Ko'ia oa' -tano nipaha-e! Ha uma-pi nikiwoi roti to lima meha' to kupokoni' -raka tauna to lima ncobu-e? Pai' hangkuja luncu-pi toro-na to nirumpu?
Pai' beiwa wo'o hante roti to pitu meha' kupokoni' -raka tauna to opo' ncobu-e? Hangkuja luncu wo'o-pi toro-na to nirumpu?
Napa pai' uma oa' nipaha kabela-na roti mpu'u to ku'uli' -e! Mo'inga' -inga' -koi hi ragi to Parisi pai' to Saduki."
Lako' ra'inca-di we'i ana'guru-nae kabela-na ragi to ragalo-ki roti to na'uli' Yesus-e. Patuju lolita-na, bona mo'inga' -inga' -ra hi tudui' to Parisi pai' to Saduki.
Hilou-ramo Yesus hante ana'guru-na hi tana' to mohu' hi Kaisarea Filipi. Hi ree mepekune' Yesus hi ana'guru-na: "Ntuku' ponguli' -ra ntodea, hema-a Aku' Ana' Manusia' toi-e?"
Ratompoi' ana'guru-na: "Ria-ra to mpo'uli' Yohanes Topeniu' -ko tuwu' nculii'. Ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli' Iko hadua nabi to owi mehupa' nculii', hewa nabi Elia, nabi Yeremia, ba nabi to ntani' -na."
Napekune' tena-ra, na'uli': "Hiaa' koi' -koiwo mpo'uli' hema-a Aku' toi-e?"
Natompoi' Simon Petrus: "Iko-mile Magau' Topetolo' -e, Ana' Alata'ala to Tuwu'."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Marasi' mpu'u-ko, Simon ana' Yunus, apa' bela manusia' to mpopo'incai-ko tetu-e, Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga-hana.
Jadi', toe pai' rahanga' Petrus-ko-- batua-na `watu.' Pai' hi lolo parawatu tohe'i kuwangu tomi-ku-- batua-na, kurumpu hawe'ea tauna to mpopangala' -a. Hawe'ea kuasa anudaa' uma mpokulei' mpodagi-ra.

Kuwai' -ko kuasa mpototu'ai ntodea Alata'ala. Napa to nubotuhi hi dunia', tetu wo'o to nabotuhi Alata'ala hi rala suruga: Ane nu'uli' neo', Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' neo'. Ane nu'uli' ma'ala moto, Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' ma'ala moto."
Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Neo' ulu ni'uli' hi hema-hema ka'Aku' -na Magau' Topetolo'."

Ntepu'u ngkai tempo toe, Yesus mpakanoto hi ana'guru-na napa to kana jadi' hi woto-na. Na'uli' -raka: "Kana hilou-a hi Yerusalem. Hi ria mpai' totu'a ngata, imam pangkeni hante guru-guru agama mpobalinai' -a pai' mposesa' -a. Rapatehi-a mpai', aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' moto-a."
Aga Petrus mpo'ai' -i hi ncori-na pai' nakorai' -i na'uli': "Neo' Pue'! Kuperapi' hi Alata'ala bona nawi'iha tetu lau ngkai Pue'."
Hampe'ili' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki Petrus: "Palai-ko topesori! Doko' nulawa' -a, bona ngalai' neo' -a mpotuku' konoa Tuama-ku? Pekiri-nu tetu-le pekiri manusia', bela pekiri Alata'ala."

Oti toe Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Hema to doko' mpotuku' -a kana mpobahaka konoa-na moto, pai' kana napaha'a kaju parika' -na-- batua-na: kana natuku' hawa' -ku nau' napopate-ki. Oti toe-di pai' lako' ma'ala-i mpotuku' -a.
Hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto, uma-i mpai' mporatai katuwua' to lompe'. Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa-na moto sabana petuku' -na hi Aku', nau' napopate-ki, hi'a mpai' to mporata katuwua' to lompe'.
Napa kalaua-na tarumpu hawe'ea ka'uaa' dunia', ane uma taratai katuwua' to lompe' hi eo mpeno-na. Apa' uma ria napa-napa to ma'ala tasula' -ki katuwua' to lompe' toe.

Bate rata mpai' tempo-na, Aku' Ana' Manusia' tumai ngkai suruga mpopehuwu kabaraka' -ku, to hewa kabaraka' Tuama-ku, pai' wori' wo'o mala'eka mpodohei-a. Nto'u toe mpai', bate kuhiwili kehi butu-butu dua tauna.
Mpu'u-mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: ngkai olo' -ni koi' toi, ria-koi mpai' to ko'ia mate kako'ia-na nihilo-a, Aku' Ana' Manusia', rata jadi' Magau'."

Ono mengi ngkai ree, Yesus mpobawai tolu ana'guru-na hilou dohe-na hi bulu' to molangko. Ana'guru to tolu toera: Petrus, Yakobus pai' Yohanes ompi' -na Yakobus. Muntu' Yesus hante ana'guru-na to tolu toera-wadi to hi ria.
Bula-ra hi ria, mobali' -mi lence-na. Lio-na mehini hewa eo, pai' pohea-na mengea' meringkila'.
Muu-mule' rahilo-rawo ana'guru-nae, ria wo'o rodua nabi to owi mpololitai Yesus. Nabi to rodua toera, Musa pai' Elia.

Ngkai ree Petrus mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Pue', lompe' lia-ta mo'oha' hi rehe'i. Ane nupokono Pue', kubabehi tolu bamaru' hi rehe'i: hameha' bagia-nu Pue', hameha' bagia-na Musa pai' hameha' wo'o bagia-na Elia."

Bula-na mololita-pidi Petrus, muu-mule' hompo-mi limu' to mehini mpokamoui-ra, pai' ngkai rala limu' toe mpo'epe-ra topololita to mpo'uli': "Hi'a toi-mi Ana' -ku to kupe'ahi'. Hi'a mpakagoe' nono-ku. Pe'epei-mi lolita-na!"
Wae kara'epe-na ana'guru-na lolita toe, tetumpopo' -ramo hi tana' apa' me'eka' lia-ra.
Tumai-i Yesus mpoganga-ra, na'uli' -raka: "Memata-mokoi, neo' me'eka'!"
Kamenaa-ra, uma-pi ria hewa to rahilo-e we'i, muntu' Yesus-damo.
Pana'u-ra ngkai lolo bulu' toe, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Neo' ulu ni'uli' hi hema-hema napa to nihilo we'i duu' -na Aku', Ana' Manusia', rapotuwu' nculii' ngkai kamatea."
Mepekune' -ramo ana'guru-na, ra'uli': "Napa pai' guru agama mpo'uli' nabi Elia ncala' -di to ri'ulu rata, pai' lako' rata-idi Magau' Topetolo' -e?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u-di, Elia kana rata mperi'ulu, apa' hi'a to mporodo hawe'ea-na.
Aga ku'uli' -kokoi, mpolia' rata-imile Elia-e, aga pangkeni ngata-ta uma mpo'incai-i. Ra'ewa lau-idi ntuku' konoa-ra. Wae wo'o mpai' Aku' Ana' Manusia' ra'ewa ntuku' konoa-ra."
Ngkai ree, rapaha-mi ana'guru-na lolita Yesus-e we'i: to rarapai' -ki nabi Elia, hi'a-mi Yohanes Topeniu'.
Kanculii' -ra Yesus hante ana'guru-na to tolu toera mpohirua' -raka ntodea, ria hadua tomane tumai mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na, mpo'uli' -ki:
"Pue', poka'ahi' -ka-kuwo ana' -ku. Mohaki' limpuangaa-i, pai' jau-i molimpu' nakeni haki' -na. Jau-i modungka hi rala apu, jau wo'o-i modungka hi rala ue.
Kukeni-imi hi ana'guru-nu, aga uma-di rapakulei' mpaka'uri' -i."

Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma mowo-koie'! Ko'ia oa' -tano mepangala' -koie! Mesapuaka oa' -pidi-koi mposapuaka konoa Alata'ala! Ni'uli' -koina hangkuja tena-pi kahae-ku dohe-ni, hangkuja tena-pi kahae-na kupengkatarii kalente pepangala' -nie! Keni tumai ana' tetui!"
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpopetibo' anudaa' to mpopedahi ana' toei. Palai-nami anudaa', pai' mo'uri' -imi-hawo topeda' toei.
Oti toe, Yesus pai' ana'guru-na malai ngkai ree, pai' ana'guru-na mpekune' -i, ra'uli': "Guru, napa pai' uma kipakulei' mpopalai anudaa' toei-e we'i?"

Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae moto-hawo-le, apa' hangkedi' rahi pepangala' -nie. Ku'uli' -kokoi: ane rii-ria-mi pepangala' -ta nau' hangkutuno' -wadi, uma ria to uma-na madupa'. Ma'ala ta'uli' -ki bulu' toe mai: `Mentoli-ko ngkai retu!' bate mentoli-ile. ((
Aga seta to hewa toe we'i, sampale-i malai ane mosampaya pai' mopuasa' -koi.))"
Nto'u Yesus hante topetuku' -na morumpu hi Galilea, na'uli' -mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Aku' Ana' Manusia', ratonu-a mpai' hi kuasa manusia'.
Rapatehi-a mpai', aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' -a." Peda' lia-mi nono topetuku' -na mpo'epe lolita-na.
Karata-na Yesus hante topetuku' -na hi ngata Kapernaum, rata to mpesingarai' paja' Tomi Alata'ala hi Petrus pai' mpekune' -i: "Ha nabayari moto-hawo Guru-ni paja' Tomi Alata'ala-e, ba uma-di?"

Na'uli' Petrus: "Nabayari moto!" Ngkai ree, nculii' -imi Simon Petrus hilou hi tomi po'ohaa' -ra. Rata hi ria, ko'ia-di napoka'alai mololita-e, ncaliu Yesus-mi mpekune' -i: "Simon, beiwa-kowo pomporata-nu: hema to kana mpobayari paja' pai' pepue' hi raja to mpokuasai ngata doo? Ntodea-na moto-di, ba pue' ngata to nakuasai-di?"

Na'uli' Petrus: "Tantu pue' ngata to nakuasai to kana mpobayari." Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane wae, ntodea-na moto uma mingki' mpobayari. Wae wo'o kita' to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala, uma-ta mingki' mpobayari paja' Tomi Alata'ala.

Aga nau' wae, agina mobayari moto-tamo, bona neo' kedi' nono-ra hi kita'. Jadi', hilou-moko hi rano mopeka. Ala' bau' uru to lomo' -na nupeka. Nurata doi hi rala nganga-na hono' pobayari paja' hi kita' rodua. Ala' doi tetu, pai' nubayari-ki paja' Tomi Alata'ala."
Hinto'u toe, tumai-ra ana'guru Yesus mpomohui' -i, ra'uli': "Pue', ane jadi' Magau' -poko mpai', hema to meliu kabohe tuwu' -na hi rala Kamagaua' -nu?"
Yesus mpokio' hadua ana' to kedi', napopokore hi laintongo' -ra,
pai' na'uli' -raka: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: ane uma nibalii' kehi-ni pai' jadi' hewa ana' to kedi' toii, uma-koi mpai' jadi' ntodea Alata'ala.
Hema to mpakadingki' nono-na pai' jadi' hewa ana' to kedi' tohe'ii, hi'a-mi to bohe mpu'u tuwu' -na ngkai hawe'ea ntodea Alata'ala.
Hema to mpotarima hadua ana' to kedi' hewa ana' toii sabana petuku' -na hi Aku', batua-na Aku' -mi to natarima.

"Aga hema to mpopanawu' hadua ana' to kedi' alaa-na uma-ipi mepangala' hi Aku', bohe mpu'u pehuku' Alata'ala hi tauna tetui. Agina lau-pi hameha' watu po'ahaa' to bohe ratoe hi wuroko' -na pai' -i ratene' hi rala tahi'.
Silaka tauna hi dunia' toi, apa' wori' to mpopanawu' -ra. Bate ria mpu'u-di to mepanawu' -e, aga silaka-ra tauna to mepanawu' toera.

"Ane rapa' -na pale-ta hamali ba witi' -ta hamali to mpakeni-ta mojeko', pua' lau-mi pai' petadi. Agina hamali-damo pale-ta ba witi' -ta, asala mporata-ta katuwua' to lompe' dohe Alata'ala. Agina lau-pi toe, ngkai palea ntimalia pai' witia' ntimalia, hiaa' ka'omea-na ratadi-ta hi rala apu to jela' ncuu.

Pai' ane rapa' -na mata-ta hamali to mpakeni-ta mojeko', jungki' pai' petadi. Agina hamali-wadi mata-ta pai' mporata katuwua' to lompe' moto-ta dohe Alata'ala, ngkai mataa ntimalia, hiaa' ka'omea-na ratadi-ta hi rala apu naraka.

"Jadi', pelompehi mpu'u-koi, neo' -koi uma mposaile' ana' -ana' to kedi' hewa ana' tohe'ii, nau' hadua. Apa' mpu'u-mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: mala'eka to mpodoo-ra tida ncuu hi nyanyoa Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga. ((
Apa' patuju-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia' tumai hi dunia', bona mpopali' tauna to molaa ngkai Alata'ala pai' mpohore-ra ngkai huku' jeko' -ra.))

"Beiwa pomporata-ni? Ria hadua tauna to ria bima-na ha'atu ma'a-na. Ane moronto hama'a, napa to nababehi? Tantu napalahii bima-na to sio mpulu' sio hi panapa bulu', pai' -i hilou mpopali' to hama'a to moronto toei.
Pai' ane narua' nculii' -ipi, mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi meliu-mi kagoe' -na mpokagoe' bima to hama'a toei, ngkai bima-na to sio mpulu' sio to uma-ra-rana moronto.
Wae wo'o Tuama-ni hi rala suruga, uma napokonoi ane ria hadua ngkai ana' to kedi' toi to molaa ngkai Hi'a.

"Ane ria ompi' hampepangalaa' -ta to masala' hi kita', hilou-ta mpohirua' -ki, pai' uli' -ki sala' -na. Tababehi toe hante uma ria to ngincai, muntu' kita' tau rodua-wadi. Ane napangala' lolita-ta, lompe' nculii' -mi pohintuwu' -ta.

Aga ane uma-i dota mpangala' lolita-ta, po'ema' hadua ba rodua dohe-ta hilou mpololitai-i. Apa' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi te'uki' hewa toi: `Ane ria tauna to rapakilu mpobabehi sala', kana ria nte rodua ba tolu to jadi' sabi', bona monoa' -mi kara-kara-na.'

Ane uma-i dota mpangala' lolita sabi' toera, bua' -imi hi hawe'ea ompi' hampepangalaa'. Ane uma oa' napangalai' nau' hawe'ea ompi' hampepangalaa' mpoparesai' -i, pelele' lau-imi-hana, taponcawa hewa tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala lau-imi, pai' hewa tauna to dada'a kehi-ra.

"Penonoi-koi! Napa to nibotuhi hi dunia', tetu wo'o to nabotuhi Alata'ala hi rala suruga: Ane koi' mpo'uli' neo', Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' neo'. Ane koi' mpo'uli' ma'ala moto, Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' ma'ala moto.
Ku'uli' wo'o: ane ria-koi hi dunia' toi nte rodua to hintuwu' mekakae mperapi' ba napa-napa, posampaya-ni toe natompoi' Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga.
Apa' hiapa tauna morumpu sabana Aku', nau' rodua ba tolu-ra-wadi, ria-a dohe-ra."
Oti toe, Petrus mpomohui' Yesus pai' mpekune' -i, na'uli': "Pue', ane ompi' hampepangalaa' -ku masala' hi aku', hangkuja ngkani kana ku'ampungi-i? Nte pitu ngkani?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma wule' pitu ngkani-wadi. Nau' mo'atu-atu ngkani-nai masala' hi kita', kana ta'ampungi-i.
Apa' Alata'ala hewa magau' to hi rala lolita rapa' toi: Ria hadua magau' doko' mpowile inta batua-na.
Lomo' -na, ria hadua batua rakeni hi nyanyoa-na to mo'inta hi juta-na.
Uma mpu'u-hawo nakulei' mpobayari inta-na toe. Jadi', mohawa' -mi magau' toei, na'uli': `Pobalu' lau-imi batua tetui hante ana' -na pai' tobine-na pai' hawe'ea rewa-na, pobayari-ki inta-na.'
"Powingkotu' -nami batua toei hi nyanyoa magau', mpopepoka'ahi', na'uli': `Mosabara-ko Magau', kubayari moto-kuwo mpai' inta-ku!'
"Ngkai ree, metumu' lau-mi ahi' -na magau' mpoka'ahi' batua-na toei. Nabahaka-imi pai' na'uli' -ki: `Inta-nu, uma-pi mingki' nubayari.'
"Palai-na batua toei, napohirua' -ki hadua hingka batua-na to mo'inta hi hi'a hi ncobu-na-wadi. Napentoe doo-na toei, nabaga' pai' na'uli' -ki: `Bayari omea-mi inta-nu!'
"Powingkotu' -nami-hawo doo-na toei mpopepoka'ahi', na'uli': `Mosabara-ko ulu bale, kubayari moto-kuwo mpai' inta-ku!'
Aga uma napangalai' pomperapia' -na toe. Napopesua' lau-imi hi rala tarungku' duu' -na tebayari omea inta-na.
"Karahilo-na batua to ntani' -na napa to jadi' tohe'e, peda' lia-mi-rawo nono-ra. Hilou-ramo hi magau' mpo'uli' kehi batua toei-e we'i.

Mpo'epe toe we'i, kamoroe-nami magau'. Mpohubui-i tauna hilou mpokio' batua to dada'a gau' -na tohe'ei. Karata-na, na'uli' -ki: `Dada'a lia-ko! Inta-nu kupori-mi ngkai rala buku-ku, apa' moranempale-moko hi aku'.
Napa-di-kona pai' uma nupoka'ahi' hingka batua-nu, hewa aku' mpoka'ahi' -koe!'
Uma-pi mowo roe-na magau'. Batua to dada'a gau' -na toei napopesua' hi rala tarungku' duu' -na tebayari oti inta-na."
Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa' toe, na'uli': "Wae wo'o Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga mpobabehi hi koi' -e, ane uma-koi mpo'ampungi doo-ni ngkai nono-ni mpu'u."
Kahudu-na Yesus mpololita hawe'ea toe, malai-imi ngkai tana' Galilea hilou hi tana' Yudea to hi dipo ue Yordan.
Wori' tauna mpotuku' -i, pai' to peda' napaka'uri'.
Ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi tumai mposori Yesus. Rapekune' -i: "Ntuku' atura agama-ta, ba ma'ala moto-hawo tomane mpogaa' -ki tobine-na nau' to uma kojerea'?"
Natompoi' Yesus: "Kiwoi napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi: lomo' -na Topejadi' mpajadi' hadua tomane pai' hadua tobine.
Pai' oti toe na'uli': `Tomane kana mpalahii tina pai' tuama-na, pai' kana tuwu' hintuwu' hante tobine-na, bona hira' tau rodua toe jadi' hewa hadua lau-ra-damo.'
Jadi', hi poncilo Alata'ala, tau hancamoko uma-pi rodua, hadua lau-ramo. Toe pai' ku'uli' -kokoi: ane ntoa' Alata'ala mpoposidai' -ra, manusia' uma ma'ala mpogaa' -ra."
Mehono' -ra to Parisi: "Ane wae, napa pai' Musa mohawa' bona tomane mpowai' sura pogaa' hi tobine, ane doko' napogaa' -ki?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Musa mpiliu-koi mogaa' -le, apa' ngkai kamotu'a nono-ni, uma tuduia'. Aga kakoo-kono-na, uma hewa toe ngkai lomo' -na.
Bona ni'inca: hema to mpogaa' -ki tobine-na pai' -i motobinei to ntani' -na, mobualo' -i-hana. Sampale-di ane mobualo' tobine-nae, ma'ala-mi napogaa' -ki."
Ngkai ree, ana'guru-na mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ane wae-di kamokoro-na ada poncamoko, agina lau-pi-hawo neo' ncamoko."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma hawe'ea tauna bisa ntarima lolita tetu. Aga ria moto tauna to napakatantu Alata'ala bona uma-ra ncamoko.

Ria tauna to uma ncamoko apa' lawi' hewa toe-hawo ngkai kaputu-ra. Ria wo'o to uma ncamoko apa' babehia tau ntani' -na. Ria wo'o to uma ncamoko apa' lawi' kadota-ra moto-rawo, bona mologa-ra mpobago bago Alata'ala. Hema to mpakule' mpotuku' tudui' toi, lompe' ane natuku'."
Hangkani, ria tauna to mpokeni ana' -ra hi Yesus bona najama-ra pai' naposampayai. Aga ana'guru-na mpokaroe tauna toera.
Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Pelele' moto-ra ana' tetura tumai hi Aku', neo' -ra nitagi. Apa' tauna to hewa toe-ramo to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na."
Ngkai ree, najama-ramo ana' toera, pai' -ra nagane'. Oti toe, malai-imi ngkai ree.
Hangkani, ria hadua tomane rata hi Yesus mpopekune' -i: "Guru, kehi napa to lompe' kana kubabehi bona mporata-a katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa pai' nupekune' -a beiwa kehi to lompe' -e? Uma ria ntani' -na to lompe', hadua Alata'ala-wadi. Ane doko' mporata katuwua' to lompe' -ko, tuku' -mi parenta Alata'ala."
Mepekune' tena-i tau tohe'ei: "Parenta to'uma?" Natompoi' Yesus: "Neo' mepatehi, neo' mobualo', neo' manako, neo' mosabi' boa',
kana tabila' tina tuama-ta, pai' poka'ahi' doo-ta hewa kampoka'ahi' -ta woto-ta moto."
Na'uli' kabilasa toei: "Hawe'ea parenta tetu lau, kutuku' omea-mi. Napa-pi to kana kubabehi?"

Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane doko' -ko mpotuku' Alata'ala hante karoli' -roli' nono-nu, lou-moko ulu mpobalu' rewa-nu, pai' doi oli-na wai' -raka tokabu. Ane nubabehi hewa toe, bohe mpai' rasi' to nurata hi rala suruga. Oti toe, pai' tumai-moko mpotuku' -a."
Mpo'epe toe we'i, kapeda' -nami nono-na pai' -i malai-mi, apa' wori' rewa-na.
Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus hi ana'guru-na: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: mokoro rahi tauna to mo'ua' jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na.
Ku'uli' wo'o: mojoli-pi hama'a unta ntara hi wulou' jaru ngkai tauna to mo'ua' mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ra."
Kara'epe ana'guru-na lolita Yesus toe, rapokakonce lia, ra'uli': "Ei', ane wae-di, hema lau-damo to ma'ala mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae!"
Yesus mponaa-ra pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ane hante pakulea' manusia' -le, uma ami' hema. Aga ane Alata'ala, uma ria to uma napakule'."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi-hawo Petrus: "Hiaa' kai', kipalahii omea-mi-kaina bona mpotuku' -ko. Hiwili napa mpai' to kirata?"

Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hi eo mpeno-na nto'u Alata'ala mpobo'ui omea, Aku' Ana' Manusia' mohura hi pohuraa to ncola moparenta. Nto'u toe mpai', koi' to mpotuku' -a toi-e, mohura wo'o-ko-koiwo hi pohuraa to hampulu' romeha', mpoparentai to Israel to hampulu' rontina.

Hema-hema to mpalahii ompi' -na, tuama-na ba tina-na, ana' -na ba tomi-na ba bonea-na sabana mpotuku' -a, bate mporata-i mpai' ha'atu ngkani hiwili-na, pai' mporata wo'o-i katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
Aga wori' tauna to bohe tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' kedi' tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno. Pai' wori' wo'o tauna to kedi' tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' bohe tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau', kajadi' -na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i: Hadua pue' bonea anggur hilou mpopali' tauna to dota mobago hi bonea-na. Mepupulo modao' -i mporua' tauna,
na'uli' -raka: `Hilou-koi mobago hi bonea-ku, kuwai' -koi hore hampepa' doi pera' gaji' -ni ha'eo.' Rapo'io' -mi lolita-na toe, hilou mpu'u-ramo.
Jaa sio, hilou wo'o-imi mpali' to ntani' -na, nahilo ba hangkuja dua tauna ntora-ntora hi wiwi' karajaa.
Na'uli' -raka: `Hilou-koi mobago hi bonea-ku, kuwai' moto-koi gaji' to masipato'.' Hilou mpu'u-ramo-rawo.
Tebua' eo, hilou wo'o-imi mpopali' tauna, na'uli' -raka: `Hilou-koi mobago hi bonea-ku.' Wae wo'o jaa tolu libe eo.
"Ncimonou' -mi, ba neo' jaa lima, modao' wo'o-imi mporua' tauna to ntora. Napekune' -ra: `Napa pai' ntora-ntora mara-wadi-koi ha'eoa, uma-ko-koina mobago-e?'
"Ratompoi' -i: `Apa' uma hema to mpopobago-kai.' "Na'uli' pue' bonea toei: `Ane wae, hilou-mokoi mobago hi bonea-ku.' Hilou mpu'u-ramo-rawo.

"Limpa-mi eo, na'uli' -mi pue' bonea hi mantoro' -na: `Kio' -ramo topobago toera ria, pai' wai' -ramo gaji' -ra. Wai' ulu gaji' hi tauna to lako' ntepu'u mobago jaa lima we'i. Oti toe, wai' gaji' hi tauna to ntepu'u mobago jaa tolu, duu' rata hi tauna to mobago ngkai mepuloa.'
"Tumai mpu'u-ramo to mobago ntepu'u jaa lima ncimonou', mporata-ramo gaji' himpau hampepa' doi pera'.

Kawae-kawae-na duu' -na rata wo'o-ra-rawo to mobago ngkai mepuloa-e ngone. To mobago ngkai mepulo toera mpo'uli' hi rala nono-ra: `Tantu meliu mpai' to nawai' -taka kita', apa' ha'eoa-ta-tana mobago!' Ntaa' we'i, bate hampepa' doi pera' wo'o-wadi-rawo to rarata-e.
Kampohilo-ra gaji' -ra tohe'e, ngkunuti-ramo mpongkunutii pue' bonea, ra'uli':
`To lako' rata mobago hi ka'omea-na, muntu' hajaa-ra-wadi mobago. Hiaa' kai', mobago ha'eoa-ka-kaina, nahimai' eo to ngkerepa'. Napa-di pai' nubayari-ra hibaa-balia hante kai'?'
"Hampetompoi' pue' bonea toei: `Uma-a masala' hi koi', bale. Ha uma pojanci-tami mporata-koi gaji' hampepa' doi pera' rala-na ha'eo?
Ala' -mi-koiwo gaji' -ni pai' hilou-mokoi! Konoa-kumi mpowai' gaji' hi tauna to rata ka'omea-na hibalia hante to kuwai' -kokoi koi'.
Ha uma ma'ala kubabehi ntuku' konoa-ku hante doi-ku? Napa pai' mohingi' -koi hi doo ane lompe' nono-ku hi hira'?'"

Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa' toe, na'uli': "Wae wo'o mpai' hi eo mpeno-na: wori' tauna to kedi' tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' bohe tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno. Pai' wori' wo'o tauna to bohe tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' kedi' tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno."
Nto'u toe, Yesus mako' mpotoa' ngata Yerusalem. Hi lengko ohea nakio' -ra ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua morumpu mopatani', pai' na'uli' -raka:
"Epe-koi! Hilou-tamo tohe'i-e mpotoa' Yerusalem. Hi ria mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia' ratonu hi imam pangkeni pai' guru agama, pai' rabotuhi bona rapatehi-a.
Oti toe mpai', ratonu-a hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi, rapopo'ore', raweba', pai' rapatehi-a hi kaju parika'. Aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' moto-a."
Nto'u toe, rata tobine-na Zebedeus hante ana' -na rodua hi Yesus. Motingkua' -i hi nyanyoa-na apa' ria to naperapi'.

Napekune' Yesus: "Napa to nuperapi' -e?" Na'uli' totina toei: "Pomperapia' -kule, bona ane jadi' Magau' -poko mpai', ana' -ku to rodua tohe'ira mohura pai' moparenta hangkaa-ngkania dohe-nu, hadua hi mali ka'ana-nu, hadua hi mali ki'ii-nu."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Uma ni'incai napa to niperapi' tetu. Ha nipakule' mpai' mpokolo kaparia to kana kukolo-e?" Ratompoi' ana'guru to rodua toera: "Kipakule' moto!"

Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u, bate nikolo mpai' kaparia hewa to kukolo. Aga hema to mohura hi mali ka'ana-ku pai' hi mali ki'ii-ku, bela Aku' to mpakatantu. Tuama-ku-hana to mpakatantu hema to mporata bagia tetu."
Kara'epe-na ana'guru-na to hampulu' pomperapia' doo-ra to rodua toera, kamoroe-rami mpokaroe-ra.

Toe pai' Yesus mpokio' -ra omea pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ni'inca moto kasoa-ra topoparenta to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala mpoparentai ntodea-na. Tauna to bohe pangka' -ra mpewuku ntodea-na mpotuku' hawa' -na.
Aga koi', neo' hewa toe kehi-ni. Hema-koi to doko' bohe pangka' -na, kana jadi' pahawaa'.
Pai' hema to doko' bohe hanga' -na kana jadi' batua-ni.

Kana nituku' po'ingku-ku, Aku' Ana' Manusia'. Patuju-ku tumai hi dunia', uma bona jadi' topohawa'. Pai' -a tumai-le, bona jadi' pahawaa', duu' -na mpewai' woto-ku rapatehi mpotolo' sala' tauna to wori'."
Kamalai-ra Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ngkai ngata Yerikho, mo'iko-ra-damo tauna mpotuku' -i.
Hi wiwi' ohea, ria rodua tauna to wero mohura. Kape'epe-ra towero toera Kayesus-na to liu, mekio' -ramo, ra'uli': "Pue', muli Magau' Daud! Poka'ahi' -ka-kaiwo!"
Tauna to wori' hi ree mpokaroe-ra, ra'uli': "Ngkalino-koi!" Uma-rawo rapangalai', rahuduwukui lau-mi mejeu': "Pue', muli Magau' Daud, poka'ahi' -ka-kaiwo!"
Mento'o-imi Yesus, pai' -i mpokio' -ra tumai, na'uli' -raka: "Napa to nipokono kubabehi-kokoi?"
Ratompoi' -i: "Pue', doko' -ka-kaiwo pehilo!"
Metumu' -mi ahi' -na Yesus, toe pai' naganga mata-ra. Ncaliu pehilo-ramo, pai' -ra mpotuku' Yesus.
Mohu' -ramo hi Yerusalem, rata-ra hi ngata Betfage hi Bulu' Zaitun. Hi ree, Yesus mpohubui rodua ana'guru-na hilou meri'ulu,
na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-koi hi ngata to tanyanyohi toe mai. Rata-koi mpai' hi ria, nihilo hama'a keledai to tehoo' pai' ana' -na mohu' dohe-na. Bongka koloro-na pai' keni-ra tumai.
Ane ria to mpokamaro-koi, uli' -raka: `Apa' Pue' mparaluu-ra. Napoponculi' moto-kokoi mpai'.'"
Tohe'e majadi' bona madupa' napa to na'uli' nabi owi, hewa toi:
"Uli' -raka pue' ngata Sion: Hilo, etu-imi tumai Magau' -ni! Dingki' nono-na, mpohawi' -i hama'a keledai, mpohawi' -i hama'a ana' keledai to mongura."
Jadi', hilou mpu'u-ramo ana'guru-na to rodua toera, rababehi hewa to nahubui-raka.
Rakeni keledai to ntali ana' toera, ralampii hante baju-ra. Oti ralampii, mehawi' -imi Yesus.
Hilou-ramo mpotoa' Yerusalem. Hi kaliua-na Yesus toe, wori' lia tauna mpokodo pohea-ra hi mata ohea, pai' hantongo' mpoho'a rau kaju pai' rakodo hi mata ohea bona mpobila' -i.

Wori' tauna mpotuku' -i, ria-ra to meri'ulu, ria wo'o-ra to hi boko'. Ntora mogora-ra mpo'uli': Une' -imi muli Magau' Daud!" Pue' Ala mpogane' Magau' to tumai mpokeni hanga' -na!" Une' -imi Pue' Ala to hi rala suruga!"
Pesua' -na Yesus hi ngata Yerusalem, konce-mi pue' ngata, ra'uli': "Hema-idie?"
Ratompoi' tauna to dohe-na: "Yesus-le, nabi ngkai Nazaret tana' Galilea."

Oti toe, mesua' -imi Yesus hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala, pai' -i mpopalai hawe'ea tauna to mobabalu' hi ree. Nabilingko-raka meja' -meja' posulaa' -ra doi, pai' nabilingko wo'o pohuraa topobabalu' danci mangkebodo.
Na'uli' -raka: "Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' Alata'ala mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Tomi-ku mpai' rakahangai' tomi posampayaa.' Hiaa' koi' -koina, niponcawa tomi toperampaki-di!"
Hi Tomi Alata'ala, tauna towero pai' topungku rata hi Yesus, pai' napaka'uri' -ra.
Aga imam-imam pangkeni pai' guru-guru agama, moroe-ra mpohilo tanda mekoncehi to nababehi Yesus. Gigi nono-ra mpo'epe ana' to mogora hi rala Tomi Alata'ala to mpo'uli': "Une' -imi muli Magau' Daud!"

Toe pai' ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Nu'epe wa napa to ra'uli' -e!" Na'uli' Yesus: "Ku'epe moto. Ko'ia-tano nibasa hi rala Buku Tomoroli' -e to mpo'uli': `Nutudui' -ramo ana' -ana' pai' ana'lei mpohowa' lolita pe'une' hi Iko.'"
Ngkai ree, malai-imi Yesus mpalahii-ra hilou hi mali ngata, turu hi Betania.
Kampeneo-na mepulo ngkii, hi pomako' -ra Yesus pai' ana'guru-na nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem, mo'oro' -imi Yesus.

Mpohilo-i hi wiwi' ohea hangkaju kaju ara. Hilou-i hi tawu-na mpali' wua' -na, aga uma ria nau' hantakua, muntu' rau-na-wadi. Toe pai' Yesus mpototowi kaju toei, na'uli': "Ngkai eo toe lau, uma-poko mowua' -wua' kaju toi-ko!" Kamolaju-nami kaju ara toei.
Wae karahilo-na ana'guru-na to jadi' toe, rapokakonce, ra'uli': "Beiwa pai' kaliliu molaju kaju ara toei-e mai?"

Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, ane nipangala' pai' uma-koi morara', ma'ala wo'o-ko-koiwo mpobabehi hewa to kubabehi hi kaju toe we'i. Pai' uma muntu' tohe'e, ma'ala-koi mpololitai bulu' tohe'i: `Te'ongko' -moko, pengkanawu' -ko hi rala tahi'!' bate majadi' tetu.
Napa-napa to niperapi' hi rala posampaya-ni, ane nipangala', bate nitarima."

Mesua' wo'o-imi Yesus hi rala Tomi Alata'ala pai' metudui'. Bula-na metudui', rata-ramo imam pangkeni hante totu'a to Yahudi mpekune' -i, ra'uli': "Uli' -kakai, ngkaiapa huraa-nu mpobabehi hawe'ea tetu hi Tomi Alata'ala! Hema to mpowai' -ko kuasa hewa tetu?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku', ria wo'o-kuwo pompekunea' -ku hi koi'. Ane nitompoi' -ka, bo ku'uli' -kokoi kangkaiapa-na kuasa-ku mpobabehi hawe'ea toe lau.

Uli' -ka pe': ngkaiapa kuasa-na Yohanes Topeniu' mponiu' tauna? Ngkai Alata'ala-di, ba ngkai manusia' -di?" Momepololitai-ramo pangkeni to Yahudi toera, ra'uli': "Beiwa-tale' mpotompoi' -ie? Ane ta'uli' ngkai Alata'ala kuasa-na, na'uli' -taka mpai': `Ane wae, napa pai' uma-i nipangala'?'
Hiaa' ane ta'uli' ngkai manusia' -wadi kuasa-na, mpoka'eka' -ta ntodea, apa' ntodea toera mpo'uli' Yohanes toe hadua nabi."
Jadi', ratompoi' -i: "Uma ki'incai." Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane wae, uma wo'o-kuwo ku'uli' -kokoi kangkaiapa kuasa-ku mpobabehi toe lau."

Napokaliliu Yesus lolita-na hi pangkeni agama Yahudi toera, na'uli': "Beiwa pomporata-ni tohe'i: Ria hadua tuama, rodua-ki ana' -na, paka' tomane. Hilou-i hi to tuaka, na'uli' -ki: `Uto', eo toe lau, hilou-ko mobago hi bonea.'
"Natompoi': `Oja' -a Mama!' Aga ka'omea-na mobali' nono-na, hilou moto-i mobago hi bonea.
"Ngkai ree, hilou wo'o-i hi ana' -na to tu'ai, na'uli' -ki: `Uto', hilou-ko mobago hi bonea.' "Natompoi' ana' toei: `Io', hilou moto-a Mama.' Ntaa' uma-idi hilou-e!"

Ngkai ree, mepekune' -i Yesus hi pangkeni agama Yahudi, na'uli': "Jadi', ngkai ana' to rodua toera, hema to mpotuku' hawa' tuama-ra?" Ra'uli' pangkeni to Yahudi toera: "To lomo' -na." Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: tauna topojeko', hewa topesingara' paja' pai' tobine to uma tumotoa gau' -ra, hira' lau-mi to natarima Alata'ala jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua' -na, bela koi'.

Apa' Yohanes Topeniu' mpotudui' -koi ohea to monoa', aga uma-koi dota mpopangala' -i. Hiaa' topesingara' paja' pai' tobine to uma tumotoa gau' -ra, rapangala' -i-rana. Pai' nau' nihilo-mi toe, uma oa' nibalii' gau' -ni pai' uma oa' nipangala' -i."

Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka pangkeni agama Yahudi: "Epe wo'o-koi lolita rapa' tohe'i. Ria hadua pue' bonea mpohu'ai bonea-na hante anggur. Nawala ntololikia-na, nababehi pompeaa' anggur, pai' natunya' wo'o pongko pompodooa. Oti toe, napewai' bonea-na rapobago hi ba hangkuja dua tauna, pai' hilou-imi hi ngata to molaa.
Rata-mi tempo pohopua' wua' anggur, napahawa' -ra ba hangkuja dua batua-na hilou mperapi' bagia-na.
Aga topobago bonea toera mpohoko' batua to napahawa': ria-ra to rapao', ria to rapana' watu, ria wo'o to rapatehi.
Pue' bonea toei mpahawa' tena batua-na to ntani' -na, meliu kawori' -ra ngkai to lomo' -na. Aga rapohewa toe wo'o-ra-wadi.
Ka'omea-na, na'uli': `Agina ana' -ku moto-mi kupahawa' hilou, bate rapengkorui-i mpai'.'

"Ntaa' we'i, karahilo-na topobago bonea toera ana' pue' bonea tohe'ei, mohawa' -ramo ra'uli': `Etu-imi tumai ana' -na, hi'a mpai' to jadi' pue' bonea toi-e. Kita tapatehi-i, bona bonea toi kita' -mi mpai' pue' -na.'
Karahoko' -nami ana' toei, radii' hilou hi mali bonea pai' rapatehi."
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka pangkeni agama Yahudi: "Jadi', ane rata nculii' -ipi pue' bonea-e, napopai-ra topobago bonea-na toera-e?"
Ratompoi' -i: "Tantu napatehi-ra tauna to dada'a toera, pai' bonea-na nawai' -raka tau ntani' -na to dota mpowai' -i bagia-na hi tempo-na."

Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Tantu nibasa-mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa pesapuaka-ni hi Aku', hewa toi moni-na: `Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi, watu toe lau-mi to jadi' poko parawatu. Tohe'e majadi' ntuku' konoa Pue' Alata'ala, uma mowo kalompe' -na hi poncilo-ta.'"

Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Jadi', apa' oja' -koi mpotarima-a jadi' Magau' -ni, wae-pi, bagia-ni hi rala Kamagaua' -na Alata'ala, ra'ala' ngkai koi' pai' rawai' -raka tauna to mpobabehi po'ingku to natao hi ntodea Alata'ala. ((
Hewa kura to monawu' hi watu mopengka, pai' hewa kura to napitihi watu moreja', hewa toe wo'o mpai' tauna to mposapuaka-a.))"
Kara'epe-na imam pangkeni pai' to Parisi lolita-lolita rapa' Yesus toe, ra'inca kahira' -na to natoa'.
Toe pai' rapali' -mi ohea-ra mpohoko' -i. Aga uma-ra daho', apa' mpoka'eka' -ra ntodea, apa' ntodea mpo'uli' Yesus hadua nabi.
Mololita tena-i Yesus hi pangkeni agama Yahudi toera, mpo'uli' -raka hanyala-pi lolita rapa'. Na'uli':
"Alata'ala hewa magau' to hi rala jarita toi: Hadua magau' mpobabehi karamea hi poncamokoa ana' -na.
Mohawa' -i hi pahawaa' -na hilou mpokio' tauna to rahinta' hewa toi: `Hilou-tamo ngkoni' hi posusaa' poncamokoa!' Aga hawe'ea to rakio' toera, uma-ra dota hilou.

Toe pai' nahubui tena pahawaa' -na to ntani' -na, na'uli' -raka: `Uli' -raka to rahinta': pongkoni' taha' -mi, japi hante porewua to morudu' ntani' -na rasumale' -mi, rodo-mi omea. Kita-mi hilou hi posusaa' poncamokoa!'
Aga hawe'ea to rakio' toera uma mposaile' pekio' toe. Hore-hore hilou hi pobagoa-ra moto-ra. Ria-ra to hilou hi bonea-ra, ria-ra to hilou hi bago-ra ntani' -na.
To ntani' -na wo'o-ra mpohoko' pahawaa' magau' toe, rapao' pai' rapatehi.
Kana'epe-na magau' napa to jadi' tohe'e, moroe lia-imi. Nahubui tantara-na hilou mpatehi topepatehi toera, pai' mposuwe ngata-ra.
"Oti toe, nakio' wo'o-ramo pahawaa' -na, na'uli' -raka: `Susa' poncamokoa rodo-mi, aga tauna to kukio', uma-ra natao mpokaralai.
Wae-pi, hilou-mokoi hi ohea kama, hema-hema to nirua', bawai-ramo tumai mpokaralai susa' poncamokoa.'
Kahilou-rami-rawo pahawaa' toera hi ohea mporumpu hawe'ea tauna to liu, uma mpenara' ba to lompe' gau' -ra ba to dada'a. Ka'omea-na ihia' mpu'u-mi tomi posusaa' hante torata.
"Mesua' -imi magau' toei mpokamata torata. Nahilo-hawo hi olo' torata, ria hadua to uma moheai pohea posusa'.
Na'uli' magau': `Bale, napa-kona pai' tumai-ko hi posusaa' uma-ko moheai pohea posusa' -e?' Uma-i-hawo winihi.
Ngkai ree, mohawa' -imi magau' mpo'uli' -raka pahawaa' -na: `Hilu' witi' -na, hoo' pale-na, petadi-i hi mali-na rala kabengia-na! Hi ria-i mpai' geo' pai' ntodohaka.'"
Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa' -na hewa toi: "Wori' tauna to nakio' Alata'ala, aga hangkedi' -ra-wadi to napelihi jadi' ntodea-na."
Ngkai ree, malai-ramo to Parisi ngkai Tomi Alata'ala. Mohawa' -ra mpali' akala beiwa-ra ma'ala mpo'opa kahala' lolita-na Yesus mpotompoi' pompekunea' -ra.

Rarata-mi akala-ra: mpahawa' -ra ba hangkuja dua topetuku' -ra hante ba hangkuja dua tauna to tono' hi Magau' Herodes hilou hi Yesus. Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki: "Guru, ki'inca Guru tau manoa'. Monoa' lia tudui' -nu mpo'uli' napa konoa Alata'ala hi manusia'. Uma nupengkorui ba hema-hema, apa' uma-ko mpelence tauna.
Toe pai' kiperapi' bona nu'uli' -kakai, beiwa pomporata-nu Guru: ntuku' atura agama-ta, ba ma'ala moto-ta mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar, ba uma-di?"
Na'inca Yesus patuju nono-ra to dada'a toe, toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Hilo mpu'u-koie' topebagiu! Napa pai' doko' ni'opa kahala' lolita-ku!
Popehuwu-ka pe' doi to biasa nibayari-ki paja' -e." Ratonu-miki hampepa' doi pera'.
Na'uli' Yesus: "Lence hema pai' hanga' hema to hi doi toi?"
Ratompoi': "Lence pai' hanga' Kaisar." Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane wae-di, wai' -ki Kaisar napa to kasipato' -na rawai' -ki Kaisar, pai' wai' -ki Alata'ala napa to kasipato' -na rawai' -ki Alata'ala."
Kara'epe-na petompoi' Yesus tohe'e, rapokakonce. Kamalai-rami mpalahii Yesus.
Hi eo toe wo'o, ba hangkuja dua to Saduki rata hi Yesus. To Saduki toera, pangkeni agama Yahudi to mposapuaka tauna to mate tuwu' nculii' hi eo mpeno.

Rata to Saduki toera mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, nabi Musa metudui' hewa toi: Ane hadua tomane mate, hiaa' uma-ki ria ana' -na, pudupuhe-na kana mpotobine balu-na, bona ria-ki-hawo muli-na tomate toei.
Jadi', ria pitu to ntali ompi' paka' tomane. To ulumua' motobinei, mate-i uma ria ana' -na. Balu-na napotobine tu'ai-na.
Ko'ia wo'o rapoka'alai mo'anai', mate wo'o-imi-hawo to tu'ai toei. Wae oa' -mi majadi' hi katolu-na duu' -na hi kapitu-na.
Ka'omea-na, mate wo'o-imi-hawo tobine toei.
Jadi' hi eo mpeno-na, ane tuwu' nculii' mpu'u-di hawe'ea tomate-e, hema-ramo mpai' pue' tobine toei? Apa' hawe'ea-ra mpotobine-imi."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Sala' rahi pekiri-ni tetu, apa' uma nipaha ihi' Buku Tomoroli', uma wo'o ni'incai baraka' -na Alata'ala.
Apa' ane tuwu' nculii' -ramo tauna to mate, katuwu' -ra hewa katuwu' mala'eka hi rala suruga, uma-rapa motobinei ba motomanei.
Ha ko'ia ria nibasa lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpakanoto katuwu' -ra nculii' tomate-e? Ria Lolita Alata'ala owi to mpo'uli' -kokoi hewa toi:

`Aku' toi-mi Alata'ala to napue' Abraham, Alata'ala to napue' Ishak, Alata'ala to napue' Yakub.' Batua-na, nau' mahae-ramo mate Abraham, Ishak pai' Yakub, bate tuwu' moto-ra. Apa' bela tauna to mate to mepue' hi Alata'ala, tauna to tuwu' -hana to mpopue' -i."
Kara'epe-na ntodea tudui' -na Yesus toe, rapokakonce.
To Saduki uma-pi tepehono', apa' nadagi-ramo Yesus. Kara'epe-na to Parisi toe, moromu wo'o-ramo-rawo mpopali' akala-ra mpo'akalai Yesus.
Hadua ngkai laintongo' -ra, hadua guru agama, mperao mpo'opa petompoi' Yesus hante pompekunea' -na, na'uli':
"Guru, ngkai hawe'ea parenta hi rala Atura Pue', parenta to'uma to meliu kabohe-na?"
Na'uli' Yesus: `Kana tapoka'ahi' Pue' -ta Pue' Alata'ala hante nono-ta mpu'u, tatonu hawe'ea katuwu' -ta hi Hi'a, pai' tapoka'ahi' -i hudu inca-ta.'
Toe-mi parenta to meliu kabohe-na, pai' to lomo' -na mpu'u.
Pai' parenta karonyala-na to hibalia hante to lomo' -na toe: `Kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa pompoka'ahi' -ta woto-ta moto.'
Hawe'ea Atura Pue' pai' tudui' nabi-nabi mentoe hi parenta to ronyala toe."
Bula-ra to Parisi ria-pidi morumpu hi retu, Yesus mpekune' -ra:
"Beiwa pomporata-ni, hema-i Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala-e? Muli hema-i?" Ratompoi': "Muli Magau' Daud."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane wae-di, napa pai' Daud mpokahangai' -i Pue' -na? Hante petete' Inoha' Tomoroli', Daud mpotompo'wiwi Magau' Topetolo' hewa toi:
Pue' Ala mpo'uli' -ki Pue' -ku: `Mohura-moko hi mali ngka'ana-ku, duu' -na kupopengkoru hawe'ea bali' -nu hi Iko.'
Jadi', ane muli Daud mpu'u-idi Magau' Topetolo' -e, napa pai' Daud mpokahangai' -i Pue' -na?"
Uma ria haduaa to mpotompoi' -i. Ntepu'u ngkai eo toe, uma-pi hema to daho' mpekune' ba napa-napa hi Yesus.
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpololitai ntodea pai' topetuku' -na, na'uli':
"Guru-guru agama pai' to Parisi mohura hi pohuraa Musa, apa' hira' to mpotudui' -koi Atura Musa.
Toe pai' kana nituku' omea napa to ratudui' -kokoi. Aga neo' nipenau' po'ingku-ra, apa' hira' toe uma mpotuku' napa to ratudui' -kokoi.
Hira' toe mpopokoloi ntodea hante parenta pai' ada to motomo, hiaa' hira' moto, uma-ra mpotulungi ntodea mpotuku' parenta pai' ada toe.

"Wori' moto-hawo po'ingku-ra to lompe', aga patuju-ra mpobabehi po'ingku toe, bona rahilo doo-wadi. Mpopake' -ra tali posampaya to mopepa' -pepa', pai' rapokaloe wua' baju-ra, bona petuku' -ra hi Atura Musa ma'ala rahilo doo.
Goe' -ra ane rapopohura-ra hi pohuraa to lompe' hi posusaa'. Goe' -ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa.
Goe' -ra ane ria tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-ra pai' mpokahangai' -ra `Guru.'
"Aga koi', neo' -koi mpopebila' pai' doko' rakahangai' `Guru,' apa' hadua-wadi Guru-ni, pai' koi' omea ntali ompi' -wadi.
Pai' neo' wo'o nipomolangko rahi ba hema-hema hi dunia' toi pai' mpokahangai' -ra `Tuama,' apa' Tuama-ni hadua-wadi, Hi'a-mi Tuama-ni to hi rala suruga.
Pai' neo' wo'o-koi doko' rakahangai' `Pangkeni,' apa' Pangkeni-ni hadua-wadi, Hi'a-mi Magau' Topetolo'.
Hema-koi to doko' bohe tuwu' -na, kana jadi' pahawaa' hi doo-na.
Tauna to mpakalangko nono-ra, Pue' Ala bate mpodingkihi-ra, pai' tauna to mpakadingki' nono-ra, Pue' Ala mpomolangko-ra.

"Pai' koi' guru agama pai' to Parisi! Bate mporata silaka-koi mpai'! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Tauna to doko' jadi' ntodea Alata'ala, nitagi-ra. Koi' moto uma dota jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala, pai' tau ntani' -na to doko' jadi' ntodea-na, nihalawai' lau-rada. ((

"Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Nibagiu tobine tobalu pai' nihagoi tomi-ra. Pai' mosampaya-koi nipomoloe-loe, bona tewunii' gau' -ni to dada'a tetu. Motomo lia mpai' huku' -ni.))

"Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Mako' molaa-koi medipo tahi' modao' hi role-na, bona ngalai' ria nte hadua tauna to jadi' topetuku' -ni. Pai' ane ria-pi topetuku' -ni, nitudui' -ra mpotuku' pebagiu-ni, alaa-na meliu kadada'a gau' -ra ngkai koi', pai' meliu kamasipato' -ra rahuku' hi naraka ngkai koi'.

"Bate silaka-koi mpai'! Koi' hewa to wero to doko' mpotete' doo! Metudui' -koi hewa toi: Ane ria tauna to mpobabehi pojanci pai' mosumpa-i mpokahangai' Tomi Alata'ala, ni'uli' uma-i tehoo' hante sumpa-na toe. Hiaa' ane mpokahangai' -i bulawa to hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, tehoo' -i hante sumpa-na toe.
Wojo mpu'u-koi, hewa to wero-koi! Ha ni'uli' -koina bulawa to meliu ngkai Tomi Alata'ala! Hiaa' bo Tomi Alata'ala toe-di to mpomoroli' bulawa to hi rala-na.

Metudui' wo'o-koi hewa toi: Ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' meja' pontunua pepue' to hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, uma-i tehoo' hante sumpa-na toe. Aga ane mpokahangai' -i pepue' to ratunu hi lolo meja' toe, ni'uli' bate tehoo' -i hante sumpa-na.
Hewa to wero mpu'u-koi! Ha ni'uli' -koina, pepue' to meliu ngkai meja' pontunua pepue'? Uma-e', apa' meja' toe-di to mpomoroli' pepue' to hi lolo-nae.
Ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' meja' pontunua pepue', batua-na mpokahangai' -i meja' toe pai' hawe'ea to ratunu hi lolo-na.
Pai' ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' Tomi Alata'ala, batua-na mpokahangai' -i Tomi Alata'ala pai' Alata'ala to mo'oha' hi tomi toe.
Pai' ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' suruga, batua-na mpokahangai' -i pohuraa Alata'ala, pai' mpokahangai' wo'o-i Alata'ala to mohura hi pohuraa toe.

"Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Ntahawe' hinu'a to kedi', hewa tarangkada', ngkoromonyi' pai' wunga bonea, nipopepue' hampobagiahampulu' hi Alata'ala. Hiaa' parenta hi rala Atura Pue' to bohe mpu'u, hewa po'ingku to monoa', ma'ahi' hi doo, pai' mpo'ihii' janci, uma nisaile'. Kakoo-kono-na, ke parenta to bohe toe-hanale to kana nituku' -e, pai' neo' wo'o nilipo' mpotuku' parenta to kedi'.
Koi' hewa towero to mpotete' doo. Koi' hewa tauna to mpolali koromu' nete' ngkai ue ininu-ni, hiaa' hama'a unta, to bohe lia, ni'ome' lau.

"Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Koi' hewa tauna to mpobohoi' sangkiri' pai' piri hi mali-na-wadi, hiaa' hi rala-na babo' moto. Ada agama to kahiloa hi mali-na-wadi nituku' lia. Hiaa' hi rala nono-ni jampa pai' mpokahina anu doo-koi.
Hewa towero mpu'u-koi, koi' to Parisi! Bohoi' ulu rala-na sangkiri', bona lompe' wo'o to hi mali-na.

"Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Hewa daeo' to rasapuru' bula-koi: hi mali-na lompe' -damo hiloa-na, hiaa' bo hi rala-na paka' wuku kiu pai' wori' nyala to merungkui.
Wae wo'o koi': ane hi pogau' to hi mali-na to rahilo doo, monoa' -koi. Hiaa' hi rala nono-ni topebagiu-koi pai' dada'a kehi-ni.
"Silaka-koi, guru agama pai' to Parisi! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi! Nipenasa-damo mpakalompe' daeo' -ra nabi-nabi pai' tauna to monoa' owi.
Molangko nono-ni, ni'uli': `Ane ke rapa' -na tuwu' -makai hingkala'ia hante totu'a-kai owi, ke uma-ka-kaina mpodohei-ra mpatehi nabi-nabi.'
Jadi', nipangaku' moto kakoi' -na muli-ra to mpatehi nabi-nabi, pai' kehi ntu'a-ni tetu bate ni'uhi.
Wae-pi, pokaliliu lau-mi mpobabehi jeko' hewa to rababehi ntu'a-ni tetu!
"He topebagiu, he koi' to bengku' gau' -ni! Ha ni'uli' -koina tewi'iha-koi mpai' ngkai huku' -ni hi rala naraka-e?

Ntu'a-ni owi mpopatehi wori' tauna to monoa' ingku-ra, ntepu'u ngkai kampopatehi-ra Habel, tauna to monoa' ingku-na owi, rata-rata hi kampopatehi-ni Zakharia ana' Berekia, to nipatehi hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala hi olo' tomi to moroli' pai' meja' pontunua pepue'. Jadi', hi koi' to tuwu' tempo toi, kupahawa' wo'o mpai' nabi, tauna to pante pai' guru to mpotudui' -koi lolita-ku. Hantongo' -ra mpai' nipatehi, hantongo' -ra niparika', ria wo'o-ra to niweba' hi rala tomi posampayaa-ni, ria wo'o-ra to nidapa' hilou hi ngata-ngata petiboa' -ra. Ka'omea-na mpai', koi' to tuwu' tempo toi-mi to mpokolo hawe'ea kasalaa' totu'a-ni to mpatehi tauna to monoa' owi.
Wae mpu'u-di! Koi' to tuwu' tempo toi bate rahuku' sabana hawe'ea kasalaa' -ra totu'a-ni toe.

"Ee to Yerusalem! to Yerusalem! Nipatehi-ra-koina nabi-nabi, pai' nipana' watu-ra-koina tauna to nasuro Alata'ala hi koi'. Wori' ngkani-mi kupehuka' ngkupui-koi, hewa hama'a manu' tina mpo'urui ana' -na hi une' pani' -na, aga uma-koi dota.
Bona ni'inca: tomi pepuea' -ni toi napalahii-kokoi mpai' Alata'ala.
Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, uma-apa nihiloi, duu' -na rata tempo-na ni'uli': `Une' -imi to rata mpokeni hanga' Pue' Ala!'"
Malai-imi Yesus ngkai Tomi Alata'ala. Tumai-ramo ana'guru-na mpotudo' -ki kalompe' pompowangu-na tomi toe.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Nihilo wa hawe'ea tohe'e-e lau? Bona ni'inca: uma mpai' ria hamehaa' watu to bate pomeduncu-na. Bate ragero omea mpai'."

Oti toe, hilou-imi Yesus mohura hi Bulu' Zaitun. Bula-na mohura, rata-ramo ana'guru-na nto'u uma ria tau ntani' -na, pai' -ra mpekune' -i: "Uli' -kakai ba nto'uma kadupa' -na to nu'uli' toe-e we'i, pai' napa mpai' to jadi' tanda karata-nu pai' kahudua dunia' toi."
Natompoi' Yesus: "Pelompehi, neo' -koi ma'ala rabagiu.
Apa' wori' mpai' to mehupa' to mpo'uli' kahira' -na Magau' Topetolo'. Wori' mpai' tauna to rabagiu.
Mpo'epe-koi mpai' kareba panga'ea ngkai kalaa-na, ni'epe wo'o moni panga'ea to mohu'. Aga neo' me'eka', apa' hawe'ea toe kana jadi' ulu, aga kajadia' toe uma mpobatuai karata-nami kahudua dunia'.
Nto'u toe mpai', wori' ngata mosipanga'ei, magau' hadua mpo'ewa magau' kahadua-na, pai' hiapa-apa ria oro' pai' linu.
Aga hawe'ea toe lau lako' pontepu'ua-na-pidi, hewa pontodohaka hadua tobine to neo' mo'ana'.
"Nto'u toe mpai', rahoko' -koi pai' ratonu hi tauna to mposesa' pai' mpopatehi-koi. Tauna humalili' dunia' mpokahuku' -koi sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku'.
Wori' tauna ngkala'ura ngkai petuku' -ra hi Aku'. Ria to mpewai' doo-ra hi bali' -ra. Wori' tauna momepokahuku'.
Pai' mehupa' wo'o wori' nabi boa' to mpobagiu wori' tauna.
Nto'u toe, kada'aa tauna katedoo-donihia, duu' -na mere' -mi ahi' tauna to wori'.
Aga tauna to tida mepangala' hi Aku' duu' hi ka'omea-na, hira' -mi to mporata kalompea' hi eo mpeno.
Pai' Kareba Lompe' to mpo'uli' beiwa Alata'ala jadi' Magau', bate rapalele hi humalili' dunia', bona hawe'ea manusia' ma'ala mpo'epe. Oti toe-di pai' lako' rata kahudua dunia'.
"Owi nabi Daniel mpolowa karata-na to rahanga' `Topegerohi to dada'a.' (Hema to mpobasa lolita pelowa toe, penotohi batua-na!) Jadi', ane nihilo to nalowa Daniel toe mokore hi tomi to moroli',
agina tauna to mo'oha' hi Yudea metibo' hilou hi bulu' -na.
Tauna to mohura hi parawa-na, neo' -pi leba' mesua' hi rala tomi-na mpo'ala' rewa-na.
Tauna to hi bonea, neo' -pi nculii' hi ngata mpo'ala' pohea-na. Kaliliu metibo'!
Mpe'ahii' -ra mpai' tobine to nto'u-ra motina'i pai' to mpentii' ana' -ra nto'u toe, apa' mokoro mpai' petibo' -ra.
Mekakae-koi hi Alata'ala bona eo petiboa' -ni toe neo' nto'u tempo lengi' ba nto'u eo pepuea'.
Apa' uma mowo pesesa' to mporumpa' manusia' nto'u toe, ko'ia ria jadi' ngkai lomo' kajadia' dunia' duu' -na rata tempo toi, pai' uma wo'o-pi mpai' ria jadi' hi eo boko' -na.

Aga naredehi moto mpai' Alata'ala tempo kaparia toe, apa' ane uma naredehi tempo-na, bate uma ria haduaa to tuwu'. Jadi', apa' napoka'ahi' -ra tauna to napelihi, toe pai' naredehi mpai' tempo kaparia toe.
"Nto'u toe mpai', ane ria to mpo'uli' -kokoi: `Hilo, Magau' Topetolo' ohe'i-imi,' ba `Ohe'e-i mai,' neo' nipangalai'.

Apa' mehupa' mpai' wori' tauna to boa' to mpo'uli' kahira' -na Magau' Topetolo', ba to mpo'uli' kahira' -na nabi. Mpobabehi-ra tanda to mekoncehi lia pai' tanda to mobaraka', bona mpobagiu-ra wori' tauna. Ane ke ma'ala, ntahawe' tauna to napelihi Alata'ala rabagiu wo'o.
Kiwoi-koi! Ku'uli' ami' -mikokoi kako'ia-na jadi'.
"Jadi', ane ria to mpo'uli' -kokoi: `Hilo, Magau' Topetolo' oe-i ria hi papada to wao'!' neo' -koi hilou. Ane ra'uli': `Hilo, oe-i ria hi rala tomi!' neo' nipangalai'.
Apa' ane rata nculii' -apa mpai' Aku' Ana' Manusia', karata-ku kahiloa hobo' hi dunia', hewa pehini kila' to mehupa' hi mata'eo pai' mehini hilou hi kasoloa.
Ane ria anu mate, incana moto apa' wori' danci morumpu mpokoni'. Wae wo'o mpai' karata-ku nculii' hi dunia', uma-a tumai ngkawuni, incana moto mpai'.
"Ane timpaliu-damo tempo kaparia toe, hawe'ea anu to mobaraka' hi langi' ralengo. Eo mobali' mobengi, wula uma-pi mehini, betue' roda' ngkai langi'.

Nto'u toe-damo mpai', mehupa' -mi tanda hi langi' to mpobatuai karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia'. Pai' hawe'ea manusia' hi dunia' motantangi', apa' rahilo-a hi lolo raoa mana'u tumai hi rala limu', mobaraka' -a pai' uma mowo pehini-ku.
Sangkakala to bohe ratuwui', pai' kuhubui mala'eka-ku hilou mporumpu tauna to kupobagia ngkai humalili' dunia', ngkai wuntu-na hamali rata hi wuntu-na hamali.
"Petonoi-koi napa to kutudui' -kokoi hante lolita rapa' kaju ara. Ane nihilo rau-na mela' pai' mohulu-i, ni'inca-mi kaneo' -na mara eo.
Wae wo'o ane nihilo-damo hawe'ea kajadia' toe we'i lou, ni'inca-mi neo' madupa' mpu'u-mi to ku'uli' we'i.
Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hawe'ea toe we'i bate madupa' kako'ia-na mate omea tauna to tuwu' tempo toi.
Langi' pai' dunia' mogero mpai', tapi' lolita-ku bate-bate-na duu' kahae-hae-na.

"Aga ane eo pai' jaa kadupa' -na hawe'ea toe, wuwu Tuama-ku-wadi to mpo'inca. Uma ria to ntani' -na to mpo'inca. Bangku' mala'eka to hi rala suruga-hawoe', uma wo'o-rawo ra'incai. Bangku' Aku' Ana' -nae', uma wo'o-kuwo ku'incai.
Hewa to majadi' hi tempo nabi Nuh owi, hewa toe wo'o mpai' to jadi' hi eo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia'.

Hi tempo nabi Nuh owi, kako'ia-na rata ue mowo', manusia' lempe' moto, uma ra'incai napa to neo' mporumpa' -ra. Ntora ngkoni' pai' nginu-ra-wadi, rapoponcamoko pai' mepoponcamoko moto-ra, kawae-kawae-na duu' -na nabi Nuh mesua' hi rala sakaya bohe.
Karata-nami ue mowo' mpoliu' -ra, lako' monoto-rada napa to majadi'. Wae wo'o mpai' kalempe' -ra manusia' nto'u Aku' Ana' Manusia' nculii' tumai hi dunia'.
Nto'u toe mpai', rodua tauna mo'ema' mobago hi bonea, hadua ra'ala', to hadua rapalahii.
Rodua tobine to motongke' momanyu, hadua ra'ala', to hadua rapalahii.
Toe pai' ku'uli' mo'inga' -inga' -koi, apa' uma ni'incai nto'uma Pue' -ni rata.
"Poinono lolita rapa' -ku toi: ane na'inca ami' -mi pue' tomi jaa hangkuja ngkabengia topanako rata, bate mo'inga' -inga' -i-hawo, uma napelele' -ra mesua' hi rala tomi-na.
Hewa toe wo'o kana rodo ami' -mokoi mpopea-a, apa' uma ni'incai tempo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia'.

"Rapa' -na ria hadua batua to monoto nono-na pai' to tida mpobago bago maradika-na. Batua toei na'ongko' maradika-na jadi' topohawa' mpohawai' batua ntani' -na pai' mpowai' -ra pongkoni' -ra butu eo-na.
Uma mowo kamarasi' -na ane maradika-na rata nculii' ngkai pomakoa' -na pai' mporata-i bula-na mpobago bago-na.
Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, maradika-na mpo'ongko' -i pai' mpowai' -i kuasa mpewili' hawe'ea ka'uaa' -na.
"Aga ane dada'a-di kehi-na batua toei, na'uli' hi rala nono-na: `Uma-ile sohi' tumai maradika-e.'
Ngkai ree, natepu'u-mi mpoweba' hingka batua-na, pai' -i ntora ngkoni' pai' nginu hante tauna topalangu-langu.
Ntaa' we'i, bula-na lempe' moto hewa toe, muu-mule' rata-mi maradika-na hi eo pai' hi jaa to uma na'incai.
Batua toei raweba' ntarurua', pai' rapetadi hi mali-na, rapohewa topebagiu. Hi ria-i geo' pai' ntodohaka.
"Ane rata nculii' -apa mpai' jadi' Magau', kajadia' hewa lolita rapa' toi: Hampulu' toronaa mopatuju hilou mpotomu topemua', hore-hore ngkeni hulu' -ra.
Lima-ra to wojo, lima-ra to monoto nono-ra.
Lima toronaa to wojo toera, ngkeni moto-ra hulu' -ra, aga uma-ra ngkeni lana.
Lima toronaa to monoto nono-ra mpokeni hulu' -ra hante lana talaa-ra.
Apa' mahae rahi karata topemua', tetunu' -ramo toronaa toera, ka'omea-na leta' omea-ramo.
"Mentongo' bengi-mi, lako' ria-di tauna to mekio', ra'uli': `Etu-imi tumai topemua'! Mai-mokoi mpotomu-i.'
Pemata-rami toronaa to hampulu' toera, hore-hore mporodo hulu' -ra.
Toronaa to wojo mpo'uli' -raka ema' -ra to monoto nono-ra: `Bale, mai-kaiwo lana-ni hangkedi', neo' mate-mi-kaina hulu' -kai.'
"Ratompoi' to monoto nono-ra toera: `Uma-kaiwo hono'! Hilou-mokoi ulu me'oli hi topobalu' lana.'

Hilou-ramo-rawo toronaa to wojo toera mpo'oli lana. Lingku' -ra hilou, rata mpu'u-imi topemua'. Lima toronaa to monoto toera, apa' rodo ami' -mi-rana hulu' -ra, kaliliu mesua' -ramo dohe topemua' rala tomi posusaa', pai' wobo' ra'unca-mi.
"Oti toe rata wo'o-ramo-rawo toronaa to wojo toera. Mekio' -ra ngkai mali-na, ra'uli': `Pue'! Pue'! Bea-kaka-kaiwo wobo'!'
"Na'uli' topemua': `Uma-koi ku'incai.'"
Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa' -na toe hewa toi: "Toe pai' kana mo'inga' -inga' -koi, apa' uma ni'incai nto'uma-a rata.

"Ane rata nculii' -apa mpai' jadi' Magau', kajadi' -na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i: Hadua maradika mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa. Kako'ia-na me'ongko', mpokio' -i pahawaa' -na napontonui doi-na, bona lingku' -na rapopodaga rapali' -ki donihi-na.
Nawai' -ra hore-hore ntuku' pakulea' -ra. Hadua nawai' lima ncobu doi bulawa, to hadua roncobu, pai' to hadua wo'o hancobu. Pai' -i me'ongko' -mi.
Pahawaa' to mporata lima ncobu doi bulawa toei, kaliliu napopodaga mpali' donihi-na, narata mpu'u-mi donihi-na lima ncobu wo'o.
Wae wo'o pahawaa' to mporata roncobu, narata wo'o-hawo donihi-na roncobu.
Aga pahawaa' to mporata hancobu-wadi, hilou-i mpokae tana' napontawui doi maradika-na.
"Mahae ngkai ree, nculii' -imi maradika toei, pai' nakio' -ra pahawaa' -na, napongincai pompewili' -ra doi-na.
Pahawaa' to mporata lima ncobu doi bulawa, tumai-i mpotonu hi maradika-na hampulu' ncobu, na'uli': `Maradika, to nutonu-ka wengi lima ncobu. Hilo, oi-mi ana' -na, lima ncobu wo'o.'

"Na'uli' maradika-na: `Lompe' -mi! Nupopomako' lompe' pobago to kuwai' -koko. Wae-pi, apa' lawi' monoa' -ko hi to hangkedi', kusarumaka lau-moko hi to wori'. Mai-moko, mo'oha' hante aku', pai' goe' -moko hangkaa-ngkania hante aku'.'
"Pahawaa' to mporata roncobu doi bulawa, rata wo'o-imi-hawo, na'uli': `Maradika, roncobu wengi to nuwai' -ka. Hilo, oi-mi ana' -na roncobu wo'o.'

"Na'uli' maradika toei: `Lompe' -mi! Nupopomako' lompe' pobago to kuwai' -koko. Wae-pi, apa' lawi' monoa' -ko hi to hangkedi', kusarumaka lau-moko hi to wori'. Mai-moko, mo'oha' hante aku', pai' goe' -moko hangkaa-ngkania hante aku'.'
"Oti toe, rata wo'o-imi-hawo pahawaa' to mporata hancobu, na'uli': `Maradika, ku'inca kaseke-nu. Nupepae to bela-kowo hinu'a-nu, nu'ala' to uma nukarokoi.
Me'eka' -a, toe pai' hilou-a mpowuni doi-nu hi rala tana'. Jadi', ohe'i-mi doi-nu nculii'.'
"Na'uli' -mi maradika toei: `Iko pahawaa' to dada'a pai' to lose! Ane nu'inca kampepae-ku to bela hinu'a-ku, ane nu'inca kampo'ala' -ku to uma kukarokoi,
napa pai' uma nupopesua' lau doi-ku hi bank, bona ane rata-apa, kurua' nculii' hante ana' -na!'
Na'uli' wo'o-mi maradika toei hi pahawaa' kahadua-na: `Ala' doi to hi hi'a, wai' -ki to ria-ki hampulu' ncobu.
Apa' tauna to rasarumaka hante anu to rawai' -ki, rawai' tena-i-pidi bona kawoo-woria' -ki. Aga tauna to uma rasarumaka, anu hangkedi' to ria hi hi'a, ra'alai' lau-imi.
Pai' pahawaa' to uma motuju tetui, petadi-imi hi mali-na hi kabengia-na. Hi ria-i ntora geo' pai' ntodohaka.'
"Aku' Ana' Manusia', ane rata nculii' -apa mpai', mehini mpu'u-mi baraka' -ku, pai' radohei-a hawe'ea mala'eka-ku. Mohura-a mpai' moparenta hewa Magau' hi pohuraa to ncola.
Hawe'ea manusia' morumpu hi nyanyoa-ku pai' kugaa' -ra jadi' rontuda, hewa hadua topo'ewu mpogaa' bima ngkai kebe'.
Tauna to mpobabehi konoa Alata'ala kupahantuda hi mali ka'ana-ku, pai' tauna topesapuaka hi mali ki'ii-ku.
"Pai' Aku' Magau', ku'uli' -raka to hi mali ka'ana-ku: `Mai-mokoi to nagane' Tuama-ku! Mesua' -mokoi hi rala Kamagaua' -ku, po'ohaa' -ni kuporodo ami' -mikokoi ngkai lomo' kajadi' dunia'.
Apa' nto'u-ku mo'oro', niwai' -a pongkoni'. Ngkamara-a, niwai' -a ue ininu. Liu-a hi tomi-ni, nipopehani-a.
Uma ria pohea-ku, niwai' -a pohea. Peda' -a, nikinomo-a. Hi rala tarungku' -a, nipencuai' -a.'
"Metompoi' -ra to hi mali ka'ana-ku, ra'uli': `Pue', nto'uma-ko kihilo mo'oro' pai' kiwai' -ko koni', ba ngkamara pai' kiwai' -ko ue?
Nto'uma-ko liu hi tomi-kai, pai' kipopehani-ko? Nto'uma-ko kihilo uma ria pohea-nu, pai' kiwai' -ko pohea?
Nto'uma-ko kihilo peda' ba hi rala tarungku', pai' tilou-kai mpencuai' -ko?'
"Pai' Aku' Magau', kutompoi' -ra: `Bona ni'inca: napa to nibabehi mpotulungi ompi' -ku tohe'ira lau, nau' hadua ompi' -ku to kedi' lia katuwu' -na, batua-na, hibalia nibabehi hi Aku' -mi.'

"Oti toe mpai', ku'uli' -raka to hi mali ki'ii-ku: `Malai-mokoi ngkai rei, koi' to natotowi Tuama-ku! Mesua' -mokoi hi rala apu to jela' ncuu, to raporodo ami' -miki Magau' Anudaa' pai' mala'eka to mpotuku' -i.
Apa' nto'u-ku mo'oro', uma-a niwai' koni'. Ngkamara-a, uma-a niwai' ue ininu.
Liu-a hi tomi-ni, uma-a nipopehani. Uma ria pohea-ku, uma-a niwai' pohea. Peda' -a, hi rala tarungku' -a, uma-a nipencuai'.'
"Ra'uli' wo'o-mi-rawo mpai' mpo'uli' -ka: `Pue', nto'uma-ko kihilo mo'oro' ba ngkamara ba hewa tauna toliu, ba uma-ko moheai, ba peda' ba ratarungku', pai' uma-ko kitulungi?'
"Pai' Aku' Magau', kutompoi' -ra: `Bona ni'inca: apa' uma-koina nitulungi-ra tauna to kedi' tuwu' -ra tohe'i-era lau, batua-na, Aku' -mi to uma nitulungi tetu-e.'"
Napohudu Yesus lolita-na, na'uli': "Hawe'ea tauna to dada'a toera lau ratadi hi rala naraka pai' rahuku' duu' kahae-hae-na, pai' tauna to monoa' mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na."
Kahudu-na Yesus mpololita hawe'ea tohe'e, na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na:
"Ni'inca wa karo'eo-na-damo eo bohe Paskah? Pai' Aku' Ana' Manusia' rapewai' hi pale bali' -ku bona raparika'."
Nto'u toe, imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi morumpu hi tomi Imam Bohe to rahanga' Kayafas.
Mohawa' -ramo, ra'uli': "Beiwa akala-ta mpolede pai' mpohoko' Yesus bona rapatehi-ie?
Agina neo' ulu tahoko' -i nto'u eo bohe, nee-neo' mpai' bara' ntodea."
Nto'u Yesus hi ngata Betania, hilou-i hi tomi hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon topohaki' poko'.
Bula-na hi ree, rata hadua tobine ngkeni hameha' butolo' ihia' lana honga to masuli' lia oli-na. Bula-na Yesus ngkoni', tumai tobine toei mpotua lana honga toe hi woo' -na tanda pebila' -na.
Karahilo-na ana'guru-na napa to nababehi tobine toei, moroe-ramo, ra'uli': "Napa-hawo pai' rakerei lana to masuli' oli-na hewa tetu?
Ke agina rapobalu' lau bona oli-na rawai' -raka tokabu."
Na'inca Yesus pekiri-ra, toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' nipedahi nono-na tobine toei! To nababehi hi Aku' toe-le, lompe'.
Apa' tokabu-hana, ria oa' loga-ni mpotulungi-ra apa' ria oa' -ra doo-ni. Aga Aku', uma-a mpai' ria oa' doo-ni.
Natuai-a hante lana toe, mpakasadia ami' woto-ku hi karatana-ku mpai'.
Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hi humalili' dunia', hiapa-apa Kareba Lompe' rapalele, napa to nababehi tobine toei we'i bate ralolita, uma mpai' ralipo' -lipo'."
Nto'u toe, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua, to rahanga' Yudas Iskariot, hilou hi imam pangkeni.
Na'uli' -raka: "Ane kutonu Yesus hi rala pale-ni, napa to niwai' -ka?" Rabila' -mi doi pera' tolu mpulu', pai' rawai' -ki.
Ngkai ree, Yudas mpopali' loga to lompe' mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -na.
Hi eo to lomo' -na hi Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii, rata-ramo ana'guru-na hi Yesus, ra'uli' -ki: "Hiapa konoa-nu kiporodo pongkoni' Paskah to takoni' -e mpai'?"
Na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi rala ngata hi tomi ni'anu, uli' -ki hewa toi: `Na'uli' Guru: Rata-mi tempo-ku, doko' -a mo'eo bohe Paskah hi tomi-nu hante ana'guru-ku.'"
Ana'guru Yesus toera, hilou mpu'u-ramo hewa to nahubui-raka, pai' -ra mporodo-mi pongkoni' Paskah.
Kamobengi-na, Yesus hante ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mohura ngkoni'.
Bula-ra ngkoni' toe, na'uli' -mi Yesus: "Pe'epei-koi: hadua ngkai olo' -ni mpobalu' -a mpai' hi bali' -ku."
Mpo'epe tohe'e, peda' -mi nono-ra ana'guru-na, pai' mepekune' -ramo hadua bo hadua hi Yesus, ra'uli': "Bela-hawo aku' to nutoa' -e Pue'?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Tauna to mpololo' roti hi banga' uta hangkaa-ngkania hante Aku', hi'a-mi to mpobalu' -a.
Makono mpu'u, Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate mate hewa to ralowa hi rala Buku Tomoroli' -e. Aga mpe'ahii' tauna to mpobalu' -a tetui. Ke lompe' lau-pi ane uma-i na'ote tina-na."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi-hawo Yudas, to mpobalu' -ie mpai': "Bela-hawo aku' to nutoa' -e Guru?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Hewa to nu'uli' tetu-midi!"
Bula-ra ngkoni', na'ala' -mi Yesus roti pai' naposampayai mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala. Oti toe, napihe-pihe pai' natonu-raka ana'guru-na, na'uli': "Ala' -mi, koni' -mi. Toi-mi woto-ku."
Oti toe na'ala' wo'o sangkiri' to ihia' anggur, na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala pai' natonu-raka, na'uli': "Nginu-mokoi omea,
apa' toi-mi raa' -ku to rabowo ane mate-a mpai'. Raa' -ku toi mpai' mporohoi pojanci to mpoposidai' Alata'ala hante manusia', bona jeko' tauna to wori' ra'ampungi.

Bona ni'inca: ntepu'u ngkai wae lau, uma-apa nginu anggur duu' -na rata tempo-na Tuama-ku jadi' Magau' hi dunia' bo'u. Nto'u toe mpai' mpo'inu-a anggur to bo'u hangkaa-ngkania hante koi' hi rala Kamagaua' -na."
Oti toe morona' -ramo hanyala rona' pe'une'. Kahudu-ra morona', malai-ramo ngkai ngata hilou hi Bulu' Zaitun.

Na'uli' -mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Bengi toe mpai' lau, hawe'ea-ni, molengo pepangala' -ni hi Aku', apa' ria te'uki' Lolita Alata'ala to mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Kupatehi topo'ewu toei, pai' bima inewu-na pagaa' -gaa' -ramo.'
Aga ane tuwu' nculii' -apa mpai', meri'ulu-a hilou hi tana' Galilea, bona hirua' hi ria-ta-damo mpai'."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' -mi Petrus: "Nau' hawe'ea tauna molengo pepangala' -ra hi Iko Pue', aku' uma!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -koko: kako'ia-na turua' manu' bengi toe mpai' lau, mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku."
Na'uli' Petrus: "Nau' -a mate hangkaa-ngkania dohe-nu, uma mpu'u kusapu kaku'inca-nu!" Wae wo'o-rawo pololita-ra ana'guru-na to ntani' -na.
Oti toe, rata-ramo hi pampa to rahanga' Getsemani. Hi ree-i mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Koi', mohura hi rei-mokoi. Aku', lou hi ree-a mai ulu mosampaya."
Aga Petrus pai' ana' Zebedeus to rodua, nabawai-ra hilou dohe-na. Nto'u toe, susa' pai' mokaratu-mi nono-na.
Na'uli' -raka: "Susa' lia nono-ku, hewa to neo' mate-ama ku'epe. Rehe'i-mokoi ulu, dohei-a mojaga."

Oti toe hilou-imi molaa hangkedi', pai' -i motumpa, mosampaya, na'uli': "Tuama-ku, ane ma'ala, pomolaa-ka-kuwo kaparia to neo' mporumpa' -a toi. Aga bela konoa-ku Aku' to jadi', agina konoa-nu Iko moto."
Oti toe, nculii' -imi hi ana'guru-na to tolu toera, narata-ra bula-ra leta' moto. Na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Petrus: "Hilo! Hajaa-wadi uma nidadahi mojaga dohe-ku?
Mojaga pai' mosampaya-mokoi bona neo' -koi mporata pesori. Hi rala nono-ni dota moto-koi mpobabehi to makono, aga uma nidadahi apa' manusia' bate lente."
Ngkai ree, hilou wo'o-imi mosampaya, na'uli': "Tuama-ku, ane kaparia toi uma ma'ala rawi'iha-ka, bate konoa-numi to majadi'."
Oti toe, nculii' wo'o-imi mporata ana'guru-na, leta' wo'o-ra-wadi apa' mopoke' mata-ra.
Hangkani wo'o-ipi Yesus mpalahii-ra hilou mosampaya katolu ngkani-na. Posampaya-na toe hibalia hante posampaya-na to we'i.

Ka'oti-na mosampaya toe, nculii' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na to tolu toera, pai' na'uli' -raka: "Turu pai' leta' oa' -pada-koi? Hilo-dile, rata-mi tempo-na Aku' Ana' Manusia' rapobalu' pai' ratonu hi tauna to dada'a.
Memata-mokoi! Hilo, etu-imi tumai tauna to mpobalu' -a. Kita-mi lou."

Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi, rata-imi Yudas, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua. Pai' dohe-na wori' wo'o tau ntani' -na to ngkeni piho' pai' sumampu. Hira' toe rapahawa' imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi.
Yudas mpo'uli' ami' -miraka tanda bona ra'inca kato'uma-nai Yesus, na'uli': "Hema mpai' to ku'eki, Hi'a-mi Yesus. Hoko' -imi!"
Jadi', karata-ra hi ree, kahilou-nami Yudas mpohirua' -ki Yesus, na'uli': "Wori' tabe, Guru!" pai' na'eki-i ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi.
Na'uli' Yesus: "Toe-tanoe pai' tumai-koe, bale!" Katumai-rami tauna to wori' mpohoko' Yesus.
Ngkai ree, hadua tauna to dohe Yesus mpowute' piho' -na natime-ki batua Imam Bohe, bela mpoholu tilinga-na.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Unco' nculii' piho' -nu! Apa' hema to mpohenta piho' mpopatehi doo, bate rapatehi wo'o-i-hawo mpai' hante piho'.
Ha uma nu'incai, ane mpopetulungi-a hi Tuama-ku, napesahui mpahawa' tumai hampulu' rontuda tantara mala'eka-na, ba melabi tena!
Aga ane ta'ewa-ra to mpohoko' -a toi-e, uma mpai' madupa' lolita to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi to mpo'uli' hawe'ea toe lau kana majadi' hi Aku'."

Nto'u toe, na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka tauna to wori' toera: "Ha toperampaki-a toi-e, pai' mingki' tumai-koi ntali piho' pai' sumampu mpohoko' -ae! Butu eo-na mohura moto-a hi rala Tomi Alata'ala metudui', napa pai' uma-a nihoko' nto'u toe?
Aga to hewa toi-le kana majadi', bona madupa' -mi napa to ra'uki' nabi-nabi owi hi rala Buku Tomoroli'." Oti toe, metibo' -ramo hawe'ea ana'guru-na mpalahii-i.
Ngkai ree, tauna to mpohoko' Yesus mpokeni-i hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe Kayafas. Hi ria morumpu-ramo guru-guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi.
Petrus metuku' ngkawao-wadi, duu' -na rata hi berewe tomi Imam Bohe. Mesua' -i hi berewe pai' -i mohura dohe topojaga, apa' doko' na'inca ba napa mpai' to majadi' hi Yesus.
Nto'u toe, imam pangkeni pai' hawe'ea topohura agama morumpu hi tomi Kayafas. Mpali' -ra sabi' boa' to mpakilu Yesus, bona ngalai' rahuku' mate-i.
Aga nau' wori' sabi' boa' to mpo'uli' napa to nababehi Yesus, uma raruai' to masipato' rahuku' mate-ki. Ka'omea-na, ria rodua sabi' to tumai hi nyanyoa topohura to hibalia lolita-ra,
ra'uli': "Tauna toii, ria-i-hana mpo'uli': `Tomi Alata'ala ma'ala kugero, pai' rala-na tolu eo kuwangu nculii'.'"
Kamokore-nami Imam Bohe pai' -i mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ha uma nutompoi' -ra to mpakilu-ko toe-e?"
Aga Yesus, uma-i winihi. Na'uli' wo'o-mi Imam Bohe: "Hante hanga' Alata'ala to Tuwu', uli' -kakai to makono! Makono mpu'u ka'Iko-na Magau' Topetolo', Ana' Alata'ala-e?"

Na'uli' Yesus: "Io', hewa to nu'uli' tetu-e. Pai' ku'uli' tena: rata mpai' tempo-na nihilo-a Aku' Ana' Manusia', mohura pai' moparenta hi mali ka'ana Alata'ala to Mobaraka', pai' nihilo wo'o-a mpai' mana'u tumai ngkai suruga hi rala limu'."

Mpo'epe toe we'i, Imam Bohe mpoheu' baju-na ngkai kamoroe-na, pai' na'uli': "Tau toii mpopohibalia woto-na hante Alata'ala! Uma-pi mingki' ria sabi'. Ni'epe moto-mi-koiwo lolita-na mpokedi' Alata'ala.
Beiwa-mi-koiwo pompowile-nie?" Ratompoi' topohura: "Kana rahuku' mate-imile!"
Ngkai ree, ra'uelikui lio-na pai' -i raweba'. Ria wo'o to mpohopo' -i, pai' ra'uli' -ki:
"Ee Magau' Topetolo'! Pe'uli' pe' ba hema to mpohopo' -koe!"
Nto'u toe, Petrus mohura hi berewe. Nto'u pohura-na toe, tumai hadua tobine to mobago hi tomi Imam Bohe, na'uli' -ki Petrus: "Ba iko wo'o-di doo-na Yesus to Galilea toei-e mai?"
Aga nasapu Petrus hi nyanyoa-ra omea, na'uli': "Uma-kuna ku'incai napa to nu'uli'!"
Ngkai ree hilou wo'o-imi Petrus mokore mohu' hi wobo' wala. Ria wo'o hadua tobine mpohilo-i pai' mpo'uli' -raka tauna to hi ree: "Hi'a toi wo'o-le to dohe Yesus to Nazaret toei-e mai."
Nasapu wo'o-wadi Petrus hante mosumpa, na'uli': "Uma-kuna ku'incai-i tau tetui!"
Uma mahae ngkai ree, tauna to mokore hi ree mpomohui' Petrus, ra'uli' -ki: "Iko mpu'u-di hadua doo-nae! Incana ngkai kotu basa-nu Katogalilea-nu."
Mosumpa tena-i Petrus mpotuna' woto-na, na'uli': "Uma mpu'u-kuwo ku'incai-i!" Nto'u toe turua' -mi manu'.

Nakiwoi-mi Petrus lolita Yesus ngone to mpo'uli' -ki: "Kako'ia-na turua' manu', mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku." Kamalai-nami Petrus hilou hi mali-na, pai' -i geo' ngkai kapeda' nono-na.
Mepupulo ngkii, hawe'ea imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi mpobotuhi: Yesus kana rapatehi.
Jadi', rahoo' -imi pai' rakeni hilou rabua' hi Gubernur Pilatus.

Ane Yudas, to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -na toei, kana'inca-na karahuku' mate-na mpai' Yesus, soho' -mi nono-na. Kahilou-nami hi imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi, napoponculi' -raka doi pera' to tolu mpulu' mpepa',
pai' na'uli': "Mojeko' -ama! Mpobalu' -a-kuna tauna to uma masala', alaa-na rahuku' mate-i!" Ratompoi' -i: "Napa ki'uli' kai'! Iko moto-kowo pue' sala'!"
Ngkai ree, Yudas mpetadi doi tohe'e hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, pai' -i hilou mengkahunca'.
Imam pangkeni mpotima' doi toe, pai' ra'uli': "Doi toi, doi posula' raa'. Ntuku' atura agama, doi to hewa tohe'e uma ma'ala rapuna' hi rala peti' pompunaa' doi pepue' hi Tomi Alata'ala."
Hibalia-mi pohawa' -ra, doi toe ra'oli-ki tana' to rahanga' Tana' Topobabehi Kura, bona tana' toe rapontanai-raka tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi.
Toe pai' tana' toe rahanga' Tana' Raa' duu' tempo toi.
Hante babehia-ra toe, madupa' -mi napa to nalowa nabi Yeremia owi, hewa toi moni-na: "Ntuku' ada to Israel, oli hadua batua tolu mpulu' doi pera'. Jadi', ra'ala' -mi tolu mpulu' doi pera' toe,
pai' ra'oli-ki tana' topobabehi kura. Tohe'e majadi' ntuku' hawa' Pue' Alata'ala hi aku'."
Ane Yesus we'i, karakeni-na hi Gubernur Pilatus, mokore-i hi nyanyoa-na. Pilatus mpekune' -i: "Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Yahudi-e?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae mpu'u, hewa to nu'uli' tetu."
Imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi mpodulu mpakilu-i. Aga uma-i winihi.
Toe pai' Pilatus mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ha uma nu'epei hawe'ea to rapakilu-kokoe?"
Uma hamelaa nahono' Yesus, alaa-na napokakonce lia Gubernur.
Butu eo bohe Paskah, Gubernur biasa mpobahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku', ba hema konoa ntodea.
Jadi', mpae toe, ria hadua to ratarungku' to ra'inca lia ntodea. Hanga' -na Yesus Barabas.

Jadi', hi pohura-na Pilatus mpohurai kara-kara Yesus toe, wori' -mi tauna morumpu. Mepekune' Pilatus mpekune' -ra: "Hema to nipokono kubahaka-kokoi mpae tohe'i? Yesus Barabas, ba Yesus to rahanga' Kristus-di?"
Pilatus mpo'uli' hewa toe, apa' na'inca ka'uma-na-hawo masala' -i Yesus; pangkeni to Yahudi mpotonu Yesus hi hi'a apa' kamohingi' -ra-wadi.

Nto'u pohura-na Pilatus hi pohuraa pobotuhia toe, rata suro ngkai tobine-na to mpo'uli' -ki: "Neo' -konae' nuhuku' -i tauna to uma masala' tetui! Apa' ngkai Hi'a alaa-ku mo'ompo' to mekoroi' bengi ngone-e."
Aga imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi, kaliliu moto-ra mpo'ukei' ntodea, ra'uli' -raka: "Perapi' -koi hi Gubernur bona Barabas nabahaka, pai' Yesus to nahuku' mate!"
Jadi', mepekune' Gubernur Pilatus hi ntodea, na'uli': "Ngkai hira' rodua tohe'i, hema to nipokono kubahaka-kokoi?" Ratompoi': "Barabas!"
Napekune' tena Pilatus: "Ane wae, kupopai-imi Yesus to rahanga' Kristus?" Metompoi' -ra omea: "Raparika' -i!"
Mepekune' tena-i-pidi Pilatus: "Hiaa' napa sala' -na?" Rapesukui lau-mi mejeu': "Parika' -imi!"

Ka'omea-na nahilo Pilatus uma-pi ria kalaua-na mpololitai-ra, apa' kameroo-rodoa' lau-ramo. Toe pai' na'ala' ue napowano hi nyanyoa ntodea pai' na'uli': "Mowano-a! Bona nihilo, ka'uma-na-kuwo kugalo kanipatehi-na tau toii! Koi' moto-koiwo to mpotangku."
Metompoi' ntodea, ra'uli': "Io', kai' moto-kaiwo pai' hante muli-kai to mpokolo kamate-na."
Ngkai ree, nabahaka-miraka Barabas, pai' nahubui tantara-na mpoweba' Yesus. Oti toe natonu-miraka bona raparika'.
Oti toe, tantara Gubernur mpokeni Yesus mesua' hi rala tomi Gubernur, pai' -ra mpokio' hawe'ea doo-ra tumai mpotipuhi-i.
Raroncu-ki pohea-na pai' rapasuai' -i baju to mperelei to hewa baju magau'.

Rababehi hameha' songko ngkai walaa to morui to hewa songko magau', pai' rasongkoi-ki. Rawai' wo'o-i lua' hameha' hi pale ka'ana-na, hewa lua' to nakamu magau', pai' -ra mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na, ra'uli': "Wori' tabe, Magau' to Yahudi!"
Ra'uelikui-i pai' ra'ala' lua' to hi pale-na rapao' -ki woo' -na.
Ka'oti-na rapopo'ore' hewa toe, raroncu-mi baju to rabajui-ki we'i pai' ra'uncoi' nculii' -i pohea-na moto-mi. Oti toe rakeni-imi hilou hi mali ngata bona raparika'.
Hi lengko ohea hirua' -ra hante hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon to Kirene. Tantara to Roma mpewuku Simon toe mpopaha'a kaju parika' -na Yesus.
Uma mahae rata-ramo hi po'ohaa' to rahanga' Golgota, batua-na Bulu' Banga'woo'.
Hi ree, Yesus rapopo'inui anggur to ragalo hante pokuli' to mopai'. Ka'oti-na napemita, oja' -i mpo'inu.
Raparika' -imi, pai' pohea-na rabagi-bagi hante ntene' undi hewa pompenoa' -ra.
Oti toe, mohura-ramo hilau mojaga.
Hi kaju parika' -na hi lolo woo' -na rapataka' hampepa' papan. Hi papan toe te'uki' napa to rapakilu-ki Yesus, hewa toi moni-na: TOI-MI YESUS MAGAU' TO YAHUDI.
Ria wo'o rodua toperampaki raparika' dohe-na, hadua mali ka'ana-na hadua mali ki'ii-na.
Tauna to liu hi ree, ngkololi-ra mpopo'ore' -i,
ra'uli': "Nu'uli' -kona mpogero-ko Tomi Alata'ala pai' nuwangu nculii' rala-na tolu eo! Ane Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko, tulungi woto-nu moto! Mana'u-moko ngkai kaju parika' tetu!"
Wae wo'o imam pangkeni, guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi mpopo'ore' -i, ra'uli':
"Tau ntani' -na natulungi-ramo, woto-na moto-pi uma nakulei' ntulungi. Hiaa' bo Hi'a he'e Magau' to Israel! Agina mana'u-i ngkai kaju parika' -na toe, pai' lako' tapangala' -i.
Ncarumaka Alata'ala-i, pai' na'uli' Ana' Alata'ala-i. Mai tahilo Alata'ala mpobahaka-i, ane dota-i."
Ntahawe' toperampaki to raparika' dohe-na, meruge' wo'o-ra-rawo mporuge' -i hewa toe.
Tebua' -mi eo, muu-mule' mobengi hobo' hi ngata toe rala-na tolu jaa.
Jaa tolu ncimonou', mekio' -imi Yesus napasimuku mpo'uli': "Alata'ala-ku! Alata'ala-ku! Napa pai' nupalahii-a?" Hi rala basa Yahudi: "Eli! Eli! Lama sabakhtani?"
Ba hangkuja dua to mokore mohu' hi kaju parika' -na mpo'epe pe'au-na toe, ra'uli': "Epe, mpokio' nabi Elia-i!"
Ria hadua to mokeno hilou mpo'ala' hampu'u wunga to hewa lomo', nabangkahi hi rala ue anggur to mo'onco, natu'u hi wuntu hompea pai' napopoju'ui-ki Yesus bona na'inu.
Ria wo'o to mpo'uli': "Popea ulu, tahilo ba tumai mpu'u-i Elia mpotulungi-i."
Oti toe me'au tena-i Yesus napesukui, pai' modupe' -mi inoha' -na.
Nto'u toe, kain porini-olo' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata'ala muu-mule' mobika' ntongo' ngkai lolo-na rata hi une' -na. Ria wo'o linu, pai' watu bohe paheka' -heka'.
Wori' daeo' mobea-mi, pai' wori' tauna to monoa' ingku-ra owi rapotuwu' nculii'.
Ka'oti-na Yesus tuwu' nculii', mehupa' -ra ngkai daeo' -ra, pai' -ra mesua' -hi ngata Yerusalem, ngata to moroli' toe. Wori' tauna mpohilo-ra.
Tadulako tantara hante tantara-tantara doo-na to mpojaga Yesus, me'eka' lia-ramo mpo'epe linu pai' mpohilo hawe'ea to jadi' toe. Ra'uli': "Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-i-tawo'!"
Hi ree, wori' wo'o tobine to menaa ngkawao. Hira' toe tobine to mpotuku' pai' mpotulungi Yesus, ntepu'u ngkai pobago-na hi tana' Galilea.
Hanga' -na to hadua, Maria Magdalena. To hadua wo'o, Maria tina-na Yakobus pai' Yusuf. Pai' hadua wo'o tobine-na Zebedeus.
Neo' limpa-mi eo, tumai hadua tauna to mo'ua' to ngkai ngata Arimatea, hanga' -na Yusuf. Yusuf toei, topetuku' Yesus wo'o-i-hawo.
Hilou-i hi Pilatus mperapi' woto Yesus. Pilatus mpohubui tantara-na mpowai' -i Yusuf woto-na Yesus.
Na'ala' mpu'u-mi, naputu' hante kain to bula,

pai' napopoturu hi rala daeo'. Daeo' toe, daeo' to bo'u-pidi, daeo' pomporodoa-na Yusuf moto, to ratowi hi panapa bulu' watu. Oti toe, naluli' hameha' watu to bohe na'unca-ki daeo' toe, pai' -i malai-mi.
Aga Maria Magdalena pai' Maria to ntani' -na, mohura-ra hi mai hi mali daeo'.
Kamepulo-na hi Eo Sabat, imam-imam pangkeni pai' to Parisi hilou hangkaa-ngkania hi Pilatus,
ra'uli': "Tua Gubernur, kikiwoi lolita topebagiu toei ngone lou, bula-na tuwu' -pidi na'uli': `Kaliu-na tolu eo, tuwu' nculii' -a.'

Jadi', toe pai' kiperapi' bona Tua mpohubui tantara hilou mpojaga daeo' -na toe ria, radongo lompe' duu' -na rata hi eo katolu-na, bona neo' ria loga ana'guru-na lou mpanako woto-na. Ra'uli' mpai' hi ntodea tuwu' nculii' -i, duu' -na wori' -mi tauna to rabagiu. Helee, meliu lau-mi mpai' kawori' tauna to mpotuku' -i ngkai to mpotuku' -i bula-na tuwu' -pidi."
Na'uli' Pilatus: "Ria moto tantara. Keni-ramo hilou mpodongo daeo' -na hudupakulea' -ni."
Hilou mpu'u-ramo hi daeo'. Rasaa' watu po'unca-na, bona uma ma'ala raderu', pai' rahubui tantara mpodongo daeo' toe, bona neo' ria to mpokabiboi.
Timpaliu-mi eo pepuea', kako'ia-na mehupa' eo hi eo Mingku, Maria Magdalena pai' Maria to ntani' -na hilou mpokamata daeo'.
Ncorobaa ria linu bohe, apa' hadua mala'eka Pue' mana'u ngkai suruga tumai mpoderu' watu po'unca daeo', pai' -i mohura hi lolo-na.
Lence-na mekiroi' hewa kila', pai' pohea-na bula ngehe.
Tantara to mpodongo hi ree, me'eka' lia-ramo, moridi' -ra, pai' uma-rapa tono mokore, hewa to mate-ramo.
Na'uli' mala'eka mpo'uli' -raka tobine toera: "Neo' -koi me'eka', ku'inca moto mpali' -koi Yesus to mate raparika'.
Uma-ipi-hana ria hi rehe'i. Tuwu' nculii' -imi, hewa to na'uli' -kokoie wengi. Mai hilo karatu'ua-na wengi.
Wae-pi, hilou-mokoi pesahui, uli' -raka ana'guru-na katuwu' -na nculii' -mi. Hilou meri'ulu-i hi tana' Galilea. Hi ria-damo mpai', pai' -i nihilo. Kiwoi napa to ku'uli' -kokoi!"
Rapesahui-mi-rawo tobine toera malai ngkai daeo'. Me'eka' moto-ra, aga goe' lia wo'o-ra. Pokeno-rami hilou apa' doko' raparata to jadi' toe hi ana'guru-na Yesus.
Muu-mule' etu-imi Yesus mpohirua' -raka pai' natabe-ra. Tumai-ramo mpomohui' -i, rakupui witi' -na pai' ranyompa-i.
Na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka: "Neo' me'eka'! Hilou-mokoi, uli' -raka ompi' -ku bona hilou-ra hi Galilea, hi ria mpai' rahilo-a."
Lingku' -ra tobine toera hilou, ba hangkuja dua tantara to mpodongo daeo' hilou hi rala ngata, pai' -ra mpoparata hi imam pangkeni hawe'ea to jadi' hi daeo' we'i.
Mohawa' -ramo imam pangkeni toera hante totu'a to Yahudi to ntani' -na. Kabotu' lolita-ra, agina mpowai' -ra tantara wori' doi po'ompo wiwi-ra, bona neo' ra'uli' hilau.
Ra'uli' imam pangkeni toera mpo'uli' -raka tantara: "Uli' -koi hewa toi: `Mentongo' bengi ngone, topetuku' Yesus tumai mpanako woto-na bula-kai leta'.'
Ane na'epe Gubernur tohe'e, kai' -damo mpololitai-i bona neo' -koi rapoo-popai."
Radoa-mi-rawo tantara doi toe, pai' ra'uli' hewa to oti ratudui' -raka. Duu' rata hi eo tohe'i, motote oa' lolita toe hi to Yahudi.
Ana'guru-na Yesus to hampulu' hadua toera hilou hi tana' Galilea, hi bulu' to natudo' ami' -raka Yesus.
Rahilo mpu'u-imi hi ria, pai' ranyompa-i. Aga ria wo'o tauna to morara' -pidi nono-ra.
Yesus mpomohui' -ra pai' na'uli' -raka: "Hawe'ea kuasa hi suruga pai' hi dunia' ratonu-maka.
Jadi', hilou-mokoi hi humalili' dunia', tudui' hawe'ea tauna jadi' topetuku' -ku. Niu' -ra hi rala hanga' Alata'ala to Tuama, to Ana' pai' Inoha' Tomoroli'.
Tudui' -ramo mpotuku' hawe'ea to kuhawai' -kokoi. Kiwoi-koi: kudohei moto-koi duu' -na hi kahudua dunia'."
Tohe'i-mi Kareba Lompe', tutura katuwu' -na Yesus Kristus, Ana' Alata'ala.

Tutura-na ntepu'u ngkai karata-na Yohanes Topeniu'. Karata-na Yohanes toei, telowa ami' -mi hi rala sura nabi Yesaya. Hante wiwi nabi, Alata'ala mpo'uli' -ki Ana' -na hewa toi: Hi'a toi-mi suro-ku, kuhubui-i meri'ulu ngkai Iko, bona mporodo ohea-nu."
"Mekio' -i hi papada to wao', na'uli': `Neo' rata-imi Pue'! Porodo ami' -miki ohea-na. Nipakalempe ami' -mi ohea to natara mpai'.'"

Hewa to ra'uki' toe, mehupa' mpu'u-imi Yohanes Topeniu' hi papada to wao'. Mpoparata-i Lolita Alata'ala hi ntodea, na'uli': "Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko' -ni, pai' kana tumai-koi kuniu' bona Alata'ala mpo'ampungi jeko' -ni."

Wori' tauna to hilou hi papada to wao' doko' mpo'epe lolita-na Yohanes. Ria-ra ngkai ngata Yerusalem pai' ngkai hawe'ea ngata hi tana' Yudea. Hilou-ra mpangaku' jeko' -ra, pai' naniu' -ra hi ue Yordan, tanda kamedea-ra ngkai jeko' -ra.
Pohea-na Yohanes rababehi ngkai wulu porewua to rahanga' unta. Salepe' -na ngkai kuliba. Koni' -na lari pai' ue wani.
Mpopalele-i kareba toi: "Ngkabokoa' ngkai aku', tumai mpai' to meliu kuasa-na ngkai aku'. Bangku' mowilingkudu mpobongka koloro sapatu' -na, uma-a-kuwo natao.
Aku' mponiu' -koi hante ue tanda kamedea-ni ngkai jeko' -ni. Aga Hi'a mpai' mponiu' -koi hante Inoha' Tomoroli'."
Rala-na ha'eo, Yesus me'ongko' ngkai ngata Nazaret hi tana' Galilea, tumai mpopeniu' hi Yohanes. Yohanes mponiu' -i hi ue Yordan.
Wae ka'oti-na raniu', mencore-imi ngkai ue, pai' mpohilo-imi langi' mobea pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u tumai molence mpo-danci mangkebodo hompo hi Hi'a.
Alata'ala mololita ngkai langi' mpo'uli' -ki: "Iko toi-mi Ana' -ku to kupe'ahi'. Iko-mi to mpakagoe' nono-ku."
Oti toe, Inoha' Tomoroli' mpakeni Yesus lou hi papada to wao'.
Opo' mpulu' eo-i hi ria. Bula-na hi papada toe, Magau' Anudaa' mposori-i. Binata to me'ila dohe-na, pai' mala'eka mpomawai-i.
Ko'ia mahae ngkai ree, Yohanes Topeniu' rahoko' pai' -i ratarungku'. Nto'u toe, hilou-imi Yesus hi tana' Galilea, pai' -i mpopalele Kareba Lompe' to ngkai Alata'ala,
na'uli': "Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'! Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko' -ni, pangala' -mi Kareba Lompe'."
Bula-na momako' hi wiwi' rano Galilea, mpohilo-i rodua tauna. Hanga' -ra: Simon hante Andreas ompi' -na. Nto'u toe, bula-ra mebau' hi rano mojala', apa' toe-mi-rawo bago-ra.
Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Mai-mokoi ntuku' -a! Uma-pokoi mebau' mpali' uru. Ngkai wae lau, kuwai' -koi pobago mpotudui' tauna mepangala' hi Aku'."
Karapalahii-nami jala' -ra, pai' ntepu'u eo toe mpotuku' Yesus-ramo.
Napaliliu-mi Yesus momako', ko'ia molaa ngkai ree mpohilo wo'o-imi rodua to ntali ompi': Yakobus pai' Yohanes, ana' -na Zebedeus. Hira' toe, bula-ra mpokolompehii jala' -ra hi rala sakaya.
Nakio' -ramo mpotuku' -i. Jadi', rapalahii-mi tuama-ra hi rala sakaya hante tauna to dohe-ra to ngkoni' gaji', pai' mpotuku' Yesus-ramo.
Ngkai ree, Yesus hante topetuku' -na hilou hi ngata Kapernaum. Hi eo pepuea' to Yahudi, mesua' -imi hi rala tomi posampayaa pai' natepu'u-mi metudui'.
Konce-ramo tauna to mpo'epe tudui' -na. Apa' uma-i metudui' hewa guru-guru agama. Petudui' -na, hewa tauna to mokuasa mpu'u.
Nto'u toe, ria hadua tauna to nahawi' anudaa', mesua' wo'o-i-hawo hi tomi posampayaa toe, pai' -i mejeu':
"Ee Yesus to Nazaret! Doko' nupopai-dakaie? Ba doko' nuropuhi-dakaie? Ku'inca moto-kole, ka'Iko-na Suro to moroli' ngkai Alata'ala-e."
Yesus mpo'uli' -ki anudaa' toei: "Ngkaba'i-ko! Palai-ko ngkai tauna tetui!"
Tauna toei moridi' sabana anudaa', pai' -i me'au, pai' malai-mi anudaa' to mpohawi' -i.
Konce omea-ramo tauna to mpohilo, alaa-na momepololitai-ramo ra'uli': "Uma mowo-e'! Toi-e tudui' to bo'u, ria mpu'u baraka' -na! Mpopalai-i anudaa', bo ratuku' mpu'u-diki-hana hawa' -nae!"
Ngkai ree, kamolele-nami kareba to mpotompo'wiwi Yesus hobo' hi tana' Galilea.
Kanculii' -ra Yesus hante ana'guru-na ngkai tomi posampayaa toe, hilou-ramo hi tomi-ra Simon pai' Andreas. Yakobus pai' Yohanes hilou wo'o dohe-ra.
