Ngkai ree, hadua tauna to mokore mohu' Yesus mpowute' piho' -na natime-ki batua Imam Bohe, bela mpoholu tilinga-na.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka tauna to mpohoko' -i: "Ha toperampaki-a toi-e, pai' mingki' tumai-koi ntali piho' pai' sumampu mpohoko' -ae!
Butu eo-na ria moto-a dohe-ni hi Tomi Alata'ala metudui', napa pai' uma-a nihoko' nto'u toe? Aga tohe'i kana jadi', bona madupa' -mi to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli'."
Ngkai ree, metibo' -ramo hawe'ea ana'guru-na mpalahii-i.
Ria wo'o hadua kabilasa mpotuku' Yesus nto'u toe, motapui' -i-wadi hante abe' to bula. Ria-ra to doko' mpohoko' -i,
toe pai' naroncu-mi abe' -na, pai' -i metibo' molawa.
Ngkai ree, Yesus rakeni hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe. Hi ria, morumpu-ramo hawe'ea imam pangkeni, guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi to ntani' -na.
Petrus metuku' ngkawao-wadi, duu' -na rata hi berewe tomi Imam Bohe. Hi ria mohura-i moneru dohe topojaga.
Nto'u toe, imam pangkeni pai' hawe'ea topohura agama mpali' sabi' to mpakilu Yesus, bona ngalai' rahuku' mate-i. Aga uma raruai' sala' -na.
Wori' moto sabi' to mpopakilu-i, aga uma hibalia lolita-ra.
Ria ba hangkuja dua to mokore pai' to mosabi' boa', ra'uli':
"Tauna toii, ki'epe-i-kaina mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Kugero Tomi Alata'ala to nawangu manusia', pai' rala-na tolu eo kuwangu to ntani' -na, to bela manusia' mpowangu.'"
Hiaa' posabi' -ra toe, uma wo'o-wadi hibalia.
Kamokore-nami Imam Bohe hi nyanyoa hawe'ea topohura, pai' na'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ha uma nutompoi' -ra to mpakilu-ko toe-e?"
Aga Yesus, uma-i winihi, uma-i metompoi' nau' hamelaa. Hangkani-pi Imam Bohe mpekune' -i: "Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo', Ana' Alata'ala to Moroli'?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku' -mi, pai' nihilo moto-a mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia', mohura pai' moparenta hi mali ka'ana Alata'ala to Mobaraka', pai' nihilo wo'o-a mana'u tumai ngkai suruga hi rala limu'."
Mpo'epe toe we'i, Imam Bohe mpoheu' baju-na ngkai kamoroe-na, pai' na'uli': "Uma-pi mingki' ria sabi'!
Ni'epe moto-mi-koiwo lolita-na mpokedi' Alata'ala. Beiwa-mi-koiwo kabotu' -ni?" Hibalia-mi kabotu' -ra omea, ra'uli': "Bate masala' -imile, kana rahuku' mate-i!"

Ngkai ree, ria-ra to mpo'uelikui-i, ria wo'o to mpopo'ore' -i: rakaramuai lio-na, raweba' -i, pai' ra'uli' -ki: "Ee nabi! Pe'uli' pe' ba hema to mpoweba' -koe!" Topojaga wo'o-hawo, mehopo' wo'o-ramo-rawo.
Nto'u toe, Petrus hi berewe-pidi. Bula-na hi berewe toe, tumai hadua tobine topobago hi tomi Imam Bohe.
Kampohilo-na Petrus moneru, nanaa-i pai' na'uli' -ki: "Ba iko wo'o-di hadua doo-na Yesus to Nazaret toei-e mai?"
Aga nasapu Petrus, na'uli': "Uma ku'incai-i, pai' uma kupaha ba napa to nu'uli'!" Ngkai ree moderu' -imi hilou mohu' hi wobo' wala. Turua' -mi manu'.
Pehilo wo'o-imi tobine toei, na'uli' -raka tauna to hi ree: "Hi'a tetu wo'o-di doo-na Yesus toei-e mai."
Aga nasapu mperii wo'o-wadi Petrus. Uma mahae ngkai ree, tauna to mokore hi ree mpo'uli' wo'o-miki: "Iko mpu'u-di doo-nae! Apa' to Galilea wo'o-ko-kowo."
Kamosumpa-nami Petrus mpotuna' woto-na, na'uli': "Uma mpu'u ku'incai tauna to ni'uli' tetui!"

Nto'u toe, turua' -mi manu' karongkani-na. Nakiwoi-mi Petrus lolita-na Yesus ngone to mpo'uli' -ki: "Kako'ia-na turua' manu' karongkani-na, mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku." Kageo' -nami Petrus kaka'utu-utu.
Mepupulo ngkii, hawe'ea topohura agama nte imam pangkeni pai' guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi to ntani' -na, mohawa' wo'o-ramo. Rahoo' -imi Yesus, rakeni hilou rabua' hi Gubernur Pilatus.
Mepekune' -i Pilatus: "Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Yahudi-e?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae mpu'u, hewa to nu'uli' tetu."
Wori' nyala pepakilu to raparata imam pangkeni hi Pilatus.
Toe pai' mepekune' wo'o-i-pidi: "Uma-ko dota metompoi' -e? Wori' nyala-mi to raparata kehi-nu."
Aga Yesus bate uma-pi winihi, alaa-na napokakonce mpu'u Pilatus.
Butu eo bohe Paskah, Pilatus biasa-na mpobahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku', ba hema to raperapi' ntodea.
Hi mpae toe, ria hi rala tarungku' hadua to me'ewa hi topoparenta, to rahanga' Barabas. Barabas pai' doo-na, ria-ramo mpopatehi tauna rala pe'ewa-ra hi topoparenta.
Jadi', morumpu-ramo ntodea, raperapi' hi Pilatus bona nabahaka hadua to ratarungku' hewa to biasa nababehi butu mpae-na.
Napekune' -ra: "Beiwa, dota-koi ane kubahaka-kokoi Magau' to Yahudi toii?"
Pilatus mpo'uli' hewa toe, apa' na'inca ka'uma-na-hawo masala' -i Yesus; imam pangkeni mpotonu Yesus hi hi'a ngkai kamohingi' -ra-wadi.
Aga imam pangkeni mpo'ukei' ntodea, ra'uli' -raka: "Perapi' -koi bona nabahaka-taka Barabas!" Merapi' Barabas mpu'u-ramo.
Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi Pilatus mpo'uli' -raka ntodea: "Ane rapa' -na Barabas to kubahaka-kokoi, kupopai-imi tauna to ni'uli' magau' -ni to Yahudi-e?"
Pejeu' -rami ntodea, ra'uli': "Parika' -i!"
Napekune' Pilatus: "Hiaa' napa sala' -na?" Rapesukui lau-mi mejeu': "Parika' -imi!"
Pilatus doko' ngala' nono ntodea, toe pai' nabahaka-miraka Barabas. Oti toe, nahubui-mi tantara-na mpoweba' Yesus pai' natonu-miraka bona raparika'.
Oti toe, tantara mpokeni Yesus hilou hi po'ohaa' -ra to hi rala tomi Gubernur, pai' -ra mpokio' hawe'ea doo-ra tumai.
Ra'uncoi' -imi hante baju to mperelei to hewa baju magau'. Rababehi hameha' songko ngkai walaa to morui to hewa songko magau', pai' rasongkoi-ki.
Oti toe, pai' -i rapopo'ore', ra'uli' -ki: "Wori' tabe, Magau' to Yahudi!"
Woo' -na rapao' hante lua', ra'uelikui-i, pai' motingkua' -ra ntani' hewa to mpobila' -i.
Ka'oti-na rapopo'ore' hewa toe, raroncu-mi baju to mperelei-e we'i, pai' ra'uncoi' nculii' -imi pohea-na ami'. Oti toe, rakeni-imi hilou hi mali ngata bona raparika'.
Hi lengko ohea, hirua' -ra hante hadua tauna to lako' rata hi ngata, pai' rapewuku-ki hi'a-mi mpopaha'a kaju parika' -na Yesus. Hanga' -na Simon to Kirene, tuama-ra hira' Aleksander pai' Rufus.
Ko'ia mahae, rata-ramo hi po'ohaa' to rahanga' Golgota, batua-na Bulu' Banga'woo'.
Hi ree, Yesus rapopo'inui anggur to ragalo pokuli' to rahanga' mur, aga uma-i dota mpo'inu.
Oti toe, tantara mpoparika' -i, pai' -ra mpobagi-bagi pohea-na hante mpotene' undi hewa pompenoa' -ra, ba hema-ra to mporata.
Nto'u karaparika' -na toe, jaa sio mepulo.
Hi kaju parika' -na hi ntoto woo' -na, ria ukia' to mpo'uli' napa to rapakilu-ki, hewa toi moni-na: MAGAU' TO YAHUDI.
Ria wo'o rodua toperampaki raparika' dohe-na, hadua mali ka'ana-na hadua mali ki'ii-na. ((
Jadi', napa to rababehi toe, madupa' -mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli': "Magau' Topetolo' rapohewa tauna to dada'a."))
Tauna to liu hi ree, ngkololi-ra mpopo'ore' -i, ra'uli': "Hahi Nu'uli' -kona mpogero-ko Tomi Alata'ala pai' nuwangu nculii' rala-na tolu eo!
Ane wae-di, tulungi moto-mi woto-nu! Mana'u-moko ngkai kaju parika' tetu!"
Wae wo'o imam pangkeni hante guru agama ntora mpopo'ore' -i. Momepololitai-ramo ra'uli': "Tau ntani' -na natulungi-ramo. Woto-na moto-pi uma nakulei' ntulungi.
Hiaa' bo ra'uli' Hi'a Magau' Topetolo', Magau' to Israel! Ane tahilo mpu'u-i mana'u ngkai kaju parika' -na toe mai, lako' tapangala' -idi." Ntahawe' tauna to raparika' dohe-na, meruge' wo'o-ra-rawo.
Tebua' -mi eo, muu-mule' mobengi hobo' hi ngata toe rala-na tolu jaa.
Jaa tolu ncimonou', mekio' -imi Yesus napasimuku mpo'uli': "Alata'ala-ku, Alata'ala-ku! Napa pai' nupalahii-a?" Hi rala basa Yahudi hewa toi moni-na: "Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakhtani?"
Ba hangkuja dua to mokore mohu' hi kaju parika' -na mpo'epe pe'au-na toe, ra'uli': "Epe-dile! Mpokio' nabi Elia-i."

Hadua mokeno hilou mpo'ala' hampu'u wunga to hewa lomo', nabangkahi hi rala ue anggur to mo'onco, natu'u hi wuntu hompea pai' napopoju'ui-ki Yesus bona na'inu. Na'uli': "Popea, tahilo ba tumai mpu'u-i Elia mpopana'u-i ngkai kaju parika'!"
Ngkai ree, kame'au-nami Yesus napesukui, pai' modupe' -mi inoha' -na.
Nto'u toe, kain porini-olo' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mobika' ntongo' ngkai lolo-na rata hi une' -na.
Tadulako tantara to mokore mponyanyohi kaju parika' toe mpohilo beiwa kamate-na Yesus. Na'uli': "Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-i-tawo'!"
Ria wo'o hi ree ba hangkuja dua tobine to menaa ngkawao. Hanga' -na to hadua, Maria Magdalena. To hadua wo'o, Maria tina-ra Yakobus to tu'ai pai' Yoses. Pai' hadua wo'o, Salome.
Tobine toe-ramo to mpotuku' pai' mpotulungi Yesus bula-na hi tana' Galilea. Pai' wori' wo'o-pidi tobine to ntani' -na to mpotuku' Yesus tumai ngkai Galilea rata hi Yerusalem.
Eo karaparika' -na Yesus toe, eo pomporodoa, batua-na, eo kako'ia-na eo pepuea', pai' ntuku' ada to Yahudi ntepu'u ncimonou' toe, rapalii' -mi mobago. Jadi', neo' limpa-mi eo,

tumai-mi hadua tauna to rahanga' Yusuf to Arimatea. Yusuf toei, hadua topohura agama Yahudi to rabila', mahae moto-imi-hana mpopea tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Yusuf mpedahoi' hilou hi Pilatus mperapi' woto-na Yesus.
Konce-i Pilatus mpo'epe kasohi' -na mate Yesus. Toe pai' nakio' -mi tadulako tantara napompekunei' ba mahae-imi Yesus mate.
Kana'epe-na Pilatus lolita tadulako tohe'e, napiliu-imi Yusuf mpo'ala' woto Yesus.

Yusuf mpo'oli kain to bula bona nahompui' -ki. Napopana'u-mi woto-na ngkai kaju parika' pai' naputu' hante kain toe. Oti toe natu'u hi rala daeo' to ralonga' hi panapa bulu' watu, pai' naluli' hameha' watu na'unca-ki wobo' daeo' toe.
Maria Magdalena pai' Maria tina-na Yoses mpetonoi kahiapa-na woto-na Yesus ratu'u.
Katimpaliu-na eo pepuea', Maria Magdalena, Maria tina-na Yakobus, pai' Salome, hilou-ra mpo'oli anu mohonga. Patuju-ra, doko' hilou mpolanai woto-na Yesus hante to mohonga toe.
Jadi', mepupulo ngkii eo Mingku, lako' moweka', hilou-ramo hi daeo'.

Hi lengko ohea momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Hema-mi-tawo to mpotulungi-ta mpoderu' watu po'unca wobo' daeo'?" Apa' watu toe ria bohe lia. Ntaa' we'i, karata-ra hi daeo', rahilo-rawo tederu' -mi watu.
Pesua' -rami hi rala daeo', mpohilo-ra hadua kabilasa mohura tono' mali ka'ana-na, moheai hante pohea to bula. Konce tobine toera mpohilo-i.
Na'uli' kabilasa toei: "Neo' -koi konce! Mpali' Yesus to Nazaret-koi, to mate raparika'. Tuwu' nculii' -imi! Uma-ipi ria hi rehe'i. Hilo karatu'ua-na wengi.

Wae-e lau, hilou-mokoi, uli' -raka Petrus pai' ana'guru-na to ntani' -na katuwu' -na nculii' -mi. Uli' -raka hewa toi: Hilou meri'ulu-i hi tana' Galilea. Hi ria-damo mpai', pai' -i nihilo, hewa to oti na'uli' -kokoi wengi."
Pehupa' -ra tobine toera ngkai rala daeo', pokeno-rami metibo', apa' wulunga pai' moridi' -ramo. Uma-ra ulu mpololitai hema-hema, apa' ngkai kame'eka' -ra.
Pemata-na Yesus ngkai kamatea mepupulo ngkii hi eo Mingku, lomo' -na mpopehuwu-i woto-na hi Maria Magdalena. Maria tohe'ei, ria-i Yesus mpopalai pitu seta to mpohawi' -i.
Hilou-imi Maria hi topetuku' -na Yesus, narata-ra bula-ra geo' pai' peda' nono-ra. Na'uli' -raka: "Tuwu' nculii' -imi-hana Pue', kuhilo-imi we'i!" Aga uma raparasaya hawe'ea to najarita Maria toe.
Oti toe, Yesus mpopehuwu wo'o-mi woto-na hi rodua topetuku' -na bula-ra mako' hilou hi mali ngata. Nto'u toe, lence-na mobali', alaa-na uma ra'incai Kayesus-na.
Ponculi' -rami to rodua toera mpo'uli' -raka doo-ra kampohilo-ra Yesus. Aga uma wo'o raparasaya.

Ngkai ree, mehupa' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na to hampulu' hadua bula-ra ngkoni'. Nakamaro-ra apa' kura' pepangala' -ra pai' motu'a nono-ra. Nau' ria-mi tauna to mpohilo-i, uma oa' -ra dota mparasaya katuwu' -na nculii' mpu'u-imi.
Na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi humalili' dunia', mpopalele Kareba Lompe' hi hawe'ea tauna.
Hema to mepangala' pai' raniu', tehore-ra ngkai huku' jeko' -ra. Aga hema to uma mepangala' bate rahuku'.
Pai' hema to mepangala', kuwai' -ra kuasa mpobabehi tanda-tanda to hewa toi: Hante hanga' -ku mpopalai-ra seta. Mololita-ra hante basa to uma ra'incai ngkai baraka' Inoha' Tomoroli'.
Ria-ra to ngkamu ule, ba paia-na nginu rasu, aga uma moto-ra moapa. Mpojama-ra tauna to peda', bona mo'uri' -ra topeda'."
Ka'oti-na Pue' Yesus mpololitai-ra, te'ongko' -imi hilou hi suruga, pai' -i mohura hi mali ka'ana Alata'ala.
Ngkai ree, topetuku' -na hilou mpopalele Kareba Lompe' hiapa-apa. Pue' mobago hangkaa-ngkania dohe-ra, pai' nawai' -ra kuasa mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi bona mporohoi kamakono-na Kareba to rakeni.
Teofilus to rabila': Wori' -mi tauna mperao mpo'uki' dala ngkatuwu' -na Yesus, hewa to jadi' ba hangkuja mpae to liu hi laintongo' -ta.
To ra'uki' tohe'e, hibalia hante tutura to raparata-taka tauna to mpohilo mata moto-mi hawe'ea to jadi' toe ngkai lomo' -na pai' to jadi' pangkeni Lolita Pue'.
Jadi', ka'oti-ku mpewulihi' hawe'ea-na ngkai tawu-na hante kanoto-noto-na, ku'uli' agina aku' wo'o-kuwo mpo'uki' tutura-na ntuku' pomeduncu-na.
Patuju-ku, bona nu'inca kamakono-na mpu'u napa to oti-mi ratudui' -koko.
Nto'u Magau' Herodes moparenta hi tana' Yudea, ria hadua imam to rahanga' Zakharia. Zakharia toei, ngkai posantina imam muli Abia. Hanga' tobine-na, Elisabet, muli imam wo'o-i-hawo.
Tau hancamoko toera, monoa' ingku-ra hi poncilo Alata'ala, apa' ratuku' hawe'ea parenta pai' atura Pue' hante uma ria kasalaia' -na.
Aga uma-ra mo'anai', apa' Elisabet lalo, pai' tu'a-ramo roduaa-ra.
Hangkani, megoli-mi tempo-na imam-imam muli Abia to mpokamu bago Alata'ala, pai' Zakharia mpobago bago imam hi Tomi Alata'ala.
Ntuku' ada-ra, mpenoa' -ra ba hema-ra to rapelihi mesua' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mpotunu dupa'. Zakharia-mi to mpela pompenoa' -ra.
Jadi', bula ntodea mosampaya hi mali-na, Zakharia mesua' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mpotunu dupa'.
Nto'u toe, mehupa' -mi hadua mala'eka Pue' hi mali ngka'ana meja' pontunua dupa'.
Kanahilo-na Zakharia mala'eka toei, konce pai' me'eka' lia-imi.
Na'uli' mala'eka toei: "Zakharia, neo' -ko me'eka', apa' Pue' Ala mpo'epe pomperapia' -nu. Elisabet tobine-nu mo'ana' mpai', hadua ana' tomane. Ana' tetui kana nuhanga' Yohanes.
Uma mpai' mowo kagoe' -nu mpokagoe' ana' -nu tetui. Wori' tauna mpokagoe' kaputu-na.
Hi'a jadi' tau bohe hi poncilo Pue'. Uma-i ma'ala nginu anggur ba napa-napa to melanguhi, pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mpokuasai-i ngkai lomo' kaputu-na.
Wori' muli Israel natete' nculii' bona mepangala' -ra hi Alata'ala to rapue' ntu'a-ra owi.

Ana' -nu tetui mpai' jadi' suro to mako' meri'ulu ngkai Pue' hante kuasa pai' kabaraka' -na nabi Elia owi. Napopohintuwu' ana' -ana' hante tuama-ra. Pai' tauna to uma mpotuku' Pue' natete' nculii' hi ohea to monoa' bona monoto nono-ra. Hawe'ea toe nababehi bona mporodo nono ntodea, bona sadia-ramo mpotarima Pue'."
Na'uli' Zakharia mpo'uli' -ki mala'eka: "Hiaa', beiwa kaku'inca-na kamakono-na to nu'uli' tetu-e? Apa' tu'a-amadie, pai' tobine-ku tu'a wo'o-imi-hawo."
Natompoi' mala'eka toei: "Aku' toi Gabriel, pahawaa' Alata'ala to ngkai suruga. Alata'ala mposuro-a tumai mpoparata-koko kareba toe.
Napa to ku'uli' -koko toe we'i, bate madupa' ane rata-pi mpai' tempo-na. Aga iko-kona, apa' uma nuparasaya lolita-kue, wae-pi ngkai wae lau, uma-poko howa' mololita duu' -na madupa' mpu'u lolita-ku."
Bula-na Zakharia hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, kapea-pea-ramo ntodea hi mali-na. Ingu' -ra apa' mahae rahi-i.
Pehupa' -na hi mali-na, uma-ipi howa' mpololitai-ra. Muntu' mohuka' -i-damo pai' bate uma-i howa' mololita. Toe pai' ra'inca-mi ntodea karia-na to nahilo hi rala Tomi Alata'ala.
Hudu-mi pobago-na Zakharia hi Tomi Alata'ala, nculii' -imi hilou hi tomi-na.
Ko'ia mahae ngkai ree, motina'i mpu'u-imi Elisabet. Lima mula kahae-na Elisabet uma mehupa' -hupa' ngkai rala tomi-na, pai' na'uli':
"Tohe'i-e ahi' -na Pue' hi aku'. Natulungi-a mo'anai', bona uma-apa me'ea' sabana kalalo-ku."
Kahono' -na ono mula Elisabet motina'i, Alata'ala mpohubui mala'eka Gabriel hilou hi tana' Galilea, hi ngata to rahanga' Nazaret,
bona mpohirua' -ki hadua toronaa to rahanga' Maria. Toronaa toei, bula-na mokamae' hante hadua kabilasa to rahanga' Yusuf, muli Magau' Daud owi.
Karata-na mala'eka hi ria, na'uli' -ki Maria: "Wori' tabe! Pue' mpogane' -ko pai' mpodohei-ko!"
Konce-i Maria mpo'epe lolita mala'eka toei, pai' -i mopekiri ba napa batua petabe-na toe.
Na'uli' wo'o-mi mala'eka: "Neo' -ko me'eka' Maria, apa' iko-mi to napokono Alata'ala bona mporata pegane' -na.
Motina'i-ko mpai', pai' -ko mo'ana', hadua ana' tomane. Ana' tetu mpai' kana nuhanga' Yesus.
Hi'a mpai' jadi' tauna to bohe tuwu' -na, pai' -i rahanga' Ana' Alata'ala to hi suruga. Pai' Pue' Alata'ala mpo'ongko' -i jadi' Magau', hewa Magau' Daud, ntu'a-na owi.
Hi'a jadi' magau' to mpoparentai hawe'ea muli Yakub duu' kahae-hae-na, pai' poparenta-na uma ria kahudua-na."
Na'uli' Maria mpo'uli' -ki mala'eka: "Beiwa-hawo kajadi' -na to nu'uli' tetu-e? Apa' ko'ia-a-kuwo motomanei."
Na'uli' mala'eka: "Inoha' Tomoroli' mpai' mana'u hi iko, pai' kabaraka' Alata'ala to hi suruga ngkamoui-ko. Toe pai' ana' to putu toe mpai' rahanga' moroli', Ana' Alata'ala.
Epe-dile: ompi' -nu Elisabet-ele, to tu'a lia-imi pai' to ra'uli' doo lalo-ie, motina'i ono mula-imi-hawo! Mo'ana' -i mpai', hadua ana' tomane.
Apa' napa-napa to na'uli' Alata'ala bate kana madupa'."
Na'uli' Maria: "Aku' toi batua-na Pue', mengkoru-ama hi hawa' -na, bona napadupa' patuju-na hi aku', hewa to nu'uli' -ka tetu." Oti toe, malai-imi mala'eka mpalahii Maria.
Ngkai ree, pe'ongko' -nami Maria hilou hi ngata to hi bulu' -na hi tana' Yudea.
Karata-na hi tomi Zakharia, pesua' -nami pai' -i mpotabe Elisabet.
Kana'epe-na Elisabet petabe-na Maria toe, pongkale-nami ana' to hi rala puanaka-na, pai' Elisabet, nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' -imi.
Mekio' -imi napesukui mpo'uli' -ki Maria: "Iko-mi-kona to nagane' Alata'ala meliu ngkai hawe'ea tobine ntani' -na, pai' Alata'ala mpogane' ana' to nupotina'i-ki tetu.
Ha hema-a-kuwo aku' toi-e, pai' iko tina-na Pue' -ku tumai mpokinomo-a!
Wae kaku'epe-na petabe-nu, ana' to hi rala-ku ncaliu mongkale nakeni kagoe' -na.
Morasi' mpu'u-ko, apa' nupangala' lolita Pue', apa' napa to na'uli' -koko bate madupa'."
Na'uli' Maria: Mpo'une' -a Pue' hante nono-ku mpu'u.
Goe' lia-a, apa' Alata'ala Magau' Tompohore-a ngkai huku' jeko' -ku.
Nakiwoi-awa-kuwo, aku' batua-na to mpe'ahii'. Ngkai wae lau, hawe'ea tauna mpo'uli' ka'aku' -na tobine to nagane' Alata'ala.
Apa' Alata'ala to mokuasa mpopehuwu kabaraka' -na hi aku'. Moroli' hanga' -na!
Ma'ahi' -i hi hawe'ea tauna to mengkoru hi Hi'a, duu' rata hi muli-muli-ra.
Nababehi anu mobaraka' hante kuasa-na: Tauna to molangko nono-ra nagaro' bona uma oko patuju-ra.
Magau' -magau' napohu ngkai pangka' -ra. Tauna to dingki' tuwu' -ra napomolangko.
Tauna to mo'oro' nabohui hante pongkoni' to lompe'. Tauna topo'ua' napopalai hante ngkeni woto mara.
Napopohiloi ahi' -na hi kita' muli Israel, batua-na owi. Natulungi-ta hewa to najanci hi ntu'a-ta owi. Uma nalipo' pojanci-na hi Abraham pai' hi muli-na duu' kahae-hae-na."
Ba tolu mula kahae-na Maria mo'oha' hante Elisabet, pai' lako' nculii' -idi hilou hi tomi-na.
Rata-mi tempo-na Elisabet mo'ana'. Mo'ana' mpu'u-imi, hadua ana' tomane.
Tongki-ra pai' ompi' -ra mpo'epe beiwa Pue' mpopohiloi ahi' -na hi Elisabet hi kanawai' -na ana' -na toe, toe pai' goe' wo'o-ramo-rawo hangkaa-ngkania hante Elisabet.

Ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi, kahono' -na walu eo umuru-na ana' toei, tumai-ramo tongki pai' ompi' -ra mpotini' -i ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi. Patuju-ra doko' mpohanga' -i Zakharia, mpongkona' -ki tuama-na moto, ntuku' ada-ra.
Tapi' na'uli' Elisabet mpo'uli' -raka: "Neo' waetu! Bate Yohanes hanga' -na."
Hampetompoi' -ra: "Hiaa' bo uma-hanale ria ompi' -ni to rahanga' tetu-e!"
Ngkai ree, rahuka' -ki Zakharia rapompekunei' ba napa to doko' nahanga' -ki ana' -na.
Zakharia mperapi' hameha' po'ukia' pai' na'uki': "Hanga' -na Yohanes." Konce omea-ramo.
Nto'u toe, muu-mule' howa' nculii' -imi mololita, pai' -i mpo'une' -une' Alata'ala.
Me'eka' omea-ramo tongki-ra, pai' kareba toe molele hobo' hi bulu' -na Yudea.
Hawe'ea to mpo'epe kareba toe mokanono, ra'uli': "Ha jadi' napa-i mpai' ana' toei?" Apa' Pue' mpodohei-i hante baraka' -na.
Ane Zakharia, tuama ana' toei, Inoha' Tomoroli' mpokuasai-i, pai' -i mpohowa' lolita Alata'ala, na'uli':
"Mai-tamo kita' muli Israel, mpo'une' Alata'ala Pue' -ta! Apa' hompo-imi tumai mpotulungi-ta kita' ntodea-na. Tumai-i mpobahaka-ta ngkai bali' -ta.
Nawai' -tamo Tadulako to mobaraka' to mpokeni kalompea'. Tadulako toei, muli Magau' Daud, batua-na owi.
Ngkai owi hante wiwi nabi-nabi to moroli', Pue' mpojanci
kanabahaka-ta mpai' ngkai bali' -ta, nabahaka-ta ngkai kuasa-ra to mpokahuku' -ta.
Napopohiloi mpu'u-mi ahi' -na hi ntu'a-ta owi. Napadupa' -mi janci-na to moroli'.
Mojanci pai' mosumpa-i hi Abraham ntu'a-ta owi, kanabahaka-ta ngkai kuasa bali' -ta, bona ma'ala-ta mpopue' -i hante uma ria ka'ekaa' -ta,
bona kita' jadi' topetuku' -na to moroli' pai' to monoa' hi poncilo-na, duu' kahae-hae-na.
Hiaa' ane iko, ana' -ku, iko mpai' rahanga' nabi Pue' Ala to hi suruga. Apa' iko-mi mpai' to mako' meri'ulu ngkai Pue', bona mporodo ohea-na.
Iko mpai' to mpopo'incai ntodea-na ohea bona Alata'ala mpowai' -ra kalompea' pai' mpo'ampungi jeko' -ra.
Apa' ma'ahi' lia Alata'ala Pue' -ta. Toe pai' hompo-imi tumai mpotulungi-ta. Tumai-i ngkai suruga hewa eo mebere'.
Tumai-i mpobajahi nono tauna to hi rala kabengia-na pai' to me'eka' mpoka'eka' kamatea. Natete' -ta hi ohea to mpotoa' kalompea' tuwu'."
Ana' Zakharia toei, kaboo-bohea kamonoo-notoa nono-na. Mo'oha' -i hi papada to wao', duu' -na rata tempo-na natepu'u-mi mpokeni Lolita Pue' hi muli Israel.
Nto'u toe, rata hawa' ngkai Kaisar Agustus, mpohawai' bona hawe'ea tauna hi humalili' kamagaua' Roma ra'uki' hanga' -ra bona ra'inca kadea-ra.
Pobilaa' tauna to lomo' -na tohe'i rababehi nto'u-na Kirenius jadi' gubernur hi tana' Siria.
Hawe'ea tauna hilou mpope'uki' hanga' -ra, hore-hore hi ngata totu'a-ra.

Wae wo'o Yusuf me'ongko' ngkai ngata Nazaret, mpo'ema' Maria kamae' -na to bula-na motina'i-mi. Me'ongko' -ramo ngkai tana' Galilea, manake' hilou hi tana' Yudea, mpotoa' ngata Betlehem, ngata kaputua Magau' Daud owi. Yusuf kana mpope'uki' hanga' -na hi ria, apa' hi'a muli Magau' Daud.
Nto'u-ra hi Betlehem toe, rata-mi tempo-na Maria mo'ana'.
Mo'ana' mpu'u-imi, hadua ana' tomane, ana' ulumua' -na. Ana' -na toei naputu' pai' napopoturu hi rala paiwa', apa' ihia' -mi tomi torata.
Hi mali ngata Betlehem, ria ba hangkuja dua topo'ewu. Bula-ra mpodoo bima-ra hi papada ngkabengia toe,
muu-mule' mehupa' -mi hadua mala'eka Pue' mpohirua' -raka, pai' kabaraka' Pue' mehini mpohinii-ra, alaa-na me'eka' lia-ramo.
Na'uli' mala'eka toei mpo'uli' -raka: "Neo' -koi me'eka', apa' katumai-ku toi mpokeni kareba lompe' hi koi', kareba to mpakagoe' lia hawe'ea tauna.
Eo toe lau hi ngata Magau' Daud, putu-mi Magau' Tompohore-koi ngkai huku' jeko' -ni, Hi'a-mi Kristus, Pue'.
Toi-mi pompetonoi-na bona ni'inca kamakono-na lolita-ku: mporua' -koi mpai' hadua ana'lei raputu' pai' rapopoturu hi rala paiwa'."
Hampinisi mata mehupa' wo'o-mi wori' mala'eka to ngkai suruga dohe mala'eka to lomo' -na we'i. Mpo'une' -ra Alata'ala, ra'uli':
"Mai-tamo mpo'une' Alata'ala to hi suruga! Pai' hi dunia', tauna to napokono mporata kalompea' tuwu'."
Ngkai ree, nculii' -ramo mala'eka hilou hi suruga, pai' mohawa' -ramo topo'ewu toera, ra'uli': "Kita-mi hilou hi Betlehem mpohilo kajadia' to na'uli' -taka Pue'."
Kahilou-rami, pai' rarua' mpu'u-mi Maria pai' Yusuf, hante ana'lei-ra to turu hi rala paiwa'.
Karahilo-na ana' toei, ralolita-mi napa to na'uli' -raka mala'eka mpotompo'wiwi-i.
Konce omea tauna to mpo'epe lolita topo'ewu toera.
Aga Maria mpotimamahi hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi rala nono-na, pai' ntora napenonoi.
Nculii' -ramo topo'ewu toera, pai' halengko ohea mpo'une' pai' mpobila' Alata'ala-ramo, apa' hawe'ea to ra'epe pai' to rahilo, bate hewa to na'uli' -raka mala'eka.
Ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi, kahono' -na walu eo umuru-na, Ana' toei ratini' pai' rahanga' -i Yesus, hanga' to nahanga' -ki mala'eka kako'ia-na napotina'i-ki tina-na.
Oti toe, rata-mi tempo-na Yusuf pai' Maria kana mpobabehi ada ka'oti-na mo'ana', ntuku' Atura Pue' to na'uki' Musa. Nto'u toe, ana'lei-ra toe rakeni hilou hi Yerusalem bona ratonu hi Pue',
hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Atura Pue': "Butu dua ana' tomane to ulumua' kana ratonu hi Pue' bona jadi' bagia-na."
Rakeni wo'o pepue' -ra, ntuku' hawa' to te'uki' hi rala Buku Atura Pue': hamoko korokou ba roma'a ana' mangkebodo.

Hi Yerusalem nto'u toe, ria hadua tauna to rahanga' Simeon. Simeon toei, tau monoa' to mengkoru hi Alata'ala. Inoha' Tomoroli' mpodohei-i, pai' -i ncarumaka kaneo' -na rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala mpotulungi muli Israel.
Hangkani, Inoha' Tomoroli' mpo'uli' -ki hewa toi: "Ko'ia-ko mate ane ko'ia nuhiloi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Pue' Ala."
Jadi', nto'u-na Yusuf pai' Maria mpokeni Yesus ana'lei-ra hi Tomi Alata'ala bona ratonu hi Alata'ala ntuku' Atura Musa, Inoha' Tomoroli' mpopakeni Simeon mesua' hi Tomi Alata'ala.
Kana'ala' -nami ana'lei toei, napanawi pai' -i mpo'une' Alata'ala, na'uli':
"O Pue', nau' mate-ama, uma-pi beiwa. Oha-mi nono-ku, apa' madupa' -mi janci-nu.
Hante mata-ku moto-mi mpohilo Topetolo' to ngkai Iko Pue',
to nuporodo hi hawe'ea manusia'.
Topetolo' toei, hewa baja to mponotohi nono tauna to bela-ra muli Israel. Pai' -i mpokeni karabilaa' hi kai' muli Israel to nupobagia."
Tina pai' tuama ana' toei konce mpo'epe lolita Simeon mpotompo'wiwi ana' -ra.

Simeon mpogane' -ra, pai' na'uli' -ki Maria: "Ngkai Ana' -nu toii, wori' mpai' muli Israel monawu' mporata silaka, aga wori' wo'o to tehore bona mporata kalompea'. Hi'a-mi to napelihi pai' nasuro tumai Pue' Ala, aga wori' tauna mposapuaka-i mpai',
alaa-na telohu-mi ihi' nono-ra. Hiaa' iko Maria, narumpa' -ko-hana mpai' kasusaa' nono, hewa to rajalo piho'."

Nto'u karata-ra Yusuf pai' Maria hi Tomi Alata'ala toe, ria wo'o-hawo hi ree hadua nabi tobine to tu'a lia-mi. Hanga' -na Hana, ana' Fanuel, ngkai posantina-na Asyer. Nto'u toe, umuru-na walu mpulu' opo' mpae. Pitu mpae-i-wadi motomanei. Ngkai ree, balu-imi pai' uma-ipi motomanei. Tida oa' -i hi Tomi Alata'ala, hi eo-na hi bengi-na ntora mosampaya pai' mopuasa' -i mepue' hi Pue' Ala.

Jadi', nto'u Yusuf pai' Maria hi Tomi Alata'ala toe, rata wo'o-imi-hawo Hana, mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala, pai' ntora mpotompo'wiwi Ana' toei hi hawe'ea tauna to mpopea tempo-na Alata'ala mpobahaka to Yerusalem ngkai bali' -ra.
Ka'oti-ra Yusuf pai' Maria mpobabehi hawe'ea to ratuntu' hi rala Buku Atura Pue', nculii' -ramo hilou hi ngata Nazaret hi tana' Galilea.
Ana' -ra toei, kaboo-bohea pai' karoo-rohoa. Monoto lia nono-na, pai' Alata'ala mpogane' -i.
Butu mpae-na, tina pai' tuama-na Yesus hilou hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga' Eo Paskah.
Hono' -mi hampulu' rompae umuru-na Yesus, hilou wo'o-ramo ngkaralai eo bohe toe hewa kabiasaa-ra.
Katimpaliu-na eo bohe toe, nculii' -ramo hilou mpotoa' ngata-ra. Aga Yesus-hana, uma-i mpotuku' -ra. Hi ria-i-pidi hi Yerusalem, aga uma ra'incai totu'a-na.
Ra'uli' -rawo, metuku' moto-i dohe doo hampomakoa' -ra. Ha'eo-ramo momako', lako' rapali' -idi hi doo-ra pai' ompi' -ra.
Aga uma-i raruai'. Toe pai' nculii' -ra hi Yerusalem mpopali' -i.
Tolu eo-ramo mepali', lako' rarua' -idi hi Tomi Alata'ala. Mohura-i hi laintongo' guru agama, mpe'epei pai' mepekune'.
Hawe'ea tauna to mpo'epe-i mpo'uli': "Uma mowo kapante-nae'! Uma mowo kamonoto tompoi' -na!"
Konce tina pai' tuama-na mpohilo-i. Na'uli' tina-na: "Uto', napa-di-kona pai' nupohewa toe-kaie! Kai' tuama-nu, sese' -kai mpopali' -ko!"
Na'uli' -raka: "Ha napa pai' nipali' -a? Ha uma ni'incai kana hi rala tomi Tuama-kua?"
Tapi' uma rapaha batua lolita-na.
Oti toe, hidohea-ramo nculii' hilou hi Nazaret, pai' bate mengkoru-i hi hawa' tina pai' tuama-na. Tina-na mpotimamahi hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi rala nono-na.
Yesus kaboo-bohea pai' kamonoo-notoa nono-na. Alata'ala mpokono-i, wae wo'o manusia'.

Hi kahampulu' lima mpae-na poparenta Kaisar Tiberius hi ngata Roma, Pontius Pilatus jadi' gubernur hi tana' Yudea pai' Herodes Antipas to moparenta hi Galilea. Filipus ompi' -na Herodes moparenta hi Iturea pai' hi Trakhonitis, pai' Lisanias moparenta hi Abilene.
To jadi' Imam Bohe nto'u toe, Hanas pai' Kayafas. Hi mpae tohe'e, Alata'ala mpoparata lolita-na hi Yohanes ana' Zakharia hi papada to wao'.
Jadi', momako' -imi Yohanes mure' -nca'u ue Yordan mpoparata Lolita Alata'ala hi ntodea, na'uli': "Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko' -ni, pai' kana tumai-koi kuniu', bona Alata'ala mpo'ampungi jeko' -ni."

Yohanes toei mpopadupa' napa to te'uki' hi rala sura nabi Yesaya owi, moni-na hewa toi: Ria tauna to mekio' hi papada to wao', na'uli': `Neo' rata-imi Pue'! Porodo ami' -miki ohea-na! Nipakalempe ami' -mi ohea to natara mpai'!
To lobu' -na kana ra'ihii', to molangko pai' to pabulu' -bulu' kana rapohimpaya'. To pahiku-hiku rapomonoa', pai' to moloke' -loke' rapokalempe.
Oti toe, hawe'ea manusia' mpohilo Alata'ala mpohore ntodea-na ngkai jeko' -ra.'"

Wori' tauna tumai mpopeniu' hi Yohanes. Na'uli' Yohanes mpo'uli' -raka: "He koi' to bengku' gau' -ni! Napa pai' tumai-koie? Ba ni'uli' -koina, ma'ala mpai' nipasalewa roe Pue' Ala to neo' mporumpa' -koi?
Ane bongko medea-mokoi ngkai jeko' -ni, babehi-mokoi gau' to lompe'. Pai' neo' nipoperaha kamuli-na Abraham-koi! Bona ni'inca: muli Abraham bisa napajadi' Alata'ala ngkai watu-watu toe lau.
Neo' rata-mi pehuku' Alata'ala! Pehuku' -na hewa pati to rodo ami' -mi hi tawu kaju. Butu ngkaju-na to uma lompe' wua' -na, bate ratoki pai' ratene' hi rala apu."
Ntodea mpekune' Yohanes, ra'uli': "Ane wae, napa-kaiwo to kana kibabehi?"
Na'uli' Yohanes: "Hema-koi to rontonga' baju-ni, hantonga' wai' -raka-rawo to uma nakariai. Pai' tauna to ria pongkoni' -ra, bagii-ra-rawo to uma ria pongkoni' -ra."
Rata wo'o-ra-rawo topesingara' paja' mpopeniu' hi Yohanes. Mepekune' -ra, ra'uli': "Guru, napa-kaiwo to kana kibabehi-e?"
Natompoi' -ra: "Neo' -koi mesingara' melabi ngkai to rapakatantu topoparenta."

Rata wo'o-ra-rawo tantara mpekune' -i, ra'uli': "Hiaa' beiwa wo'o-ka-kaiwo kai'! Napa-kaiwo to kana kibabehi-e?" Na'uli' -raka: "Neo' -koi mporampaki rewa doo, pai' neo' mpo'ekahi ntodea bona rawai' -koi doi. Hangkuja-mi-hawo gaji' -ni, tarima-mi hante kagoea' nono."
Nto'u toe, ntodea ntora mpopea karata-na Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala. Hawe'ea-ra mepekune' hi rala nono-ra, meka' ba lue' Yohanes lau-mi Magau' Topetolo' to rapopea toe.

Toe pai' Yohanes mpo'uli' -raka omea: "Ane aku' -le, mponiu' -koi hante ue-wadi, tanda kamedea-ni ngkai jeko' -ni. Tapi' tumai-i mpai' to meliu kuasa-na ngkai aku'. Bangku' jadi' pahawaa' -na to mpobongka koloro sapatu' -na, uma-a-kuwo natao. Hi'a mpai' to mponiu' -koi hante Inoha' Tomoroli' pai' hante apu.

Hi'a ma'ala rarapai' -ki tauna to mpowiri' pae. Nagaa' pae to mo'ihi ngkai to lopa' -na duu' -na me'itu'. Pae to mo'ihi napuna' hi rala wilulu-na, pai' to lopa' -na nasuwe hi rala apu to jela' ncuu duu' kahae-hae-na."
Hewa toei Yohanes mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi ntodea, pai' naparesai' -ra nte wori' nyala tudui' -na.

Pai' nakamaro wo'o kasalaa' -na Herodes Antipas, topoparenta hi tana' Galilea, apa' Herodes mpo'ago pai' mpotobine Herodias, tobine ompi' -na moto. Yohanes mpokamaro-i sabana gau' -na toe, pai' sabana hawe'ea gau' -na to dada'a ntani' -na.
Jadi', kana'epe-na Herodes pekamaro Yohanes toe, uma-di nabalii' gau' -na to dada'a, nadonihii lau-di: nahoko' lau-imi Yohanes pai' -i natarungku'.
Kako'ia-na Yohanes ratarungku', bula-na meniu' -pidi mponiu' ntodea, Yesus wo'o-hawo tumai mpopeniu'. Ka'oti-nai raniu', bula-na mosampaya, muu-mule' tebea-mi langi',

pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u tumai dungku hi Yesus, lence-na hewa danci mangkebodo. Pai' Alata'ala mololita ngkai suruga mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Iko toi-mi Ana' -ku to kupe'ahi'. Iko-mi to mpakagoe' nono-ku."
Nto'u umuru Yesus kira-kira tolu mpulu' mpae, natepu'u-mi pobago-na. Ntuku' pomporataa tauna, Yesus ana' Yusuf, Yusuf ana' Eli,
Eli ana' Matat, Matat ana' Lewi, Lewi ana' Malkhi, Malkhi ana' Yanai, Yanai ana' Yusuf,
Yusuf ana' Matica, Matica ana' Amos, Amos ana' Nahum, Nahum ana' Hesli, Hesli ana' Nagai,
Nagai ana' Maat, Maat ana' Matica, Matica ana' Simei, Simei ana' Yosekh, Yosekh ana' Yoda,
Yoda ana' Yohanan, Yohanan ana' Resa, Resa ana' Zerubabel, Zerubabel ana' Sealtiel, Sealtiel ana' Neri,
Neri ana' Malkhi, Malkhi ana' Adi, Adi ana' Kosam, Kosam ana' Elmadam, Elmadam ana' Er,
Er ana' Yesua, Yesua ana' Eliezer, Eliezer ana' Yorim, Yorim ana' Matat, Matat ana' Lewi,
Lewi ana' Simeon, Simeon ana' Yehuda, Yehuda ana' Yusuf, Yusuf ana' Yonam, Yonam ana' Elyakim,
Elyakim ana' Melea, Melea ana' Mina, Mina ana' Matata, Matata ana' Natan, Natan ana' Daud,
Daud ana' Isai, Isai ana' Obed, Obed ana' Boas, Boas ana' Salmon, Salmon ana' Nahason,
Nahason ana' Aminadab, Aminadab ana' Admin, Admin ana' Arni, Arni ana' Hezron, Hezron ana' Peres, Peres ana' Yehuda,
Yehuda ana' Yakub, Yakub ana' Ishak, Ishak ana' Abraham, Abraham ana' Terah, Terah ana' Nahor,
Nahor ana' Serug, Serug ana' Rehu, Rehu ana' Peleg, Peleg ana' Eber, Eber ana' Salmon,
Salmon ana' Kenan, Kenan ana' Arpakhsad, Arpakhsad ana' Sem, Sem ana' Nuh, Nuh ana' Lamekh,
Lamekh ana' Metusalah, Metusalah ana' Henokh, Henokh ana' Yared, Yared ana' Mahalaleel, Mahalaleel ana' Kenan,
Kenan ana' Enos, Enos ana' Set, Set ana' Adam, Adam ana' Alata'ala.
Pe'ongko' -na Yesus ngkai ue Yordan, Inoha' Tomoroli' mpokuasai-i pai' mpakeni-i hilou hi papada to wao'.
Mo'oha' -i hi ria opo' mpulu' bengi, pai' -i nasori Magau' Anudaa'. Kahae-na toe, uma ria hanyalaa to nakoni'. Timpaliu opo' mpulu' bengi toe, mo'oro' -imi.
Na'uli' Magau' Anudaa' mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ane Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko, wae-pi hubui watu toe mewali pongkoni'!"
Natompoi' Yesus: "Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' hewa toi: `Manusia' uma tuwu' ngkai pongkoni' -wadi.'"
Oti toe, Magau' Anudaa' mpokeni-i hilou hi kalangkoa-na. Hampinisi mata-wadi napopohiloi-i hawe'ea kamagaua' hi dunia',
pai' na'uli' -ki: "Kuasa mpoparentai hawe'ea kamagaua' toera lau pai' hawe'ea ka'uaa' -na, kuwai' -koko Iko omea-mi mpai', apa' aku' omea pue' -na, pai' ma'ala kupewai' hi hema konoa-ku.
Jadi', ane mepue' -ko hi aku', kuwai' -koko Iko omea-mi toe lau."
Natompoi' Yesus: "Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' hewa toi: `Kana mepue' -ta hi Pue' -ta, Pue' Ala. Muntu' Hi'a-wadi to natao tapengkorui.'"
Oti toe, Magau' Anudaa' mpopakeni-i hilou hi Yerusalem, napopokore-i hi lolo wumu Tomi Alata'ala, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Ane Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko, mengkanawu' -ko pe' ngkai rei!
Uma-ko mpai' moapa, apa' ria te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli': `Pue' Ala mpohubui mala'eka-na mpetalawai' -ko, bona neo' -ko silaka.
Rahorongko-ko, bona witi' -nu uma dungku hi watu.'"
Natompoi' Yesus: "Te'uki' wo'o hewa toi: `Neo' tasori Pue' -ta, Pue' Ala.'"
Ka'oti-na Magau' Anudaa' mposori Yesus hante hawe'ea pesori toe, malai-imi mpopea loga to lompe'.
Oti toe, Yesus nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli', pai' -i nculii' hilou hi tana' Galilea. Hi humalili' Galilea, molele-mi kareba to mpo'uli' napa to nababehi.
Metudui' -i hi tomi-tomi posampayaa to Yahudi, pai' hawe'ea tauna mpo'une' -i.
Hilou-imi Yesus hi Nazaret, ngata kabohea-na. Pai' hewa kabiasaa-na, mesua' -imi hi tomi posampayaa hi Eo Sabat, eo pepuea' -ra to Yahudi. Mokore-imi bona mpobasa Buku Tomoroli'.
Ratonu-ki sura nabi Yesaya. Napali' duu' -na mporua' lolita tohe'i:

"Inoha' Pue' Ala hompo hi Aku', apa' nawati' -ama mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi tauna to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -ra. Nasuro-a mpo'uli' -raka to ratawani: `Tebahaka-mokoi!' Nasuro-a mpo'uli' -raka towero: `Pehilo-mokoi!' Nahubui-a mpobahaka-ra to rapobatua.
Nahubui-a mpopalele kareba-na, karata-nami tempo-na Pue' mpopohiloi ahi' -na hi ntodea-na."
Ka'oti-na nabasa toe we'i, nalulu nculii' -mi sura toe, natonu-ki pue' bago, pai' -i mohura bona metudui'. Hawe'ea tauna to hi rala tomi posampayaa toe mpodulu mponaa-i doko' mpo'epe lolita-na.
Na'uli' -miraka: "Eo toe lau, madupa' -mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' toe, nto'u kani'epe-na kubasa we'i."
Konce omea-ramo to mpo'epe-i, ra'uli': "Lompe' lia pololita-na! Uma mowo kanoto-na! Hiaa' bo ana' Yusuf-i-wadi-hawo."

Ngkai ree, na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka: "Bate ria-koi mpai' to mpo'uli' -ka walatu tohe'i: `Ee dokter, paka'uri' moto-mi-kowo woto-nu! Ane bongko nabi mpu'u-ko, anu mekoncehi to ki'epe nubabehi hi Kapernaum, babehi wo'o hi rehe'i hi ngata-nu moto.'"
Na'uli' tena-raka Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, uma ria nabi to rabila' hi ngata-na moto.

Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: napa to jadi' tempo toi, bate hewa to jadi' hi tempo-na nabi Elia owi. Nto'u toe, tolu mpae ono mula hangaa mara eo, alaa-na rata oro' bohe hi hawe'ea ngata. Wori' moto tobine tobalu hi tana' Israel to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -ra nto'u toe.
Tapi' Pue' Ala uma mpohubui Elia mpotulungi haduaa ngkai tobalu toera. To nahubui-ki hilou hi ngata Sarfat, mpotulungi hadua tobine tobalu to Sidon, bela-i-hana to Israel.
Wae wo'o nto'u nabi Elisa owi, wori' moto topohaki' poko' hi tana' Israel. Aga uma-ra haduaa to napaka'uri' nabi Elisa. Muntu' Naaman, tauna to Siria."
Mpo'epe lolita-na Yesus toe we'i, moroe lia-ramo hawe'ea tauna to hi rala tomi posampayaa.
Pokore-rami mpopalai-i hilou hi mali ngata, pai' rakeni hilou hi bingke-na, apa' ngata-ra hi lolo bulu'. Patuju-ra ke mpotulaka-i hi bingke-na bona mate-i.
Ntaa' we'i, Yesus mako' mpe'olo' tauna to wori', pai' nculi' palai-nami.
Oti toe, Yesus hilou hi ngata Kapernaum hi tana' Galilea. Karata-na hi ree, metudui' wo'o-i hi tomi posampayaa hi Eo Sabat.
Konce-ramo tauna to mpo'epe tudui' -na, apa' mololita-i hewa tauna to mokuasa.
Ria wo'o hi ree hadua tauna to napesuai' seta to dada'a lia. Mejeu' -imi na'uli':
"Ee Yesus to Nazaret Doko' nupopai-dakaie? Ba doko' nuropuhi-dakaie? Ku'inca moto-kole, ka'Iko-na Suro to moroli' ngkai Alata'ala-e."
Yesus mpo'uli' -ki seta toei: "Ngkaba'i-ko! Palai-ko ngkai tauna tetui!" Seta to mpesuai' tau toei mpodungka-i hi laintongo' ntodea, pai' -i malai, aga uma-i napopai-pai.
Konce omea-ramo tauna to mpohilo, pai' momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Uma mowo kabaraka' lolita-nae'! Napake' kuasa-na mpopalai anudaa', malai mpu'u-ramo-rana."
Ngkai ree, molele-mi kareba hiapa-apa hi tana' Galilea, to mpo'uli' napa to nababehi Yesus.
Oti toe, malai-imi Yesus ngkai rala tomi posampayaa, hilou hi tomi Simon. Nto'u toe, piniana-na Simon tobine ngkelengi' gaga. Jadi' merapi' -ra hi Yesus bona natulungi-i-hawo.
Lou-imi Yesus mokore hi ncori poturua-na, pai' na'uli': "Palai-ko haki'!" Ncaliu mo'uri' -imi, pai' memata-i mpolayani-ra.
Limpa-mi eo, wori' tauna tumai hi Yesus, mpokeni hawe'ea ompi' -ra to peda' hante wori' nyala haki' -ra. Naganga-ra butu dua-na pai' napaka'uri' -ra.

Pai' wori' wo'o seta napopalai ngkai tauna to rapesuai'. Seta to napopalai toera, kaka'au-au-ra, ra'uli': "Iko-mi Ana' Alata'ala!" Aga natagi mpu'u-ra bona neo' -ra mololita, apa' ra'inca Kahi'a-na Magau' Topetolo'.
Kamepulo-na, malai-imi Yesus ngkai ngata toe, hilou hi kawaoa' -na. Wori' tauna mpali' -i, duu' -na rarua' -i. Merapi' -ra bona neo' -ipi mpalahii-ra.

Tapi' na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka: "Kana hilou wo'o-a hi ngata-ngata ntani' -na, mpoparata-raka kareba lompe' to mpo'uli' neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Apa' toe-mi patuju-na Alata'ala mposuro-a tumai."
Ngkai ree, Yesus hilou mpokeni Lolita Pue' hi tomi posampayaa hobo' hi tana' Yudea.
Hangkani, bula-na Yesus mokore hi wiwi' rano Genesaret, wori' tauna mome'upi' doko' mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala.
Mpohilo-i romeha' sakaya hi wiwi' rano. Nto'u toe, topebau' mencore ngkai sakaya-ra hilou hi role-na mpobohoi' jala' -ra.
Hilou-imi Yesus mpohawi' sakaya to hameha', sakaya-na Simon, pai' naperapi' bona Simon mpotoko sakaya ngkai wiwi' rano hangkedi'. Oti toe, pai' mohura-imi hi rala sakaya mpotudui' ntodea.
Kahudu-na metudui', na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Simon: "Toko tena hilou hi kanalaa-na, pai' tene' jala' -ni bona mporata-koi bau'."
Na'uli' Simon: "Guru, hamengia-makai ngone mobago, aga uma hama'aa ihi' jala' -kai. Aga nau' wae, kutene' moto, lawi' nuhubui-kai."
Ngkai ree, karatene' -na jala' -ra, wori' mpu'u-mi bau' to mesua' hi rala-na, alaa-na ntepu'u morenta-mi jala' -ra.
Mekawe-ra hi doo-ra to hi rala sakaya kahameha' -na bona tumai mengawa'. Tumai mpu'u-ramo-rawo pai' ra'ihii' -mi sakaya romehaa', duu' -na neo' matala nakeni katomo-na.
Kanahilo-na Simon Petrus kabaraka' -na Yesus toe, powingkotu' -nami hi nyanyoa-na, na'uli': "Neo' -apa numohui', Pue'! Apa' aku' toi tauna topojeko'."
Simon mololita hewa toe, apa' hi'a pai' hawe'ea doo-na wilingkoroa mpohilo kawori' bau' to nawoko' jala' -ra.

Wilingkoroa wo'o-ra-rawo Yakobus pai' Yohanes, rodua ana' Zebedeus to mobago dohe Simon. Ngkai ree, na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki Simon: "Neo' me'eka'. Ntepu'u wae lau, uma-poko mebau'. Kuwai' -moko pobago to bo'u: mpotudui' tauna jadi' topetuku' -ku."
Oti toe, radii' sakaya-ra hi role-na, rapalahii omea-mi, pai' mpotuku' Yesus-ramo.

Hangkani, bula-na Yesus hi rala ngata, rata hadua tauna to mohaki' poko' hobo' woto-na. Kampohilo-na Yesus, powingkotu' -nami, lio-na dungku hi tana'. Merapi' -i hi Yesus, na'uli': "Pue', ane ma'ala, paka'uri' -a-kuwo!"
Yesus mpojama-i pai' na'uli' -ki: "Ma'ala moto. Kupaka'uri' -moko!" Hampinisi mata, mo'uri' -imi.

Oti toe, Yesus mpotagi-i, na'uli': "Neo' nulolita to jadi' tohe'i hi hema-hema. Hilou-moko ulu mpopehuwu woto-nu hi imam, bona nahilo kamo'uri' -numi, pai' keni pepue' -nu ntuku' parenta to na'uki' Musa, bona monoa' hi hawe'ea tauna kamo'uri' -nu mpu'u-mi."
Ntaa' molele lau-midi kareba-na hiapa-apa-e, alaa-na mo'iko tauna mpotuku' Yesus doko' mpo'epe lolita-na pai' mpopepaka'uri'.
Tapi' Yesus biasa hilou hi kawaoa' -na pai' mosampaya.

Rala-na ha'eo nto'u Yesus metudui', ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai' guru agama mohura hi ree. Ria-ra ngkai ngata-ngata hi tana' Galilea, Yudea, pai' ngkai ngata Yerusalem wo'o. Baraka' ngkai Pue' Ala ria hi Yesus bona mepaka'uri'.
Nto'u toe, tumai-ra ba hangkuja tauna mpokowa' hadua topungku to turu hi rala pokowaa'. Rapali' ohea-ra mesua' hi tomi doko' mpokeni doo-ra hi Yesus.

Aga uma-ra teliu mesua', apa' bihi' rahi tauna. Toe pai' ngkahe' tuka' -ramo mpokeni doo-ra hilou hi lolo tomi, rahungka' ata' pai' ra'ulu-i ntali pokowaa' -na hilou hi nyanyoa Yesus hi laintongo' ntodea.
Kanahilo-na Yesus kabohe pepangala' -ra, na'uli' -mi hi topungku toei: "Ompi', te'ampungi-mi jeko' -nu."

Mololita-ramo guru agama pai' to Parisi toera hi rala nono-ra, ra'uli': "Hema rahi-idi tauna toei mai, pai' daho' -i mpo'uli' hibalia tuwu' -na hante Alata'ala-e? Uma ria haduaa to ma'ala mpo'ampungi jeko', muntu' Alata'ala-wadi."
Na'inca moto Yesus napa to hi rala nono-ra. Toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' nipekiri hewa tetu-e?

Aku' Ana' Manusia', ria mpu'u kuasa-ku hi dunia' mpo'ampungi jeko'. Tapi' ane ku'uli' -ki topungku toei mai: `Te'ampungi-mi jeko' -nu,' uma ni'incai ba te'ampungi mpu'u-di jeko' -nae ba uma-di. Aga ane ku'uli': `Memata pai' mako' -moko,' nihilo mpai' kadupa' -na ba ka'uma-na.
Jadi', kupopohiloi-koi karia-na kuasa-ku mpo'ampungi jeko'." Ngkai ree, kamewili' -na hi topungku toei, na'uli' -ki: "Ku'uli' -koko, memata-moko, ongko' -mi pokowaa' -nu, pai' nculii' -moko."
Pemata-na mpu'u-mi topungku toei, rasabii' tauna to wori', na'ongko' poturua-na, pai' -i nculii' hilou hi tomi-na. Pai' hi lengko ohea ntora mpo'une' Alata'ala-imi.
Konce lia hawe'ea tauna mpohilo tohe'e, pai' -ra mpo'une' Alata'ala. Hante mogalo me'eka' wo'o-ra, ra'uli': "Uma mowo kajadia' to tahilo eo toe we'i lau!"
Oti toe, malai-imi Yesus, pai' hi lengko ohea mpohilo-i hadua topesingara' paja' bula-na mohura hi kantoro' -na, hanga' -na Lewi. Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Tuku' -ama."
Pokore-nami mpalahii omea, pai' -i mpotuku' Yesus.
Lewi mpobabehi karamea bohe hi tomi-na, mpotorata Yesus. Wori' wo'o topesingara' paja' pai' tau ntani' -na rakio' ngkoni' dohe-ra.

Mpohilo toe, ba hangkuja dua pangkeni agama pai' guru agama to mpotuku' tudui' Parisi, ntora ngkunuti. Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na Yesus: "Napa pai' ngkoni' pai' nginu-ko-koina hangkaa-ngkania hante topesingara' paja' pai' topojeko' -e?"
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Tauna to uma peda', uma mingki' rapokulii'. Tauna to peda' -wadi-hawo to paraluu rapokulii'.
Uma-a tumai mpokio' -ra to monoa' ingku-ra. Katumai-ku toi-le, mpokio' topojeko' -a bona medea-ra ngkai jeko' -ra."

Nto'u toe, ria to mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Topetuku' -na Yohanes Topeniu', jau-ra-hana mopuasa' pai' mosampaya. Wae wo'o topetuku' -ra to Parisi. Hiaa' topetuku' -nu Iko-kona, ngkoni' pai' nginu oa' -ra-wadi. Napa pai' uma-ra mopuasa' -e?"
Yesus mpotompoi' -ra hante lolita rapa' toi, na'uli': "Tauna hi posusaa' poncamokoa, ha mopuasa' -ra-rana bula-ra mpo'emai' topemua'? Uma-hawo.
Tapi' rata mpai' tempo-na, topemua' ra'ala' ngkai laintongo' -ra. Nto'u toe-damo, pai' lako' mopuasa' -rada."

Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' lolita rapa' toi, na'uli' -raka: "Uma ria tauna to mpotai' hanceu' pontaia' ngkai baju to bo'u pai' natelepei-ki baju to hae. Apa' ane wae, narenta lau-mi baju to bo'u. Pai' uma wo'o mpai' lompe' lence-na pontaia' to bo'u toe hi baju to hae.
Wae wo'o, uma ria tauna to mpotua anggur to bo'u hi rala pontu'ua to hae. Apa' ane dede' -i mpai', mopengka lau-mi pontu'ua to hae toe, alaa-na mobowo anggur, pai' mpadaa' wo'o-mi pontu'ua-na.
Anggur to bo'u bate kana ra'ihii' hi pontu'ua to bo'u wo'o-wadi-hawo.
"Uma ria tauna to dota nginu anggur to bo'u ane oti-i-damo mpo'inu to hae. Apa' na'uli' mpai': `Anggur to hae to motomo'.'"
Hangkani Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ntara rala bonea nto'u Eo Sabat, eo pepuea' -ra to Yahudi. Bula-ra mpotara bonea toe, ana'guru-na mpotepo' wua' gandum, raporo bona molepa' kuluma-na, pai' raru'a.
To Parisi to hi ree mpokamaro-ra, ra'uli': "Napa pai' nitiboki atura agama-ta? Mobago-dako-koina hi eo pepuea'!"
Na'uli' -raka Yesus: "Ha uma ria nibasa napa to nababehi Magau' Daud pai' doo-doo-na owi nto'u-ra mo'oro' -e?

Mesua' -i hi rala tomi pepuea', pai' nakoni' roti to rapopepue' hi Alata'ala, pai' nabagi wo'o-raka doo-na. Ntuku' ada agama-ta, imam-wadi-hana to ma'ala mpokoni' roti toe. Aga nau' wae, gau' -na Daud toe uma-hawo naposala'."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Aku' Ana' Manusia', ria kuasa-ku mpo'uli' napa to ma'ala rababehi hi eo pepuea'."
Hangkani wo'o nto'u Eo Sabat, hilou-i metudui' hi tomi posampayaa. Hi tomi posampayaa toe, ria hadua tauna to mate pale ka'ana-na.
Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai' guru agama to hi ree mpolelemata-i Yesus, meka' ba mepaka'uri' -i mpai' hi Eo Sabat. Patuju-ra, mpali' kedo' bona rapakilu-i mobago hi Eo Sabat.
Aga na'inca moto Yesus anu hi nono-ra. Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki tauna to mate pale-na hamali toei: "Mai-moko mokore hi laintongo' rei!" Hilou mpu'u-imi-hawo mokore hi ree.
Ngkai ree, na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Kupekune' -koi ulu. Ntuku' atura agama-ta, to'uma to ma'ala tababehi hi Eo Sabat: mpobabehi to lompe' -di ba to dada'a? Mpotulungi doo ba mpatehi doo?"
Mogolili Yesus mponaa-ra omea, pai' na'uli' -ki topeda' toei: "Tanoa pale-nu!" Kanatanoa-na pale-na, mo'uri' -imi.
Ngkai ree, uma mowo karoe-ra guru agama pai' to Parisi. Toe pai' mohawa' -ramo mpali' reke-ra, ba rapopai-i Yesus.
Nto'u toe, Yesus hilou hi bulu' -na, pai' mosampaya-i hamengia hi Alata'ala.
Kabaja-na, nakio' -ramo topetuku' -na pai' napelihi hampulu' rodua ngkai laintongo' -ra. To hampulu' rodua toera, nahanga' suro-na.

Hanga' -ra: Simon (Yesus mpohanga' -i Petrus); pai' Andreas ompi' -na Simon; Yakobus; Yohanes; Filipus; Bartolomeus; Matius; Tomas; Yakobus ana' Alfeus; Simon to rahanga' to Zelot; Yudas ana' Yakobus; pai' Yudas Iskariot, to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -nae mpai'.

Oti toe, mana'u-imi Yesus ngkai lolo bulu' hante ana'guru-na, pai' -ra mento'o hi lempe-na. Hi ree, wori' -mi topetuku' -na mpopea-i, pai' wori' lia tauna morumpu. Tauna toera ngkai humalili' tana' Yudea, ngkai ngata Yerusalem pai' ngkai ngata Tirus pai' Sidon to hi wiwi' tahi'.
Patuju-ra tumai, doko' mpo'epe lolita Yesus pai' mpopepaka'uri'. To napesuai' seta tumai wo'o pai' napaka'uri' -ra.
Wori' tauna mpali' ohea doko' mpoganga Yesus, apa' ria baraka' to mehupa' ngkai woto-na to mpaka'uri' -ra omea.
Yesus mponaa topetuku' -na pai' na'uli' -raka: Morasi' -koi tokabu, apa' koi' to jadi' ntodea Alata'ala, pai' Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ni.
Morasi' -koi to mo'oro' tempo toi, apa' rabohui moto-koi mpai'. Morasi' -koi to geo' tempo toi, apa' goe' moto-koi mpai'.
"Morasi' -koi ane rapokahuku' -koi, rapopalai-koi, raruge' pai' rapomohoa hanga' -ni sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku' Ana' Manusia'.
Apa' wae wo'o gau' ntu'a-ra mpobalinai' nabi-nabi to owi. Jadi', ane rapohewa toe-koi, mohajo-koi pai' pakagoe' moto nono-ni, apa' bohe mpai' rasi' to nirata hi rala suruga.
"Aga silaka-koi topo'ua' tempo toi, apa' mpolia' nirata-mi-koina kagoea' -ni.
Silaka-koi to bohu tempo toi, apa' mo'oro' -koi mpai'. Silaka-koi to goe' tempo toi, apa' susa' pai' geo' -koi mpai'.
Silaka-koi ane hawe'ea tauna mpo'une' -koi, apa' wae wo'o ntu'a-ra owi mpo'une' nabi-nabi to boa'.
"Aga hi koi' to mpo'epe lolita-ku wae-e lau, ohe'i hawa' -ku: Kana tapoka'ahi' bali' -ta, mo'ingku lompe' hi tauna to mpokahuku' -ta.
Gane' -ra to mpokamo-ta, posampayai-ra to dada'a hi kita'.
Ane ria tauna to mpohopo' kulimpi-ta hamali, neo' rapehawai. Tonu lau wo'o-ki to hamali. Ane ria to mpo'agoi-ta abe' -ta, wai' wo'o lau-i baju-ta.
Ane ria to mperapii' -ta, wai' -ra-rawo. Ane ria to mpo'agoi ba napa-napa rewa-ta, neo' raperapi' nculii'.
Napa po'ingku to tapokono rababehi doo hi kita', toe wo'o to kana tababehi hi doo.
"Ane tapoka'ahi' muntu' tauna to mpoka'ahi' -ta-wadi, uma mpai' nagane' -ta Alata'ala. Bangku' tauna to dada'a gau' -ra, ma'ahi' moto-ra hi tauna to mpoka'ahi' -ra.
Ane lompe' po'ingku-ta muntu' hi tauna to lompe' po'ingku-ra hi kita', uma mpai' nagane' -ta Alata'ala. Bangku' tauna to dada'a, bate lompe' po'ingku-ra hi tauna to lompe' po'ingku-ra hi hira'.

Ane kita' mpewai' doi-ta rahenta muntu' hi tauna to ta'inca bisa mpoponculi' -taka, uma mpai' nagane' -ta Alata'ala. Bangku' tauna to dada'a, dota wo'o-ra-rawo rapohentai doi hingka todada'a-ra, apa' ncarumaka-ra rapoponculi' moto-raka mpai'.

"Neo' hewa tetu! Kana tapoka'ahi' bali' -ta, mo'ingku lompe' hi hira'. Wai' -ra hema to doko' mpohentai-ta, pai' neo' ncarumaka ponculia' -na. Ane wae po'ingku-ta, bohe mpai' rasi' to tarata hi eo mpeno, pai' tatuku' -mi po'ingku Pue' Ala to hi suruga. Apa' manara-i Pue' hi tauna to uma mpo'incai mpo'uli' tarima kasi pai' hi tauna to dada'a.
Kana ma'ahi' -ta, hewa kama'ahi' -na Pue' Ala Tuama-ta.

"Neo' -ta mpotudo' sala' doo, bona uma wo'o mpai' Pue' Ala mpotudo' sala' -ta. Neo' mpo'uli' tauna to masala' kana rahuku', bona uma wo'o mpai' Pue' Ala mpohuku' -ta. Ampungi sala' doo, Pue' Ala wo'o mpai' mpo'ampungi sala' -ta.

Kana tawai' doo-ta, Pue' Ala wo'o mpowai' -ta. Nawai' -ta pewai' to lompe' lia, to oti-mi ralengo pai' ra'oo', duu' -na moloju'. Apa' pohuka' to tapake' hi doo, tetu wo'o-hawo mpai' to rapopohuka' -taka."
Pai' na'uli' wo'o Yesus lolita rapa' tohe'i: "Ane towero mpotete' hingka towero-na, bate moluli' -ra mpai' hi rala kinali.
Pai' uma ria ana' sikola to meliu karabila' -na ngkai guru-na. Ane hudu-miki posikola-na, pai' lako' hibalia-idi hante guru-na.
"Napa pai' mponaa-ta gege' hi mata doo, hiaa' wince' kaju to hi mata-ta moto uma ta'incai karia-na!

Beiwa-ta ma'ala mpo'uli' -ki doo: `Ompi', mai kulali gege' -nu,' bo uma moto tahiloi wince' kaju to hi mata-ta. Neo' mpetolompei' kehi! Kana talali ulu wince' kaju to hi mata-ta, bona monoto mata-ta mpolali gege' doo.
"Uma ria kaju to lompe' mowua' to dada'a. Wae wo'o uma ria kaju to dada'a mowua' to lompe'.
Butu nyala kaju ra'inca kalompe' -na hi powua' -na. Wua' ara uma rahopu' ngkai walaa to morui. Wua' anggur uma rahopu' ngkai jilata.

Wae wo'o manusia'. Tauna to lompe', bate mpohowa' lolita to lompe' -ra, apa' lawi' nono-ra ihia' to lompe'. Tauna to dada'a, dada'a wo'o lolita-ra, apa' nono-ra ihia' to dada'a. Apa' napa ihi' nono-ta, toe wo'o-mi to howa' hi wiwi-ta.
"Napa pai' nikio' -a `Pue'! Pue'!' bo uma-di nituku' hawa' -kue!
Tauna to tumai hi Aku' mpo'epe pai' mpotuku' tudui' -ku, hira' hewa tauna hi rala lolita rapa' tohe'i:
Hadua tauna mpowangu tomi, nakae tana' napomonala pai' nahu'a parawatu to moroho. Rata uda bohe pai' ue mowo' mporumpa' tomi toe, aga uma-i molengo apa' moroho parawatu-na.

Aga tauna to mpo'epe lolita-ku pai' uma ratuku', hira' hewa hadua tauna to mpowangu tomi hi lolo tana' -wadi hante uma ria parawatu-na. Rata ue mowo' mporumpa' tomi toe, kamodungka-nami, pai' gaga kagero-na."
Kahudu-na Yesus mpotudui' ntodea hawe'ea toe, hilou-imi hi ngata Kapernaum.
Hi ngata toe, ria hadua tadulako tantara to Roma, ria-ki batua-na to napoka'ahi' lia. Batua-na toei peda' danca, neo' mate.
Kana'epe-na tadulako toei karia-na Yesus hi ngata-na, nahubui ba hangkuja dua pangkeni to Yahudi hilou mpopetulungi hi Yesus, bona tumai-i mpaka'uri' batua-na.
Karata-ra hi Yesus, merapi' mpu'u-ra, ra'uli': "Tadulako toei ria, natao lia nutulungi,
apa' napoka'ahi' -ta kita' to Yahudi, pai' ria-i mpowai' -kai doi mpowangu tomi posampayaa-kai."

Ngkai ree, hilou mpu'u-imi Yesus dohe-ra. Kamohu' -na Yesus hi tomi-na, tadulako toei mpohubui wo'o-ramo ba hangkuja dua doo-na hilou mpohirua' -ki Yesus mpo'uli' -ki hewa toi: "Tuama, uma-ko mingki' tumai hi tomi-ku, apa' aku' toi bela-a to Yahudi, uma-a natao nupencuai'.
Toe pai' uma-a daho' tilou hi Iko Tuama, apa' uma-a natao mpohirua' -koko. Nau' lolita hamela-wadi nu'uli', bate mo'uri' -i mpai' batua-ku.

Apa' aku' toi-e, pahawaa' wo'o-a-wadi-kuwo, pai' ria wo'o-ra-kuwo to kuhawai'. Ane rapa' -na ria hawa' -ku hi hadua tantara mpo'uli' -ki: `Hilou-ko!' bate hilou-i. Ane mekio' -a hi tantara kahadua-na: `Mai-ko!' bate tumai-i. Ane ku'uli' -raka batua-ku: `Babehi toe!' bate rababehi. Wae wo'o-kowo Iko Tuama, napa to nu'uli' hi retu, bate madupa' hi rei."

Konce-i Yesus mpo'epe lolita ngkai tadulako toei. Toe pai' me'ili' -imi hi ntodea to mpotuku' -i, pai' na'uli' -raka: "Uma mowo pepangala' -na tau toei ria! Nau' hi to Yahudi muli Israel, ko'ia ria haduaa kurata to bohe pepangala' -na hewa tauna toei ria."
Oti toe, nculii' -ramo suro toera hi tomi tadulako. Karata-ra hi ria, mpolia' mo'uri' -imi batua-na.
Uma mahae ngkai toe, hilou-imi Yesus hi ngata to rahanga' Nain, hante ana'guru-na pai' wori' tau ntani' -na dohe-ra.

Mohu' -ramo hi wobo' wuntu ngata, rahilo-rawo wori' tauna mehupa' ngkai rala ngata, mpokowa' tomate. Tomate toei, hadua kabilasa, ana' hadudua, tina-na balu-mi. Wori' pue' ngata mpodohei tina-na hilou hi daeo'.
Kanahilo-na Pue' Yesus tobine toei, metumu' -mi ahi' -na pai' na'uli' -ki: "Neo' -pi-hawo geo'!"
Hilou-imi mpoganga pokowa', mentoda' -ramo to mokowa'. Na'uli' Yesus: "Kabilasa! Kuhubui-ko memata!"
Kabilasa to mate toei we'i, kaliliu mohura-imi pai' -i mololita. Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki tina-na: "Oi-mi ana' -nu, totina."
Tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe, me'eka' omea-ramo, pai' -ra mpobila' Alata'ala, ra'uli': "Hadua nabi to mobaraka' mehuwu-mi hi laintongo' -ta! Hompo mpu'u-imi Alata'ala tumai mpotulungi ntodea-na!"
Kareba toe molele hobo' hi tana' Yudea pai' ntololikia-na.
Ana'guru-na Yohanes Topeniu' mpoparata-ki hawe'ea to nababehi Yesus toe. Toe pai' mpokio' -i rodua ana'guru-na,
pai' nahubui-ra hilou hi Pue' Yesus, na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi Yesus pai' uli' -ki retu: `Ba Iko-mi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala, ba ria-pidi to ntani' -na to kipopea?'"

Hilou mpu'u-ramo suro to rodua toera, pai' ra'uli' -ki Yesus: "Pai' -kai tumai Guru, nahubui-kai Yohanes mpekune' -ta, ba kita' -midi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Pue' Ala, ba ria-pidi to ntani' -na to kipopea."
Nto'u toe wo'o-hawo, Yesus mpaka'uri' wori' topeda' ngkai haki' -ra, napopalai anudaa' ngkai tauna to rahawi', pai' napaka'uri' towero bona pehilo-ra.

Na'uli' -mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka suro Yohanes toera hewa toi: "Nculii' -mokoi, uli' -ki Yohanes hi retu napa to nihilo pai' to ni'epe: towero pehilo-mi, tokejo momako' monoa' -mi, topohaki' poko' mo'uri', towongo pe'epe, tomate kupotuwu' nculii', pai' Kareba Lompe' kuparata-raka to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -ra.
Marasi' -ra tauna to uma morara' nono-ra hi Aku'."

Palai-ra suro Yohanes toera, mololita-imi Yesus hi ntodea, mpotompo'wiwi Yohanes. Na'uli': "Napa patuju-ni hilou mpohirua' -ki Yohanes Topeniu' hi tana' to wao'? Ba doko' -koi mpohilo tauna to morara' nono-na, to hewa pimpi to molue nawui ngolu' hilou tumai? Uma-hawoe'.
Jadi', hilou doko' mpohilo napa-dikoie? Ba doko' mpohilo tauna to ncola pohea-na? Uma wo'o, apa' po'ohaa' tauna to ncola pohea-ra pai' to mo'ua' katuwu' -ra, hi tomi magau' -ra-wadi-hana.
Jadi', hilou doko' mpohilo napa-dikoie? Ba doko' mpohilo nabi-dikoi? Ane tetu, makono lia. Apa' Yohanes tetui meliu ngkai nabi to ntani' -na.
Apa' hi'a tetu-mi to mporodo nono-ra ntodea mpotarima-a, hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi. Na'uli' Alata'ala: `Hi'a toi-mi suro-ku, kuhubui-i meri'ulu ngkai Iko, bona mporodo ohea-nu.'"

Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Pe'epei lompe': ngkai hawe'ea tauna to putu hi rala dunia' toi, uma ria haduaa to meliu kabohe tuwu' -na ngkai Yohanes. Aga ngkai wae lau, marasi' mpu'u-ra tauna to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na. Nau' to kedi' lia tuwu' -ra, meliu kamarasi' -ra ngkai Yohanes."
Hawe'ea tauna, nte to mpesingarai' paja', mpo'epe lolita Yesus toe mpotompo'wiwi Yohanes. Mpo'epe toe, ratarima-mi Lolita Alata'ala, apa' oti-ramo mpopeniu' hi Yohanes.
Hiaa' to Parisi pai' guru agama-rana, oja' -ra mpotarima patuju Alata'ala hi tuwu' -ra, bo oja' -ra mpopeniu' hi Yohanes.
Na'uli' wo'o Yesus: "Uma mowo tauna to tuwu' tempo toi! Toi-mi lolita rapa' -ku to kurapai' -raka:
Hira' hewa ana' to mohura hi wiwi' karajaa, to ntora momekio' hi doo-ra, ra'uli': `Kibawai-koi molalowe, uma-koi dota goe' dohe-kai. Kibawai-koi motantangi', uma wo'o-koi dota geo' dohe-kai.'

Batua-na: Yohanes Topeniu' uma nipokonoi, Aku' wo'o uma nipokonoi. Katumai-na Yohanes, mopuasa' -i pai' uma-i nginu to melanguhi. Nipoka'oja' -i, ni'uli': `Kahawia' -i-hanale!' Hiaa' katumai-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia', nginu-a, ngkoni' -a. Nipoka'oja' wo'o-a-wadi, ni'uli': `Hilo-i! Tojampa, topalangu-langu, bale-ra topesingara' paja' pai' doo-ra topojeko'!'
Aga nau' wae, ta'inca kamonoto-na patuju Alata'ala ane tanaa gau' hawe'ea topetuku' -na."
Ria hadua to Parisi, hanga' -na Simon, mpohinta' Yesus ngkoni' hi tomi-na. Hilou mpu'u-imi Yesus hi tomi-na, mohura pai' -ra ngkoni'.
Hi rala ngata toe, ria hadua tobine topojeko', uma tumotoa gau' -na. Kana'epe-na karia Yesus ngkoni' hi tomi to Parisi toei, tumai-i ngkeni hameha' butolo' ihia' lana honga.
Tumai-imi mpomohui' witi' Yesus, pai' -i geo'. Nasiii' witi' -na Yesus hante ue mata-na. Oti toe nabongka wuluwoo' -na, napomporihi-ki witi' -na, na'eki pai' natuai hante lana honga.
Nahilo to Parisi babehia tobine toei. Mololita bongo-imi hi rala nono-na, na'uli': "Ane bongko nabi mpu'u-i tau toei, ke na'inca kahema-na tobine to mpoganga-i toe, ka'uma-na tumotoa gau' -na."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki to Parisi toei: "Simon, ria to doko' ku'uli' -koko." Na'uli' Simon: "Uli' -mile Guru."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ria rodua tauna to mo'inta hi tauna to ma'ala rapohentai doi. Hadua mpohenta lima atu doi pera', to hadua lima mpulu' -wadi.
Ngkai ka'uma-napi rakulei' mpobayari inta-ra, na'uli' -mi tauna to rapohentai toei: `Uma-pi mingki' nibayari inta-ni.' Jadi', hema ngkai hira' to rodua toera to meliu ahi' -ra hi popa'intaa-ra?"
Natompoi' Simon: "Ba tauna to wori' inta-na tu?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono tompoi' -nu."

Oti toe, pai' me'ili' -imi hi tobine toei pai' na'uli' -ki Simon: "Ha nuhilo tobine toei-e? Karata-ku hi tomi-nu we'i, uma nuporodo ue pobohoi' witi' -ku, ntuku' ada-ta hi torata. Hiaa' tobine toei, nabohoi' -hana witi' -ku hante ue mata-na pai' naporihi hante wuluwoo' -na.
Iko, uma-a nutabe hante pe'eki ntuku' ada-ta. Hiaa' tobine toei, uma nabahakai mpo'eki witi' -ku ngkai lomo' -ku rata duu' toe lau.
Iko, uma nulanai woo' -ku ntuku' ada-ta hi torata. Hiaa' tobine toei mpobowohi witi' -ku hante lana honga to masuli' oli-na.
Jadi', bo ma'ahi' lia-ie, toe pai' monoa' -mi kata'inca-na, jeko' -na to wori' te'ampungi-mi. Aga tauna to hangkedi' -wadi te'ampungi jeko' -na, hangkedi' wo'o-wadi-hawo ahi' -na."
Oti toe na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki tobine toei: "Te'ampungi-mi jeko' -nu."
Mpo'epe toe, momepololitai-ramo tauna to mpohimpongkoni' -raka, ra'uli': "Hema-idie tau tetui-e, pai' daho' -i mpo'ampungi jeko' -e?"
Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus hi tobine toei: "Tebahaka-moko ngkai huku' jeko' -nu sabana pepangala' -nu hi Aku'. Hilou-moko hante kalompea' tuwu' -nu."
Oti toe, Yesus mpodaoi' wori' ngata mpopalele Kareba Lompe', na'uli': "Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'." Ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mpodohei-i.

Ria wo'o ba hangkuja dua tobine to mpodohei-ra. Tobine toera, tobine to napaka'uri' Yesus ngkai haki' -ra ba ngkai anudaa' to mpohawi' -ra. To hadua, Maria to biasa-na rahanga' Magdalena. Ria-i hangkani Yesus mpopalai pitu anudaa' ngkai Maria toei.
To hadua wo'o, Yohana tobine-na Khuza, topohawa' hi rala tomi Magau' Herodes. Ria wo'o Susana, pai' wori' -pidi tobine ntani' -na. Tobine toera mpake' doi-ra moto mpotulungi Yesus pai' ana'guru-na.
Uma ria kaputua tauna ngkai ngata ntani' -na tumai hi Yesus. Wori' -mi tauna to morumpu, Yesus mpololitai-ra hante lolita rapa' toi, na'uli':
"Ria hadua topohawu' hilou mohawu'. Rala mpohawu' -na toe, ria hawua' -na monawu' hi mata ohea, alaa-na rapopongko tauna pai' natilo' danci.
Ria wo'o to monawu' hi tana' to watua. Tuwu' moto hinawu' toe, aga kaliliu molaju apa' bangi tana' -na.
Ria wo'o to monawu' hi laintongo' rui. Tuwu' rui hangkaa-ngkania hante hinawu', alaa-na rui mpo'upi' hinawu' duu' -na mate.

Ria wo'o hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu'. Tuwu' hinawu' toe, morudu' lia, wua' -na ha'atu ngkani ngkai hinawu' -na." Oti lolita rapa' -na toe, na'uli' -mi Yesus: "Hema-koi to tilingaa, pe'epei lompe'!"
Ana'guru-na mpekune' Yesus ba napa-i batua lolita rapa' toe.

Na'uli' Yesus: "Owi, Alata'ala ko'ia mpopo'incai manusia' beiwa-i mpai' jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Aga hewa toe lau, napopo'incai-mokoi tudui' toe. Aga ane ntodea-hana, kutudui' -ra hante lolita rapa', bona madupa' lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli': `Pe'epe moto-ra, aga uma oa' ra'incai batua-na. Pehilo moto-ra, aga hewa to uma oa' monoto rahilo.'
"Tohe'i-mi batua lolita rapa' -ku we'i: Hawua' to rahawu', tetu-mi Lolita Alata'ala.
Hawua' to monawu' hi mata ohea mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala, aga Magau' Anudaa' mpohilingai' nono-ra, alaa-na uma-ra mepangala', pai' uma-ra tebahaka ngkai huku' jeko' -ra.

"Hawua' to monawu' hi watu mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala pai' ratarima hante goe' nono-ra. Mepangala' moto-ra, aga pepangala' -ra tetu uma moroho, hewa hinu'a to uma morali'. Toe pai' ane rata-damo pesori, mo'ungkere' -ramo, uma-rapa mepangala'.

"Hawua' to monawu' hi laintongo' rui mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala, aga ntora mpenonoi katuwu' -ra hi rala dunia', doko' mo'ua' pai' doko' mporata kagoea'. Hawe'ea toe mposesei' -ra, alaa-na uma-ra kaliliu mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala, pai' uma ria kalaua-na hi katuwu' -ra.

"Hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu' mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala, pai' lolita toe rakakamu hante kanoa' pai' karoli' nono-ra. Ntaha-ra mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala, duu' -na ria kalaua-na hi katuwu' -ra.
"Uma ria tauna to mposuwe palita pai' napopoi' ba natu'u hi une' poturua. Palita bate natu'u hi pontu'ua-na bona hini-na rahilo tauna to mesua'.
Apa' hawe'ea to tewuni kana rapopehuwu. Pai' hawe'ea to kalerua kana rahungke pai' jadi' kahiloa.

"Toe pai' ku'uli', pelompehi-koie' beiwa-koi mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala. Apa' tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala, ranotohi nono-ra bona kawoo-woria' to ra'inca. Aga tauna to uma dota mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala, nau' ria hangkedi' to ra'inca, ra'alai' lau-ra."
Hangkani, tina pai' ompi' -na Yesus tumai doko' mpohirua' -ki, aga uma-ra teliu apa' wori' rahi tauna.
Ria hadua to mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, tina-nu pai' ompi' -nu, oe-ra ria hi mali-na, doko' mpohirua' -koko."
Tapi' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane to kupotina pai' to kupo'ompi' -le, tauna to mpo'epe pai' mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala."
Rala-na ha'eo, Yesus hante ana'guru-na mohawi' sakaya. Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Hilou-tamo hi dipo rano." Me'ongko' -ramo.
Bula-ra mosakaya, leta' -imi Yesus. Muu-mule' rata-mi ngolu' bohe hi rano mporumpa' -ra. Sakaya-ra napesua' ue, alaa-na neo' matala-ramo.

Ana'guru-na hilou hi Yesus mpolike-i, ra'uli': "Guru! Guru! Mate-ta toi-e!" Pemata-nami Yesus pai' -i mpotagi ngolu' pai' balumpa to mekoroi' toe. Mento'o-mi ngolu', pai' rano molino nculii'. Rodo omea-mi.

Ngkai ree, na'uli' -mi Yesus hi ana'guru-na: "Napa pai' uma-a nipangala' -e?" Konce pai' me'eka' -ramo, pai' momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Hema mpu'u-idi tau toii-e? Bangku' ngolu' pai' balumpa nahawai', ratuku' mpu'u-diki-hana hawa' -nae!"
Kaliliu-ramo mosakaya, duu' -na rata hi tana' Gerasa to hi dipo rano ngkai tana' Galilea.

Ria hi ree hadua pue' ngata to rapesuai' seta to wori'. Mahae-imi tauna toei uma moheai pai' uma-i mo'oha' hi tomi. Hi daeo' -wadi po'ohaa' -na. Jau-i kahawia'. Nau' rahilu' -i hante koloro pai' rante pai' radongo ncuu, ma'ala oa' nadupe' pohilu' -na pai' metibo' hilou hi kawaoa' -na, apa' nakeni karoho seta to mpohawi' -i. Nto'u Yesus mehompo ngkai sakaya hilou hi role-na, tumai-imi tauna to kahawia' toei mpohirua' -ki. Kampohilo-na Yesus, pe'au-nami pai' -i mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na. Yesus mpohubui seta toera malai. Na'uli' tau toei mpesukui: "Ee Yesus, Ana' Alata'ala to hi suruga! Napa-di-kona pai' tumai-koe? Kuperapi' bona neo' -a-kuwo nusesa'!"
Yesus mpekune' -i: "Hema hanga' -nu?" Natompoi': "Legion." ("Legion" tohe'e, batua-na "moncobu," apa' wori' seta to mpohawi' -i.)
Raperapi' mpu'u seta toera bona neo' -ra nawuso hilou hi rala wulou'laa to uma tepetudu kanala-na.
Uma molaa ngkai ree, ria wori' wawu mojume hi panapa bulu'. Seta toera merapi' hi Yesus, ra'uli': "Piliu-ka-kaiwo mesua' hi wawu toera mai." Napiliu moto-ra.
Malai mpu'u-ramo seta ngkai rala tauna toei, kaliliu mesua' hi wawu. Pesua' -ra hi wawu toe, mparampuli-ramo-rawo wawu hilou mengkajuala' hi rano, mate bonga-ramo hi rala ue.
Karahilo-na to mpodoo wawu kajadia' toe, mokeno-ramo hilou hi ngata pai' bonea to mohu' mpoparata kajadia' toe.

Toe pai' tumai-ramo pue' ngata doko' mpohilo napa to jadi'. Karata-ra hi Yesus, rahilo-rawo tauna to biasa-na napesuai' seta, mohura rodo-imi hi ncori Yesus. Moheai-i pai' monoto-mi nono-na. Me'eka' -ramo.
Tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe mpotutura beiwa Yesus mpaka'uri' tauna to kahawia'.
Ngkai ree, hawe'ea tauna hi tana' Gerasa toe merapi' hi Yesus bona malai-imi ngkai ngata-ra, apa' me'eka' lia-ra. Jadi' mohawi' sakaya-imi nculii' hilou hi dipo-na.
Ane tauna to napaka'uri' Yesus, merapi' -i bona ma'ala-i hilou dohe-na. Tapi' uma-i napiliu, na'uli' -ki:
"Nculii' -moko hilou hi tomi-nu pai' uli' -raka retu napa to nababehi Alata'ala hi iko." Hilou mpu'u-imi mpopalele hi rala ngata napa to nababehi Yesus hi woto-na.
Karata-na Yesus nculii' hi dipo rano, goe' -ramo tauna to wori' mpotomu-i, apa' hawe'ea-ra ntora mpopea-i.
Nto'u toe, rata hadua pangkeni tomi posampayaa hi ngata toe, hanga' -na Yairus. Mowingkotu' -i hi nyanyoa Yesus, naperapi' bona hilou-i hi tomi-na.
Apa' ria ana' -na tobine hadudua-wadi, umuru-na hampulu' rompae, peda' neo' mate. Hilou mpu'u-i Yesus dohe-na. Bula-ra momako' hilou hi tomi-na Yairus, mome'upi' -damo tauna to wori' mpo'upi' Yesus.
Hi olo' ntodea, ria hadua tobine, hampulu' rompae-imi ntora moraa', pai' uma ria katontoa' -na, nau' wori' -mi to mpokulii' -i.
Tumai-imi tobine toei mpomohui' Yesus ngkai tilingkuria-na pai' naganga wuntu baju-na. Hampinisi mata mentoda' -mi poraa' -na.
Mepekune' -imi Yesus: "Hema to mpoganga-ae?" Mancapu omea-ra. Na'uli' Petrus: "Guru, apa' wori' rahi tauna mpotipuhi-ta, mome'iho' -ra-damo mpo'upi' -ko."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Bate ria-di to mpoganga-ae! Ku'inca-le, apa' ria kabaraka' to malai ngkai woto-ku."
Na'inca tobine toei ka'uma-na tewunii' babehia-na. Jadi' moridi' -i tumai mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa Yesus. Napangaku' hi ntodea kahi'a-na to mpoganga baju Yesus pai' kamo'uri' -nami ngkai haki' -na.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Ana' -ku, mo'uri' -moko sabana pepangala' -nu hi Aku'. Nculii' -moko hante kalompea' tuwu' -nu."
Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi, rata-mi suro ngkai tomi Yairus to mpo'uli' -ki Yairus: "Mate-mi ana' -nu. Neo' -pi mposusai' Guru."
Kana'epe-na Yesus lolita toe, na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Yairus: "Neo' mere' nono-nu. Pangala' -mi-hana, mo'uri' moto-i mpai' ana' -nu."
Karata-ra hi tomi Yairus, Yesus uma mpiliu kabua' -bua' tauna mesua' dohe-na. Muntu' Petrus, Yohanes, Yakobus hante tina pai' tuama ana' toei-wadi to ma'ala mesua'.
Hawe'ea tauna to morumpu hi tomi Yairus geo' pai' motantangi', mpotantangii' ana' to mate toei. Na'uli' Yesus: "Neo' -pi-hawo geo'. Uma-ile mate-e, leta' -i-wadi-hawo."
Mpo'epe toe, rapotawai-i-wadi, apa' ra'inca kamate-na mpu'u-mi.
Oti toe, Yesus mpokamu pale-na ana' toei pai' na'uli' -ki: "Memata-moko ana'!"
Mo'inoha' nculii' -imi ana' toei, pai' kaliliu memata-imi. Na'uli' Yesus: "Wai' -i pongkoni'."
Konce mpu'u-ramo totu'a-na. Aga Yesus mpotagi-ra, bona neo' ra'uli' hi hema-hema napa to jadi' toe.
Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua morumpu, pai' nawai' -ra kuasa pai' kabaraka' mpopalai hawe'ea seta pai' mpaka'uri' topohaki'.
Napahawa' -ra hilou mpaka'uri' topeda' pai' mpopalele kareba-na: "Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'."
Kako'ia-ra me'ongko', na'uli' -raka: "Neo' -koi ngkeni napa-napa hi pomakoa' -ni. Neo' ngkeni boku ba pongkoni' ba doi. Neo' ngkeni rontonga' baju ba lua'.
Ane ratarima-koi hi rala tomi hantomi, mo'oha' hi ree-mokoi duu' -ni kaliliu hilou hi ngata ntani' -na.
Ane rata-koi hi ngata pai' uma-koi ratarima, wae kanipalahii-na ngata tetu, tonta awu to mentaka' hi palanta' witi' -ni, tanda kanahuku' -ra mpai' Alata'ala."
Ka'oti-na Yesus mpotudui' -ra, me'ongko' -ramo hilou hi ngata-ngata. Hiapa pomakoa' -ra, mpokeni-ra Kareba Lompe' pai' mpaka'uri' topeda'.

Nto'u toe, topoparenta hi Galilea, Herodes Antipas. Kana'epe-na Herodes hawe'ea to nababehi Yesus toe, napoka'ingu' lau-mi. Apa' ria to mpo'uli': "Yesus toei lou, Yohanes Topeniu' tuwu' nculii' -imi."
Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' Yesus toei nabi Elia owi mehupa' nculii'. Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' Yesus toei hadua nabi to owi memata nculii'.

Na'uli' Herodes: "Ane Yohanes Topeniu', kuhubui-mi wengi tauna mpopata' wuroko' -na. Hiaa' Yesus toe-e lou, hema mpu'u-i-hawo? Wori' -mi ku'epe to mpotompo'wiwi-i." Toe pai' Herodes doko' mpohirua' -ki Yesus.
Rata nculii' -ramo suro Yesus to hampulu' rodua toera, pai' ratutura-ki Yesus hawe'ea to rababehi. Oti toe, Yesus mpo'ema' -ra hilou hi kawaoa' -na mohu' hi ngata Betsaida.

Ntaa' ra'inca-di ntodea kahilou-rae. Toe pai' metuku' -ramo mpotuku' Yesus. Karata-ra hi Yesus, natarima moto-ra pai' natudui' -ra tudui' to mpotompo'wiwi Kamagaua' -na Alata'ala. Pai' hema-hema to mohaki' napaka'uri'.

Neo' limpa-mi eo, rata-ramo ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, agina tahubui-ramo ntodea toera lau hilou mpali' pongkoni' -ra pai' poturua-ra hi ngata pai' bonea to mohu'. Apa' wao' -hana hi rehe'i lau."

Na'uli' Yesus: "Koi' -mi to mpopokoni' -ra." Ra'uli' ana'guru-na: "Beiwa-mi-kaina! Apa' muntu' lima meha' roti pai' rongkaju bau' uru-wadi to ria hi kai' -e. Ha kana hilou-kai mpo'oli pongkoni' to rapokoni' -raka tauna to wori' toera lau?"
(Kawori' -ra kira-kira lima ncobu paka' tomane-pidi.) Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Hubui-ra mohura mopantuda-ntuda, nte lima mpulu' tauna hantuda."
Ratuku' -mi ana'guru-na napa to nahubui-raka Yesus.

Mohura-ra omea, na'ala' -mi Yesus roti to lima meha' pai' uru to rongkaju, pai' -i ngkongoa' hi langi' mosampaya. Oti toe napihe-pihe-mi roti pai' nabibe' -bibe' bau', pai' nawai' -raka ana'guru-na bona rabagi hi ntodea.
Ngkoni' omea-ramo duu' -ra bohu. Ka'oti-ra ngkoni', ana'guru-na mporumpu toro koni'. Metoro-pi hampulu' roluncu.
Rala-na ha'eo, Yesus mosampaya hadudua-na, pai' rata ana'guru-na dohe-na. Napekune' -ra, na'uli': "Ntuku' ponguli' ntodea, hema-a Aku' toi-e?"
Ratompoi': "Ria to mpo'uli' Yohanes Topeniu' -ko tuwu' nculii'. Aga ria wo'o to mpo'uli' nabi Elia-ko. Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' Iko hadua nabi to owi tuwu' nculii'."
Napekune' tena-ra: "Hiaa' koi' -koiwo mpo'uli', hema-a Aku' toi-e?" Natompoi' Petrus: "Iko-mi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala!"
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpotagi mpu'u-ra, na'uli': "Neo' ulu ni'uli' hi hema-hema ka'Aku' -na Magau' Topetolo'."
Na'uli' wo'o-mi: "Aku' Ana' Manusia' kana mporata wori' kaparia. Rasapuaka-a mpai' totu'a ngata, imam pangkeni hante guru agama. Rapatehi-a mpai', aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' moto-a."

Ngkai ree, Yesus mpololitai hawe'ea tauna, na'uli': "Hema to doko' mpotuku' -a kana mpobahaka konoa-na moto, pai' kana napaha'a kaju parika' -na butu eo-na-- batua-na: kana natuku' hawa' -ku nau' napopate-ki. Oti toe-di pai' lako' ma'ala-i mpotuku' -a.

Hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto, uma-i mpai' mporatai katuwua' to lompe'. Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa-na moto sabana petuku' -na hi Aku', nau' napopate-ki, hi'a-mi mpai' to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
Napa kalaua-na tarumpu hawe'ea ka'uaa' dunia', tapi' kao' -ta moto morugi apa' uma taratai katuwua' to lompe' hi eo mpeno-na.

"Hema to me'ea' mpangaku' petuku' -na hi Aku' pai' mpoka'ea' tudui' -ku, Aku' wo'o mpai' me'ea' mpangaku' kahi'a-na topetuku' -ku ane rata-apa mpai' ngkai suruga. Nto'u toe mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia' mana'u tumai hante mala'eka-mala'eka to moroli', mehini-a hante baraka' -ku pai' hante baraka' -na Tuama-ku.
Pe'epei to ku'uli' -kokoi tohe'i: ria-koi mpai' hi rehe'i to ko'ia mate kako'ia-na nihilo Alata'ala jadi' Magau'."
Kira-kira hamingku ngkai pololita-na toe, Yesus mpobawai Petrus, Yohanes pai' Yakobus manake' hilou hi lolo bulu', lou mosampaya.
Bula-na Yesus mosampaya, mobali' -mi lence-na, pai' pohea-na mewali mengea' meringkila'.
Muu-mule' ria rodua tauna to mpololitai-i, hira' nabi Musa pai' Elia.
Mehini pai' ncola wo'o-ra-rawo to rodua toera. Mololita-ra, mpotompo'wiwi kamate-na Yesus to napadupa' mpai' hi ngata Yerusalem.
Nto'u toe, Petrus pai' doo-na leta' luru'. Kamolike-ra, rahilo-rawo Yesus mehini ncola hante tauna to rodua to dohe-na.

Kaneo' -ra me'ongko' -mi to rodua toera, na'uli' Petrus: "Guru, lompe' lia-ta mo'oha' hi rehe'i! Agina kibabehi-damo tolu bamaru' hi rehe'i. Hameha' bagia-nu Guru, hameha' bagia-na Musa, pai' hameha' wo'o bagia-na Elia." (Aga uma-hawo na'incai kahompoa lolita-na.)
Bula-na mololita-pidi Petrus, rata-mi limu' mpokamoui-ra. Me'eka' -ramo mpohilo limu' to mpoputu' -ra.
Mpo'epe-ra topololita ngkai rala limu' to mpo'uli': "Hi'a toi-mi Ana' -ku to kupelihi. Pe'epei-mi lolita-na!"

Kamolino-na topololita, rahilo-rawo ana'guru-na, hadudua-na Yesus-damo. Pana'u-ra ngkai bulu' toe, ana'guru-na to tolu toera mengkalino-wadi, uma-ra ulu mpololita hi hema-hema napa to rahilo hi lolo bulu' toe.
Kamepulo-na mana'u-ramo ngkai lolo bulu', pai' wori' tauna mpohirua' -ki Yesus.
Ria hadua tomane hi laintongo' tauna to wori' to mekio', na'uli': "Guru! Tulungi-a! Pehiloi-ka-kuwo ana' -ku. Hadudua hi'a-wadi-ka-kuwo ana' -ku.
Ane napesuai' anudaa' -i, kaka'au-au-i pai' kakapadi-padi-i, duu' -na mowura' nganga-na. Neo' uma ria palaia-na anudaa' toe mpopedahi-i.
Kuperapi' -ramo ana'guru-nu mpopalai anudaa' toe, aga uma rakulei'."

Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma mowo-koie'! Ko'ia oa' -tano mepangala' -koie! Mesapuaka oa' -pidi-koi mposapuaka konoa Alata'ala! Ni'uli' -koina hangkuja tena-pi kahae-ku dohe-ni, hangkuja tena-pi kahae-na kupengkatarii kalente pepangala' -nie! Keni tumai ana' -nu!"

Bula-na ana' toei momako' hilou hi Yesus, modungka-imi napakeni seta to mpohawi' -i, pai' kakapadi-padi woto-na. Yesus mpopetibo' anudaa', pai' mpaka'uri' ana' toei. Oti toe na'uli' -ki tuama-na: "Ala' -mi ana' -nu. Mo'uri' -imi."
Konce omea-ramo tauna mpohilo baraka' Alata'ala to bohe tohe'e.
"Penonoi lompe' -e' lolita-ku toi: Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate ratonu mpai' hi kuasa manusia'."
Aga ana'guru-na uma mpo'incai patuju-na, apa' tewunii' -raka batua-na, alaa-na uma rapaha. Hiaa' uma wo'o-ra daho' mpekune' -i ba napa batua lolita-na toe.
Ana'guru-na Yesus momehono', ba hema-ra to meliu kabohe tuwu' -ra.
Na'inca Yesus napa to hi rala nono-ra. Toe pai' na'ala' hadua ana' to kedi' napopokore hi ncori-na,

pai' na'uli' -raka: "Hema to mpotarima ana' to kedi' toi sabana petuku' -na hi Aku', batua-na Aku' -mi to natarima. Pai' hema to mpotarima-a, mpotarima wo'o-imi Pue' Ala to mposuro-a. Hema-koi to tuwu' mengkadingki', hi'a-mi to bohe mpu'u tuwu' -na."
Na'uli' Yohanes: "Guru, ria kihilo hadua tauna mpopalai seta hante hanga' -nu, aga kitagi-i apa' bela-i topetuku' -ta."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Neo' -i ratagi, apa' tauna to uma mpo'ewa-ta, batua-na hira' -mi to tono' hi kita'."
Mohu' -mi tempo-na Yesus me'ongko' hilou hi suruga, napomonoa' -mi bate mpotoa' -i Yerusalem.
Nahubui ba hangkuja dua topetuku' -na meri'ulu ngkai Hi'a. Mesua' -ra to rahubui toera hi ngata to Samaria bona mporodo hawe'ea-na kako'ia-na Yesus rata.
Aga pue' ngata toera, oja' -ra mpotarima Yesus, apa' ra'inca kampotoa' -na Yerusalem.
Yakobus pai' Yohanes mpo'epe karapoka'oja' -ra pue' ngata toera. Toe pai' ra'uli' -ki Yesus: "Pue', ane nupokono, kiperapi' apu ngkai langi' mpomampuhi pue' ngata toera lau!"
Tapi' Yesus mpe'ili' -ra pai' mpotagi-ra.
Oti toe, kaliliu-ramo hilou hi ngata ntani' -na.
Hi pomakoa' -ra toe, ria hadua tauna to mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Hiapa kahiloua-nu Pue', doko' kutuku' -ko."
Yesus mpotompoi' -i, na'uli': "Bangko' ria pulo'u-ra, pai' danci ria peta-ra, aga Aku' Ana' Manusia' uma-kuna ria tomi-ku kupoturui."
Oti toe, pai' na'uli' Yesus hi kahadua-na: "Tuku' -a." Aga natompoi' tau toei: "Pue', piliu-a-kuwo ulu nculii' hi tomi-ku. Ane mate-damo tuama-ku pai' -i ratana, bo kutuku' -moko."
Yesus mpotompoi' -i hante walatu toi, na'uli': "Pelele' moto-ramo tomate mpotana hingka tomate-ra. Aga iko-kona, hilou-moko mpopalele kareba Kamagaua' Alata'ala."
Ria wo'o kahadua-na mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Pue', dota moto-a mpotuku' -ko. Aga piliu-a ulu nculii' mpalakana hi ompi' -ku."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Tauna to ntepu'u-mi mopajeko', uma-hawo lompe' ane kaka'ili' -ili' -i. Tauna to hewa toe kehi-ra, uma-ra natao jadi' topobago hi rala Kamagaua' -na Alata'ala."
Oti toe, Pue' Yesus mpelihi wo'o-mi pitu mpulu' topetuku' to ntani' -na pai' nahubui-ra momako' rodua-rodua meri'ulu ngkai Hi'a hilou hi butu-butu ngata to natara mpai'.

Na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka: "Tauna to doko' mpo'epe Kareba Lompe' ma'ala rarapai' -ki pae to taha'. Wori' pae to kana rapepae, aga topepae uma-ra wori'. Toe pai' kana mekakae-koi hi pue' bonea, niperapi' bona nahubui tauna hilou mepae hi bonea-na.
"Hilou-mokoi, aga pelompehi, apa' kuhubui-koi hilou hi olo' tauna to dada'a. Koi' mpai' hewa bima hi olo' serigala.
Neo' ngkeni karepe' doi ba boku ba sapatu' ropasa. Neo' mengkahae mpololitai tauna hi lengko ohea.
"Ane mesua' -koi hi rala tomi hantomi, ncaliu ni'uli': `Kalompea' ngkai Pue' rata hi koi' pue' tomi!'
Ane lompe' nono-ra pue' tomi mpotarima-koi, bate nagane' mpu'u-ra mpai' Pue' Ala. Aga ane uma-rada dota mpotarima-koi, uma-ra mpai' mporata rasi' ngkai pegane' -ni tetu.

Hantomi lau-wadi po'ohaa' -ni, neo' -koi pantoli-ntoli hi kahantomi-na bula-ni mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi ngata tetu. Pongkoni' napa to rawai' -kokoi, koni' -mi-hana, apa' topobago masipato' mpotarima gaji' -na.
"Ane mesua' -koi hi rala ngata pai' -koi ratarima, koni' -mi-hana napa to ratonu-kokoi.
Paka'uri' topeda' to hi rala ngata, pai' uli' -raka pue' ngata: `Rata-mi tempo-na, Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi laintongo' -ni.'
Aga ane mesua' -koi hi rala ngata pai' uma-koi ratarima, hilou-mokoi hi karajaa pai' mpo'uli':
`Nau' awu ngata-ni to mentaka' hi palanta' witi' -kai, kitonta bona nihilo. Aga kiwoi-koie': neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau'!'"
Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus hi topetuku' -na: "Ku'uli' -kokoi, hi Eo Kiama, meliu pehuku' -na Alata'ala mpohuku' pue' ngata toera ngkai pehuku' -na hi pue' ngata Sodom owi.

"Silaka-koi to Yahudi to mo'oha' hi ngata Korazim pai' hi Betsaida! Wori' moto-mi tanda mekoncehi kubabehi hi ngata-ni, aga uma oa' -koi medea ngkai jeko' -ni. Ane rapa' -na tanda mekoncehi toe rababehi hi rala ngata Tirus pai' Sidon, ke mahae-ramo-rana medea ngkai jeko' -ra, nau' bela-ra to Yahudi. Ke mpo'ala' karu' -ramo rapohea, pai' mohura-ra mpohawui' woto-ra hante awu, tanda kasoho' nono-ra.
Jadi', hi Eo Kiama mpai', meliu-pi pehuku' -na Alata'ala hi koi' ngkai pehuku' -na hi to Tirus pai' to Sidon.
