"Pai' koi' wo'o to Kapernaum! Ha ni'uli' -koina na'ongko' napomolangko-koi mpai' Alata'ala-e? Uma-e'! Natadi pai' nahuku' lau-dakoi mpai'."

Oti toe, Yesus mololita tena hi topetuku' -na, na'uli': "Tauna to mpotarima lolita-ni, batua-na lolita-ku Aku' to ratarima. Tauna to mposapuaka-koi, batua-na Aku' to rasapuaka. Pai' tauna to mposapuaka-a, mposapuaka wo'o-ra Pue' Ala to mposuro-a."

Ba hangkuja kahae-na ngkai toe, nculii' -ramo topetuku' to pitu mpulu' toera. Goe' mpu'u-mi nono-ra, ra'uli' -ki Yesus: "Pue', bangku' seta wo'o mengkoru hi kai' pai' metibo' -ra, ane kipopalai-ra hante hanga' -nu."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Kuhilo-di Magau' Anudaa' -e monawu' ngkai langi' hewa kila'!
Jadi', bona ni'inca: kuwai' -mokoi kuasa, bona ma'ala-koi mpolisa ule ba lipa pai' mpodagi hawe'ea karohoa bali' -ta. Uma hema to mposerohi-koi.
Aga nau' wae, neo' nipokagoe' kamengkoru-ra seta hi koi'. Agina mpokagoe' -koi kate'uki' -nami hanga' -ni hi rala suruga."

Nto'u toe Yesus nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli', pai' -i mololita ngkai kagoe' nono-na, na'uli': "O Mama, Pue' langi' pai' dunia'! Mpo'uli' -a tarima kasi, apa' hawe'ea toe lau nupopohiloi-raka tauna to uma pe'incai, tapi' nuwunii' -raka tauna to nginca pai' tauna to pante. Apa' wae-mi konoa-nu Mama.

"Hawe'ea-na natonu-maka Tuama-ku. Uma ria haduaa to mpo'inca kahema-ku Aku' Ana' Alata'ala, muntu' Tuama-ku to mpo'inca-a. Wae wo'o uma ria to mpo'incai hema-i Tuama-ku, muntu' Aku' Ana' -na to mpo'inca-i, pai' hema-hema to kupopo'incai kahema-nai Tuama-ku."
Ngkai ree, bona neo' ra'epe doo, me'ili' -imi hi ana'guru-na, na'uli' -raka: "Morasi' mpu'u-koi, apa' nihilo-mi-koina hawe'ea tohe'i.
Apa' wori' moto nabi pai' magau' owi to doko' mpohilo napa to nihilo koi' toi, aga uma-rana rahiloi. Doko' lia-ra mpo'epe napa to ni'epe-mi koi', aga uma-rana ra'epei."
Ria hadua guru agama Yahudi to doko' mpemai-mai kasala' petompoi' Yesus. Napekune' -i: "Guru, napa-hawo to kana kubabehi bona mporata-a katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa to te'uki' hi rala Atura Pue'? Beiwa to nubasa?"

Natompoi' guru agama toei: `Kana tapoka'ahi' Pue' -ta Pue' Alata'ala hante nono-ta mpu'u, tatonu hawe'ea katuwu' -ta hi Hi'a, tapoka'ahi' -i hudu pakulea' -ta, pai' hudu inca-ta.' Pai' `Kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa pompoka'ahi' -ta woto-ta moto.'"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Kono-mi petompoi' -nu. Babehi-mi hewa tetu, mporata moto-ko mpai' katuwua' to lompe'."
Aga guru agama toei uma dota radagi, mpoperaha-i kamonoa' po'ingku-na. Toe pai' na'uli': "Hiaa' hema doo-ku to kana kupoka'ahi' -e?"

Natompoi' Yesus: "Ria hadua tomane to mako' ngkai Yerusalem mana'u hilou hi ngata Yerikho. Hi lengko ohea-i mpohirua' -ki toperampaki. Ra'agoi-i rewa-na pai' pohea-na, pai' -i rapao' duu' -na neo' mate, pai' rapalahii moto-imi hi ohea.
Ko'ia mahae ngkai ree, ria wo'o-hawo hadua imam ntara hi ohea toe. Kanahilo-na tauna to weho toei, napelelii' pai' kaliliu moto-i.
Wae wo'o, hadua topobago hi Tomi Alata'ala liu hi ree. Kanahilo-na tauna to weho toei, napelelii' wo'o-i-wadi-hawo pai' -i kaliliu.
"Uma mahae ngkai ree, liu wo'o-hawo hadua to Samaria to bula-na hi pomakoa' -na. Kanahilo-na tauna to weho toei, metumu' -mi ahi' -na.
Kahilou-nami mpomohui' -i, nabohoi' weho-na hante lana pai' anggur pai' nawewe. Oti toe napopehawi' -i hi keledai-na pai' nakeni-i hilou hi tomi torata, pai' napodoo-i hi ree.

Kamepulo-na na'ala' rompepa' doi pera', nawai' -ki pue' tomi pai' na'uli' -ki: `Pewili' -i-hawo ulu tauna toei hi rehe'i. Nculii' moto-a mpai' pai' kubayari omea ongkoso' -nu ane ria pelabia-na ngkai tetu.'"
Hudu-mi jarita-na toe, napekune' Yesus hi guru agama toei, na'uli': "Ntuku' pomporataa-nu, ngkai to tolu toera, hema-ra to ma'ahi' hi doo to rarampaki toei?"
Natompoi' guru agama toei: "Tauna to mpotulungi-i." Na'uli' Yesus: "Koi' -moko, babehi wo'o-kowo hewa tetu."
Rala pomakoa' -ra toe, Yesus pai' ana'guru-na mehani hi ngata. Hi rala ngata toe, ria hadua tobine to rahanga' Marta to mpotorata Yesus.
Ria wo'o ompi' -na Marta, tobine wo'o-wadi, hanga' -na Maria. Maria toei mohura mohu' hi witi' -na Yesus ntora mpe'epei lolita-na.
Hiaa' Marta-hana, sese' -i-damo mpo'urusi torata. Kahilou-nami Marta hi Yesus pai' na'uli' -ki: "Pue', ha nupokono ompi' -ku tetui mpelele' -a mobago hadudua-ku! Uli' -ki pe' mpongawa' -ae."
Na'uli' Pue' Yesus: "Ee' Marta! Sese' pai' kawuhe rahi-ko mpenonoi to wori' nyala.
Hiaa' kakono-na, to paraluu nubabehi hanyala lau-wadi, toe-mi mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala. Ane Maria, napelihi-mi bagia to lompe', pai' bagia toe uma mpai' ra'alai' ngkai hi'a."
Hangkani Yesus mosampaya. Kahudu-na mosampaya, hadua ana'guru-na mpo'uli' -ki: "Pue', tudui' wo'o-ka-kaiwo mosampaya, hewa Yohanes Topeniu' mpotudui' ana'guru-na."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane mosampaya-koi, uli' hewa tohe'i: Mama, pomperapia' -kai bona hawe'ea tauna mpobila' hanga' -nu to moroli', bona Iko jadi' Magau' hi dunia'.
Wai' -kai pongkoni' to kiparaluu eo-eo-na.
Ampungi jeko' -kai, apa' kai' wo'o mpo'ampungi hawe'ea tauna to masala' hi kai'. Pai' neo' -kai nupelele' rasori."
Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Rapa' -na hilou-ta hi doo-ta mentongo' bengi pai' ta'uli' -ki: `Bale, wai' -a-kuwo pongkoni' tolu mputu'.
Apa' ria bale-ku to lako' rata, hiaa' uma-kuna ria napa-napa to kuwai' -ki.'
"Ha natompoi' -ta mpai' hewa tohe'i: `Neo' -a nusaleroi. Wobo' tehohoki-mi. Ana' -ku leta' omea-ramo dohe-ku. Uma-a bisa memata mpowai' -ko ba napa-napa.'
Uma mpai' hewa toe tompoi' -na. Nau' bale-ta uma dota memata pai' mpowai' -ta napa-napa, aga apa' uma tabahakai pai' uma-ta me'ea' mperapii' -i, memata oa' -i mpowai' -ta napa to taparaluu.
"Jadi' ku'uli' -kokoi: Perapi' -mi hi Alata'ala, nawai' moto-ta mpai'. Pali' kaparaluua-ta hi Alata'ala, tarata moto mpai'. Neo' tabahakai mpopebea wobo', Alata'ala mpobea moto-taka mpai' wobo' -na.
Apa' hema to merapi' bate rawai'. Hema to mpali' bate mporata. Hema to mpopebea wobo', bate rabea-ki wobo'.
Ha ria-koi to mpowai' ule hi ana' -ni ane merapi' -i bau'?
Ba mpowai' -i pehede' ane merapi' -i ntolumanu'? Tantu uma.
Nau' hewa apa-mi kadada'a-nie, ni'inca moto mpowai' to lompe' hi ana' -ni. Peliu-liu-nami Tuama-ni to ria hi rala suruga! Bate nawai' Inoha' Tomoroli' hi tauna to merapi' hi Hi'a."
Rala-na ha'eo, Yesus mpopalai seta ngkai hadua tauna to uma howa' mololita. Wae kanawuso-na seta toe, howa' -imi tauna toei mololita. Konce-ramo ntodea.
Aga ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli': "Kuasa-na tetu-le ngkai Beelzebul, magau' hawe'ea seta. Toe-hawo pai' ria baraka' -na mpopalai seta-e."
Ria wo'o-ra hantongo' to doko' mposori Yesus. Merapi' -ra hi Yesus bona napopohiloi-ra anu mekoncehi bona monoa' ra'inca kangkai Alata'ala-na mpu'u-i.

Ntaa' na'inca-di Yesus napa to hi rala nono-rae. Toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ane rapa' -na ria hadua magau', pai' ntodea hi rala kamagaua' -na ntora mome'ewa, bate mogero mpai' kamagaua' -na toe. Wae wo'o tau hantomi to ntora motuda', bate pagaa' -gaa' -ra mpai'.
Wae wo'o hi kamagaua' -na seta. Ane seta mpo'ewa hingka seta-na, bate mogero mpai' kamagaua' -na seta. Hiaa' ni'uli' -koina, mpopalai-a seta hante baraka' Beelzebul, magau' seta.
Aga ria wo'o doo-ni moto to mpopalai seta. Hante kuasa napa doo-ni tetu mpopalai seta? Tantu hante kuasa Alata'ala. Jadi', ngkai pobabehi doo-ni moto, monoto-mi kamasala' pebalihi-ni tetu.
Tapi' Aku', mpopalai-a seta hante baraka' Alata'ala. Ngkai toe, monoa' -mi ni'inca karata-nami tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi laintongo' -ni.
"Seta ma'ala rarapai' -ki tauna to parimuku. Ane tauna to parimuku mpodongo tomi-na hante rewa panga'e-na, uma moapa ihi' tomi-na.

Aga ane tumai hadua to meliu karoho-na mpo'ewa-i pai' mpodagi-i, nahagoi-i hawe'ea rewa panga'e-na to nasarumaka pai' nabagi-bagi ihi' tomi-na hi doo-doo-na. Jadi', ane Aku' mpopalai seta, batua-na meliu kuasa-ku ngkai seta.
"Hema to uma tono' hi Aku', kakono-na bali' -ku-imi. Hema to uma mpotulungi-a mobago, hi'a to mpobalinai' bago-ku.

"Rapa' -na ria anudaa' to mpohawi' tauna. Malai-imi anudaa' toei, pai' -i modao' -dao' hi kawaoa' -na mpali' po'ohaa' -na. Apa' uma ria naruai', na'uli' -mi: `Agina nculii' lau-ama hi po'ohaa' to kupalahii-mi toe wengi ria.'
Ponculi' -na hilou hi tauna to napalahii-e wengi, nahilo-hawo uma ria to mpo'ohai' -i. Tauna toei hewa tomi to molela' tepehaii, hinapa' hiloa-na.

Toe pai' hilou ncala' -i mpokio' pitu hingka anudaa' -na to meliu kadada'a-ra ngkai hi'a. Tumai-ramo mesua' hi tauna to napalahii toe-e wengi, pai' mo'oha' -ramo hi ree. Ka'omea-na tampai kampe'ahii' tauna toei ngkai lomo' -na."
Bula-na Yesus mololita, hadua tobine hi laintongo' ntodea mpo'uli' mpesukui: "Morasi' mpu'u-i-hana tobine to mpo'ote pai' to mpentii' -ko!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Aga to morasi' mpu'u-le, tauna to mpo'epe pai' mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala."

Nto'u tauna to wori' mpotipuhi Yesus, napokaliliu lolita-na, na'uli': "Dada'a lia tauna to tuwu' tempo toi. Merapi' -ra bona kupopohiloi-ra tanda mekoncehi. Aga uma hanyalaa tanda mekoncehi to rapopohiloi-raka. Sampale to rapopohiloi-raka mpai', tanda hewa to jadi' hi nabi Yunus owi.
Hewa Yunus jadi' tanda to rapokakonce pue' ngata Niniwe owi, wae wo'o Aku' Ana' Manusia' jadi' tanda to rapokakonce tauna to tuwu' tempo toi.

Hi Eo Kiama mpai', raja bine ngkai Selatan rapotuwu' nculii' hangkaa-ngkania hante koi' to tuwu' tempo toi, pai' -i mpotudo' sala' -ni. Apa' momako' -i tumai ngkai ngata to molaa lia, doko' mpu'u-i mpo'epe lolita Magau' Salomo to pante lia. Hiaa' ria-mi hi laintongo' -ni to meliu kabohe tuwu' -na ngkai Salomo, aga uma oa' nipangalai' lolita-na.

Wae wo'o hi Eo Kiama mpai', pue' ngata Niniwe rapotuwu' nculii' hangkaa-ngkania hante koi' to tuwu' tempo toi, pai' -ra mpotudo' sala' -ni. Apa' hira', medea-ramo-rana ngkai jeko' -ra kampo'epe-ra pololita nabi Yunus. Hiaa' ria-mi hi laintongo' -ni to meliu kabohe tuwu' -na ngkai Yunus, aga uma oa' nipangalai' lolita-na.
"Uma ria tauna mposuwe palita pai' nawuni ba napopoi' hante kura. Palita bate ratu'u hi pontu'ua-na bona hini-na rahilo tauna to mesua'.
Mata-ta ma'ala rarapai' -ki hulu'. Ane lompe' mata-ta, monoto pehilo-ta. Aga ane mogawu mata-ta, hewa mobengi pehilo-ta.
Wae wo'o-hawo hante nono-ta. Kana tapelompehi mpu'u: ane Pue' mpobajahi nono-ta, neo' tapomobengi nculii'.
Ane Pue' mpobajahi nono-ta duu' -na uma-pi ria kabengia-na, mobaja mpu'u katuwu' -ta omea, hewa tomi to nabajahi palita."
Hudu-mi Yesus mololita, ria hadua to Parisi mpokio' -i lou ngkoni' hi tomi-na. Hilou mpu'u-imi ngkoni'.
Konce to Parisi toei mpohilo Yesus ngkoni', apa' uma-i leba' mowano ntuku' ada agama-ra.

Toe pai' Pue' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Koi' to Parisi-le hewa tauna to mpobohoi' sangkiri' pai' piri hi mali-na-wadi, hiaa' hi rala-na babo' moto. Ada agama to kahiloa hi mali-na nituku' lia, hiaa' hi rala nono-ni, dada'a-koi pai' mpokahina anu doo-koi.
Wojo mpu'u-koi! Ha woto-ta-wadi to napajadi' Pue'? Ha uma napajadi' wo'o nono-ta?
Napa to hi rala sangkiri' pai' piri-ni wai' -raka to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -ra. Ane hewa toe-mi po'ingku-ni, hawe'ea jadi' moroli' hi koi'.

"Silaka-koi to Parisi! Ntahawe' hinu'a to kedi' hewa tarangkada' pai' kula' pai' hinu'a ntani' -na nipopepue' hampobagiahampulu' hi Alata'ala. Hiaa' parenta to bohe, hewa po'ingku to monoa' hi doo-ni pai' ahi' hi Pue' Ala, uma nisaile'. Kakoo-kono-na, ke parenta to bohe toe-hanale to kana nituku' -e, pai' neo' wo'o nilipo' mpotuku' parenta to kedi'.
"Silaka-koi to Parisi! Apa' goe' -koi mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa, pai' goe' -koi ane tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-koi.

Silaka-koi, apa' koi' hewa daeo' to uma ka'incanaa, to uma ria pompetonoi-na. Tauna mpolisa daeo' toe, aga uma ra'incai karia-na anu pope hi rala-na. Lompe' -koi hi mali-na, tapi' dada'a hi rala nono-ni."
Hadua guru agama Yahudi mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, hante lolita-nu tetu, kai' wo'o to nusalai'!"
Mehono' Yesus: "Silaka wo'o-dakoi guru agama! Apa' nipopokoloi ntodea hante parenta pai' ada to motomo. Hiaa' uma-koi dota mpotulungi-ra ngkolo kinolo toe. Nau' hangkaju karawe-ni uma nihuko-raka.
Silaka-koi! Nipenasa-damo mpakalompe' daeo' -ra nabi to owi, hiaa' ntu'a-ni moto-mi to mpatehi nabi toera.
Hante pobabehi-ni tetu, nipangaku' moto-mi kanipokono-na kehi ntu'a-ni tetu. Hira' mpatehi nabi to owi, pai' koi' mpakalompe' daeo' -ra.
Aga monoto lia patuju-na Alata'ala, na'uli' hewa toi: `Kupahawa' mpai' nabi-ku pai' suro-ku hilou hi tauna toera. Hantongo' -ra mpai' rapatehi, hantongo' -ra rasesa'.'
Ka'omea-na mpai', koi' to tuwu' tempo toi rahuku' sabana hawe'ea nabi to rapatehi ngkai lomo' kajadi' dunia',

ntepu'u ngkai karapatehi-na Habel owi, rata-rata hi karapatehi-na nabi Zakharia, to rapatehi hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala hi olo' meja' pontunua pepue' pai' tomi to moroli'. Wae mpu'u-di! Koi' to tuwu' tempo toi bate rahuku' sabana hawe'ea kasalaa' totu'a-ni toe.
"Silaka-koi guru agama! Kakoo-kono-na, ke koi' -di to mpotudui' ntodea ohea bona mpo'inca Alata'ala. Ntaa' koi' moto uma dota mpotuku' ohea toe, pai' nilawa' lau wo'o-di tauna to doko' mpotuku' -e."
Malai-imi Yesus ngkai ree. Pai' ntepu'u tempo toe, gigi mpu'u-mi nono-ra guru agama pai' to Parisi. Toe pai' rapemai-mai-i hante wori' nyala pompekunea' -ra,
pai' ralelemata ncuu-i, mpali' kasalaa' hi pololita-na.

Ngkai kamoncobu-ncobu-ra tauna to morumpu doko' mpohilo Yesus, mome'upi' -ra alaa-na momepopongko ngkawiti'. Nto'u toe, Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na, na'uli': "Mo'inga' -inga' -koi hi ragi-ra to Parisi. Batua-na, neo' nituku' kehi-ra. Apa' hira' toe lompe' hi mali-na-wadi dada'a moto hi rala nono-ra.
Tapi' hawe'ea kehi-ra to tewunii' bate kahiloa mpai'. Pai' hawe'ea to hi rala nono-ra bate telohu mpai'.
Jadi', napa to ni'uli' hi bengi-na bate ralohu hi eo-na. Pai' napa to niwara' -ki doo hi rala tomi to tehohoki, bate ratolele hobo' hi rala ngata.
"Ompi' -ompi', pe'epei lompe' lolita-ku: neo' -koi mpoka'eka' manusia' to doko' mpopatehi-koi, apa' hudu ree-wadi pakulea' -ra.
Sampale-di to kana nipoka'eka', Alata'ala. Apa' mokuasa-i mpatehi-koi, pai' mokuasa wo'o-i mpotadi-koi hi rala naraka. Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, Hi'a-mi to kana nipoka'eka'.
"Lima ma'a rone biasa-na rapobalu' nte rompepa' doi see-wadi. Aga nau' wae, uma ria hama'aa to uma nakiwoi Pue' Ala.
Peliu-liu-nami koi'. Bangku' kawori' wuluwoo' -ni nabila' pai' na'inca omea. Jadi' neo' -koi me'eka'. Meliu-pi pompewili' -na Alata'ala hi koi' ngkai pompewili' -na rone to wori'.
"Pe'epei lompe' lolita-ku: hema to mpangaku' hi doo kahi'a-na topetuku' -ku, hi'a wo'o mpai' kupangaku' hi nyanyoa hawe'ea mala'eka Alata'ala, ku'uli': `Tau toei topetuku' -ku.'
Aga hema to mposapu-a hi doo, hi'a wo'o mpai' kusapu hi nyanyoa mala'eka Alata'ala, ku'uli': `Bela-i topetuku' -ku.'
"Tauna to ncapuaka-a, Aku' Ana' Manusia', ma'ala-pidi te'ampungi sala' -na. Aga tauna to mporuge' Inoha' Tomoroli', uma-pi ma'ala ampungia sala' -na.
"Ane rakeni-koi hi tomi posampayaa pai' rapakilu-koi hi topohura agama ba topoparenta sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku', neo' -koi me'eka' ba beiwa mpai' tompoi' -ni ba napa mpai' to kana ni'uli'.
Apa' hinto'u toe mpai', Inoha' Tomoroli' moto mpotudui' -koi napa to kana ni'uli'."
Ria hadua ngkai laintongo' ntodea mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, uli' -ki ompi' -ku bona nawai' -a-kuwo bagia-ku ngkai sosora totu'a-kai."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ompi', hema to mpo'ongko' -a jadi' topohura to mpobagi-kokoi sosora totu'a-ni?"
Oti toe na'uli' -raka tauna to wori': "Mo'inga' -inga' -koi pai' pelompehi, bona neo' -koi mpokahina ba apa-apa rewa dunia'. Apa' nau' wori' rewa-ta, uma ngkai rewa toe pai' lompe' tuwu' -ta."
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpololitai-ra hante hanyala lolita rapa', na'uli': "Ria hadua topo'ua' to tebua' lompe' -ki polia' -na.
Na'uli' -mi hi rala nono-na: `Napa-le' to kubabehi-e? Uma-pi liu poropo' -ku kupontimamahii wua' polia' -ku.
Aa, kurata reke! Kukero lau-di poropo' -ku, pai' kuwangu to meliu kabohe-na, bona hi retu-mi mpai' pontimamahia hawe'ea pae-ku pai' rewa-ku.
Oti toe mpai', uma-apa mobago, apa' wori' -mi timamahia-ku, hono' nte ba hangkuja mpae kupake'. Wae-pi, ntora-ama, ngkoni', nginu, pai' ntora goe' -a-damo!'
"Ntaa' we'i Alata'ala mpo'uli' -ki tauna toei: `He towojo! Bengi toe mpai' lau, ra'alai' -moko inoha' -nu. Jadi', hawe'ea to nurumpu tetu, hema-mi mpai' pue' -na?'
"Wae-mi katuwu' tauna to doko' mporumpu ka'uaa' hi dunia', tapi' mpe'ahii' tuwu' -ra hi poncilo Alata'ala."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Toe pai' ku'uli' -kokoi, neo' -koi sese' mpopekiri tuwu' -ni. Neo' ni'uli': `Napa-le' to takoni' -e? Napa-le' to tapohea-e?'
Apa' katuwu' -ni meliu ngkai pongkoni' pai' pohea.

Penonoi-dile danci kaa' -e. Uma-ra molia', uma-ra mepae, uma ria poropo' -ra ba wilulu-ra. Aga nau' wae, Alata'ala mpowai' moto-ra pongkoni'. Peliu-liu-nami koi', apa' hi poncilo Alata'ala meliu tuwu' -ni ngkai katuwu' danci, pai' meliu pompewili' -na hi koi' ngkai pompewili' -na hi danci.
Napa wo'o kalaua-na wori' rahi pekiri-ni? Apa' nau' sese' ncuu-ta mpopekiri, uma-ta bisa mpodonihii umuru-ta nau' kampa' hamengi.
Jadi', ane to kedi' toe uma nipakulei' mpobabehi, napa pai' wori' rahi pekiri-ni?
Penonoi-dile katuwu' wunga-e. Uma-ra mobago, uma-ra mpobabehi pohea-ra. Tapi' ku'uli' -kokoi, bangku' Magau' Salomo-hawoe' hante hawe'ea ka'uaa' -na, pohea-na uma hewa kancola wunga toera lau.

Kowo' hi papada tuwu' eo toe lau, mepulo rasuwe oti. Aga nau' wae, Alata'ala mpakancola moto kowo' toe. Peliu-liu-nami koi'! Meliu pompewili' Alata'ala hi koi'. Jadi', napa pai' uma nipangala' pompewili' -nae?
Jadi' neo' -koi sese' rahi mpenonoi napa to nikoni' ba napa to ni'inu. Neo' -koi me'eka'.
Hawe'ea tetu lau to ntora rapali' tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala. Hiaa' Tuama-ni hi suruga mpo'inca kaparaluua-ni.
Kana mengkoru-ta hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ta. Ane toe tababehi, to ntani' -ntani' -na nawai' moto-ta mpai'.
"Koi' to mpotuku' -a, uma-koi hangkuja-na. Aga nau' wae, neo' -koi me'eka'. Apa' Alata'ala Tuama-ni mpopelihi-mokoi ngkai kabula rala-na, napajadi' -koi ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua' -na.

Toe pai' ku'uli', pobalu' -mi rewa-ni, pai' oli-na wai' -raka tokabu. Babehi-mokoi karepe' to uma bisa moheu'. Batua-na, babehi kehi to lompe'. Apa' kehi to lompe' toe ma'ala rarapai' -ki rewa to nitimamahi hi suruga, to uma ria karontoa-na, apa' uma ria to mpanako pai' uma ria anutuwu' to mposerohi.
Apa' hiapa pontimamahia rewa-ta, retu wo'o nono-ta.

"Neo' -koi lempe', mo'inga' -inga' oa' -koi mpopea karata-ku. Agina-koi hewa batua to mpopea karata-na maradika-ra ngkai posusaa' poncamokoa. Batua toera, sadia-mi pohea-ra, pai' palita-ra rapobaa ncuu, bona ane rata-ipi mpai' maradika-ra pai' -i mpopebea wobo', kaliliu rabea-ki.
Morasi' batua to narata maradika-ra bula-ra mojaga pai' mpopea karata-na. Apa' maradika toei mpai' mpehoo' abe' hi hope' -na, napopohura-ra pai' natonui-ra.
Morasi' mpu'u-ra batua to narata maradika-ra rodo moto-ra mpopea-i, nau' mentongo' bengi ba paia-na liu mentongo' bengi.
"Poinono lolita rapa' -ku toi: Ane na'inca ami' -mi pue' tomi jaa hangkuja topanako rata, bate mojaga-i bona neo' -ra mesua'.
Hewa toe wo'o kana rodo ami' -mokoi mpopea-a, apa' uma ni'incai tempo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia'."
Napekune' Petrus hi Yesus: "Pue', ba hi kai' -wadi lolita rapa' tetu-e, ba hi ntodea wo'o-di?"

Na'uli' Pue': "Rapa' -na ria hadua batua to monoto nono-na pai' to tida mpobago bago maradika-na. Batua toei na'ongko' maradika-na jadi' topohawa' to mpohawai' batua ntani' -na pai' mpobagi-raka pongkoni' -ra butu eo-na.
Uma mowo kamorasi' -na ane maradika-na rata nculii' ngkai pomakoa' -na pai' mporata-i bula-na mpobago bago-na.
Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, maradika-na mpo'ongko' -i pai' mpowai' -i kuasa mpewili' hawe'ea ka'uaa' -na.
Aga silaka mpai' batua to mpo'uli': `Uma-ile sohi' rata maradika-e.' Natepu'u-mi mpoweba' hingka batua-na ba tobine ba tomane, pai' -i ntora ngkoni' pai' nginu duu' -na palangu-langu.

Ntaa' we'i, bula-na lempe' moto hewa toe, muu-mule' rata-mi maradika-na hi eo pai' hi jaa to uma na'incai. Batua toei raweba' ntarurua' pai' rapetadi hi mali-na, raponcawa tauna to uma mepangala' hi Alata'ala.
"Batua to mpo'inca moto konoa maradika-na, tapi' uma-i mo'inga' -inga' pai' uma nababehi konoa maradika-na, batua toei bate raweba' mperegea.

Aga batua to uma-hawo mpo'incai konoa maradika-na, pai' -i mpobabehi to natao raweba' -ki, raweba' moto-i, aga huka' -na-wadi. Apa' hema to rawai' wori', wori' wo'o to ratuntu' ngkai hi'a. Hema to ratonui wori', rapomperapii' wori' wo'o-i.
"Katumai-ku toi, tumai mpobaa apu hi dunia'. Pai' konoa-ku bona apu toe sohi' rapobaa-mi.
Ria-pidi pontodohakaa to kana kutodohaka, pai' uma oa' rodo nono-ku ane pontodohakaa toe ko'ia madupa'.
Ha ni'uli' -koina katumai-ku toi, tumai mpopohintuwu' tauna? Uma-e'! Katumai-ku toi, tumai mpoposisala tauna.
Ntepu'u ngkai tempo toi, tau hantina to nte lima rala-na hantomi mosisala: tolu hamali, rodua hamali.
To tuama mpo'ewa ana' -na tomane, ana' tomane mpo'ewa tuama-na. To tina mpo'ewa ana' -na tobine, pai' ana' tobine mpo'ewa tina-na. To piniana mpo'ewa minia-na, pai' to minia mpo'ewa piniana-na."
Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus hi tauna to wori': "Ane nihilo limu' mehupa' tono' hi kasoloa, ni'uli' udaa mpai'. Udaa mpu'u.
Ane mewui ngolu' ngkai tono' selatan, ni'uli' mara eo mpai', pai' bate wae mpu'u.
He koi' to lompe' hi mali-na-wadi! Ni'inca lia mpelence tanda hi langi' pai' hi dunia'. Napa-di pai' uma ni'incai mpelence napa to nababehi Pue' Ala tempo toi!
"Napa pai' uma oa' nipakanoto nono-ni pai' mpangaku' napa to monoa'!

Ane rapa' -na ria to doko' mpakilu-ta hi totu'a ngata, agina tahuduwukui mpo'oti kara-kara-ta bula-ta hi lengko ohea-pidi. Nee-neo' mpai' nakeni mpu'u-ta hi topohura, pai' topohura mpai' mpotonu-ta hi polisi, pai' polisi mpopesua' -ta hi rala tarungku'.
Mpu'u ku'uli': uma-tapa tebahaka ngkai rala tarungku' ane da koo-ko'ia oti tabayari waya' -ta."
Nto'u toe wo'o-hawo, ria tauna mpololitai Yesus, mpololita ba hangkuja dua to Galilea to rapatehi ntuku' hawa' Pilatus bula-ra mpotonu pepue' -ra hi Pue' Ala.
Mpotompoi' lolita toe, na'uli' -mi Yesus: "Ba ni'uli' -koina wae, pai' hewa toe rahi kamate-ra to Galilea toera, apa' meliu jeko' -ra ngkai hawe'ea to Galilea to ntani' -na?
Uma-e' waetu! Ku'uli' -kokoi: ane uma-koi medea ngkai jeko' -ni, bate rahuku' wo'o-koiwo mpai' omea.
Wae wo'o to hampulu' walu to mate nadungkahi tomi to molangko hi Siloam. Apa' oo-raka kamate-rae, meka' ba lue' ni'uli' melabi-rana sala' -ra ngkai hawe'ea to Yerusalem?
Uma-e' waetu! Ku'uli' -kokoi: ane uma-koi medea ngkai jeko' -ni, bate rahuku' wo'o-koiwo mpai' omea."
Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka lolita rapa' toi. Na'uli': "Ria hadua tauna to mpohu'a kaju ara hi pampa-na. Hangkani hilou-imi mpongoa' -ngoa' ba ria wua' -na. Ntaa' uma-di ria hamehaa' -e.

Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki tompodoo pampa-na: `Hilo, tolu mpae-mi ntora tumai-a mpehiloi kaju toei ba ria wua' -na, uma oa' ria. Toki lau-mi! Napa kalaua-na tuwu' hi rehe'i mpe'oti mara rudu' tana'.'
"Na'uli' tompodoo pampa toei: `Pelele' -mi ulu tuwu' hampae toi-pi Maradika. Kukawahi-damo, pai' kutaui' tana' to morudu' ngkai mali-na.
Meka' ba lue' mowua' -i-hawo mpai' mpae boko'. Ane uma oa' -i mowua', tatoki-imi.'"
Hangkani, Yesus metudui' hi tomi posampayaa nto'u Eo Sabat, eo pepuea' -ra to Yahudi.
Hi ree, ria hadua tobine, hampulu' walu mpae-imi peda', apa' napesuai' seta-i. Tobine toei bungku', uma nakulei' mokore monoa'.
Kanahilo-na Yesus tobine toei, nakio' -i pai' na'uli' -ki: "Ina', mo'uri' -moko, uma-pi ria haki' to mpohoo' -ko."
Oti toe najama tobine toei, kaliliu mokore monoa' -imi, pai' -i mpo'une' Alata'ala.

Ngkai ree, kamoroe-nami pangkeni tomi posampayaa toei, apa' Yesus mpaka'uri' tauna hi Eo Sabat. Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka tauna to wori': "Ono eo, eo pobagoa-ta. Hi eo toe, ma'ala-koi tumai mpopepaka'uri', neo' hi Eo Sabat!"
Na'uli' Pue' Yesus: "He koi' to lompe' hi mali-na-wadi! Hi Eo Sabat, hema-ta to uma mpobahaka japi ba jara' -ta, takeni hilou hi mali gimpu pai' tapoponginu?
Hiaa' hi rehe'i, ria hadua tobine muli Abraham, hampulu' walu mpae-imi nahoo' Magau' Anudaa'. Ha uma-hana ma'ala tabahaka-i ngkai pohoo' -na hi Eo Sabat?"
Lolita-na Yesus tohe'e mpo'eai' bali' -na. Tapi' ane ntodea, goe' -ra-rana mpohilo hawe'ea anu mekoncehi to nababehi.
Ngkai ree, na'uli' Yesus: "Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia', beiwa kajadi' -na? Kajadi' -nale, hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i:
Ria hadua tauna ngala' unto' hawi, lou nahawu' hi pampa-na. Unto' toe tuwu' kaboo-bohea, duu' -na jadi' hangkaju kaju, pai' danci mpobabehi peta-ra hi ra'a-na."
Oti toe, na'uli' wo'o-mi: "Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia', kajadi' -na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i:
Hadua tobine mpo'ala' ragi hangkedi', nagalo hante lunu to wori'. Mahae-hae, woke' -mi omea."
Rala pomakoa' -na hilou hi Yerusalem, Yesus mpotara ngata to bohe pai' ngata to kedi', mpotudui' tauna.
Ria hadua tauna mpekune' -i: "Pue', ba hangkedi' -wadi tauna to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae?" Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ntodea:

"Mporata katuwua' to lompe' -le, ma'ala rarapai' -ki tauna to mesua' ntara hi wobo' to jopi'. Pari-pari-koi mesua' ntara wobo' to jopi' toe. Apa' wori' -hana mpai' to mpali' ohea-ra mesua', aga uma-rapa ma'ala mesua'.

Apa' rata mpai' tempo-na, mokore-imi pue' tomi toe hilou mpo'unca wobo'. Ane rapa' -na mokore hi mali-na-pidi-koi nto'u toe, mpopebea wobo' -koi, ni'uli': `Pue', bea-kaka-kaiwo!' "Natompoi' -koi mpai': `Uma-koi ku'incai, ba to ngkaiapa-koi.'
"Ni'uli' -ki: `Ei'! Ngkoni' pai' nginu-madakaie dohe-nue Pue'! Ria-moko metudui' hi rala ngata-kai!'
"Na'uli' -kokoi mpai': `Uma-koi ku'incai ba to ngkaiapa-koi. Palai-koi ngkai rei, koi' paka' to mo'ingku dada'a.'
"Nto'u toe mpai', geo' pai' ntodohaka-mokoi, apa' nihilo Abraham, Ishak pai' Yakub hante hawe'ea nabi, mohura goe' -goe' -ra hi rala Kamagaua' Alata'ala, hiaa' koi' ra'uncahi hi mali-na.

Wori' wo'o mpai' tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi to jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na. Tumai-ra ngkai tono' mata'eo pai' ngkai kasoloa pai' ngkai humalili' dunia', mohura goe' -goe' omea-ra mpai' mpokaralai posusaa' hi rala Kamagaua' Alata'ala.
Ka'omea-na mpai', wori' tauna to kedi' tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' bohe tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno. Pai' wori' tauna to bohe tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' kedi' tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno."
Nto'u toe wo'o, ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi rata hi Yesus pai' mpo'uli' -ki: "Malai-moko ngkai rei, apa' Magau' Herodes doko' mpopatehi-ko."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Koi', uli' -ki tope'akalai tetui hewa tohe'i: Eo toe lau pai' mepulo, mobago-a-pidi, mpopalai seta pai' mpaka'uri' topeda'. Pai' hi eo katolu-na, kupohudu-mi pobago-ku.
Aga eo toe mpai' lau, mepulo pai' romengi mpai', bate kana kaliliu-ama mpotoa' Yerusalem. Apa' uma-hawo masipato' hadua nabi rapatehi hi ngata ntani' -na, kana hi ngata Yerusalem.

"Ee to Yerusalem! to Yerusalem! Nipatehi-ra-koina nabi-nabi, pai' nipana' watu-ra-koina tauna to nasuro-kokoi Alata'ala. Wori' ngkani-mi kupehuka' ngkupui-koi, hewa hama'a manu' tina mpo'urui ana' -na hi une' pani' -na, aga uma-koi dota.
Jadi', bona ni'inca: Tomi pepuea' -ni napalahii-kokoi mpai' Pue' Ala. Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi, uma-apa nihiloi, duu' -na rata tempo-na ni'uli': `Une' -imi to rata mpokeni hanga' Pue' Ala!'"
Hangkani nto'u Eo Sabat, Yesus hilou ngkoni' hi tomi hadua pangkeni to Parisi. Bula-na hi ree, ralelemata-i mpopali' sala' -na.
Muu-mule' rata hadua tauna to mohaki' ngkumowu, mowoto witi' pai' pale-na.
Yesus mpekune' -ra guru agama pai' to Parisi, na'uli': "Ntuku' atura agama-ta, ma'ala-ta mpaka'uri' topeda' hi Eo Sabat, ba uma-di?"
Guru agama pai' to Parisi toera, oja' -ra mpotompoi' -i. Ngkai ree, Yesus mpojama topeda' toei, napaka'uri' pai' nahubui-i hilou.
Oti toe na'uli' -raka: "Ane rapa' -na ria ana' -ta ba japi-ta monawu' hi rala buwu hi Eo Sabat, ha uma sahu ta'ore' -i tumai, nau' hi eo pepuea' -e?"
Aga uma hema to daho' mpohono' -i.
Hi tomi to Parisi toe, Yesus mpohilo ria torata to doko' mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa'. Toe pai' natudui' -ra hante lolita rapa' toi.
Na'uli': "Ane rakio' -ko hilou hi posusaa' poncamokoa, neo' mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa'. Meka' ba ria-di mpai' to rakio' to meliu karabila' -na ngkai iko.
Tumai mpai' pue' tomi mpo'uli' -koko hewa toi: `Wai' -ki hi'a-hana pohuraa tetu!' Me'ea' -ko mpai' hilou mohura hi kadingkia' -na.

Jadi', ane rakio' -ko hilou hi posusaa', agina mohura-ko hi kadingkia' -na, bona pue' tomi mpai' mpo'uli' -koko: `Bale, mai-ta mohura hi pohuraa to lompe' toe mai.' Ane hewa toe, rabila' lau-moko hi mata ntodea.
Hawe'ea to mpomolangko nono-ra, Pue' Ala mpodingkihi-ra, pai' hawe'ea to mpakadingki' nono-ra, Pue' Ala mpomolangko-ra."

Oti toe, mololita wo'o-imi Yesus mpololitai pue' tomi. Na'uli': "Ane takio' tauna ngkaralai posusa' -ta, ba ngkoni' mpo'eo ba ngkabengia, neo' mpokio' bale-ta, ompi' -ta, ba topo'ua' rala ngata. Apa' bate rakio' wo'o-ta mpai', alaa-na tehiwili-mi kehi-ta.
Jadi' ane tababehi posusa', kio' tauna tokabu, tokeru, topungku pai' towero.

Ane wae pobabehi-ta, Pue' Ala mpogane' -ta mpai', apa' tauna to hewa toe uma mpokulei' mpohiwili kehi-ta. Kehi-ta tetu nahiwili moto mpai' Pue' Ala hi Eo Kiama, nto'u kanapotuwu' -ra nculii' tauna to monoa' hi poncilo-na."
Bula-ra ngkoni' toe, hadua torata mpo'epe lolita-na Yesus, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Marasi' tauna to mpokaralai posusa' hi rala Kamagaua' -na Alata'ala."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki tauna toei: "Hangkani ria hadua tauna to mpobabehi susa' bohe, pai' mpokio' wori' tauna.
Sadia-mi omea, nahubui pahawaa' -na hilou mpo'uli' -raka to rakio': `Mai-tamo hilou hi posusaa', apa' sadia-mi omea.'
Aga tauna to rakio' toera, motance omea-ra. To lomo' -na mpo'uli': `Lako' me'oli tana' -a, pai' kana hilou ulu kupehiloi. Merapi' ampu-a, uma-a tilou.'
To hadua-na mpo'uli': `Lako' mpo'oli japi-a lima moko, hilou kuperao mpake' -ra mopajeko'. Merapi' ampu-a, uma-a tilou!'
To ntani' -na wo'o mpo'uli': `Aku' lako' oti ncamoko-a. Uma-a bisa tilou.'

"Pahawaa' toei nculii' hilou hi pue' susa' mpowoli' lolita-ra toe. Uma-pi mowo kamoroe-na pue' susa', na'uli' -ki pahawaa' -na: `Pesahui hilou hi karajaa pai' hi porompengaa ohea hi rala ngata. Bawai-ramo tumai tokabu, tokeru, towero, pai' topungku.' Hilou mpu'u-imi-hawo pahawaa' toei mpotuku' hawa' pue' susa'.
"Karata-na nculii', na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki pue' susa': `Tuama, hawa' -nu kupopomako' -mi, aga ko'ia ihia' tomi-nu, ria-pidi pohuraa.'
"Na'uli' pue' susa': `Hilou tena-ko hi ohea bohe pai' ohea to kedi' hi mali ngata, pewuku-ra tauna tumai, bona tomi-ku ihia' hobo'.
Mpu'u ku'uli', ngkai hawe'ea tauna to kukio' toera lou, uma haduaa-ra to mpokoni' ba apa-apa hi posusa' -ku.'"
Wori' tauna mpotuku' Yesus rala pomakoa' -na. Yesus mewili' hi tauna toera pai' na'uli' -raka:
"Tauna to doko' mpotuku' -a, aga uma meliu pe'ahi' -na hi Aku' ngkai pe'ahi' -na hi tina-na, tuama-na, tobine-na, ana' -na, ompi' -na, ba paiana woto-na moto-mi, uma-i ma'ala jadi' topetuku' -ku.

Tauna to jadi' topetuku' -ku kana mpopaha'a kaju parika' -na-- batua-na kana sadia-i mporata kaparia ba paiana rapatehi sabana petuku' -na hi Aku'. Jadi', tauna to uma dota mpopaha'a kaju parika' -na pai' mpotuku' -a, uma-i ma'ala jadi' topetuku' -ku.
"Ane ria to doko' mpowangu tomi bohe, napohura-ki ulu mporeke ongkoso' pompowangu-na, ba hono' mpai' doi-na ba uma-di.
Apa' ane mpolia' natu'u-mi parawatu-na pai' uma hudu nawangu apa' naka'otii doi-na, hawe'ea tauna to mpohilo mpotawai-i,
ra'uli': `Ii, ni'anu-di doko' mpowangu tomi bohe, ntaa' uma-di hono' doi-nae!'
"Wae wo'o, ane hadua magau' to ria tantara-na hampulu' ncobu manga'e hante hadua magau' to ria tantara-na rompulu' ncobu, kana napekiri ncala', ba rakule' mpo'ewa-ra ba uma-di.
Ane na'inca ka'uma-na mpai' hompe tantara-na, molaa-pidi bali' -na, nahubui-mi suro hilou mpali' kahintuwuaa'."
Yesus mpokaliliu lolita-na, na'uli': "Wae wo'o koi', ane uma-koi mpobahaka hawe'ea to ria hi koi', uma-koi ma'ala jadi' topetuku' -ku.
"Poi', wori' kalaua-na. Aga ane mobali' -mi kapoi' -na alaa-na uma-pi mopoi', napa tena to ma'ala mpakapoi' -i?
Uma ntoto-pi ria tuju-na, ba raruduhi-ki hinu'a ba rapopai-pai. Agina ratadi lau-imi. Hema-koi to tilingaa, pe'epei lompe'!"
Rala-na ha'eo, wori' topesingara' paja' pai' tau ntani' -na to ra'uli' ntodea dada'a kehi-ra rata mpo'epe lolita Yesus.
To Parisi pai' guru agama mporuge' -i, ra'uli': "Ii, tau toe-idi mai mpobale-raka topojeko', pai' ngkoni' dohe-rae."
Toe pai' Yesus mpololitai-ra hante lolita rapa' toi.

Na'uli': "Rapa' -na ria doo-ta to ria-ki bima-na ha'atu ma'a. Ane moronto hama'a, napa to nababehi? Bate napalahii bima-na to sio mpulu' sio hi papada, pai' -i hilou mpali' bima-na to moronto duu' -na narua'.
Ane narua' -pi, uma mowo kagoe' -na. Ngkai kagoe' -na napololopongko' bima-na toei, pai' nakeni nculii' hilou hi tomi-na.
Oti toe, pai' -i mpokio' bale-na pai' tongki-na, na'uli' -raka: `Mai-mokoi goe' dohe-ku. Apa' bima-ku to moronto kurua' nculii' -imi.'
Wae wo'o, ane hadua topojeko' medea ngkai jeko' -na, meliu kagoe' -ra ihi' suruga mpokagoe' -i ngkai kagoe' -ra mpokagoe' sio mpulu' sio tauna to monoa' po'ingku-ra, to uma-ra-rana mingki' medea.

"Rapa' -na ria hadua tobine to ria-ki hampulu' mpepa' doi pera' -na. Ane moronto hampepa', napa to nababehi? Mposuwe palita-i pai' -i mpehaii tomi-na, pai' napali' hiapa-apa karontoa-na, duu' -na narua'.
Wae kanarua' -na, nakio' -ramo bale-na pai' tongki-na, na'uli' -raka: `Mai-mokoi goe' dohe-ku. Apa' kurua' nculii' -mi doi-ku to moronto.'
Wae wo'o-ra mala'eka Alata'ala mpokagoe' hadua tauna topojeko' to medea ngkai jeko' -na."
Na'uli' tena Yesus: "Ria hadua tuama to ria-ki rodua ana' -na tomane.
Tokahudu mpo'uli' -ki tuama-ra: `Mama, wai' ami' -ama-kuna bagia-ku ngkai rewa-nu.' Jadi', nabagi mpu'u-mi rewa-na hi ana' -na to rodua toera.
"Ba hangkuja eo olo' -na ngkai ree, ana' -na tokahudu mpobalu' bagia-na, pai' -i hilou hi ngata to molaa. Hi ria-i mpo'oti mara doi-na hante kehi to uma tumotoa.
Ka'oti doi-na omea, ria-mi oro' hi ngata toe, duu' -na mpe'ahii' -mi tuwu' -na.
Hilou-imi hi pue' ngata doko' ngkoni' gaji'. Pue' ngata toei mpohubui-i mpodoo wawu-na.
Ngkai kamo'oro' -na, mehina-imi-hawo doko' mpokoni' kano wawu. Hiaa' uma hema to mpowai' -i pongkoni'.
"Ka'omea-na, mokanono-imi, na'uli': `Topobago hi tomi tuama-kule, melabi lia pongkoni' -ra. Hiaa' aku' -mi-kuna hi rehe'i, neo' mate modupu' -ama.
Wae-pi, nculii' -ama hilou hi tuama-ku, ku'uli' -damo-ki: Mama, masala' -ama hi Pue' Ala pai' hi Mama wo'o.
Uma-apa natao nukio' ana' -nu Mama. Agina nuponcawa batua-nua-damo.'
Kame'ongko' -nami hilou hi tuama-na. "Molaa-i-pidi ngkai tomi-na, pehilo-mi tuama-na. Ngkai kama'ahi' -na, pokeno-nami hilou mpohirua' -ki ana' -na, nakupui pai' na'eki.
Na'uli' -mi to ana': `Mama, masala' -ama hi Pue' Ala pai' hi Mama wo'o. Uma-apa natao nukio' ana' -nu....'
"Aga tuama-na mpokio' topobago-na, pai' na'uli' -raka: `Pesahui, ala' pohea to lompe' lia, pai' heai-i. Uncoi' karawe-na hante hinci, pai' sapatui' wo'o-i.
Oti toe, hilou-koi mpohoko' ana' japi to morudu' pai' nisumale'. Ngkoni' -ta goe' -goe'!
Apa' ana' -ku tohe'ii, ma'ala-mi ta'uli' mate-imi, aga tuwu' nculii' -imi. Moronto-i, aga kurua' nculii' -imi.' Kamosusa' -rami.
"Nto'u toe, lingku' ana' -na to ulumua' hi bonea. Ponculi' -na ngkai bonea, mohu' -mi hi tomi, na'epe-hawo to molalowe pai' moni karamea.
Nakio' hadua topobago-ra, napompekunei' ba moapa-ra hi tomi.
Na'uli' topobago toei: `Tu'ai-nule, rata nculii' -imi-hawo! Tuama-nu mpehubui mposumale' ana' japi to morudu', apa' ana' -na to moronto narua' nculii' -mi hante kalompea' -na.'
"Kamoroe-nami ana' to ulumua' toei, oja' -i mesua' hi rala tomi. Tuama-na hilou mpobawai-i mesua'.

Tapi' na'uli' to ana': `Mompae-mpae-ama mobago huduwuku-ku mpobago-koko Mama. Uma-kuna hangkania-a mposapuaka hawa' -nu. Hiaa' ntahawe' hama'a kebe' -kuwo, ko'ia-kuna ria nuwai' -a bona kubabehi-kuwo kagoea' hante bale-ku.
Hiaa' ana' -nu tetui to mpe'oti hinyai' rewa-nu hante tobine to ele', wae kanculii' -na nusumale' lau-ki japi to morudu'!'
"Na'uli' tuama-na: `Ana', iko-le tida dohe-ku oa' -ko-kona. Ihi' tomi-kule, iko wo'o pue' -na.
Hiaa' toto-na lia-ta mosusa' goe' -goe', apa' tu'ai-nu to mate-imi-hana, tuwu' nculii' -imi. Moronto-imi, tapi' tarua' nculii' -imi-hawo.'"

Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Ria hadua topo'ua', pai' ria-ki hadua topobago-na to ngkakamu doi-na. Ria to mpakilu topobago toei hi topo'ua', ra'uli': `Ntora napewai' mara-hana doi-nu!'

Toe pai' topo'ua' toei mpokio' topobago-na, na'uli' -ki: `Napa-di to ku'epe to rapakilu-koko toi-e? Wae lau, popehuwu-ka hawe'ea buku popa'intaa. Ngkai eo toe lau, uma-pi iko to ngkakamu ka'uaa' -ku!'
"Mokanono-imi topobago toei, na'uli': `Napa-le' to kubabehi-e? Naleso' -ama mpai' sepu' -ku ngkai bago-ku. Momangki uma kukulei'. Kakarapi' -rapi', me'ea' -a.'
Ngkai ree na'uli': `Aa, ria akala-ku! Apa' neo' raleso' -ama ngkai bago-kue, agina mpali' ncala' -a bale-ku wori' -wori', bona hira' mpai' mpotarima-a hi tomi-ra.'
"Jadi' ngkai ree, nakio' -mi butu dua tauna to mo'inta hi sepu' -na. Hi to lomo' -na na'uli': `Hangkuja inta-nu hi sepu' -ku?'
"Metompoi' tauna toei: `Tolu ncobu lite lana.' "Na'uli' topobago toei: `Oi sura popa'intaa-nu. Mohura-moko, uki' pesahui, hancobu lima atu lite-wadi!'
"Oti toe, pai' na'uli' -ki karodua-na: `Hiaa' iko, hangkuja-kowo inta-nu?' "Natompoi' -hawo: `Hancobu karu' pae.' "Na'uli' topobago toei: `Ohe'i sura inta-nu, uki' -mi walu atu karu' -wadi.'

"Kana'epe-na topo'ua' napa to nababehi topobago-na to bengku' gau' -na tetui, na'une' lau-imi, apa' pante-i-hana mpali' akala-na bona lompe' katuwu' -na. Apa' tauna to uma mpo'incai Pue' Ala, meliu kapante-ra mpo'urusi katuwu' -ra hante hingka doo-ra, ngkai kapante-ra tauna to hi rala kabajaa-na Pue' Ala mpo'urusi katuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno.
"Toe pai' ku'uli' -kokoi: Kana tapake' ka'uaa' hi dunia' tohe'i mpotulungi doo, bona ane uma-pi mpai' mokalaua ka'uaa' dunia' toi, ratarima lompe' -ta hi po'ohaa' to tida duu' kahae-hae-na.

Tauna to ma'ala rasarumaka hante rewa to hangkedi', ma'ala wo'o-i rasarumaka hante rewa to wori'. Tauna to uma monoa' kehi-na hante rewa to hangkedi', uma wo'o mpai' monoa' kehi-na hante rewa to wori'.
Jadi', ane uma lompe' pompewili' -ta hi ka'uaa' dunia' tohe'i, hema to mposarumaka-ta hi poko ka'uaa' to hi suruga?
Ane uma lompe' pompewili' -ta hi rewa to rasarumaka-taka hi dunia' toi, hema mpai' to mpowai' -ta rewa to jadi' anu-ta moto hi suruga?

"Uma-hawo ria hadua topobago mobago hi rodua tua. Apa' hadua mpai' nape'ahi', hadua napokahuku'. Hadua natuku' -ki hawa' -na, hadua nasapuaka. Wae wo'o koi', uma-koi bisa mpotuku' konoa Alata'ala, pai' hamali-koi ntora mporumpu rewa dunia'."
To Parisi mpo'epe hawe'ea lolita Yesus toe. Rapotawai lau-i-wadi, apa' hira' toe-mi to mpokahina doi.
Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Koi' tetu-mi mpemanoa' po'ingku-ni hi poncilo manusia'. Aga Alata'ala mpo'inca ihi' nono-ni. Apa' napa to rabila' manusia', napokahuku' Alata'ala.

"Napa to te'uki' hi rala Atura Musa pai' sura nabi bate-na rapake' -pidi duu' rata hi tempo Yohanes Topeniu'. Ngkai tempo toe, rapalele-mi Kareba Lompe' to mpo'uli' Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Pai' wori' tauna mpohuduwukui doko' jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua' -na toe.
Tapi' butu mela to te'uki' hi rala Atura Pue' bate kana madupa'. Mojoli-pi langi' pai' dunia' mokero, ngkai hamela lolita hi rala Atura Pue' uma madupa'.
"Hema to mpogaa' -ki tobine-na pai' ncamoko hante tobine ntani' -na, mobualo' -i-hana. Pai' tauna to mpotobine kabulisa doo, mobualo' wo'o-i-hawo.
"Ria hadua topo'ua'. Pohea-na hewa pohea magau', paka' to masuli' oli-na. Tuwu' -na butu eo-na hewa toposusa' -damo.
Hi wobo' -na ratu'u hadua tauna to kabu, hanga' -na Lazarus. Woto-na hobo' paka' waka'.
Doko' -i-hawo ngkoni' rupu' to mohewu' ngkai meja' topo'ua' toei. Wae-mi-hawo kampe'ahii' -na, rata wo'o-pi dike' mpojilai' waka' -na.
"Rala-na ha'eo, mate-imi tokabu toei, pai' mala'eka mpokeni-i hilou hi pohuraa to lompe' hi ncori Abraham. Topo'ua' toei, mate wo'o-imi-hawo, pai' -i ratana.
Hi po'ohaa' tomate, ntora ntodohaka-i. Hampengoa' -na ngkai ree, nahilo-hawo molaa lia, oe-imi mai Abraham, hante Lazarus mohura hi ncori-na.
Pekio' -nami topo'ua' toei, na'uli': `Mama Abraham! Poka'ahi' -a-kuwo! Hubui-i Lazarus mpotubu' karawe-na hi rala ue pai' tumai natudohi-ka-kuwo jila' -ku. Pepa rahi-mi ku'epe rala apu tohe'i!'

"Na'uli' Abraham: `Kiwoi-dile ana': Bula-nu tuwu' -pidi hi rala dunia', iko mporata hawe'ea to lompe', hiaa' Lazarus-hana mporata-i paka' to dada'a. Tempo toi, tetanta'u-imi hi rehe'i, pai' iko-kowo, mporata pepa-moko.
Hiaa' etu, hi olo' -ta ria tumata to bohe lia. Tauna ngkai rehe'i uma bisa tilou hi retu, pai' tauna ngkai retu uma bisa tumai hi rehe'i.'
"Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o topo'ua' toei: `Ane wae-di Mama, kuperapi' bona nuhubui-i Lazarus hilou hi tomi tuama-ku.
Apa' ria-ra-pidi lima ompi' -ku. Hubui-i Lazarus mpopo'ingai' -ra bona neo' -ra mpai' tumai hi po'ohaa' pontodohakaa toi.'
"Na'uli' Abraham: `Ria-miraka sura to na'uki' Musa pai' nabi-nabi ntani' -na. Mpotuku' napa to te'uki' hi rala sura toe-ra-damo-rawo.'
"Na'uli' topo'ua' toei: `Ane muntu' toe-wadi, uma hono'! Kana ria tomate tuwu' nculii' hilou mpololitai-ra, pai' lako' medea-rada ngkai jeko' -ra!'
"Na'uli' Abraham: `Ane lolita nabi Musa pai' nabi ntani' -na uma rapangalai', uma oa' -ra mpai' mepangala', nau' gati ria mpu'u tomate tuwu' nculii'.'"
Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na, na'uli': "Bate ria to mpopanawu' tauna alaa-ra mojeko'. Aga silaka-ra tauna to mepanawu' toera!
Agina lau-pi hameha' watu po'ahaa' ratoe hi wuroko' -ra, pai' -ra ratene' hi rala tahi', ngkai mpopanawu' -ra nau' hadua tauna to hangkedi' pepangala' -na duu' -na mpobabehi jeko'.
Toe pai' kana mo'inga' -inga' -ta! "Ane ompi' -ta mpobabehi to sala' hi kita', tudui' -i. Ane soho' -pi nono-na, ampungi-i.
Nau' pitu ngkani rala-na ha'eo-i masala' hi kita', pai' butu ngkani-na tumai-i merapi' ampu, ampungi-i-hawo."
Ra'uli' suro Pue' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Pue', pakaroho-kaka-kaiwo pepangala' -kai!"

Na'uli' Pue' Yesus: "Ane rii-ria-mi pepangala' -ni nau' hangkutuno' -wadi, ma'ala ni'uli' -ki kaju to bohe tohe'i: `Mowuka-moko ngkai rei, mentoli-ko ree mai hi rala tahi'!' bate mentoli mpu'u-i ntuku' hawa' -ni.
"Rapa' -na ria batua-ta to molia' ba to mpodoo porewua. Ane nculii' -i ngkai pehompoa-na, napa to ta'uli' -ki? Ba ta'uli' wae: `Sahu tumai ngkoni''?
Uma-hawo. Tantu ta'uli' -ki hewa tohe'i: `Porodo-mi pongkoni' -ku! Moheai-ko to uma babo'. Peka'au-a bula-ku nginu pai' ngkoni'. Oti-a-damo ngkoni', pai' lako' ngkoni' -dako-kowo.'
Uma-hawo mingki' ta'uli' tarima kasi hi batua-ta, apa' muntu' mpotuku' hawa' -i-wadi.
Wae wo'o koi'. Ane oti-mi nituku' hawe'ea to napahawa' -kokoi Alata'ala, uli' -mi-hana: `Kai' -kaiwo-le, batua biasa-wadi-ka-kaiwo. To kibabehi-le, muntu' to rapahawa' -kakai.'"
Rala pomakoa' -na hilou hi Yerusalem, Yesus ntara hi sipa' tana' to Samaria pai' to Galilea.
Kamesua' -na hi rala ngata, rata-mi hampulu' topohaki' poko' mpohirua' -ki. Ngkai molaa-ra-wadi mekio',
ra'uli': "Yesus! Guru! Poka'ahi' -ka-kaiwo!"
Kanahilo-ra Yesus, na'uli' -miraka: "Hilou-mokoi mpopehuwu woto-ni hi imam." Hilou mpu'u-ramo. Bula-ra momako', mo'uri' -ramo.
Kanahilo-na to hadua mo'uri' -imi, kanculii' -nami hilou hi Yesus, mpo'une' -une' Alata'ala napesukui.
Karata-na hi Yesus, motingkua' -imi mpo'uli' tarima kasi. Hi'a toei to Samaria.
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ha uma hampulu' to kupaka'uri' -e? Hiapa-ramo to sio?
Beiwa pai' muntu' hadua toei-wadi to nculii' mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala-e? Hiaa' bela-i he'e to Yahudi!"
Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi mpo'uli' -ki tauna toei: "Mokore-moko, pai' -ko hilou-mi. Mo'uri' -moko sabana pepangala' -nu hi Aku'."
Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi mpekune' Yesus, nto'uma Alata'ala tumai jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Na'uli' Yesus: "Kamagaua' Alata'ala-le uma ntepu'u hante tanda-tanda to kahiloa.
Uma mpai' ria to mpo'uli': `Hilo, ohe'i-mi Kamagaua' -na Alata'ala,' ba `Etu-mi mai Kamagaua' Alata'ala,' apa' Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi laintongo' -ni."
Oti toe, Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na. Na'uli': "Rata mpai' tempo-na, doko' lia-koi mpohilo-a nau' kampa' ha'eo, aga uma-apa nihiloi.
Nto'u toe mpai', ria to mpo'uli' -kokoi: `Magau' Topetolo' oe-imi ria!' Ba ria to mpo'uli': `Ohe'i-imi!' Aga neo' -koi hilou mpotuku' -ra!

Apa' ane rata nculii' mpu'u-apa mpai', karata-ku incana hobo' hi dunia'. Hewa kila' mpohinii raoa ngkai wuntu-na hamali rata hi wuntu-na hamali, hewa toe wo'o mpai' hi eo karataa-ku, Aku' Ana' Manusia'.
Aga lomo' -lomo' -na, kana rasesa' -a pai' rasapuaka tauna to tuwu' tempo toi.
"Hewa to majadi' hi tempo nabi Nuh owi, hewa toe wo'o mpai' to jadi' hi eo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia'.
Hi tempo nabi Nuh, tauna ntora ngkoni', nginu, rapoponcamoko pai' mepoponcamoko, kawae-kawae-na duu' -na nabi Nuh mesua' hi rala sakaya bohe pai' ue mowo' mpopatehi-ra omea.
Wae wo'o kalempe' tauna owi hi ngata Sodom nto'u Lot mo'oha' hi ria. Tauna ntora ngkoni', nginu, mobabalu', molia' pai' mpowangu tomi.
Ntaa' palai-na Lot ngkai Sodom, hompo-mi apu pai' watu to morea' ngkai langi' mpopatehi-ra omea.
Wae wo'o mpai' kalempe' -ra manusia' hi eo karata-ku nculii' hi dunia' mpopehuwu kabaraka' -ku.

"Hi eo toe mpai', sohi' metibo' -koi! Tauna to mohura hi parawa, neo' -pi leba' mesua' hi rala tomi mpo'ala' rewa-na. Wae wo'o tauna to hi bonea, neo' -pi leba' nculii' mpo'ala' napa-napa hi rala ngata.
Kiwoi-dile napa to jadi' hi tobine-na Lot-e!

Hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto, uma-i mpai' mporatai katuwua' to lompe'. Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa-na sabana petuku' -na hi Aku', nau' napopate-ki, hi'a lau-mi mpai' to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
"Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: Hi eo ponculia' -ku mpai', tauna rodua to more'eli turu ngkabengia, hadua ra'ala', to hadua rapalahii.
Rodua tobine to motongke' momanyu, hadua ra'ala', to hadua rapalahii. ((
Rodua tauna mo'ema' mobago hi bonea, hadua ra'ala', to hadua rapalahii.))"

Hudu lolita Yesus toe, ana'guru-na mpekune' -i, ra'uli': "Hiapa mpai' kajadia' tetu-e, Pue'?" Yesus mpotompoi' -ra hante walatu toi: "Ane ria anu mate, incana moto apa' wori' danci morumpu mpokoni'. Wae wo'o mpai' karata-ku nculii': uma-a tumai ngkawuni, incana moto mpai'."
Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' hanyala lolita rapa', mpotudui' ana'guru-na bona tida-ra mosampaya pai' neo' mere' nono-ra.
Na'uli': "Rala ngata hamola', ria hadua topobotuhi to uma mengkoru hi Alata'ala pai' uma wo'o-i mposaile' ba hema-hema.
Hi ngata toe wo'o, ria hadua tobine tobalu. Wori' ngkani-imi hilou mponyanyo topobotuhi toei ngkeni kara-kara-na, na'uli': `Tulungi-a-kuwo mposinyanyo-ki bali' -ku.'
"Lomo' -lomo' -na, topobotuhi toei uma dota mpotulungi-i. Aga ka'oo-omea-na na'uli' hi rala nono-na: `Nau' uma-a mengkoru hi Alata'ala pai' uma wo'o-a mposaile' ba hema-hema,
agina kutulungi lau-imi tobalu toei, apa' najojo rahi tumai mposaleroi-a. Apa' ane uma kutulungi-i, uma oa' mpai' nabahakai tumai, alaa-na kupo'oha lau wo'o-kuwo mpai'.'"
Oti toe, na'uli' Pue' Yesus: "Pe'epei-koi napa to na'uli' topobotuhi toei. Nau' uma monoa' nono-na, dota moto-i mpotulungi tobalu to ntora mperapii' -i.
Peliu-liu-nami Alata'ala doko' mpotulungi topetuku' -na to mekakae ncuu hi eo-na pai' hi bengi-na. Ba ni'uli' -koina, napeka'au ncala' pai' lako' natulungi-rae?
Uma-hawoe'! Bate napesahui moto-hawo mpotulungi-ra. Aga ane rata nculii' -apa mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia', ha ria-ra-pidi kurua' tauna to mepangala' hi rala dunia' toi?"
Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' hanyala-pi lolita rapa'. Lolita rapa' toi mpotoa' tauna to mpo'uli' hira' -wadi to monoa', pai' -ra mporuge' doo.
Na'uli' Yesus: "Rodua tauna hilou hi Tomi Alata'ala, lou mosampaya. To hadua to Parisi, to hadua topesingara' paja'.

To Parisi toei mokore pai' mosampaya hi rala nono-na, na'uli': `Oo Alata'ala, mpo'uli' -a tarima kasi, apa' uma-a hewa tau ntani' -na-- toperampaki, to bengku' nono-ra, topobualo', ba hewa topesingara' paja' toei mai.
Aku', mopuasa' -a rongkani rala-na hamingku. Pai' hampobagiahampulu' ngkai hawe'ea pomporataa-ku kuwai' -koko Pue'.'
"Hiaa' topesingara' paja' toei-hawo, mokore ngkawao-i-wadi, pai' uma-i daho' ngkongoa' hi langi'. Ntora mporera' hunamu-nai, pai' na'uli': `Oo Alata'ala! Poka'ahi' -a-kuwo, tauna topojeko' toi-a!'"

Ngkai ree, napohudui Yesus lolita-na, na'uli': "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: kanculii' -ra hi tomi, topesingara' paja' toe-imi to jadi' monoa' hi poncilo-na Alata'ala, bela to Parisi toei. Apa' hawe'ea to mpomolangko nono-ra, Pue' Ala mpodingkihi-ra. Pai' hawe'ea to mpakadingki' nono-ra, Pue' Ala mpomolangko-ra."
Hangkani, ria tauna to mpokeni ana'lei-ra hi Yesus bona najama pai' nagane' -ra. Mpohilo toe we'i, moroe-ramo ana'guru-na, mpokaroe-ra to mpokeni ana' -ra toe.

Aga Yesus mpokio' ana' toera pai' na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Pelele' moto-ra ana' tetura tumai hi Aku', neo' -ra nitagi. Apa' tauna to hewa toe-ramo to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na.
Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: Ane uma-koi mengkoru hi Alata'ala hewa ana', uma-koi mpai' jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua' -na."
Hangkani, hadua pangkeni to Yahudi mpekune' Yesus, na'uli': "Guru to lompe', napa to kana kubabehi bona mporata-a-kuwo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa pai' nu'uli' tauna to lompe' -a? Uma ria ntani' -na to lompe', hadua Alata'ala-wadi.
Nu'inca moto parenta to te'uki' hi rala Atura Pue': `Neo' mobualo', neo' mepatehi, neo' manako, neo' mosabi' boa', pai' kana tabila' tina pai' tuama-ta.'"
Na'uli' tau toei: "Hawe'ea parenta tetu lau, kutuku' omea-mi ngkai kakedia' -ku."

Mpo'epe toe, na'uli' -mi Yesus: "Hanyala-pi to kana nubabehi. Pobalu' -mi hawe'ea rewa-nu pai' doi oli-na bagi-raka tokabu. Ane nubabehi hewa toe, bohe mpai' rasi' to nurata hi rala suruga. Oti toe, pai' tumai-moko mpotuku' -a."
Kana'epe-na lolita tohe'e, peda' -mi nono-na, apa' mo'ua' lia-i.
Nahilo-mi Yesus kapeda' nono-na. Toe pai' na'uli': "Mokoro rahi tauna to wori' rewa-ra mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ra.
Mojoli-pi hama'a unta ntara hi wulou' jaru ngkai tauna to mo'ua' mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ra."
Konce-ramo tauna to mpo'epe lolita Yesus tohe'e, ra'uli': "Ane wae-di, hema lau-damo to ma'ala mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane hante pakulea' manusia' -le, uma ami' hema. Aga nakule' moto Alata'ala mpobabehi to meliu ngkai pakulea' manusia'."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' Petrus: "Hiaa' kai', kipalahii-mi-kaina rewa-kai, pai' kituku' -ko."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hema-hema to mpalahii tomi-na, tobine-na, ompi' -na, totu'a-na ba ana' -na apa' mpotuku' hawa' Alata'ala Magau' -na,
tauna toe-mi to mporata wori' ngkani hiwili-na hi dunia' toi. Pai' hi eo mpeno mporata wo'o-i katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na."

Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mopahantani' pai' na'uli' -raka: "Epe-koi! Hilou-tamo tohe'i-e mpotoa' Yerusalem. Hi ria mpai' hawe'ea to ra'uki' nabi-nabi owi to mpolowa Ana' Manusia' kana madupa' hi Aku'.
Ratonu-a mpai' hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi. Rapopo'ore' -a, raruge', ra'uelikui,
raweba', pai' -a rapatehi. Aga hi eo katolu-na, tuwu' nculii' moto-a."
Aga hawe'ea to na'uli' toe, bate uma rapaha ana'guru-na. Apa' batua-na tewunii' -raka, uma ra'incai kahompoa lolita-na.
Mohu' -mi Yesus hi ngata Yerikho, ria hadua tauna to wero mohura hi wiwi' ohea karapi' -rapi'.
Kampo'epe-na wori' tauna liu, napekune': "Napa-die?"
Ra'uli' -ki: "Yesus to Nazaret-le liu oe-e lou!"
Mpo'epe toe we'i, pekio' -nami towero toei, na'uli': "Yesus, muli Magau' Daud! Poka'ahi' -a-kuwo!"
Tauna to momako' ri'ulu ngkai Yesus mpokaroe-i, ra'uli': "Ngkalino-ko!" Aga hangkedi' kanapesukui-na mekio', na'uli': "Muli Magau' Daud, poka'ahi' -a-kuwo!"
Ngkai ree, mentoda' -imi Yesus pai' na'uli': "Keni tumai towero toei mai!" Rakeni mpu'u-miki. Karata-na hi ree, Yesus mpekune' -i, na'uli': "Napa to nupokono kubabehi-koko?"
Natompoi' towero toei: "Pue', bona pehilo-a-kuwo!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane wae, pehilo-moko! Kupaka'uri' -ko sabana pepangala' -nu hi Aku'."
Ncaliu pehilo mpu'u-imi. Ngkai ree, ntora mpotuku' Yesus-imi, pai' mpo'uli' wori' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala. Hawe'ea tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe, mpo'une' Alata'ala-ramo.
Nto'u karata-na Yesus hi ngata Yerikho, momako' ncuu-i ntara rala ngata toe.
Hi ngata toe, ria hadua topo'ua' to mpokapalai' topesingara' paja', hanga' -na Zakheus.
Doko' -i-hawo mpohilo beiwa lence-na Yesus. Aga uma-i bisa mpohilo apa' wori' rahi tauna, bo hi'a he'e tauna to dingki'.
Jadi', pokeno-nami mpori'uluhi ntodea, pai' -i ngkahe' kaju ara bona ma'ala-i-hawo mpopanto' Yesus ane liu-ipi hi ree.
Kaliu-na Yesus hi ree, pengoa' -nami pai' na'uli': "Zakheus, pesahui mana'u! Apa' eo toe lau, kana mehani-a hi tomi-nu."
Napesahui mpu'u-mi-hawo Zakheus mana'u, pai' goe' -i mpotarima Yesus hi tomi-na.
Kapehilo-ra ntodea hilou-i Yesus hi tomi Zakheus, ngkunuti-ramo, ra'uli': "Ii, napa-di pai' mencua' hi tomi topojeko' -i-hanae!"
Bula-na Pue' Yesus hi tomi Zakheus, mokore-imi Zakheus mpo'uli' -ki: "Pue', bagi ntongo' ngkai rewa-ku kuwai' -raka tokabu, pai' hema-hema to kubagiu, kupoponculi' opo' ngkani ngkai to kubagiu-raka."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Hi eo toe lau, tauna hi tomi toi tebahaka ngkai huku' jeko' -ra, apa' Zakheus toii, muli Abraham wo'o-i-hawo.
Apa' toe-mile pai' tumai-ae, Aku' Ana' Manusia'. Tumai-a mpopali' tauna to molaa ngkai Alata'ala, pai' mpohore-ra ngkai huku' jeko' -ra."

Neo' rata-imi Yesus hi Yerusalem, toe pai' wori' tauna mpo'uli' neo' rata mpu'u-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Jadi', bula ntodea mpe'epei lolita-na, na'umpui' wo'o-mi lolita-na hante hanyala lolita rapa'.
Na'uli': "Ria hadua maradika mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa, lou ralanti' jadi' magau' pai' nculii'.
Jadi', kako'ia-na me'ongko', mpokio' -i hampulu' pahawaa' -na pai' nawai' -ra hore-hore hampepa' doi bulawa. Na'uli' maradika toei: `Mobabalu' -koi hante doi to kuwai' -kokoi tetu lingku' -ku hilou.'
Aga hi ngata maradika toe, ria wo'o-rawo tauna to mpokahuku' -i. Pe'ongko' -na maradika tohe'e, rapahawa' suro hilou mpotuku' -i pai' mpo'uli': `Oja' -ka-kaina maradika tetu jadi' magau' -kai!'
"Aga ra'ongko' moto-i jadi' magau', pai' nculii' -imi hilou hi ngata-na. Karata-na hi ngata, nakio' -ramo pahawaa' -na mpohirua' -ki, napongincai kahangkuja-nami rasi' to rarata.
To lomo' -na rata pai' na'uli': `Magau', doi bulawa to hampepa' to nuwai' -ka, ria-mi ana' -na hampulu'.'
"Na'uli' magau' toei: `Lompe' -mi, iko pahawaa' to lompe'. Wae-pi, apa' monoa' -ko hi to hangkedi', ku'ongko' -moko jadi' topohawa' to mpohawai' hampulu' ngata.'
"Pahawaa' karodua-na rata wo'o pai' mpo'uli': `Magau', doi bulawa to hampepa' to nuwai' -ka, jadi' lima mpepa' -mi.'
"Na'uli' wo'o-mi magau' hi karodua-na tohe'ei: `Iko wo'o ku'ongko' jadi' topohawa' hi lima ngata.'
"Ngkai ree, rata wo'o-imi-hawo pahawaa' kahadua-na. Na'uli': `Oi-mi doi-nu Magau'. Kutimamahi lompe', kuputu' hante lenco.
Me'eka' -a hi Magau', apa' ku'inca kasoa-nu. Nupepae to bela-kowo hinu'a-nu, nu'ala' to uma nukarokoi.'
"Na'uli' magau' mpo'uli' -ki: `Iko pahawaa' to dada'a! Ane nu'inca kasoa-ku, ane nu'inca kampepae-ku to bela hinu'a-ku, pai' kampo'ala' -ku to uma kukarokoi,
napa pai' doi-ku uma nupopesua' hi bank, bona ane rata-apa, ku'ala' hante ana' -na!'
Oti toe, na'uli' wo'o-mi hi tauna to mokore hi ncori-na: `Ala' doi to hi tauna tetui, pai' wai' -ki to ria-ki hampulu'.'
"Ingu' -ramo to napahawa' toera, ra'uli': `Napa pai' hewa tetu, Magau'? Apa' ria-miki-hana hampulu' mpepa'!'
"Na'uli' magau': `Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: Tauna to ma'ala rasarumaka hante anu to rawai' -ki, rawai' tena-i-pidi. Tapi' tauna to uma rasarumaka, anu hangkedi' to ria hi hi'a, ra'alai' lau-i.
Pai' wae lau, keni-ramo tumai bali' -ku to mpoka'oja' -a jadi' magau' -ra. Patehi-ramo hi rehe'i bona kuhilo!'"
Ka'oti-na Yesus mpo'uli' hawe'ea toe, pomako' -nami meri'ulu ngkai doo-na hilou hi Yerusalem.
Mohu' -ramo hi ngata Betfage pai' Betania hi bulu' Zaitun, nahubui rodua ana'guru-na mako' meri'ulu.

Na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi ngata to tanyanyohi toe mai. Ane mesua' -pokoi hi rala ngata, nihilo mpai' hama'a ana' keledai to tehoo'. Keledai toe ko'ia hangkania rahawi'. Bongka koloro-na pai' keni-i tumai.
Ane ria tauna mpekune' -koi napa pai' nibongka-i, uli': `Apa' Pue' mparaluu-i.'"
Hilou mpu'u-ramo ana'guru-na to rodua tohe'era, pai' rarata bate hewa to na'uli' -raka Yesus.
Bula-ra mpobongka keledai toe, mepekune' -mi pue' -na: "Napa pai' nibongka keledai tetu-e?"
Ratompoi': "Apa' Pue' mparaluu-i."
Karakeni-nami hilou hi Yesus, ralampii hante baju-ra, pai' rapopehawi' -i Yesus.
Kaliu-na Yesus mpohawi' keledai tohe'e, tauna mpokodo baju-ra hi mata ohea, tanda pebila' -ra.

Mohu' -mi hi ngata Yerusalem, hi pana'ua-na hi bulu' Zaitun, hawe'ea topetuku' -na to wori' toe ntepu'u mpo'une' Alata'ala. Mogora-ra-damo nakeni kagoe' nono-ra sabana hawe'ea anu mekoncehi to rahilo.
Ra'uli' hi rala pe'une' -ra: Pue' Ala mpogane' Magau' to tumai mpokeni hanga' -na!" Une' -imi Pue' Ala to hi suruga, apa' nawai' -tamo kalompea'."
Ngkai ree, ba hangkuja dua to Parisi to hi olo' tauna to wori' mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, tagi-ramo ana'guru-nu bona neo' -ra mpo'uli' hewa tetu!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma-e'! Apa' ane mengkalino-ra ana'guru-ku, watu toe lau-ramo mpai' to mogora mpo'une' -a."
Kamoo-mohua' -imi Yesus hi Yerusalem, duu' -na mpohilo-i ngata toe. Kageo' -nami mpokageoi' ngata toe.
Na'uli': "Mpe'ahii' -koi to Yerusalem! Uma mowo kalompe' -na ane ke ni'inca napa to ngkeni-kokoi kalompea' tuwu' hi eo toe lau. Aga hawe'ea toe teleru ngkai mata-ni.
Rata mpai' tempo-na, bali' -ni mpanga'ei ngata-ni, ratipuhi ntololikia hante wala, duu' -na uma-pi ria ohea metibo'.
Raropuhi mpai' ngata-ni hante hawe'ea ihi' -na, duu' -na uma-pi ria watu to bate pomeduncu-na. Apa' uma-koina nisaile' karata-na Pue' Ala doko' mpotulungi-koi."
Oti toe, Yesus mesua' hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala pai' -i mpopalai tauna to mobabalu' hi ree.
Na'uli' -raka: "Hi rala Buku Tomoroli', Alata'ala mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Tomi-ku, tomi posampayaa.' Hiaa' koi' -koina, niponcawa tomi toperampaki-di!"
Butu eo-na Yesus metudui' hi Tomi Alata'ala. Imam pangkeni hante guru agama pai' pangkeni to Yahudi ntani' -na mpali' akala-ra doko' mpatehi-i,
aga uma ria ohea-ra mpobabehi anu hi nono-ra, apa' lutu-ramo ntodea mpe'epei lolita-na.

Rala-na ha'eo Yesus metudui' pai' mparata Kareba Lompe' hi wori' tauna hi Tomi Alata'ala. Muu-mule' rata-ramo imam pangkeni hante guru agama pai' pangkeni to Yahudi ntani' -na. Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Yesus:
"Uli' -kakai pe' ngkaiapa huraa-nu mpobabehi hawe'ea tetu hi Tomi Alata'ala! Hema to mpowai' -ko kuasa tetu-e?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku', ria wo'o-kuwo pompekunea' -ku hi koi'.
Uli' -ka pe', ngkaiapa kuasa-na Yohanes Topeniu' mponiu' tauna? Ngkai Alata'ala-di, ba ngkai manusia' -di?"
Momepololitai-ramo pangkeni to Yahudi toera, ra'uli': "Beiwa-tale' mpotompoi' -ie? Ane ta'uli' ngkai Alata'ala kuasa-na, na'uli' mpai': `Ane wae, napa pai' uma-i nipangala'?'
Hiaa' ane ta'uli' ngkai manusia' -wadi kuasa-na, rawatuhi-ta mpai' ntodea toera lau, apa' hawe'ea-ra mpo'uli' Yohanes hadua nabi."
Toe pai' ratompoi': "Uma ki'incai kangkaiapa kuasa-na."
Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane wae, uma wo'o-kuwo ku'uli' -kokoi kangkaiapa kuasa-ku mpobabehi toe lau!"

Oti toe, Yesus mpololitai ntodea, mpo'uli' -raka lolita rapa' tohe'i: "Ria tau hadua mpohu'ai bonea-na hante anggur, oti toe napewai' bonea-na rapobago hi ba hangkuja dua tauna, pai' hilou-imi hi ngata to molaa, pai' mahae-i tida hi ria.
Rata-mi tempo mpohopu' wua' anggur, napahawa' hadua batua-na hilou mperapi' bagia-na hi tompodoo bonea-na toera. Tapi' tompodoo bonea-na toera mpopao' suro tetu pai' -i rapopalai mara.
Oti toe, pue' bonea toei mpopahawa' tena wo'o-pi hadua batua. Aga rapao' wo'o-i-wadi-hawo, ralibui' pai' rapopalai mara.
Oti toe wo'o, nahubui tena batua katolu-na. Aga raserohi wo'o-i-wadi pai' rapetadi hi mali bonea.
"Ngkai ree, na'uli' -mi pue' bonea toei: `Napa-le' to kubabehi-e? Agina ana' -ku to kupe'ahi' moto lau-mi kupahawa' hilou, apa' bate rapengkorui-ile mpai'.'

"Ntaa' we'i, karahilo-na tompodoo bonea toera ana' pue' bonea tohe'ei, mohawa' -ramo, ra'uli': `Etu-mi tumai ana' -na! Hi'a mpai' to jadi' pue' bonea tohe'i-e. Kita tapatehi-i bona bonea-na toi kita' -mi pue' -na.'
Ngkai ree, radii' -imi hilou hi mali bonea pai' -i rapatehi. "Jadi', napa mpai' to nababehi pue' bonea toei hi tauna to mpodoo bonea-na?
Bate tumai-ile mpopatehi-ra, pai' nawai' bonea-na hi tau ntani' -na." Kara'epe-na ntodea lolita rapa' tohe'e, ra'uli' -mi: "Neo' mpu'u-kona jadi' hewa tetu-e'!"
Yesus mponaa-ra pai' na'uli' -raka: "Hiaa' toe-mile batua-na walatu to hi rala Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli': `Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi, watu toe lau-mi to jadi' poko parawatu.'
Hewa kura to monawu' hi watu mopengka, hewa kura to napitihi watu moreja', hewa toe wo'o mpai' tauna to mposapuaka-a."

Guru agama pai' imam pangkeni mpo'inca kahira' -na to natoa' Yesus hante lolita rapa' -na toe we'i. Toe pai' ria-mi nono-ra doko' mpohoko' -i hi jaa toe wo'o. Aga uma-ra daho', apa' mpoka'eka' -ra ntodea.
Jadi' rapali' loga to lompe'. Mpopahawa' -ra tauna hilou mpolelemata-i. Tauna toera, ntani' hewa tauna to monoa' nono-ra, tapi' patuju-ra mpo'opa kasala' lolita-na, bona rapakilu-i hi gubernur.

Karata-ra hi Yesus, ra'uli' -mi to rapahawa' toera: "Guru, ki'inca hawe'ea lolita-nu pai' tudui' -nu makono omea. Metudui' -ko hante kalonto' -lonto' -na mpo'uli' napa konoa Pue' Ala hi manusia', pai' uma-ko mpelence tauna.
Jadi', toe pai' kiperapi' bona nu'uli' -kakai Guru: ntuku' atura agama-ta, ba ma'ala moto-ta mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar, ba uma-di?"
Yesus mpo'inca pepanawu' -ra. Toe pai' na'uli' -raka:
"Popohiloi-a ulu doi hampepa'! Lence hema pai' hanga' hema to hi doi tetu-e?" Ratompoi': "Lence pai' hanga' Kaisar."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' -mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane wae-di, wai' -ki Kaisar napa to kasipato' -na rawai' -ki Kaisar, pai' wai' -ki Alata'ala napa to kasipato' -na rawai' -ki Alata'ala."
Ka'omea-na madagi-ramo bali' Yesus toera. Uma raruai' nau' hanyalaa sala' lolita-na hi nyanyoa ntodea. Konce-ra mpo'epe tompoi' -na, toe pai' ngkalino-ramo.

Ba hangkuja dua tauna to mpotuku' tudui' to Saduki rata hi Yesus. To Saduki toera, pangkeni agama Yahudi to ncapuaka tauna to mate tuwu' nculii' hi eo mpeno. Karata to Saduki toera, ra'uli' -ki Yesus:
"Guru, nabi Musa mpo'uki' hi rala buku atura hewa toi: ane hadua tomane mate hiaa' uma-ki ria ana' -na, pudupuhe-na kana mpotobine balu-na, bona ria-ki-hawo muli tomate toei.
Jadi', ria pitu ntali ompi', paka' tomane. To ulumua' motobinei, mate-i hante uma ria ana' -na.
Tu'ai-na mpotobine balu-na, aga mate wo'o-i-wadi, ko'ia napoka'alai mo'anai'.
Wae oa' -mi to jadi' hi katolu-na duu' -na hi kapitu-na. Mate omea-ra hante uma ria ana' -ra.
Ka'omea-na mate wo'o-imi-hawo tobine toei.
Jadi', hi eo mpeno, ane tuwu' nculii' mpu'u-di hawe'ea tomate-e, hema-ramo mpai' pue' tobine toei, apa' pitu-ramo mpotobine-i."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Tauna hi dunia' toi motobinei pai' motomanei.
Aga tauna to napotuwu' nculii' Pue' Ala pai' to masipato' mporata bagia hi dunia' to bo'u mpai', uma-rapa-hana motobinei ba motomanei.
Apa' tuwu' -ra hewa tuwu' mala'eka, uma-rapa mate. Ana' Alata'ala-ramo, apa' napotuwu' nculii' -ramo Alata'ala.

"Ane katuwu' -ra nculii' tomate-e, nabi Musa moto to mpakanoto katuwu' -ra nculii'. Hi rala jarita julumpu to jela', Musa mpokahangai' Pue' Ala hewa toi: `Alata'ala to napue' Abraham, to napue' Ishak, pai' to napue' Yakub.'

Jadi', ngkai lolita-na nabi Musa toe, monoto-mi ta'inca katuwu' -ra moto Abraham, Ishak pai' Yakub. Apa' bela tauna to mate to mepue' hi Alata'ala, tauna to tuwu' -hana to mpopue' -i. Apa' hi Alata'ala hawe'ea tauna tuwu'."
Oti toe, ba hangkuja dua guru agama mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Lompe' lia petompoi' -nu Guru."
Ngkai ree, uma-rapa daho' mepekune' ba napa-napa hi Yesus.
Ngkai ree, mepekune' wo'o-imi-hawo Yesus mpo'uli' -raka guru agama toera: "Beiwa pai' ra'uli' Magau' Topetolo' muli-na Magau' Daud?
Hiaa' bo Daud moto-hawo mpokahangai' -i Pue' -na. Hi rala Buku Rona' na'uli': Pue' Ala mpo'uli' -ki Pue' -ku: `Mohura-moko hi mali ngka'ana-ku duu' -na kupopengkoru hawe'ea bali' -nu hi Iko.'
Bula tauna mpe'epei lolita-na Yesus toe we'i, napololitai ana'guru-na, na'uli':

"Pelompehi-koi, neo' -koi mpenau' kehi-ra guru agama. Apa' goe' -ra modao' mpopake' baju to moloe, goe' -ra ane tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-ra. Goe' -ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa, goe' -ra ane rapopohura-ra hi pohuraa to lompe' hi posusaa'.
Mpobagiu-ra tobine tobalu pai' rahagoi tomi-ra. Pai' -ra mpowunii' kadada'a gau' -ra tohe'e hante mosampaya rapomoloe-loe. Huku' -ra motomo lia mpai'."
Hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, Yesus mpohilo topo'ua' mpopuna' doi hi rala peti' pompunaa' doi pepue'.
Mpohilo wo'o-i hadua tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -na mpopuna' rompepa' doi ngkala.
Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -na tohe'e mai, meliu pewai' -na ngkai pewai' hawe'ea tauna toera lau.
Apa' hira' mewai' ngkai labi ka'uaa' -ra. Tapi' tobine toei, nau' hewa apa-mi kampe'ahii' -na, napewai' omea-mi-hana to ria hi hi'a, to naparaluu-hawo hi katuwu' -na."
Nto'u toe, ria tauna mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Lompe' lia Tomi Alata'ala toi, apa' rawangu hante watu to ncola pai' rarampai hante rewa to rapopepue' hi Pue' Ala." Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus:
"Rata mpai' tempo-na hawe'ea to nihilo toe lau ragero, uma-pi mpai' ria hamehaa' watu to bate pomeduncu-na."
Ngkai ree, mepekune' -ra ana'guru-na mpekune' -i: "Guru, nto'uma mpai' kadupa' -na to nu'uli' toe-e we'i? Pai' napa mpai' to jadi' tanda ane neo' madupa' -pi?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Pelompehi, neo' -koi ma'ala rabagiu. Apa' wori' mpai' tauna to mehupa' to mpo'uli' kahira' -na Magau' Topetolo'. Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' karata-na mpu'u Eo Kiama. Aga neo' nituku' -ra.
Neo' wo'o-koi me'eka' mpo'epe kareba to mpo'uli' wori' tauna manga'e pai' mpo'ewa topoparenta. Apa' hawe'ea tohe'e kana jadi' mperi'ulu. Tapi' ko'ia-hawo rata mpu'u-mi kahudua dunia'."
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpokaliliu lolita-na, na'uli': "Hi eo toe mpai', wori' ngata mosipanga'ei, magau' hadua mpo'ewa magau' kahadua-na.
Ria mpai' linu bohe, pai' hiapa-apa ria haki' ropu' pai' oro'. Pai' hi langi' ria tanda bohe to mewulungahi.

Aga kako'ia-na hawe'ea toe jadi', koi' mpai' rahoko' pai' rabalinai'. Rapakilu-koi hi rala tomi posampayaa, pai' -koi ratarungku'. Rabua' -koi hi magau' pai' hi topoparenta sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku'.
Nto'u toe mpai', ria loga-ni mpo'uli' -raka pepangala' -ni hi Aku'.
Pakaroho ami' -mi nono-ni, neo' -koi mingki' mpekiri ncala' ba beiwa mpai' tompoi' -ni.
Aku' moto-damo mpai' to mpowai' -koi petompoi' to monoto, alaa-na uma ria haduaa ngkai bali' -ni to mpokule' mpobaro ba mposapuaka napa to ni'uli'.
Nto'u toe mpai', hawe'ea tauna mpokahuku' -koi sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku'. Ntahawe' totu'a-ni, ompi' -ni, posantina-ni, pai' ema' -ni mpewai' -koi hi bali' -ni. Hantongo' -koi mpai' rapatehi.
Aga kakoo-kono-na uma moto-koi moapa. Nau' hangkaho wuluwoo' -ni uma mpai' ria to moronto.
Ane uma mogego' pepangala' -ni hi Aku', bate mporata-koi katuwua' to lompe'.
"Ane nihilo-damo ngata Yerusalem toi ratipuhi tantara bali', ni'inca-mi ka'uma-napi mahae Yerusalem ragero.

Nto'u toe mpai', tauna to mo'oha' hi Yudea, agina metibo' -ra hilou hi bulu' -na. Tauna to hi rala ngata agina metibo' ngkai rala ngata. Pai' tauna to hi mali ngata neo' -pi leba' mesua' hi rala ngata.
Apa' tempo toe mpai', tempo pehukua' Alata'ala, bona madupa' -mi hawe'ea to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli'.
Mpe'ahii' -ra mpai' tobine to nto'u-ra motina'i pai' to mpentii' ana' -ra hi tempo toe, apa' mokoro petibo' -ra. Apa' ngata toi narumpa' silaka bohe, pai' Pue' Ala mpohuku' pue' ngata.
Ria-ra mpai' to jadi' konia' piho'. Ria-ra to ratawani pai' rapatau' hi humalili' dunia'. Pai' ngata Yerusalem toi ralisa tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi, duu' -na hudu tempo to napakatantu-raka Pue' Ala.
"Nto'u toe mpai', ria tanda hi eo, hi wula pai' hi betue'. Hawe'ea manusia' mokaratu nono-ra pai' ingu' mpo'epe pomoni pai' pojago tahi'.
Ria mpai' tauna to mate ngkokore nakeni kawulunga-ra, mpohilo to jadi' hi humalili' dunia'. Apa' hawe'ea anu to mobaraka' hi langi' ralengo.
Nto'u toe-damo mpai', hawe'ea tauna mpohilo-a, Aku' Ana' Manusia', mana'u tumai hi rala limu'. Uma mowo pehini-ku pai' kabaraka' -ku nto'u toe.
Ane hawe'ea toe ntepu'u majadi', pakaroho-mi nono-ni pai' mengoa' -mokoi, apa' neo' rata-mi tempo-na rabahaka-koi ngkai kaparia-ni."
Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na hante lolita rapa' tohe'i, na'uli': "Petonoi-koi kaju ara pai' kaju-kaju ntani' -na wo'o.
Ane nihilo-damo mela' -mi rau-na, ni'inca-mi ka'uma-napi mahae mara eo.
Wae wo'o ane nihilo-damo kajadia' toe we'i lou, ni'inca-mi ka'uma-napi mahae Alata'ala jadi' Magau' mpu'u-mi hi dunia'.
"Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hawe'ea toe we'i bate madupa' kako'ia-na mate omea tauna to tuwu' tempo toi.
Langi' pai' dunia' mogero moto mpai'. Tapi' lolita-ku bate-bate-na duu' kahae-hae-na.
"Mo'inga' -inga' -koi, neo' -koi sese' ntora mosusa' pai' nginu palangu-langu, ba ntora mpenonoi katuwu' -ni hi dunia', alaa-na lempe' moto-koi hi eo karata-ku. Apa' rata ncorobaa-a mpai'.
Karata-ku mpai' mporumpa' hawe'ea tauna hi dunia' hewa tewo' mpowoko' wulehu'.
Mo'inga' -inga' -koi pai' tida mekakae hi Pue' Ala, bona moroho-koi ntaha hawe'ea kaparia to neo' jadi' toe, duu' -na mpohirua' -ka Aku' Ana' Manusia'."
Hi eo-na, Yesus metudui' hi Tomi Alata'ala. Hi bengi-na, hilou-i hi mali ngata Yerusalem, pai' -i turu hi Bulu' Zaitun.
Butu mepulo-na ntodea morumpu hi Tomi Alata'ala doko' mpo'epe tudui' -na.
Mohu' -mi eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga' Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii, to rahanga' wo'o Eo Paskah.
Nto'u toe, imam pangkeni pai' guru agama mpali' ohea-ra ke mpatehi bongo Yesus, apa' me'eka' -ra mpoka'eka' ntodea.
Ngkai ree, Magau' Anudaa' mesua' hi rala nono Yudas, to rahanga' wo'o Iskariot, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na Yesus to hampulu' rodua.
Toe pai' hilou-imi mpololitai imam pangkeni hante kapala' polisi Tomi Alata'ala, ba beiwa akala-na mpobalu' Yesus hi hira'.
Goe' -ramo mpo'epe lolita Yudas toe, ra'uli' -ki: "Ane nutonu Yesus hi kai', kiwai' -ko doi."
Na'io' -mi Yudas, pai' ngkai ree napali' loga to lompe' mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -na hante uma ra'incai ntodea.
Rata-mi tempo-na Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii. Pai' eo to lomo' -na hi rala posusa' tohe'e, eo posumalea' bima to rakoni' hi Eo Paskah.
Yesus mpohubui Petrus pai' Yohanes, na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi mporodo-taka pongkoni' Paskah-ta."
Rapekune' -i: "Hiapa Pue' nupokono kipomporodoi-e?"
Na'uli' -raka: "Ane mesua' -koi mpai' hi rala ngata, hirua' -koi hante hadua tomane to ngkeni pontomua' oti ntomu'. Tuku' -i rata hi tomi pesuaa' -na.
Rata hi tomi pesuaa' -na, uli' -ki pue' tomi hewa toi: `Na'uli' Guru: Hiapa-kuwo pobabehia-ku Posusa' Paskah hante ana'guru-ku?'
Pue' tomi toei mpai' mpotudo' -kokoi hameha' kamar to bohe hi lolo-na. Kamar toe teporodo ami' -mi, hono' -mi rewa-na. Hi retu-mi mpai' niporodo pongkoni' Paskah-ta."
Hilou mpu'u-ramo Petrus pai' Yohanes, pai' rarata mpu'u-mi hewa to na'uli' -raka Yesus, pai' -ra mporodo-mi pongkoni' Paskah.
Karata-na mpu'u-mi tempo ngkoni' pongkoni' Paskah tohe'e, mohura-imi Yesus hante suro-na hi tomi toe.
Na'uli' -raka: "Doko' lia-a ngkoni' dohe-ni hi Eo Paskah toi, kako'ia-ku mporata kaparia.
Apa' bona ni'inca: uma-apa ngkoni' pongkoni' Paskah to hewa toi, duu' -na madupa' mpu'u-mi batua-na posusa' toi nto'u Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'."
Oti toe, Yesus mpo'ala' sangkiri' to ihia' anggur, na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala, pai' na'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Ala' -mi tohe'i pai' nibagi-bagi.
Apa' bona ni'inca: ntepu'u ngkai wae lau, uma-apa nginu anggur duu' -na rata mpu'u-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'."

Oti toe, na'ala' -mi roti, pai' ka'oti-nai mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Pue' Ala, napihe-pihe pai' natonu-miraka, na'uli': "Roti to kutonu-kokoi toi, toi-mi woto-ku ((to kutonu mpotolo' -koi. Babehi-mokoi ada toi bona mpokiwoi-a."

Wae wo'o, ka'oti-ra ngkoni', na'ala' sangkiri' to ihia' anggur pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ihi' sangkiri' toi mpobatuai pojanci Alata'ala to bo'u, to mpoposidai' Alata'ala pai' manusia'. Pojanci toe, rapadupa' hante raa' -ku, to rabowo mpai' ane mate-a mpotolo' -koi.))
"Aga hilo pe', tauna to mpobalu' -a mpai', ria-imi hi rehe'i lau, ngkoni' dohe-ku toi-e!
Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate kana mate hewa to napakatantu Alata'ala. Aga mpe'ahii' tauna to mpobalu' -a tetui!"
Kara'epe-na ana'guru-na toe, momepekune' -ramo ba hema-ra mpai' to mpobabehi hewa toe.
Ngkai ree, momehono' -ramo ana'guru-na Yesus, ba hema-ra to meliu kabohe pangka' -ra.
Toe pai' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane hi tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala, uma mowo kasoa-na magau' mpohawai' ntodea. Pai' tauna to bohe pangka' -ra doko' rahanga' `to mpotiroi ntodea.'
Aga koi', neo' hewa tetu! Timali-na lau-di. Hema-koi to meliu kabohe pangka' -na kana mo'ingku hewa to kedi' lia tuwu' -na. Pai' tauna to mehawai' kana mo'ingku hewa hadua pahawaa'.
Kupekune' -koi ulu: hema to meliu kabohe pangka' -na? To mohura ngkoni' -di, ba to metonui-di? Tantu tauna to mohura. Hiaa' ohe'i-a hi laintongo' -ni hewa tauna to mpotonui-koi.
"Koi' tohe'i-e lau, ria oa' -koi dohe-ku hi rala hawe'ea kasusaa' -ku.
Jadi', hewa Tuama-ku mpowai' -a kuasa moparenta, wae wo'o Aku' mpowai' -koi kuasa moparenta.

Toe pai' goe' wo'o-ko-koiwo mpai' ngkoni' pai' nginu dohe-ku hi rala Kamagaua' -ku ane jadi' Magau' -apa mpai'. Pai' mohura moto-koi mpai' hi pohuraa to hampulu' romeha', mpoparentai to Israel to hampulu' rontina."
Oti toe, Pue' Yesus mpololitai Simon Petrus, na'uli': "Ee', Simon! Epe: Magau' Anudaa' rawai' loga mposori-koi omea. Hewa pae to ratapi, hewa toe wo'o mpai' kagaga-na pesori to mporumpa' -koi.
Aga kuposampayai ami' -moko Simon, bona neo' lelu' pepangala' -nu. Jadi', ane monoto nculii' mpai' nono-nu, iko kana mporohoi nono doo-nu."
Na'uli' Petrus: "Pue', nau' ratarungku' -a mpai' ba paiana rapatehi-a dohe-nu, sadia moto-a mpotuku' -ko!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Petrus, bona nu'inca: kako'ia-na turua' manu' bengi toe mpai' lau, mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku."
Oti toe Yesus mpololitai-ra, na'uli': "Nto'u kakuhubui-ni wengi hilou ngkeni Kareba Lompe', uma-koi kupiliu mpokeni karepe' doi ba boku ba sapatu'. Ha ria-mokoi nakakurai' ba napa-napa-e?"
Ratompoi': "Uma-hawo." Na'uli' Yesus: "Aga hewa toe lau, hema-koi to ria doi-ni ba boku-ni kana nikeni. Pai' hema-koi to uma ria piho' -ni, pobalu' baju-ni nipope'oli piho'.

Apa' ria lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli': `Magau' Topetolo' mpai' rapohewa tauna to dada'a.' Pai' napa to te'uki' toe kana madupa' hi Aku'. Apa' napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa-a, neo' madupa' mpu'u-mi wae lau."
Ra'uli' ana'guru-na: "Pue', ohe'i moto piho' romata." Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae-mi."
Oti toe, malai-imi Yesus ngkai rala ngata, pai' hewa kabiasaa-na hilou-imi hi Bulu' Zaitun, pai' ana'guru-na hilou wo'o dohe-na.
Karata-ra hi ria, na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka: "Mosampaya-mokoi bona neo' -koi mporata pesori."
Oti toe, pai' hilou-i molaa hala' ngkai hira', pai' -i mowilingkudu mosampaya.
Na'uli': "Tuama-ku, ane dota-ko, wi'iha-ka-kuwo kaparia to neo' mporumpa' -a tohe'i. Aga bela konoa-ku Aku' to jadi', agina konoa-nu Iko moto." ((
Ngkai ree, mehupa' -mi hadua mala'eka ngkai suruga mporohoi-i.
Hangkedi' kanahuduwukui-na mosampaya, apa' pepa mpu'u na'epe. Ini' -na tudo' hi tana' hewa raa'.))
Oti mosampaya, mokore-imi hilou nculii' hi ana'guru-na. Narata-ra bula-ra leta', nakeni kasusa' nono-ra.
Na'uli' -raka: "Napa-di pai' leta' -koie! Memata-mokoi pai' mosampaya bona neo' -koi mporata pesori."

Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi, muu-mule' rata-mi tauna hampodooa. Yudas, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua, hi'a-mi to mpakeni-ra. Karata-ra hi ree, hilou-imi Yudas mpomohui' Yesus, doko' natabe-i hante me'eki ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi.
Aga Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Ee' Yudas, ha hante petabe-nu tetu-tanoe nupobalu' -a, Aku' Ana' Manusia' -e!"
Karahilo-na ana'guru-na napa to neo' jadi', ra'uli': "Pue', ki'ewa-ramo hante piho'!"
Ngkai ree, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na mpotime batua Imam Bohe, bela mpoholu tilinga ka'ana-na.
Na'uli' Yesus: "Neo' -pi!" Pai' najama tilinga-na napaka'uri' -ki.

Oti toe, Yesus mpololitai-ra imam pangkeni pai' polisi Tomi Alata'ala hante pangkeni to Yahudi to tumai mpohoko' -i. Na'uli' -raka: "Ha toperampaki-a toi-e, pai' mingki' tumai-koi ntali piho' pai' sumampu-e!

Butu eo-na ria lalau-a dohe-ni hi Tomi Alata'ala, tapi' uma-koi hema to dungku pale-ni hi Aku' nto'u toe. Tempo mobengi-damo pai' lako' daho' -koi mpohoko' -a. Toi-mi tempo-ni koi', pai' tempo-na magau' kabengia!"
Ngkai ree, rahoko' mpu'u-imi, pai' -i rakeni hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe. Petrus metuku' ngkawao-wadi.
Hi laintongo' berewe, rapobaa apu raponerui, pai' Petrus hilou wo'o-hawo mohura dohe-ra mpotololiki apu.
Hadua tobine topobago hi tomi Imam Bohe mpohilo Petrus bula-na moneru. Napelence pai' na'uli': "Tau tetui, hadua doo-na Yesus!"
Nasapu Petrus, na'uli': "Uma-kuna ku'incai-i!"
Uma mahae ngkai ree, kahadua-na mpohilo Petrus pai' na'uli' -ki: "Iko wo'o-mi hadua doo-ra ngone!" Na'uli' wo'o Petrus: "Uma! Bela aku'."
Ba ria hajaa ngkai ree, hadua wo'o-mi mpo'uli': "Bate hi'a mpu'u-di doo-nae, apa' to Galilea wo'o-i-hawo!"
Na'uli' Petrus: "Napa to nu'uli' tetu, uma-kuna ku'incai!" Bula-na Petrus mololita-pidi, turua' -mi manu',
pai' Pue' me'ili' mponaa-i. Ngkai ree, nakiwoi-mi lolita-na Pue' to mpo'uli' -ki: "Kako'ia-na turua' manu' bengi mpai', mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku."
Palai-nami Petrus hilou hi mali-na, pai' -i geo' ngkai kapeda' nono-na.
Tauna to mpodongo Yesus mpopo'ore' -i pai' mpohopo' -i.
Raputu' lio-na bona neo' -i pehilo, pai' -i rapekune': "Ee nabi! Pe'uli' pe' ba hema to mpohopo' -koe!"
Wori' wo'o-pidi lolita peruge' -ra mporuge' -i.
Kamobaja-na, hawe'ea imam pangkeni pai' guru agama hante pangkeni to Yahudi ntani' -na moromu, pai' Yesus rakeni hi nyanyoa-ra.
Ra'uli' topohura toera mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Uli' -kakai hi rehe'i, ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo' -e?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Nau' ku'uli' -kokoi, bate uma-le nipangalai' -e.
Pai' ane Aku' mepekune' hi koi', bate uma-le nitompoi' -ae.
Aga ngkai wae-e lau, Aku' Ana' Manusia' mohura pai' moparenta hi mali ngka'ana Alata'ala to Mobaraka'."
Ra'uli' wo'o-mi topohura toera: "Ane wae-di, Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae mpu'u-di, hewa to ni'uli' tetu-e."
Ngkai ree, ra'uli' -mi: "Uma-pi mingki' ria sabi'! Ta'epe moto-mi ngkai wiwi-na kasalaa' -na!"
Oti toe, mokore-ramo hawe'ea topohura toera pai' Yesus rakeni hilou hi Gubernur Pilatus.
Karata-ra hi ria, rapakilu-imi, ra'uli': "Tau toii kirata bula-na mpopanawu' ntodea! Na'uli' -raka neo' mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar. Pai' na'uli' wo'o, Hi'a-mi Kristus, hadua magau'."
Jadi', mepekune' Pilatus hi Yesus: "Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Yahudi-e?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae mpu'u, hewa to nu'uli' tetu-e."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' Pilatus hi imam pangkeni pai' hi ntodea: "Uma-kuna kuruai' sala' -na tau toii."
Tapi' rajojo lau-mi mpo'uli': "Na'ukei' ntodea hante tudui' -na, hobo' hi tana' to Yahudi. Lomo' -na hi Galilea-i, hiaa' wae lau rata-imi hi rehe'i."
Kana'epe-na Pilatus tohe'e, mepekune' -i: "Ha to Galilea-i?"

Ratompoi': "Io', to Galilea-i-hawo." Mpo'epe toe, Pilatus mpohubui tauna mpokeni Yesus hilou hi Magau' Herodes, apa' Herodes toei topoparenta hi tana' Galilea. Pai' nto'u toe, hi Yerusalem wo'o-i-hawo Herodes.
Goe' lia-imi Herodes mpohilo Yesus, apa' mahae-imi mpo'epe tauna mpotompo'wiwi-i, pai' doko' nahilo-i. Nasarumaka, Yesus mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi bona nahilo.
Toe pai' wori' pompekunea' -na hi Yesus, aga Yesus uma winihi.
Imam pangkeni pai' guru agama ria wo'o-ra hi ree, karapo' -damo lolita-ra mpopakilu Yesus hi Herodes.
Oti toe, Herodes hante tantara-na mpopo'ore' pai' mporuge' Yesus. Raheai-i hante pohea magau', pai' rakeni nculii' -i hilou hi Pilatus.
Hi eo tohe'e momekalompei' -ramo Herodes pai' Pilatus, hiaa' ri'ulu mosisala-ra.
Ngkai ree, Pilatus mporumpu hawe'ea imam pangkeni pai' totu'a ngata hante ntodea,
