pai' na'uli' -raka: "Tau toii nikeni tumai, ni'uli' mpopanawu' -i ntodea. Kuparesa' -imi hi nyanyoa-ni omea, aga uma ria kuruai' hanyalaa gau' -na to dada'a hewa to nipakilu-ki.
Wae wo'o-hawo pomporata-na Herodes, apa' napoponculi' -imi hi aku'. Tau toii, uma-i mpobabehi ba napa-napa to masipato' rahuku' mate-ki.
Jadi', kuweba' -i-wadi pai' kubahaka-i." ((
Pilatus mpo'uli' hewa toe, apa' biasa-na butu Eo Paskah kana nabahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku', bona mpo'ala' nono ntodea. Toe pai' na'uli': "Kuweba' -i-wadi pai' kubahaka-i."))
Mpo'epe toe, mogora-ramo ntodea mpo'uli': "Patehi-imi! Bahaka-kakai Barabas!"
Barabas toe ratarungku' sabana pe'ewa-na hi topoparenta hi rala ngata pai' topepatehi wo'o-i.
Jadi', apa' Pilatus doko' mpobahaka Yesus, toe pai' mololita tena-i hi ntodea.
Aga rajojo lau-mi mogora, ra'uli': "Parika' -i! Parika' -i!"
Nakatolu-ngkanii Pilatus mpo'uli' -raka: "Hiaa' napa-mile sala' -nae? Uma ria kuruai' nau' hanyalaa sala' -na to masipato' rahuku' mate-ki. Kuweba' -i-wadi pai' kubahaka."
Aga rahudukulei' lau-mi merapi' bona Yesus raparika'. Ka'omea-na medagi mpu'u-ramo.
Napomonoa' -mi Pilatus bona Yesus rahuku' mate, ntuku' pomperapia' -ra.
Pai' napomonoa' wo'o mpobahaka-raka tauna to raperapi', to ratarungku' sabana pe'ewa-na pai' pepatehi-na. Yesus ratonu hi tantara to Roma bona rapatehi ntuku' konoa-ra to Yahudi.

Ngkai ree, rakeni-imi Yesus hilou hi mali ngata, pai' hi lengko ohea hirua' -ra hante hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon to Kirene. Hi'a tohe'ei, lako' rata hi ngata. Tantara to Roma mpentoe Simon, rapewuku-i mpaha'a kaju parika' hilou dohe-ra mpotuku' Yesus.
Bula-na Yesus rakeni hilou hi mali ngata, wori' tauna to metuku'. Ria wo'o-ra ba hangkuja dua tobine to metuku'. Tobine toera mpokageoi' pai' mpotantangii' -i.
Yesus mpewili' -ra pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ee tobine to Yerusalem, neo' -a nikageoi'. Agina woto-ni moto pai' ana' -ni nikageoi'.
Apa' rata mpai' tempo-na tauna mpo'uli': `Marasi' lau-ramo tobine to lalo, to uma hangkania mo'ana', pai' to uma hangkania mpentii' ana'!'
Nto'u toe mpai', tauna mpololitai bulu' hewa toi: `Duruhi-makai bulu'! Lulihi-makai watu!'
Apa' ane Aku', to uma ria sala' -ku, rapohewa toe, peliu-liu-nami mpai' koi'."
Nto'u Yesus rakeni hilou raparika' toe, ria wo'o rodua tau ntani' -na to rakeni hilou dohe-na bona rapatehi. To rodua toe, paka' to dada'a gau' -ra.
Karata-ra hi po'ohaa' to rahanga' Bulu' Banga'woo', raparika' -imi Yesus. Pai' to rodua to dada'a gau' -ra toera, raparika' wo'o-ramo-rawo, hadua hi mali ka'ana-na hadua mali ki'ii-na.
Yesus mosampaya, na'uli': "Tuama-ku, ampungi-ra-rawo, apa' uma ra'incai napa to rababehi." Tantara to mpoparika' Yesus mpotene' undi hewa pompenoa' -ra, ba hema-ra to mporata pohea-na.

Wori' tauna tumai mokore hilau merono. Wae wo'o pangkeni to Yahudi mpopo'ore' -i, ra'uli': "Tau ntani' -na natulungi-ramo. Agina woto-na moto-pi natulungi, ane makono Kahi'a-na Magau' Topetolo' to napelihi Alata'ala-e!"
Tantara-tantara wo'o mpopo'ore' -i. Ramohui' -i pai' rapopo'inui-i anggur to mo'onco,
pai' ra'uli': "Ane Magau' to Yahudi mpu'u-ko, wae-pi tulungi moto-mi-kowo woto-nu!"
Hi kaju parika' -na Yesus hi ntoto woo' -na ria ukia' hewa toi: TOI-MI MAGAU' TO YAHUDI.
Hadua todada'a to raparika' dohe-na Yesus, mpolibui' Yesus, na'uli': "Nu'uli' -kona Iko Magau' Topetolo' -e! Ane bongko wae, tulungi-mi woto-nu pai' kai' wo'o-kaiwo!"
Aga to hadua-i-hana mpotanee' doo-na, na'uli' -ki: "Ha uma-ko me'eka' -e? Uma-ko mengkoru hi Alata'ala-e? Rahuku' mate omea-ta toi-e.
Aga huku' -ta kita' rodua, toto-na-tana ntuku' kadada'a gau' -ta. Hiaa' Hi'a-hana, uma ria sala' -na."
Oti toe, pai' -i mpololitai Yesus, na'uli': "Yesus, kiwoi-a-kuwo, ane rata-poko mpai' jadi' Magau'!"
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -koko: eo toe mpai' lau, ria-ko dohe-ku hi Firdaus."
Tebua' -mi eo, muu-mule' uma-pi mehini eo. Hangaa mobengi-mi hobo' hi ngata toe, duu' rata jaa tolu.
Kain porini-olo' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, mobika' ntongo' jadi' rontau.
Oti toe, me'au-imi Yesus napesukui mpo'uli': "Tuama-ku, hi rala pale-nu kutonu-mi kao' -ku!" Ka'oti-na mololita hewa toe, modupe' -mi inoha' -na.
Kanahilo-na tadulako tantara napa to jadi' toe, mpo'une' Alata'ala-imi, na'uli': "Makono mpu'u-tawo! Hi'a he'e tauna to monoa'!"
Hawe'ea tauna to morumpu merono, karahilo-na napa to jadi' toe, nculii' -ramo hilou hi tomi-ra, pai' halengko ohea mporera' -rera' hunamu-ra.
Ane hawe'ea pome'inca-na Yesus hante tobine-tobine to mpotuku' -i ngkai Galilea, mokore molaa-ra mpohilo hawe'ea to jadi' toe.

Ria hadua tomane to rahanga' Yusuf to ngkai ngata Arimatea hi tana' Yudea. Yusuf toei, tauna to lompe' pai' monoa' ingku-na, pai' to mpopea wo'o tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Nau' -i hadua topohura hi Polibua' Bohe Agama to Yahudi, aga uma napokonoi hawa' pai' kabotu' -ra to mpo'uli' Yesus kana rapatehi.
Yusuf toei hilou hi Gubernur Pilatus mperapi' woto-na Yesus.
Napopana'u-mi woto Yesus ngkai kaju parika' -na, naputu' hante kain to bula, pai' napopoturu hi rala daeo' to ralonga' hi panapa bulu'. Daeo' toe bo'u-pidi, ko'ia hangkania rapotanai.
Eo toe, eo pomporodoa, pai' ntuku' ada to Yahudi ntepu'u ncimonou' toe rapalii' mobago, apa' ntepu'u-mi eo pepuea'.
Toe pai' tobine to mpodohei Yesus ngkai Galilea mpotuku' Yusuf hilou hi daeo' toe. Rahilo beiwa woto Yesus ratu'u hi rala daeo'.
Oti toe, nculii' -ramo hilou hi ngata, mporodo rampa-rampa hante lana honga bona ragelai' -ki woto Yesus. Oti toe, hi eo pepuea' rapento'oi-mi mobago ntuku' Atura Musa.
Eo Mingku mepupulo ngkii, tobine toera hilou hi daeo' mpokeni anu mohonga to oti-mi raporodo.
Rata hi ria, rahilo-rawo watu po'unca-na tederu' -mi.
Pesua' -rami hi rala daeo', aga uma raruai' woto-na Pue' Yesus.
Bula-ra mokore nakeni ka'ingu' -ra, muu-mule' mehupa' rodua tomane to moheai meringkila' mokore hi ncori-ra.
Wulunga-ramo tobine toera, pai' -ra motumpa hi tana'. Ra'uli' to rodua toera mpo'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' nipali' tauna to tuwu' hi olo' tomate?
Uma-ipi ria hi rehe'i. Tuwu' nculii' -imi! Kiwoi-dile napa to na'uli' -kokoi wengi hi Galilea-e.
Na'uli': Ana' Manusia' kana ratonu hi tauna to dada'a bona raparika', aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' -i."
Ngkai ree, rakiwoi mpu'u-mi lolita Yesus.
Ponculi' -rami ngkai daeo', pai' ratutura hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi ana'guru Yesus to hampulu' hadua pai' hi hawe'ea topetuku' ntani' -na.
Tobine toera, hira' Maria Magdalena, Yohana, pai' Maria tina Yakobus, pai' tobine ntani' -na to dohe-ra. Ratutura hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi suro Yesus.
Aga suro toera uma mpangalai' lolita-ra, ra'uli' lolita to ratamangko-wadi.

Hiaa' Petrus-hana, pokeno-nami hilou hi daeo'. Pengkabungku' -nami mpelongi' hi rala-na, nahilo muntu' hompu' -na-damo to hi ree. Oti toe, nculii' -imi hilou hi tomi-na, pai' ntora mokanono mpenonoi napa to jadi' tohe'e.
Hi eo toe wo'o, rodua topetuku' Yesus mako' hilou hi ngata Emaus, kalaa-na kira-kira hampulu' hakilo ngkai Yerusalem.
Bula-ra momako' toe, ntora mololita-ra, mpololita hawe'ea to lako' jadi'.
Bula-ra mololita pai' momepekune', muu-mule' rata-imi Yesus mpomohui' -ra pai' mako' dohe-ra.
Pehilo moto-ra, aga ria anu to mpohilingai' -ra, alaa-na uma ra'incai Kayesus-na.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Napa-die to ntora nilolita ngkalako' -e?" Mentoda' -ra hante lence to monto'.
To hadua, to rahanga' Kleopas, mpekune' Yesus, na'uli': "Ha lako' rata-ko-tanoe hi Yerusalem-e, pai' uma-di nu'incai napa to jadi' ba hangkuja eo to liu toi-e?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa-die?" Hampetompoi' -ra: "To jadi' hi Yesus to Nazaret-le! Hi'a nabi to mobaraka' hi pobago-na pai' pololita-na, lompe' hi poncilo Alata'ala pai' hi poncilo ntodea.
Imam pangkeni pai' totu'a ngata-ta mpotonu-i hi topoparenta bona rahuku' mate. Oti toe, raparika' mpu'u-i.
Hiaa' haru' -mi-kaina nono-kai, apa' ki'uli' Hi'a-mi mpai' to mpobahaka-ta to Israel ngkai bali' -ta. Eo toe lau, eo katolu-nami ngkai karapatehia-na.
Hiaa' toe-e, ba hangkuja dua tobine doo-kai mpolahoi ta'i-kai, apa' hilou-ra hi daeo' -na mepupulo ngone,
tapi' woto-na uma-pi raruai'. Nculii' -ramo ra'uli' -kakai kampohilo-ra mala'eka to mpo'uli' tuwu' nculii' -imi.
Ngkai ree, ba hangkuja dua doo-kai hilou hi daeo'. Rata hi ria, rahilo bate hewa to ra'uli' tobine toera. Aga Yesus uma rahiloi."
Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Wojo mpu'u-koi! Uma oa' -tanoe niparasaya hawe'ea to ra'uli' nabi owi-e!
Magau' Topetolo', bate kana mporata kaparia ncala' -i, pai' lako' mporata-i kabohe tuwu' -na."
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpakanoto-raka hawe'ea to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa woto-na, ntepu'u ngkai sura to na'uki' nabi Musa duu' rata hi hawe'ea sura nabi.
Mohu' -mi ngata to ratoa', Yesus ntani' kaliliu-i.
Ntaa' ratagi-idi, ra'uli' -ki: "Mehani-tamo ulu hi rehe'i! Ncimonou' -mi, neo' mobengi-mi." Jadi' mehani mpu'u-imi Yesus dohe-ra.
Mohura-ramo hangkaa-ngkania bona ngkoni'. Yesus mpo'ala' roti, naposampayai, napihe-pihe pai' natonu-miraka.
Nto'u toe, lako' monoto-rada, pai' ra'inca Kayesus-na. Ngkai ree, hangaa mengkaronto-imi, uma-ipi rahiloi.
Momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Toe-tawo' pai' tuna nono-ta hi ohea-e we'i, bula-na mpololitai-ta pai' mpakanoto-taka ihi' Buku Tomoroli' -e!"
Pe'ongko' -ra wo'o-mi nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem, mpohirua' -raka ana'guru Yesus to hampulu' hadua, to bula-ra morumpu hante doo-ra.
Ra'uli' to morumpu toera: "Makono mpu'u-di, katuwu' -na nculii' Pue' -e! Mehupa' -imi hi Simon!"
Jadi', to rodua to lako' rata toera mpotutura wo'o-mi-rawo napa to jadi' hi lengko ohea we'i, pai' kara'inca-na Yesus nto'u kampopihe-pihe-na roti.
Bula-ra mololita-pidi, muu-mule' mokore wo'o-imi Yesus hi laintongo' -ra, pai' -i mpotabe-ra, na'uli': "Kalompea' rata hi koi'."
Hakene-radile me'eka', apa' ra'uli' -rana mpohilo-ra kiu.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' me'eka' -koi pai' morara' nono-nie?
Hilo-dile rari' to hi pale-ku pai' to hi witi' -kue. Aku' -mile toi-e! Ganga-a pai' petonoi, apa' ane rate-hana, uma-hawo ihia pai' wukua hewa to nihilo hi Aku' toi-e."
Oti toe, pai' napopohiloi-ramo pale pai' witi' -na.
Ncaruku' raparasaya Kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi. Wule' mokanganga-ramo nakeni kagoe' nono-ra mogalo ingu'. Toe pai' Yesus mpekune' -ra, na'uli': "Ha ria koni' -ni?"
Ratonu-miki bau' uru to ratunu.
Nadoa-mi pai' nakoni', bona rahilo kabela-na-hawo kiu.

Oti toe, na'uli' -miraka: "Toe-mile to ku'uli' -kokoie bula-ku dohe-ni-pidi. Butu nyala-na to mpolowa woto-ku to te'uki' hi rala sura to na'uki' nabi Musa pai' sura nabi-nabi pai' Buku Rona' Daud, hawe'ea-na kana madupa'."
Oti toe, nanotohi nono-ra bona rapaha ihi' Buku Tomoroli'.
Na'uli': "Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki': Aku' Magau' Topetolo' kana mporata kaparia pai' kana rapatehi, pai' hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii'.

Pai' hi rala hanga' -ku Kareba Lompe' kana rapalele hi hawe'ea tauna, bona medea-ra ngkai jeko' -ra pai' Alata'ala mpo'ampungi-ra. Kareba toe kana rapalele hi humalili' dunia', ntepu'u ngkai Yerusalem.
Koi' -mile to jadi' sabi' ngkai hawe'ea tohe'e-e lau.
"Pe'epei lompe': kupakatu moto mpai' Inoha' Tomoroli' tumai hi koi', hewa to najanci Tuama-ku. Aga kana nipopea ulu hi rala ngata toi, duu' -na baraka' ngkai Alata'ala mana'u tumai mporohoi-koi."
Oti toe, Yesus mpo'ema' -ra hilou hi mali ngata Yerusalem, mohu' hi ngata Betania. Na'ongko' pale-na pai' nagane' -ramo.
Bula-na mpogane' -ra toe, kate'oo-ongkoa' -imi mpogaa' -raka pai' hilou-imi hi suruga.
Mowilingkudu-ramo mponyompa-i, pai' goe' lia nono-ra nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem.
Eo-eo-na tida-ra hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mpo'une' -une' Alata'ala.
Lomo' -na, kako'ia-na dunia' rapajadi', mpolia' ria-imi-hana Lolita. Lolita toei, dohe Alata'ala-i, pai' Lolita toei, Hi'a moto-mi Alata'ala.
Ngkai lomo' -na-imi dohe Alata'ala-e.
Hi'a-mi to napopale Alata'ala mpopajadi' hawe'ea to rapajadi'. Uma ria hanyalaa to jadi' ane uma Hi'a.
Hi'a-mi pehupaa' katuwua', pai' Hi'a-mi baja to mpobajahi nono manusia'.
Baja toe mehini ncuu hi rala kabengia-na, pai' kabengia uma mpakulei' mpopatehi-i.
Rata hadua tauna to nasuro Alata'ala, hanga' -na Yohanes Topeniu'.
Karata-na Yohanes toe, hi'a-mi jadi' sabi' to mpopalele baja toe hi hawe'ea tauna, bona hawe'ea-ra mpo'epe posabi' -na pai' mepangala' hi baja toei.
Yohanes, bela-hawo hi'a baja toe-e. Pai' -i tumai, mpopalele baja toe hi hawe'ea tauna.
Lolita toei, Hi'a-mi poko baja to mpobajahi nono hawe'ea tauna, rata-i hi rala dunia'.
Hi'a-mi to napopale Alata'ala mpopajadi' dunia' toi. Tapi' karata-na hi dunia', tauna hi dunia' uma mpo'incai-i.
Rata-i hi ngata-na moto, tapi' hingka ngata-na uma dota mpotarima-i.
Tapi' hema-hema to mpotarima-i pai' mepangala' hi Hi'a, nawai' -ra huraa jadi' ana' Alata'ala.
Uma-ra mewali ana' Alata'ala sabana totu'a-ra, bela wo'o ngkai kuasa manusia', ba ngkai poncamoko. Alata'ala moto to mpopajadi' -ra ana' -na.

Lolita toei, mewali manusia' -imi, pai' -i mo'oha' hi laintongo' -ta. Kai', kihilo-mi-kaina kabaraka' -na. Kabaraka' -na toe narata ngkai Tuama-na, apa' Hi'a-mi Ana' -na to Hadudua. Ngkai Hi'a toe-mi pai' alaa-na ta'inca Alata'ala pai' kabula rala-na hi kita'.

Yohanes Topeniu' mpopo'incai ntodea kahema-na Lolita toei. Mekio' -i napesukui na'uli': "Hi'a toi-mile to ku'uli' -e wengi! Ku'uli': ria mpai' to tumai ngkabokoa' ngkai aku', aga meliu kabaraka' -na ngkai aku'. Apa' kako'ia-ku putu, mpolia' ria-imi-hana."
Uma ria ka'otia ahi' -na, pai' ngkai ahi' -na toe nagane' -tamo omea, uma ria kaputua-na rasi' to tarata ngkai Hi'a.
Ngkai nabi Musa tatarima Atura Pue' Ala. Tapi' ngkai Yesus Kristus toe-mi pai' ta'inca mpu'u-i Alata'ala, pai' kabula rala-na hi kita'.
Uma ria haduaa to mpohilo Alata'ala. Tapi' Ana' -na to Hadudua toei, to tida oa' hi ncori-na, Hi'a-mi to mpakanoto Alata'ala hi kita'.

Hewa toi posabi' -na Yohanes Topeniu' mpo'uli' kahema-nai Yesus. Topoparenta to Yahudi hi Yerusalem mposuro ba hangkuja dua imam pai' to Lewi hilou hi Yohanes. Karata-ra hi Yohanes, mepekune' -ra: "Pai' -kai tumai toi-e, tumai mpekune' -ko ba hema-ko. Ba iko mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo' -e?"
Yohanes mpotompoi' -ra hante kalonto' -lonto' -na, na'uli' -raka: "Bela-kuwo aku' Magau' Topetolo'."

Mepekune' tena-ra: "Ane wae, hema-ko? Ba nabi Elia-dako?" Na'uli' Yohanes: "Bela wo'o." Mepekune' tena-ra: "Ba iko lau-midi nabi bohe to rajanci owi, to ra'uli' tumai mpai' hi rala dunia' -e?" Na'uli' Yohanes: "Bela wo'o."
Ngkai ree, ra'uli' tena: "Ane wae, uli' -kakai ba hema mpu'u-ko, bona ria woli' -na kiparata-raka to mposuro-kai. Beiwa petompoi' -nu kahema-na mpu'u-ko."
Yohanes mpotompoi' -ra hante lolita nabi Yesaya owi, na'uli': "Aku' toi-le, Tauna to mekio' hi papada to wao': 'Neo' rata-imi Pue'. Porodo ami' -miki ohea-na!'"
Ra'uli' wo'o-mi suro to Parisi toera: "Ane bela-ko Magau' Topetolo', bela-ko nabi Elia, bela wo'o-ko nabi to rajanci, napa-di pai' mponiu' -ko tauna-e?"

Na'uli' Yohanes: "Aku' -le mponiu' tauna hante ue-wadi. Tapi' rata mpai' hadua tauna ngkabokoa' ngkai aku'. Ria moto-imile hi laintongo' -ni tempo toi-e, tapi' uma-i ni'incai. Bangku' jadi' pahawaa' -na mpobongka koloro sapatu' -na, uma-a-kuwo natao."
Hawe'ea toe jadi' hi ngata Betania, hi peniua' -na Yohanes hi dipo ue Yordan.
Kampeneo-na, Yohanes mpohilo Yesus rata mpotoa' -i. Na'uli' -mi hi ntodea: "Hilo! Etu-imi tumai Ana' Bima to naporodo Alata'ala. Hi'a-mi to jadi' tolo' woto to mpolali jeko' manusia'.
Hi'a-mi to ku'uli' -e wengi. Ku'uli' rata-i ngkabokoa' ngkai aku', aga meliu kabaraka' -na ngkai aku'. Apa' kako'ia-ku putu, mpolia' ria-imi-hana.
Lomo' -na wengi, ko'ia wo'o-kuwo ku'incai Kahi'a-nami Magau' Topetolo'. Hiaa' katumai-ku toi-e, bona mponiu' -ra to Israel hante ue pai' mpotudo' -raka kahema-na Magau' Topetolo' toe-e."

Ria wo'o-mi posabi' -na Yohanes toi. Na'uli': "Lomo' -na uma ku'incai Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo'. Tapi' Alata'ala mpohubui-a mponiu' tauna hante ue, pai' na'uli' -ka hewa toi: 'Ane nampa' nuhilo mpai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u pai' rodo hi hadua tauna, Hi'a-mi mpai' to mponiu' tauna hante Inoha' Tomoroli'.' Jadi', kuhilo mpu'u-mi Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u ngkai suruga molence danci mangkebodo, mehompo pai' mengkarodo hi Yesus. Toe pai' toi-ka lolita-ku: Yesus, Hi'a-mi Ana' Alata'ala."
Kampeneo-na, ria wo'o-i Yohanes hi ree hante ana'guru-na rodua.
Kanahilo-na Yesus liu, na'uli': "Hilo, etu-imi tumai Ana' Bima Alata'ala!"
Kara'epe-na ana'guru-na lolita toe, kahilou-rami mpotuku' Yesus.
Yesus mewili', nahilo-ra mpotuku' -i. Napekune' -ra: "Napa to nipali' -e?" Ra'uli' -ki: "Hiapa po'ohaa' -nu Guru?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Mai-mokoi, nihilo moto mpai'." Hilou mpu'u-ramo mpotuku' -i rata hi po'ohaa' -na. Pai' hi ree-ramo dohe-na ngkai jaa opo' duu' mobengi.
Ana'guru-na Yohanes toera mpotuku' Yesus, apa' mpo'epe-ra lolita-na Yohanes Topeniu' we'i. Hadua ngkai to rodua toera, hanga' -na Andreas, ompi' -na Simon Petrus.
Kaliliu hilou-imi Andreas mpopali' Simon, na'uli' -ki: "Kirua' -imi-kaina Mesias!" (batua-na: Magau' Topetolo').

Pai' napo'ema' -imi hilou hi Yesus. Yesus mponaa Simon, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Iko Simon ana' -na Yohanes. Aga ntepu'u tempo toi, rahanga' Kefas-moko." (Hanga' "Kefas" hi rala basa-ra to Yahudi, hibalia hante hanga' "Petrus" hi rala basa Yunani. Batua-na: watu.)
Kampeneo-na, Yesus mopatuju hilou hi tana' Galilea. Kako'ia-na me'ongko', hilou-imi mpohirua' -ki Filipus pai' na'uli' -ki: "Tuku' -ama!"
Filipus toei, ngkai ngata Betsaida, ngata-ra hira' Andreas pai' Petrus.

Ngkai ree, hilou wo'o-imi-hawo Filipus mpohirua' -ki doo-na to rahanga' Natanael, na'uli' -ki: "Kirua' -imi-kaina Magau' Topetolo' -e, hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Atura Musa pai' sura nabi owi! Hanga' -na Yesus ngkai Nazaret, ana' -na Yusuf."
Hampetompoi' Natanael: "Ha ria wo'o-hawo to lompe' to mehuwu ngkai Nazaret-e?" Na'uli' Filipus: "Mai-moko, nuhilo moto-i mpai'!" Hilou-ramo hi Yesus.
Yesus mpohilo Natanael tumai mpohirua' -ki, na'uli': "Etu-i tumai hadua to Yahudi to mpo'uhi mpu'u kehi-na Israel ntu'a-na owi, bela-i topebagiu!"
Na'uli' Natanael: "Ngkaiapa kanu'incaa-ku Guru?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Kako'ia-na nakio' -ko Filipus, kuhilo-mokole, hi tawu kaju ara toe-e ria."
Na'uli' Natanael: "Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko-tawo', Guru! Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Israel!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Nupangala' apa' ku'uli' kakuhilo-nu hi tawu kaju ara-e? Nuhilo tena-pi mpai' to meliu kabohe-na ngkai tetu."
Oti toe, na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: nihilo mpai' langi' tebea pai' mala'eka Alata'ala ngkahe' pai' mana'u tumai hi Aku', Ana' Manusia'."
Timpaliu ro'eo ngkai toe, ria susa' poncamokoa hi ngata Kana hi tana' Galilea. Tina-na Yesus mpokaralai susa' toe.
Pai' Yesus hante ana'guru-na, rakio' wo'o-ra-rawo ngkaralai susa' toe.
Bula-ra mosusa' toe, naka'otii-ramo ue anggur. Tina-na Yesus mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Naka'otii-ra ue anggur."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa pai' nu'uli' -ka hewa tetu-e, Ina'? Ko'ia rata tempo-na kupopo'incai-ra kahema-ku."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' tina-na Yesus mpo'uli' -raka topobago: "Napa-napa mpai' to nahubui-kokoi Yesus, nibabehi-e'!"

Hi tomi toe, ria ono meha' pontu'ua ue to rababehi ngkai watu. Pontu'ua ue toe rapake' rapontu'ui ue pobohoi' witi' pai' pale, ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi. Kawori' ihi' -na, nte ha'atu lite butu meha' -na.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka topobago toera: "Ihii' pontu'ua ue tetu lau hante ue." Ra'ihii' mpu'u-mi rapoponu'.
Oti toe, na'uli' wo'o-miraka: "Tolou' hangkedi', keni hilou hi tompohawai' susa'." Ratolou' mpu'u-mi pai' rakeni hilou hi topohawa'.

Topohawa' toei mpemita ue to rakeni-ki. Bela-pi ue nonto, mobali' -mi mewali ue anggur. Aga uma-hawo na'incai kangkaiapa-na, muntu' topobago-wadi to mpo'inca. Ka'oti-na mpemita ue anggur toe, mekio' -i mpokio' topemua',

pai' na'uli' -ki: "Kabiasaa-ta-hawo, anggur to motomo' -di-hawo to ri'ulu ratua-raka torata. Ane oha-ra-damo nginu, pai' lako' ratua to uma ncako motomo'. Hiaa' iko-kona mpotalaa anggur to motomo', pai' lako' tempo toi-di nupewai' ratua!"
Yesus mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi toe hi ngata Kana hi tana' Galilea. Toe-mi tanda mekoncehi to lomo' -na to nababehi. Hante tanda toe napopohiloi kabaraka' -na, pai' ana'guru-na mepangala' hi Hi'a.
Hudu susa' toe, hilou-imi hi ngata Kapernaum hante tina-na, ompi' -na pai' ana'guru-na. Mo'oha' hi ree-ramo ba hangkuja mengi.
Neo' rata-mi tempo-na eo bohe agama Yahudi to rahanga' Eo Paskah. Jadi', hilou-imi Yesus hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe toe.
Hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala, mpohilo-i tauna to mpobalu' japi, bima pai' danci mangkebodo. Ria wo'o tauna to mposula' doi mohura hi ree.
Yesus mpobabehi poweba' ngkai koloro, pai' nawuso omea-ra ngkai berewe Tomi Alata'ala, hante bima pai' japi-ra. Meja' -ra toposula' doi nabilingko, alaa-na pahawu' -hawu' -mi doi-ra.
Na'uli' -raka topobabalu' danci mangkebodo: "Koi', keni omea tetu lau hilou hi mali-na! Tomi Tuama-ku neo' niponcawa tomi pobabalua'!"
Ana'guru-na mpokiwoi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' hewa tohe'i: "Dede' nono-ku, apa' kupe'ahi' Tomi-nu Pue'."
Ngkai ree, topoparenta to Yahudi mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Napa ntoto-kowo huraa-nu mpobabehi tetu-e? Ane ria mpu'u huraa-nu, popohiloi-kai tanda mekoncehi!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Gero-mi-hana Tomi Alata'ala toi, nihilo moto mpai' kadupa' -na rala-na tolu eo kuwangu nculii'."
Konce-ra topoparenta to Yahudi, ra'uli': "Beiwa!? Tomi Alata'ala toi rawangu rala-na opo' mpulu' ono mpae, hiaa' nu'uli' -kona nuwangu nculii' rala-na tolu eo-wadi?"
Api' woto-nadi to nawalatu Yesus, mpokahangai' Tomi Alata'ala-e.
Ngkabokoa' -na ngkai toe, katuwu' -na nculii' mpu'u-mi Yesus, ana'guru-na mpokiwoi lolita-na toe-e. Ngkai ree rapangala' -mi napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' pai' napa to na'uli' Yesus.
Bula-na Yesus hi Yerusalem mpokaralai Eo Paskah toe, wori' tauna to mepangala' hi Hi'a, apa' rahilo tanda-tanda mekoncehi to nababehi.
Aga Yesus uma mpangala' -ra, apa' na'inca nono hawe'ea tauna.
Uma mingki' kahadua-na to mpo'uli' -ki kabeiwa-na manusia', apa' na'inca ami' napa to hi rala nono manusia'.
Ria hadua tauna to rahanga' Nikodemus. Nikodemus toei, to Parisi pai' pangkeni agama Yahudi.

Rala-na hamengi, rata-i mpohirua' -ki Yesus, na'uli' -ki: "Guru, to ki'inca, Iko hadua guru to nasuro Alata'ala, apa' uma ria tauna to bisa mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi hewa to nubabehi, ane uma-i nadohei Alata'ala."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Ane tauna uma putu nculii', uma-i mpai' jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na."
Na'uli' Nikodemus: "Ha beiwa-hawo tauna to motu'a-mi putu nculii' -e? Ha bisa-i mempuna' hi rala puanaka tina-na, pai' -i putu karongkani-nae?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Ane tauna uma putu hante ue pai' hante baraka' Inoha' Alata'ala, uma-i jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na.
Manusia' tuwu' hi rala dunia' toi, apa' putu ngkai totu'a-na. Tapi' katuwua' kao' -na to bo'u narata ngkai Inoha' Tomoroli'.
Jadi', neo' nupokakonce lolita-ku tohe'i to mpo'uli': koi' omea kana putu nculii'.
Rapa' -na ngolu', mewui hiapa kalaua-na. Wule' sere-na ta'epe, uma ta'incai kangkaiapa-na ba hilou hiapa-i. Wae wo'o hante tauna to putu ngkai baraka' Inoha' Alata'ala."
Na'uli' Nikodemus: "Beiwa wo'o-hawo kawali-na tetu-e?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Iko-le hadua guru to Israel to rabila', hiaa' uma-di-kona nu'incai batua-na lolita-ku toi-e!
Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Kai' mpo'uli' napa to ki'inca, kilolita napa to kihilo. Hiaa' uma-di nipangalai' lolita-kai.
Ane kututura-kokoi napa to jadi' hi dunia', uma nipangala'. Peliu-liu-nami mpai' ane kututura-kokoi napa to jadi' hi suruga.

Uma ria haduaa tauna hi dunia' to manake' hilou hi suruga. Muntu' Aku' -wadi to mpo'inca napa to jadi' hi suruga, apa' Aku' Ana' Manusia' to mo'oha' hi suruga ngkai owi pai' to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga.

"Owi hi papada to wao', nabi Musa mpobabehi lence ule ngkai ngkala, pai' natu'u hi doe hampole kaju pai' natunya' napopokore. Hema-hema to natilo' ule, ane rangoa' lence ule ngkala toe, tuwu' moto-ra. Jadi', hewa ule ngkala toe rapokalangko owi, wae wo'o mpai' Aku' Ana' Manusia' kana rapokalangko,
bona hema-hema to mepangala' hi Aku' mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na."

Hewa toi-mi Alata'ala mpoka'ahi' hawe'ea tauna hi dunia', alaa-na napewai' Ana' -na to Hadudua, bona hema-hema to mepangala' hi Ana' -na toe, uma-ra mporata huku', tapi' mporata-ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
Bela patuju-na Alata'ala mposuro Ana' -na tumai hi dunia' bona mpohuku' manusia'. Patuju-na mposuro Ana' -na tumai-le, bona mpohore manusia' ngkai huku' jeko' -ra.
Tauna to mepangala' hi Ana' Alata'ala, uma-ra rahuku'. Aga tauna to uma mepangala', monoa' -mi kanahuku' -ra Alata'ala, apa' uma-ra dota mepangala' hi Ana' Alata'ala to Hadudua toei.
Rata-imi hi dunia' mpokeni baja hi hawe'ea tauna. Tapi' manusia' mpokono-pi bengi ngkai baja, apa' dada'a kehi-ra. Toe pai' Alata'ala mpohuku' -ra.
Hawe'ea tauna to mpobabehi kehi to dada'a, mpokahuku' baja. Uma-ra dota rata hi kabajaa-na, bona neo' mpai' kahiloa kehi-ra to dada'a.
Tauna to monoa' kehi-ra rata hi kabajaa-na, bona kahiloa po'ingku-ra pai' bona monoto-mi kampotuku' -ra konoa Alata'ala.
Oti toe, Yesus pai' ana'guru-na hilou hi tana' Yudea. Bula-ra hi ree, meniu' -ra mponiu' tauna to doko' jadi' topetuku' -na.
Nto'u toe, Yohanes Topeniu' ko'ia-i ratarungku'. Meniu' -i hi ngata Ainon, uma molaa ngkai ngata Salim, apa' hi ree wori' ue. Butu eo-na tauna hilou mpopeniu' hi Yohanes.
Rala-na ha'eo, ba hangkuja dua ana'guru Yohanes momehono' hante to Yahudi mpomehonoi' ada peniu' rala agama.
Hilou-ramo hi Yohanes ra'uli' -ki: "Guru, nukiwoi-pidi wengi tauna to dohe-ta hi dipo ue Yordan, to nutudo' -kakaie? Oe-imi ria, meniu' wo'o-i-hawo, pai' kawoo-woria' tauna lou hi Hi'a!"
Na'uli' Yohanes: "Kita' manusia' uma mporata napa-napa ane uma pewai' -na Alata'ala.
Ni'epe moto-mi wengi lolita-ku. Ku'uli': aku' bela Magau' Topetolo'. Pai' -a tumai-kuwo-le, tumai meri'ulu ngkai Hi'a mporodo-ki ohea-na.

"Ane rapa' -na hi susa' poncamokoa, topemua' -di-hana to jadi' poko-na, apa' hi'a-mi pue' tobine to rapemuai'. Ane bale-na topemua' -hawo-le, mokore-i mpopanene' -wadi-ki-hawo pai' mpe'epei hawa' -na. Pai' goe' -i mpo'epe libu' topemua'. Wae-mi-kuwo aku' -e, aku' hewa bale-na topemua'. Goe' -a, pai' gana kagoea' -ku, apa' kawoo-woria' tauna mpotuku' -i Yesus.
Hi'a-mi to kana tepaiwongko tuwu' -na, pai' aku' kana tepai'ara' tuwu' -ku."

Yesus, Hi'a-mi to tumai ngkai suruga, pai' meliu tuwu' -na ngkai hawe'ea. Tauna to ngkai dunia', bate manusia' biasa, pai' lolita-na mpololita napa-napa to jadi' hi dunia'. Aga Yesus, ngkai suruga-i-hana, pai' meliu tuwu' -na ngkai hawe'ea.
Lolita-na mpololita napa to nahilo pai' to na'epe, tapi' uma ria to mpangala' lolita-na.
Aga hema to mpangala' lolita-na mpo'uli': "Bate makono-hanale lolita Alata'ala-e."
Apa' Hi'a-mi to nasuro Alata'ala mpohowa' lolita-na, pai' Alata'ala mpowai' -i Inoha' Tomoroli' hante uma ria huka' -na.
Alata'ala to Tuama mpoka'ahi' Ana' -na, pai' nawai' -imi hawe'ea kuasa-na.

Tauna to mepangala' hi Ana' -na toei, mporata-ramo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na. Tauna to uma mengkoru hi Ana' -na toei, uma-ra mporata katuwua'. Mporata roe Alata'ala lau-rada duu' kahae-hae-na.
To Parisi mpo'epe kawoo-woria' tauna to hilou mpopeniu' hi Yesus jadi' topetuku' -na, alaa-na meliu-pi kawori' -na topetuku' -na Yesus ngkai topetuku' -na Yohanes Topeniu'.
(Kakoo-kono-na, bela-hawo Yesus to meniu', ana'guru-na to meniu'.)
Jadi', kana'inca-na Yesus kara'epe-nami to Parisi kareba toe, malai-imi ngkai tana' Yudea hilou nculii' hi tana' Galilea.
Rala pomako' -na tohe'e, kana mpotara tana' Samaria-i.

Neo' tebua' -mi eo-na, rata-imi hi ngata to Samaria to rahanga' Sikar, uma molaa ngkai tana' to napewai' Yakub owi hi Yusuf ana' -na. Hi mali ngata toe, ria hameha' buwu to rahanga' buwu Yakub. Mohura-imi Yesus hi wiwi' buwu toe, apa' lenge' -imi momako'.
Ana'guru-na kaliliu hilou hi ngata me'oli pongkoni'. Ko'ia mahae, rata hadua tobine to Samaria tumai ntomu'. Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Totina, wai' -a-kuwo ue ku'inu."
Konce tobine toei, apa' biasa-na to Yahudi morungku mposigalo-raka to Samaria. Toe pai' na'uli': "Iko to Yahudi, aku' to Samaria-a. Napa pai' daho' -ko mperapii' -a ue?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane ke nu'inca kabohe rasi' to nawai' Alata'ala, pai' ane nu'inca-a kahema-ku Aku' to mperapii' -ko ue, tantu merapi' wo'o-ko-kowo hi Aku', pai' kuwai' -ko ue to tuwu'."
Na'uli' tobine toei: "Ngkaiapa-kona ue to tuwu' to nu'uli' tetu-e, bo uma-di ria potolou' -nue, hiaa' buwu toi monala-hana.

Buwu toi sosora ngkai Yakub, ntu'a-kai owi. Hi'a nginu ue ngkai rei moto-i-hawo, wae wo'o ana' -na pai' porewua-na. Ha nu'uli' -kona meliu kabohe tuwu' -nu ngkai Yakub, pai' ma'ala-ko mpewai' ue to meliu kalompe' -na ngkai ue buwu toi-e?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Hawe'ea tauna to nginu ue ngkai buwu toi, ngkamara nculii' -ra-pidi mpai'.

Tapi' hema to mpo'inu ue to kuwai' -raka, uma-rapa ngkamara duu' kahae-hae-na. Apa' ue to kuwai' -raka toe, jadi' ue tuwu' to mo'ili ncuu hi rala nono-ra-- batua-na, mporata-ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na."
Na'uli' tobine toei: "Ane wae, wai' -ama-kuna ue tetu, bona uma-apa ngkamara oa', pai' uma-apa mingki' tumai ntomu' butu eo-na hi rehe'i."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Koi' ulu, kio' tomane-nu, pai' -ko nculii' tumai."
Na'uli' tobine toei: "Uma-kuna motomanei-a." Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono-di,
apa' lima ngkani-mokole motomanei-e, pai' tomane-nu tetu-e lou, bela tomane-nu moto. Jadi', makono lia lolita-nu we'i-e."
Na'uli' tobine toei: "Ei', nabi-ko-tawo'!
Kai' to Samaria, mepue' hi bulu' tohe'i moto-ka-kaiwo, hi bulu' pepuea' ntu'a-kai. Hiaa' koi' to Yahudi mpo'uli', kana hi Yerusalem-wadi pepuea' to makono."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Pangala' -mi lolita-ku toi: Rata mpai' tempo-na, uma-pi wule' hi Yerusalem-wadi tauna mpopue' Alata'ala, uma wo'o hi bulu' toi-wadi.
Koi' to Samaria, uma ni'incai kahema-na to nipue'. Kai' to Yahudi, ki'inca kahema-na to kipue', apa' ria pojanci Alata'ala to mpo'uli' kalompea' manusia' mehuwu ngkai laintongo' to Yahudi.

Tapi' rata mpai' tempo-na-- pai' toi-mi tempo-na-- tauna to mepue' mpu'u-mpu'u hi Alata'ala to Tuama, kana mpopue' -i hante kuasa Inoha' Tomoroli', pai' ntuku' ohea to makono. Pepue' to hewa toe-mi to napokono Alata'ala to Tuama.
Alata'ala, Hi'a-mi Inoha'. Jadi', tauna to mpopue' -i, kana mepue' hante kuasa Inoha' Tomoroli' pai' ntuku' ohea to makono."
Na'uli' tobine toei: "Io', to ku'inca-na, rata mpai' Magau' Topetolo', to rahanga' Kristus. Ane rata-ipi mpai', Hi'a to mpakanoto omea hi kita'."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku' -mile toi-e, to mpololitai-ko wae-e lau."

Bula-ra mololita, rata-ramo ana'guru-na ngkai ngata. Konce-ra mpohilo Yesus mpololitai hadua tobine. Aga uma haduaa to daho' mpopekune' tobine toei ba napa paraluu-na. Uma wo'o-ra daho' mpekune' Yesus ba napa pai' napololitai-i.
Ngkai ree, tobine toei mpalahii-mi pontomua' -na hi ree, ncaliu hilou hi ngata mpo'uli' -raka hingka ngata-na:
"Kita hilou mpohilo tauna to mpolohu-ka hawe'ea gau' -ku. Meka' ba lue' Hi'a mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo' -e!"
Toe pai' hilou-ramo hi mali ngata doko' mpohirua' -ki Yesus.
Lingku' -na tobine toe hilou hi rala ngata, ana'guru-na Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Guru, mai-tamo ngkoni'."
Aga na'uli' Yesus: "Ria-ka-kuna koni' -ku to uma ni'incai."
Momepekune' -ramo ana'guru-na ra'uli': "Hema-die to mpowai' -i pongkoni' -e?"
Toe pai' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Pongkoni' -kule, mpotuku' konoa Pue' Ala to mposuro-a, pai' mposipolea pobago to nawai' -ka.
Koi' biasa mpo'uli' lolita bulawa toi: Opo' mula-damo pai' lako' mepae-ta. Aga Aku' mpo'uli' -kokoi: Naa-dile, oe lau bonea to mperenene-damo pae-na pai' to hangaa rapepae-damo.
Tauna to mepae bate mporata gaji' -ra, alaa-na topepae pai' to ntuja' goe' hangkaa-ngkania. Wua' to rapepae, batua-na, tauna to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
Jadi', makono lolita bulawa to mpo'uli': 'Kahadua-na to ntuja', kahadua-na to mpepae.'
Kuhubui-koi mpepae to bela tinuja' -ni. Tau ntani' -na to mpotuja', koi' to mpepae wua' pobago-ra."
Hi ngata to Samaria toe, wori' tauna to mepangala' hi Yesus, apa' ra'epe lolita tobine toe we'i to mpo'uli': "Nalohu-maka hawe'ea gau' -ku."
Jadi', kahilou-rami mpohirua' -ki Yesus, pai' raperapi' bona mehani-i hi ngata-ra. Mehani mpu'u-imi hi ree romengia.
Ngkai ree, kawoo-woria' tena pue' ngata to mepangala' hi Yesus, apa' ra'epe moto-mi lolita-na.

Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki tobine toei: "Wae lau kipangala' mpu'u-mi, uma muntu' ngkai lolita-nu iko-wadi. Apa' ki'epe ntilinga moto-mi lolita-na, pai' ki'inca Kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi Magau' Tompohore manusia' ngkai huku' jeko' -ra."
Timpaliu romengia hi Samaria, Yesus mpokaliliu pomako' -na hilou hi tana' Galilea.
Ria hangkani Yesus mpo'uli': "Hadua nabi uma biasa rabila' hi ngata-na moto."

Jadi', karata-na hi Galilea, tauna mpotarima-i hante kagoe' nono-ra, apa' ria-ra wengi hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe Paskah, pai' mpohilo hante mata-ra moto-mi hawe'ea anu mekoncehi to nababehi hi ria nto'u toe.
Rata wo'o-imi Yesus hi ngata Kana hi Galilea, hi ngata pompobalia' -na ue jadi' anggur. Uma molaa ngkai Kana toe, ria hadua topohawa' hi ngata Kapernaum, to mobago hi tomi raja, peda' gaga ana' -na.

Kana'epe-na topohawa' toei karata-na Yesus hi Galilea ngkai Yudea, hilou-imi hi ngata Kana mpohirua' -ki, na'uli' -ki: "Pue', hilou-ta hi Kapernaum, nupaka'uri' -ka-kuwo ana' -ku, apa' neo' mate-imi."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Ane uma-koi mpohilo tanda mekoncehi pai' anu mobaraka', uma oa' -koi mepangala'!"
Na'uli' topohawa' toei: "Pue', hilou-tamo sohi', mate mpai' ana' -ku!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Nculii' -moko, mo'uri' -imi ana' -nu." Napangala' mpu'u-mi topohawa' toei lolita Yesus, pai' nculii' mpu'u-imi-hawo.
Hi lengko ohea-i-pidi, ba hangkuja dua batua-na mpotomu-i, ra'uli' -ki: "Mo'uri' -imile ana' -nue!"
Napekune' -ramo: "Jaa hangkuja-i mo'uri' -e?" Ra'uli': "Wengi, ba jaa satu mpo'eo tu, uma-ipi ngkelengi'."
Nakiwoi-mi topohawa', nto'u-na toe mpu'u-mi wengi Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Mo'uri' -imi ana' -nu." Ngkai ree, topohawa' toei pai' hira' hantomia, mepangala' -ramo hi Yesus.
Toe-mi tanda mekoncehi karongkani-na to nababehi Yesus hi Galilea karata-na ngkai Yudea.
Oti toe, nculii' -imi Yesus hilou hi Yerusalem bona mpokaralai-i eo bohe to Yahudi hi ria.
Hi Yerusalem, mohu' hi wobo' wala to rahanga' Wobo' Bima, ria wuhu', hi rala basa Yahudi hanga' -na Betesda. Ntololikia wuhu' toe, ria lima meha' pengkawinaraa.
Hi retu, wori' tauna to peda'. Ria towero, ria tokejo, ria topungku, ntora turu hi pengkawinaraa, ((mpopea kamojago-na ue wuhu'.
Apa' pontu-na ria mala'eka Pue' mana'u tumai hi wuhu' toe mpojago ue-na. Pai' hema to ri'ulu mehompo hi rala wuhu' nto'u ue-na mojago, mo'uri' -i ngkai haki' to natodohaka.))
Ria hi ree hadua tomane, tolu mpulu' walu mpae-imi peda'.
Yesus mpohilo-i turu hi ree, pai' na'inca kamahae-nami peda'. Napekune' -i: "Dota-ko mo'uri'?"
Na'uli' topeda' toei: "Pue', apa' uma-kuwo hema to mpokeni-a hilou rala wuhu' nto'u mojago ue-na. Ke lako' hilou-a-kuwo, to ntani' -na wo'o-mi to mpori'uluhi-a."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Memata-moko, lulu-mi ali' -nu, pai' mako' -moko."
Kamo'uri' -nami tau toei, nalulu-mi ali' -na, pai' -i momako' -mi. Tohe'e jadi' hi Eo Sabat, eo pepuea' -ra to Yahudi.
Toe pai' topoparenta to Yahudi mpokamaro tauna to lako' mo'uri' toei, ra'uli' -ki: "Eo Sabat-hanale toe-e lau! Uma-ko ma'ala ngkeni ali' -nu."
Na'uli' tauna toei: "Apa' nahubui-a-kuwo tauna to mpaka'uri' -a we'i, na'uli' -ka: 'Lulu-mi ali' -nu pai' mako' -moko.'"
Rapekune' -i: "Hema-i to mpohubui-ko ngkeni ali' -nue?"
Tapi' uma na'incai kahema-na to mpaka'uri' -i, apa' Yesus uma-pi ria hi ree, mpolia' hilou-imi hi olo' tauna to wori'.
Uma mahae ngkai ree, Yesus mpohirua' -ki tauna toei hi Tomi Alata'ala, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Mo'uri' -moko, neo' -pi-hawo mpobabehi jeko', bona neo' mpai' narumpa' -ko ba napa-napa to meliu kada'a-na."
Ngkai ree, hilou-imi tauna toei mpohirua' -raka topoparenta to Yahudi, na'uli' -raka Kayesus-na to mpaka'uri' -i.
Toe pai' topoparenta to Yahudi ntepu'u mpobalinai' Yesus, apa' mepaka'uri' -i-hana hi Eo Sabat.
Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Tuama-ku mobago duu' eo toi, pai' Aku' wo'o kana mobago."

Ngkai ree, rahuduwukui-mi topoparenta to Yahudi mpali' ohea-ra mpopatehi-i. Apa' uma wule' kampotiboki-na ada hi Eo Sabat, tapi' na'uli' wo'o-hana ka'Alata'ala-na Tuama-na; jadi', napopohibalia-hana woto-na hante Alata'ala.

Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Aku' Ana' Alata'ala, uma-a bisa mobago ntuku' konoa-ku moto. Muntu' to kuhilo ngkai Tuama-ku, toe-mi to kupobago. Napa-napa bago Tuama-ku, tetu wo'o-kuwo bago-ku.

Apa' Tuama-ku mpoka'ahi' -a, pai' napopohiloi-a hawe'ea to napobago. Kakupaka'uri' -na topeda' toe ngone ria, pai' kubabehi wo'o mpai' pobago to meliu kabohe-na ngkai toe, alaa-na konce mpu'u-mokoi mpai'.
Hewa Tuama-ku mpopemata tomate pai' mpowai' -ra katuwua', wae wo'o Aku' mpowai' katuwua' hi hema-hema to kupelihi.
Tuama-ku moto uma mpobotuhi kara-kara manusia'. Hawe'ea kuasa pompobotuhi natonu-mi hi Aku' Ana' -na.
Nababehi toe, bona hawe'ea tauna mpobila' -a hewa pompobila' -ra Tuama-ku. Hema to uma mpobila' -a, uma wo'o-ra mpobila' Tuama-ku to mposuro-a.

"Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Hema to mpo'epe lolita-ku pai' -ra mepangala' hi Pue' Ala to mposuro-a, bate mporata-ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na. Uma-ra mpai' rahuku' sabana jeko' -ra. Tebahaka-ramo ngkai kamatea, mporata-ramo katuwua'.
Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Rata mpai' tempo-na-- pai' toi-mi tempo-na-- tauna tomate mpo'epe libu' Ana' Alata'ala, pai' hira' to mpo'epe mporata katuwua' to bo'u.
Apa' hewa Tuama-ku mobaraka' mpowai' katuwua', wae wo'o nawai' -a baraka' mpowai' katuwua'.
Nawai' wo'o-a kuasa mpobotuhi kara-kara manusia', apa' Aku' Ana' Manusia'.
"Neo' nipokakonce lolita-ku toi, apa' rata mpai' tempo-na hawe'ea tauna to hi rala daeo' mpo'epe libu' -ku,
pai' -ra memata ngkai daeo' -ra. To mpobabehi gau' to lompe' rapopemata bona mporata katuwua' to lompe'. To mpobabehi gau' to dada'a rapopemata bona rahuku'.

"Aku', uma-a bisa mpobabehi napa-napa ntuku' konoa-ku moto. Kubotuhi ntuku' to nahawai' -ka Alata'ala. Pobotuhi-ku monoa', apa' uma-a mpotuku' dota-ku moto, mpotuku' -a kadota-na Pue' Ala to mposuro-a.
"Ane ke Aku' moto-wadi to mpo'uli' ka'Aku' -na suro Alata'ala, pai' uma ria tau ntani' -na to mposabii' -a, uma ni'incai ba makono lolita-ku ba uma-di.
Tapi' ria moto kahadua-na to mposabii' -a, pai' ku'inca kamakono-na posabi' -na toe.
Koi' mpohubui doo-ni hilou hi Yohanes Topeniu' wengi, pai' na'uli' -miraka posabi' -na. Napa to na'uli' toe, bate makono omea.
Aga kakoo-kono-na uma kuparaluu posabi' ngkai manusia'. Kupopokiwoii-koi lolita-na Yohanes toe-e, bona mporata-koi kalompea'.
Yohanes toei hewa lampu to mehini pai' ngkeni kabajaa-na hi koi'. Pai' koi', goe' lia moto-koi mpo'epe lolita-na. Aga kagoe' -ni tetu hampai' -wadi.

"Aga Aku', ria-ka-kuna sabi' to mpakanoto kahema-ku, pai' sabi' toei meliu ngkai posabi' -na Yohanes. Ane ninaa lompe' pobago-ku, toe-mile to mposabii' kahema-kue. Napa to kupobago hewa toe lau, pobago to nahawai' -ka Tuama-ku bona kuposipolea. Pobago-ku toi-mi to mpakanoto ka'Aku' -na suro Tuama-ku.
Pai' meliu ngkai toe, Tuama-ku to mposuro-a, Hi'a moto-mi jadi' sabi' -ku mpo'uli' kahema-ku. Tapi' koi', ko'ia hangkania ni'epei libu' -na, ko'ia nihiloi lence-na.
Lolita-na uma nitimamahi hi rala nono-ni, apa' uma-koi mepangala' hi Aku' to nasuro.
Koi' mpewulihi' ihi' Buku Tomoroli', apa' ni'uli' mporata-koi katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na ngkai Buku Tomoroli' toe. Hiaa' Buku Tomoroli' moto wo'o-mi to mpotompo'wiwi-a.
Aga nau' wae, uma oa' -koi dota tumai hi Aku', bona mporata katuwua' to lompe' toe.
"Uma-a mpopebila' hi manusia'.
Apa' ku'inca moto-koi, ka'uma-na ria ahi' -ni hi Alata'ala.
Katumai-ku toi, mpokeni-a hanga' -na Tuama-ku, aga uma-koi dota mpotarima-a. Ane ria to tumai mpokeni hanga' -ra moto-wadi, nitarima lau-ra.
Beiwa kamepangala' -ni hi Aku' -e, apa' doko' rabila' doo-wadi-koi, uma-koi mpali' pebila' to ngkai Alata'ala to Hadudua.
Aga neo' ni'uli' wae, Aku' mpai' to mpakilu-koi hi Tuama-ku. Nabi Musa moto-mi to mpakilu-koi. Ni'uli' -koina ngkai petuku' -ni hi hawa' Musa pai' -koi mporata kalompea'.
Tapi' ane bongko nipangala' mpu'u-i Musa, tantu nipangala' wo'o-a Aku' -e, apa' napa to na'uki' Musa, Aku' -mi kadungkua-na.
Bangku' to na'uki' Musa uma nipangala', peliu-liu-nami ka'uma-na nipangala' lolita-ku."
Oti toe, hilou-imi Yesus hi dipo Rano Galilea, to rahanga' wo'o Rano Tiberias.
Wori' lia tauna mpotuku' -i, apa' rahilo hawe'ea tanda mekoncehi to nababehi, mpaka'uri' topeda'.
Manake' -i lou hi panapa bulu' hante ana'guru-na, pai' mohura-imi hi ree.
Nto'u toe, neo' rata-mi eo bohe agama Yahudi to rahanga' Eo Paskah.
Yesus mponaa ntololikia-na, nahilo-hawo, mo'iko-ra-damo tauna tumai mpomohui' -i. Na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Filipus: "Hiapa-ta me'oli pongkoni', tapokoni' -raka tauna to wori' toera lau?"
(Kakoo-kono-na, na'inca ami' moto-mi napa mpai' to nababehi. Napekune' hewa toe hi Filipus, apa' doko' naponciloi pepangala' -na.)
Na'uli' Filipus: "Nau' ro'atu doi pera' tapope'oli-ki pongkoni' pai' butu dua-ra tawai' hore hangkedi' -wadi, uma oa' hono'."
Ngkai ree, hadua ana'guru-na to rahanga' Andreas, ompi' -na Simon Petrus, mpo'uli':
"Ohe'i hadua ana' to mobokui lima meha' roti pai' tinapa uru roma'a, aga napa-mile kalaua-na hi tauna to wori' hewa toe-e lau?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Hubui-ramo mohura!" Jadi' mohura-ramo hi kowo' raponcawa ali', apa' wori' kowo' hi ree. Hi olo' ntodea toe, ria ba lima ncobu paka' tomane.
Ngkai ree, na'ala' -mi roti, na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala, pai' nabagi-bagi hi tauna to wori' to mohura. Hewa toe wo'o pompobabehi-na hante bau' uru. Ngkoni' -ramo omea duu' -ra bohu.
Bohu-ramo omea, na'uli' Yesus hi ana'guru-na: "Rumpu-koi toro-na, bona neo' ria to rakerei."
Rarumpu mpu'u-mi, hampulu' roluncu-pi toro-na ngkai lima meha' roti to rakoni' tauna to wori' we'i.
Karahilo-na ntodea tanda mekoncehi tohe'e, momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Hi'a mpu'u-mi-tawo' nabi to rajanci owi-e, to ra'uli' rata mpai' hi dunia' toi-e!"
Jadi', ria patuju-ra doko' mpewuku-i jadi' magau' -ra. Kana'inca-na Yesus patuju-ra toe, malai-imi ngkai ree hilou hi bulu' -na.
Ncimonou' tohe'e, mana'u-ramo ana'guru-na hilou hi rano mpopea-i.
Rapopea duu' mobengi, ko'ia oa' -i rata. Jadi', mosakaya moto-ramo hilou mpotoa' ngata Kapernaum.
Bula-ra mosakaya toe, rata ngolu' bohe mporumpa' -ra, alaa-na bohe balumpa hi rano.
Lima ba ono kilo-ramo ngkai talinti, rahilo-rawo, etu-imi tumai Yesus momako' hi lolo ue mpototopa-ra. Aga uma ra'incai Kayesus-na. Me'eka' lia-ramo.
Na'uli' Yesus: "Neo' me'eka'! Aku' -mile toi-e."
Mpo'epe toe-di, goe' -ramo mpodoa Yesus hi rala sakaya. Pesua' -na Yesus hi rala sakaya, rata-ramo hi wiwi' talinti to ratoa'.

Kampeneo-na, wori' tauna hi dipo rano mpopali' Yesus, ra'uli': "Hiapa-imidie? Uma-idi mohawi' sakaya dohe ana'guru-nae ngone. Hiaa' uma ria sakaya ntani' -na hi rei ngone, muntu' sakaya to rahawi' ana'guru-na-wadi."
Ngkai ree, rata wo'o tauna ngkai ngata Tiberias hi rala sakaya-ra, pai' -ra mencore mohu' hi pongkonia' -ra ntodea wengi, to mpokoni' roti to nagane' Pue' Yesus.
Kara'inca-na ntodea ka'uma-napi ria Yesus hi ree, ntahawe' ana'guru-na uma wo'o-pi ria, mosakaya wo'o-ramo-rawo hilou hi Kapernaum mpopali' -i.
Karata-ra ntodea hi dipo rano mpohirua' -ki Yesus, rapekune' -i: "Nto'uma-ko rata hi rehe'i-e, Guru?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Ku'inca moto-le patuju-ni mpali' -ae. Uma ba kani'inca-na batua-na tanda mekoncehi to kubabehi. Nipali' -ale apa' bohu-mokoi kupokoni'.

Neo' -koi mobago mpali' pongkoni' to sohi' oti pai' waha'. Mobago-koi mpali' pongkoni' to uma ria kawahaa' -na pai' to mpowai' katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na. Aku' Ana' Manusia' to mpowai' -koi pongkoni' tohe'e, apa' Alata'ala to Tuama mpotudo' ka'Aku' -nami to napelihi pai' to napokono."
Mepekune' -ra ntodea: "Napa to kana kipobago bona pobago-kai ntuku' konoa Alata'ala?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Toi-mile pobago to napokono Alata'ala-e: mepangala' hi Aku' to nasuro."
Ra'uli' wo'o-mi ntodea: "Ane wae, tanda napa to nupopohiloi-kakai, bona kipangala' -ko kangkai Alata'ala-na mpu'u-ko? Napa to nubabehi?

Wai' -ka-kaiwo pongkoni', hewa to rakoni' ntu'a-ta owi. Bula-ra hi papada to wao', ngkoni' -ra pongkoni' to rahanga' manna, hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli': 'Nawai' -ra pongkoni' ngkai suruga.'"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Bela nabi Musa owi to mpowai' pongkoni' ngkai suruga. Tempo toi-e, Tuama-ku-hana to mpowai' -koi pongkoni' to mpu'u-mpu'u ngkai suruga.
Pongkoni' to nawai' Alata'ala, batua-na, to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga pai' to mpowai' katuwua' hi manusia'."
Ra'uli' -ki ntodea: "Ane wae, wai' -ka-kaiwo pongkoni' tetu butu-butu eo-na!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku' toi-mi pongkoni' to mpowai' katuwua'. Hema to tumai hi Aku' uma-rapa mo'oro', pai' hema to mepangala' hi Aku' uma-rapa ngkamara, duu' kahae-hae-na.
Aga hewa to ku'uli' we'i, nau' nihilo-ama, uma oa' -a nipangala'.
Hawe'ea tauna to nawai' -maka Tuama-ku, bate tumai hi Aku'. Pai' hema-hema to tumai hi Aku', bate kutarima-i pai' uma-i kupopalai.
Apa' tumai-a ngkai suruga, uma mpobabehi konoa-ku moto. Tumai-a mpobabehi konoa-na Alata'ala to mposuro-a.
Toi-mi konoa-na: bona ngkai hawe'ea tauna to nawai' -ka, neo' mpai' ria haduaa to moronto, bate kupopemata-ra omea hi Eo Kiama.
Toi-mi konoa Tuama-ku: bona hawe'ea to mpohilo pai' to mepangala' hi Aku' Ana' -na mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na, pai' kupopemata-ra hi Eo Kiama."
Ngkai ree, mparangkunutia-ramo to Yahudi, apa' na'uli' -hana Yesus, Hi'a-mi pongkoni' to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga.
Momepololitai-ramo ra'uli': "Ah, Hi'a toe-le Yesus, ana' Yusuf. Ta'inca moto tina-na pai' tuama-na. Napa-di-hana pai' na'uli' ngkai suruga-ie?"
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Neo' -koi ngkunuti.
Uma ria haduaa to ma'ala tumai hi Aku', ane uma-ra nakeni Tuama-ku to mposuro-a. Pai' kupopemata-ra omea hi Eo Kiama.
Hi rala sura nabi-nabi owi te'uki' hewa toi: 'Alata'ala mpotudui' hawe'ea topetuku' -na.' Jadi', hawe'ea tauna to mpo'epe pai' mpotarima tudui' -na Tuama-ku, bate tumai-ra hi Aku'.
Aga neo' ni'uli' wae, ria mpu'u-ramo to mpohilo Tuama-ku. Muntu' Aku' -wadi to mpohilo-i, apa' Aku' ngkai Alata'ala-a-kuna.
Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: hema to mepangala' hi Aku', mporata-ramo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
Aku' -mi pongkoni' to mpowai' katuwua'.
"Pongkoni' to rahanga' manna to rakoni' ntu'a-ni owi hi papada to wao' uma mpowai' katuwua', apa' mate omea moto-ra.
Aga uma hewa toe ane pongkoni' to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga. Hema-hema to ngkoni' pongkoni' toi, uma-ra mate.

Aku' toi-mi pongkoni' to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga, pongkoni' to tuwu'. Tauna to ngkoni' pongkoni' toi tuwu' duu' kahae-hae-na. Pongkoni' to tuwu' tohe'i, batua-na woto-ku to kupewai' bona manusia' mporata katuwua'."
Kara'epe-na to Yahudi lolita-na Yesus toe, momehono' -ramo himpau hira', ra'uli': "Beiwa-i ma'ala mpewai' woto-na hi kita' bona takoni' -e?"
Toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Ane uma nikoni' woto-ku, Aku' Ana' Manusia', pai' uma ni'inu raa' -ku, uma-koi mporata katuwua' kao' -ni.
Tauna to ngkoni' woto-ku pai' nginu raa' -ku, mporata-ramo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na, pai' kupopemata-ra hi Eo Kiama.
Apa' woto-ku pongkoni' mpu'u, pai' raa' -ku ininu mpu'u.
Tauna to ngkoni' woto-ku pai' nginu raa' -ku, tida-ra hintuwu' hante Aku', pai' Aku' hante hira'.
"Tuama-ku to mposuro-a, Hi'a-mi pehupaa' katuwua', pai' Aku' tuwu' ngkai Hi'a. Wae wo'o tauna to ngkoni' woto-ku, mporata-ra katuwua' ngkai Aku'.

Toi mpu'u-mile pongkoni' to mana'u ngkai suruga-e, uma hewa manna to rakoni' ntu'a-ni owi. Nau' -ra ngkoni' manna toe, bate mate oa' -ra. Tapi' tauna to ngkoni' pongkoni' toi-e, tuwu' -ra duu' kahae-hae-na."
Yesus mpololita hawe'ea toe nto'u petudui' -na hi tomi posampayaa hi Kapernaum.
Kampo'epe-ra lolita Yesus toe we'i, wori' topetuku' -na mpo'uli': "Ah! Mokoro rahi tudui' toe-e. Hema mpai' to mpokule' mpotuku'!"
Ntaa' na'inca moto-di Yesus kangkunuti-ra topetuku' -nae. Toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ha nipokedi' nono mpo'epe tudui' -ku we'i?
Ane wae-di, beiwa mpai' ane nihilo-apa, Aku' Ana' Manusia', ngkahe' nculii' hilou hi po'ohaa' -ku ami'?
Inoha' Alata'ala-hana to mpowai' katuwua'. Kuasa manusia' uma ria kalaua-na. Lolita to kupohowa' -kokoi mehuwu ngkai Inoha' Alata'ala pai' mpowai' katuwua'.

Aga nau' wae, ria moto-koi hantongo' to uma mepangala'." Yesus mpo'uli' hewa toe apa' na'inca ami' -mi ngkai lomo' -na kahema-ra to uma mepangala' hi Hi'a, pai' na'inca wo'o kahema-na mpai' to mpobalu' -i hi bali' -na.
Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Toe pai' ku'uli' -mi we'i, uma haduaa to ma'ala tumai hi Aku' ane uma-ra napiliu Tuama-ku."
Ntepu'u ngkai tempo toe, wori' topetuku' -na Yesus mpalahii-i. Uma-rapa dota mpotuku' -i.
Jadi', mepekune' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua, na'uli': "Ha malai wo'o-koi mpai' koi' -e?"
Na'uli' Simon Petrus: "Ha hilou hi hema-makai mpai' Pue'? Iko-wadi to mpohowa' lolita to mpowai' katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
Kipangala' -mi pai' ki'inca ka'Iko-na Suro to moroli' ngkai Alata'ala."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku' moto-mile to mpelihi-koi to hampulu' rodua toi-e. Nau' wae, hadua ngkai koi' mewali seta mpai'."
To natoa' Yesus, Yudas ana' Simon Iskariot. Apa' nau' Yudas hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua, hi'a mpai' to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -na.
Oti toe, Yesus modao' hi tana' Galilea. Uma-ipi dota hilou hi tana' Yudea, apa' topoparenta to Yahudi hi ria doko' mpopatehi-i.
Nto'u toe, neo' rata-mi eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga' Posusa' Pobamaru'.
Jadi', ompi' -na Yesus mpobawai-i hilou hi Yudea mpokaralai eo bohe toe, ra'uli' -ki: "Neo' -hawo ntora hi rehe'i! Hilou-tamo hi Yudea, bona topetuku' -nu mpohilo anu mekoncehi to nubabehi.
Uma-ko mpai' jadi' tau bohe ane ntora hi rehe'i-wadi-ko. Ane mpobabehi anu mekoncehi mpu'u-ko, popohiloi hawe'ea tauna hi dunia'!"
Hewa toe-mi lolita-ra ompi' -na Yesus, apa' uma wo'o-ra-rawo mepangala' hi Hi'a.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ko'ia rata tempo-na kupopehuwu woto-ku. Ane koi' -koina, uma beiwa ba nto'uma-koi hilou hi Yerusalem,
apa' uma ria tauna to mpokahuku' -koi. Aku' -e, rapokahuku' -a-kuna tauna to dada'a hi dunia' toi, apa' ntora ku'uli' -raka kadada'a kehi-ra.
Meri'ulu-mokoi hilou hi posusaa' toe ria. Aku', ko'ia-a-kuna hilou, apa' ko'ia rata tempo-ku."
Wae-mi lolita Yesus hi ompi' -na, pai' tida moto-imi hi Galilea.
Hilou mpu'u-ramo ompi' -na Yesus hi Yerusalem bona mpokaralai Posusa' Pobamaru' hi ria. Ntaa' metuku' bongo moto-idi-hawo Yesus-e, aga hadudua-na bona neo' ra'incai ntodea.
Hi posusaa' toe, topoparenta to Yahudi ntora mpopali' -i, ra'uli': "Hiapa-imidi Yesus-e?"
Pai' ntodea wo'o, mparanusi-ramo mpotompo'wiwi-i. Ria-ra to mpo'uli': "Tauna to lompe' moto-i-hawo." Hantongo' wo'o mpo'uli': "Uma-di! Topebagiu-i-hana!"
Tapi' uma haduaa to daho' mpolonto', apa' me'eka' wo'o-ra wa hi topoparenta to Yahudi.
Pentongoa' posusa' tohe'e, Yesus mesua' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, pai' natepu'u-mi metudui'.
Konce-ra topoparenta to Yahudi mpo'epe tudui' -na, ra'uli': "Beiwa pai' na'inca ihi' Buku Tomoroli', bo uma-i-hawo mosikola-e?"
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "To kutudui' -kokoile, tudui' ngkai Alata'ala to mposuro-a, bela tudui' -ku moto.
Hema to doko' mpobabehi konoa Alata'ala, ra'inca mpai' kangkaiapa-na tudui' -ku toi, ba ngkai Alata'ala mpu'u-di ba lolita-ku moto-wadi.
Tauna to mpokeni lolita-na moto, mpope'une' -i-wadi. Tapi' tauna to mpali' karabilaa' -na Alata'ala to mposuro-i, tauna to monoa' -i, uma ria pebagiua-na.
Nabi Musa owi mpowai' -koi Atura Pue'. Tapi' uma-koi ria haduaa to mpotuku' Atura toe. Napa pai' doko' nipatehi-a?"
Ra'uli' ntodea: "Wuli-ko! Hema to doko' mpopatehi-ko?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Mekehele-koi, apa' mpaka'uri' -a tauna hi Eo Sabat.

Hiaa' koi' wo'o mobago moto hi Eo Sabat ane mpobabehi-koi ada petini'. Nabi Musa owi mpohubui-koi mpotini' ana' -ni. (Tapi' kakoo-kono-na ada petini' toe ngkai ntu'a-ta owi to meri'ulu ngkai Musa, bela ngkai Musa moto.) Ane ria ana' -ni to kana ratini' hi Eo Sabat, bate nitini' moto-i.
Jadi', ane metini' -koi hi Eo Sabat bona neo' ntiboki Atura Musa, napa pai' nikaroe-a apa' mpaka'uri' -a tauna hi Eo Sabat bona hobo' woto-na lompe'?
Neo' ranaa to kahiloa hi mali-na-wadi. Pakanoa' powile-ni bona nihilo napa to makono."
Kara'epe-na pue' ngata Yerusalem lolita-na Yesus toe, ingu' -ramo. Ria-ra to mpo'uli': "Ha bela tauna toe-imi mai to rapali' pangkeni-ta, doko' rapatehi-e?
Hiaa' he'e-imi mai metudui' hante uma ria kakoo-koroa' -na, pai' uma hema to mpokamaro-i. Ba lue' ra'inca lau-mi pangkeni-ta Kahi'a-na Magau' Topetolo' -e?
Aga uma-hawo masipato' Kahi'a-na Magau' Topetolo', apa' ta'inca kangkaiapa-na. Ane rata mpu'u mpai' Magau' Topetolo' to rajanci owi-e, uma mpai' hema to mpo'incai kangkaiapa-na."

Jadi', bula-na Yesus metudui' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, mekio' -i napesukui, na'uli': "Ni'uli' ni'inca moto kahema-ku pai' kangkaiapa-ku. Tumai-a, uma ntuku' konoa-ku moto. Tumai-a mpotuku' konoa-na Alata'ala to mposuro-a. Hi'a-mi to masipato' rapangala'. Tapi' koi' uma mpo'incai-i.
Aku', ku'inca-i apa' ngkai Hi'a pehupaa' -ku, pai' Hi'a to mposuro-a."
Nto'u toe, ria-ra to doko' mpohoko' -i, aga uma hema to dungku pale-ra hi Hi'a, apa' ko'ia rata tempo-na.
Wori' hi olo' tau ntodea to mepangala' hi Hi'a, ra'uli': "Magau' Topetolo' mpu'u-i-tawo', baa' wori' -di tanda mekoncehi to nababehi-e."
Ria-ra to Parisi to mpo'epe kamparanusi-ra ntodea mpotompo'wiwi Yesus. Toe pai' to Parisi hante imam pangkeni mpohubui ba hangkuja dua topojaga Tomi Alata'ala hilou mpohoko' -i.
Nto'u toe, Yesus mpololitai ntodea, na'uli' -raka: "Hampai' -a-damo dohe-ni. Nculii' -a mpai' hilou hi Hi'a to mposuro-a.
Nipali' -a mpai', aga uma-apa niruai'. Pai' hi kahilouaa-ku uma-koi bisa hilou."

Ingu' -ramo topoparenta to Yahudi mpo'epe lolita-na, pai' momepekune' -ramo, ra'uli': "Hilou hiapa-ile', pai' na'uli' uma-i mpai' taruai' -e? Meka' ba hilou-i mo'oha' dohe to Yahudi to mposowo' -ra to Yunani, pai' -i mpotudui' -ra to Yunani.
Pai' napa batua lolita-na to mpo'uli', tapali' -i aga uma-i taruai', pai' uma-ta bisa hilou hi kahilouaa-na?"
Eo ka'omea-na susa' tohe'e, eo to meliu karapomobohe-na. Hi eo toe, mokore-imi Yesus hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, pai' -i mekio': "Hema-koi to ngkamara, tumai-mokoi hi Aku' pai' nginu!
Hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli': hema to mepangala' hi Aku', ngkai nono-ra mo'ili wori' ue to tuwu'."

Lolita-na Yesus toe mpowalatu Inoha' Tomoroli', to mehompo mpai' hi tauna to mepangala' hi Hi'a. Nto'u pololita-na Yesus toe, Inoha' Tomoroli' ko'ia mehompo hi topetuku' -na, apa' Yesus ko'ia rapomobohe.
Wori' tauna mpo'epe lolita Yesus toe, pai' ria-ra hantongo' to mpo'uli': "Bate Hi'a-mile nabi to najanci Alata'ala owi-e."
Hantongo' wo'o-ra mpo'uli': "Magau' Topetolo' mpu'u-idi!" Aga ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli': "Ah, to Galilea-i-hanale! Uma masipato' Magau' Topetolo' mehupa' ngkai Galilea.
Rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki': Magau' Topetolo' muli Magau' Daud, pai' mehupa' ngkai ngata Betlehem, ngata kaputua Daud."
Alaa-na momehono' lau-ramo ntodea: hantongo' -ra mepangala' hi Yesus, hantongo' uma.
Ria-ra to doko' mpohoko' -i, aga uma hema to dungku pale-ra.

Topojaga Tomi Alata'ala to rahubui mpohoko' Yesus, nculii' -ramo hilou hi to Parisi pai' imam pangkeni. Uma-ra oko mpohoko' -i. Ra'uli' pangkeni toera: "Napa-di pai' uma-i nihoko' pai' nikeni tumai-e?"
Ratompoi': "Apa' ko'ia ria ki'epei tauna to mololita hewa Hi'a!"
Mehono' to Parisi toera: "Ei' -e! Ha nabagiu wo'o-moko-koiwo koi' -e?
Hilo, uma ria hadua pangkeni ba to Parisi to mepangala' hi Yesus.
Muntu' ntodea to mpangala' -i, apa' uma ra'incai Atura Musa. Harala-rada!"
Ngkai ree, mololita wo'o-mi-hawo hadua to Parisi to rahanga' Nikodemus. Nikodemus toei, ria-imi hangkani mpencuai' Yesus. Na'uli' Nikodemus mpo'uli' -raka doo-na:
"Ntuku' atura-ta-hawo, uma-ta ma'ala mpohuku' tauna ane ko'ia-hawo ra'epe noa' -na pai' raparesa' gau' -na."
Hampetompoi' doo-na: "Ha ngkai Galilea wo'o-ko-kowo iko-e! Wile-dile pai' kamata rala Buku Tomoroli' -e. Uma ria nabi to mehupa' ngkai Galilea."
Oti toe, nculii' -ramo, hore-hore hilou hi tomi-ra.
Tapi' Yesus hilou hi Bulu' Zaitun.
Kampeneo-na mepupulo ngkii, hilou wo'o-imi hi Tomi Alata'ala. Tumai-ramo ntodea mpomohui' -i, pai' mohura-imi mpotudui' -ra.
Bula-na metudui' toe, rata-ramo guru agama hante to Parisi, mpokeni hadua tobine to rarata bula-na mobualo', rapopokore-i hi laintongo' ntodea.
Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, tobine tetui rarata kongko bula-na mobualo'!
Hi rala Atura Musa, ria parenta to mpo'uli': tobine to mogau' hewa toe kana rapana' watu duu' -na mate. Jadi' Iko, beiwa-kowo pobotuhi-nu?"
Patuju pompekunea' -ra toe, mpali' kedo', bona ma'ala-ra mposalai' Yesus. Tapi' Yesus, uma-i winihi. Motungka' -i-wadi mo'uki' hi tana' hante karawe-na.
Ka'omea-na, apa' rajojo mpekune' -i, mebago' -imi pai' na'uli' -raka: "Hema-koi to uma ria jeko' -ni, hi'a-mi to lomo' -na mpopana' tobine toei!"
Oti toe, motungka' wo'o-imi, pai' -i mo'uki' tena hi tana' hante karawe-na.

Kara'epe-na pangkeni to Yahudi lolita Yesus tohe'e, pengkawusili-rami hadua hadua, ntepu'u ngkai totu'a duu' rata hi to mongura. Ka'omea-na, malai omea-ramo, muntu' Yesus-damo to hi ree hante tobine toei hi laintongo' ntodea.
Ngkai ree, mebago' -imi Yesus pai' mpo'uli' -ki tobine toei: "Hiapa-ramo we'i to mpakilu-koe? Ha uma-rapa ria to doko' mpohuku' -koe?"
Natompoi' tobine toei: "Uma-pi hema, Pue'." Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku' wo'o uma mpohuku' -ko. Wae-pi, hilou-moko, pai' nubahakai-mi mpobabehi jeko'."))
Oti toe, mololita wo'o-imi Yesus hi to Yahudi, na'uli': "Aku' toi-mi baja to mpobajahi nono manusia'. Tauna to mpotuku' -a, uma-ra momako' hi rala kabengia-na. Mporata-ra baja to mpowai' katuwua'."
Ra'uli' to Parisi: "Uma-le makono lolita-nue, apa' mpo'une' woto-nu moto-moko-kona."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Nau' mpotompo'wiwi woto-ku moto-ale, makono oa' lolita-ku, apa' ku'inca kangkaiapa-ku, pai' ku'inca hiapa kahilouaa-ku. Aga koi', uma ni'incai.
Koi' mpohurai kara-kara ntuku' pekiri manusia'. Aku', uma-a mpohurai kara-kara hema-hema.
Ane rapa' -na mpohurai-a kara-kara tauna, pobotuhi-ku bate monoa', apa' uma hadudua-ku. Tuama-ku to mposuro-a, Hi'a-mi doo-ku.
"Hi rala Buku Atura-ni moto te'uki' hewa tohe'i: 'Ane ria nte rodua sabi' to hibalia lolita-ra, posabi' -ra toe ma'ala rapangala'.'
Ria-mi rodua sabi' -ku: Aku' moto-mi hadua, pai' karodua-na Tuama-ku to mposuro-a."
Ra'uli' to Parisi: "Ha hiapa-i tuama-nue?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Apa' uma ni'incai-a, toe pai' uma wo'o ni'incai Tuama-ku. Ane ke ni'inca mpu'u-a, tantu ni'inca wo'o-i Tuama-ku."
Hawe'ea toe na'uli' Yesus bula-na metudui' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala, mohu' peti' pompunaa' doi pepue'. Ko'ia oa' -i rahoko', apa' ko'ia rata tempo-na.
Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus hi topoparenta to Yahudi: "Hilou-a mpai', pai' nipali' -a, aga mate-koi mpai' ntali jeko' -ni-pidi. Hi kahilouaa-ku uma-koi bisa hilou."
Mpo'epe toe, momepololitai-ramo topoparenta to Yahudi, ra'uli': "Napa batua-na lolita-na toe-e we'i? Ba doko' mengkahunca' -idi, pai' na'uli' uma-ta bisa hilou hi kahilouaa-nae."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Koi' -le ngkai kadingkia' -na, Aku' ngkai kalangkoa-na. Koi' ngkai dunia' toi, Aku' uma-a ngkai dunia' toi.
Toe pai' ku'uli' -kokoi, mate-koi mpai' ntali jeko' -ni. Apa' ane uma nipangala' lolita-ku to mpo'uli' kahema-ku, bate mate mpu'u-koi ntali jeko' -ni."
Rapekune' -i: "Ha hema mpu'u-ko-kowo Iko-e?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa-pi kalaua-na mpololitai-koi!
Wori' -pidile ke to ku'uli' mposalai' -koie. Tapi' Hi'a to mposuro-a, masipato' lia-i rapangala', pai' napa to ku'epe ngkai Hi'a, toe-mi to kuparata hi koi' to hi dunia'."
To na'uli' Yesus tohe'e, mpotompo'wiwi Tuama-na, tapi' uma ra'incai batua-na.

Toe pai' na'uli' tena-raka: "Ane nipokalangko-apa mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia', lako' ni'inca-di ka'Aku' -nami. Uma ria hanyalaa to kubabehi ntuku' konoa-ku moto. Muntu' mpo'uli' -a napa to natudui' -ka Tuama-ku.
Hi'a-mi to mposuro-a, pai' nadohei oa' -a. Uma-a napelele' hadudua-ku, apa' kubabehi oa' napa to mpakagoe' nono-na."
Ka'oti-na Yesus mpo'uli' hawe'ea toe, wori' tauna mepangala' hi Hi'a.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka to Yahudi to mepangala' hi Hi'a: "Ane tida-koi mpotuku' tudui' -ku, koi' jadi' topetuku' -ku mpu'u.
Pai' ane topetuku' -ku mpu'u-mokoi, ni'inca mpu'u mpai' tudui' to makono, alaa-na tebahaka-mokoi."
Hampetompoi' -ra: "Kai' toi-le, muli Abraham! Uma-ka-kaina ria rapobatua. Napa-di pai' nu'uli' tebahaka-kai mpai'?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: hawe'ea tauna to mpobabehi jeko', napobatua jeko' -ramo.
Ane batua, uma monoa' katida-na hi tomi maradika-na. Aga ane ana' maradika moto-hana, monoa' katida-na hi tomi tuama-na.
Jadi', ane Aku' mpobahaka-koi ngkai jeko' -ni, tebahaka mpu'u-mokoi, apa' Aku' Ana' Alata'ala-a.
Ku'inca moto-le kamuli-na Abraham-koie. Aga ria-koi to doko' mpatehi-a, apa' uma nipoinono lolita-ku.
Napa to kuhilo hi Tuama-ku, tetu-mi to ku'uli' -kokoi. Hiaa' koi' -koina mpobabehi napa to natudui' -kokoi tuama-ni."
Ra'uli' to Yahudi: "Tuama-kaile, Abraham!" Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane muli Abraham mpu'u-koi, tantu nituku' po'ingku-na.
Kuparata-kokoi tudui' to makono to kutarima ngkai Alata'ala, hiaa' doko' nipatehi lau-ada! Uma hewa po'ingku-ni tetu po'ingku-na Abraham.
Po'ingku-ni tetu bate mpotuku' po'ingku tuama-ni!" Hampetompoi' to Yahudi: "Aga kai' -le, bela-kai ana' una! Tuama-kai hadua lau-wadi, Hi'a-mi Alata'ala."

Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane bongko Alata'ala mpu'u Tuama-ni, ke nipoka'ahi' -a, apa' Aku' ngkai Alata'ala-a, pai' ohe'i-ama naposuro. Uma-a tumai ntuku' konoa-ku moto. Tumai-a ntuku' konoa-na Alata'ala, apa' Hi'a to mposuro-a.
Uma ami' ni'incai batua-na lolita-ku, apa' uma-koi ntaha mpo'epe tudui' -ku.

Magau' Anudaa' -hanale tuama-nie! Pai' doko' oa' -koi mpotuku' konoa tuama-ni tetu. Ngkai lomo' -na, topepatehi ami' -imi. Uma-i ria mpo'uli' napa to makono, apa' uma ria napa-napa to makono hi hi'a. Ane moboa' -i, gati-nami-hana, apa' topoboa' ami' -i, pai' hawe'ea tauna to moboa' mpo'uhi kehi-na.
Jadi', toe pai' uma-a nipangala', apa' mpo'uli' to makono-a-kuna.
Hema-koi to ma'ala mpotudo' karia jeko' -ku? Ane mpo'uli' -a anu makono, napa-di pai' uma-a nipangala' -e?
Tauna to napo'ana' Alata'ala doko' mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala. Tapi' koi', uma-koi dota mpo'epe lolita-ku, apa' bela-koi ana' Alata'ala."
To Yahudi mporuge' -i Yesus, ra'uli': "To Samaria-ko! Wuli-ko, hewa to ki'uli' ami' -mi!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma-a wuli. Aku' mpobila' Tuama-ku. Hiaa' koi', uma nibila' -a.
Uma-a mpope'une'. Alata'ala-damo to mpobila' -a, pai' Hi'a to mpobotuhi kamakono-ku ba ka'uma-na.
Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Hema to mpotuku' lolita-ku, uma-ra mate, tuwu' -ra duu' kahae-hae-na."
Ra'uli' to Yahudi: "Wae lau ki'inca mpu'u-mi kawuli-nu! Bangku' Abraham-hawoe', mate moto-i. Wae wo'o hawe'ea nabi owi, mate moto-ra. Hiaa' nu'uli' -kona, hema to mpotuku' lolita-nu uma-ra mate.
Ha nu'uli' -kona meliu tuwu' -nu ngkai ntu'a-ta Abraham, to mahae-imi mate? Ha meliu tuwu' -nu ngkai hawe'ea nabi to mate-ramo? Nu'uli' hema rahi-dakoe?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane rapa' -na mpakalangko woto-ku moto-a, uma ntoto ria kalaua-na. Tapi' Tuama-kumi to mpakalangko-a. Ni'uli' -koina Kahi'a-na Alata'ala to nipue'.
Tapi' kakoo-kono-na uma-i ni'incai. Ane Aku', ku'inca-i. Ane rapa' -na ku'uli' uma-i ku'incai, boa' -ama hewa koi'. Apa' ku'inca mpu'u-i, pai' kutuku' lolita-na.
Ane ntu'a-ni Abraham, goe' -i apa' na'inca kanahilo-na mpai' eo karataa-ku. Jadi' hewa toe lau, nahilo-mi karataa-ku pai' goe' lia-imi."
Ra'uli' to Yahudi: "Umuru-nule, ko'ia hono' lima mpulu' mpae. Ha pasi' nuhilo-imi-kona Abraham-e?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Kako'ia-na putu Abraham, Aku' toi, mpolia' ria-ama!"
Kara'epe-na to Yahudi toe we'i, ntima' watu-ramo doko' rawatuhi-ki bona mate-imi. Ntaa' we'i, mengkawusili-imi Yesus ngkai Tomi Alata'ala.
Bula-na Yesus momako', mpohilo-i hadua tauna to wero ngkai lomo' kaputu-na.
Ana'guru-na mpekune' -i: "Guru, napa pai' wero ami' -i ngkai kaputu-nae? Ba jeko' -na moto-di, ba jeko' totu'a-nadi?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Bela jeko' -na moto, pai' bela wo'o jeko' totu'a-na. Toi jadi' bona tauna mpohilo baraka' Alata'ala to madupa' hi woto-na.
Bula-na mobaja-pidi, kana tapobago bago-na Alata'ala to mposuro-a. Apa' neo' rata-mi bengi-na, pai' uma-pi hema to mobago.
Bula-ku hi dunia' -pidi, Aku' toi-mi baja to mpobajahi nono manusia'."
Ka'oti-na mololita hewa toe, na'uelikui-mi tana', nagalo hante tana' hangkedi' bona morege', nagelai' -ki mata-na towero toei,
pai' na'uli' -ki: "Hilou-ko monoku hi wuhu' Siloam." (Hanga' "Siloam" toe, batua-na "Rasuro.") Kahilou-nami monoku. Ponculii' -na, pehilo-imi-hawo.
Ngkai ree, tongki-na pai' tauna to biasa mpohilo-i kakarapi' -rapi', momepekune' -ramo ra'uli': "Hema-idi toe-e mai? Ha bela hi'a-mi towero to biasa mohura kakarapi' -rapi' -e?"
Ria to mpo'uli': "Hi'a-midi!" Aga ria wo'o mpo'uli': "Bela-e'. Kahibalia lence-ra-wadi-hawo." Hiaa' hi'a moto-mi-hawo mpo'uli': "Aku' -midi!"
Jadi', rapekune' -i: "Ha beiwa pai' alaa-na pehilo-ko?"
Na'uli' -raka: "Tauna to rahanga' Yesus mpobabehi rege', nagelai' -ki mata-ku, na'uli' -ka: 'Hilou-ko monoku hi wuhu' Siloam.' Hilou mpu'u-ama monoku, ngkai ree pehilo-ama-kuwo!"
Rapekune' -i: "Hiaa' hiapa-imi we'i?" Na'uli' -raka: "Uma-kuwo ku'incai."
Yesus mpogalo ueliku-na hante tana' pai' mpaka'uri' towero toe we'i nto'u Eo Sabat, eo pepuea' -ra to Yahudi. Jadi', towero to pehilo-mi toei rakeni hilou hi to Parisi.
To Parisi wo'o-mi-rawo mpekune' -i, ra'uli': "Beiwa pai' alaa-na pehilo-koe?" Na'uli' -raka: "Nagelai' mata-ku hante rege', pai' kamonoku-ku, pehilo-ama."

Ba hangkuja dua ngkai to Parisi toera mpo'uli': "Tauna to mpobabehi tetu, uma-i ngkai Alata'ala, bo uma-i mpotuku' palia-ta hi Eo Sabat." Tapi' to hantongo' mpo'uli': "Hiaa' ane topojeko' -i, ngkaiapa-di baraka' -na mpobabehi wori' tanda mekoncehi hewa tohe'i-e?" Alaa-na, ria lau-mi pomehonoa' hi himpau hira'.
Ngkai ree, mepekune' tena-ra to Parisi hi towero toei, ra'uli': "Beiwa-kowo iko, napa to nu'uli', apa' napaka'uri' -koko mata-nue." Na'uli' towero toei: "Tantu Hi'a hadua nabi."
Tapi' topoparenta to Yahudi, uma-ra mparasaya kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi towero-e ngone, pai' muu-mule' pehilo-imi. Toe pai' rakio' tina pai' tuama-na bona mpohirua' -raka,
pai' rapompekunei': "Ha makono mpu'u tauna toii ana' -ni, to ni'uli' wero ngkai lomo' kaputu-nae? Hiaa' beiwa pai' alaa-na pehilo-i?"
Ra'uli' -rawo tina pai' tuama-na: "To ki'inca-le, bate ana' -kai mpu'u-i-hawo, pai' wero mpu'u-i ngkai lomo' kaputu-na.
Aga beiwa pai' alaa-na pehilo-i, uma-kaiwo ki'incai. Pai' hema to mpaka'uri' -i, uma wo'o-kaiwo ki'incai. Kama-imi-hawo, pekune' -ki hi'a moto-mi-koiwo. Ma'ala-imi metompoi' moto."
Tina pai' tuama-na mpo'uli' hewa toe, apa' me'eka' -ra hi topoparenta to Yahudi. Apa' hibalia-mi pohawa' -ra: hema-hema to mpo'uli' Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo' rapopalai ngkai tomi posampayaa.
Toe pai' totu'a-na mpo'uli': "Kama-imi-hawo, pekune' -ki hi'a moto-mi-koiwo."
Oti toe, rakio' tena-i tauna to wero toei we'i, pai' ra'uli' -ki: "Alata'ala mpotiroi-ta! Jadi', uli' mpu'u-e' napa to makono! Ki'inca moto-i Yesus tetui tauna topojeko'."
Na'uli' -raka: "Aku' -le, uma ku'incai ba topojeko' -i ba uma. Sampale to ku'inca, wero-a wengi, tempo toi pehilo-ama."
Ngkai ree, rapekune' tena-i: "Napa to nababehi-koko? Beiwa-i mpaka'uri' -ko?"
Natompoi' -ra: "Oti-mi kututura-kokoi we'i, ha uma ni'epei? Napa pai' nipengeei oa' -e? Ba doko' jadi' ana'guru-na lau-dakoie?"
Ngkai ree, ralibui' -imi pai' ra'uli' -ki: "Iko-le ana'guru-na tau tetu-e! Kai' ana'guru-na nabi Musa-ka-kaina!
Monoa' ki'inca Alata'ala mpoparata lolita-na hi Musa owi. Tapi' Yesus tetui, uma ki'incai kangkaiapa-na."
Mehono' -i towero toei: "Me'ingui' lia-koi! Ni'uli' uma ni'incai kangkaiapa-na, hiaa' napaka'uri' mata-ku!
Ta'inca moto Alata'ala uma mpotompoi' pomperapia' tauna topojeko'. Sampale-di mpobini' -i tilinga-na hi hema-hema to mengkoru hi Hi'a pai' to mpotuku' hawa' -na.
Ngkai lomo' kajadi' dunia', ko'ia ria ta'epei tutura-na tauna towero ngkai lomo' kaputu-na ma'ala rapaka'uri'.
Ane Yesus uma-i ngkai Alata'ala, tantu uma-i bisa mpobabehi napa-napa."
Hampetompoi' -ra: "Iko tetu to ponu' jeko' ngkai kaputu-nu, nta'ena' metudui'!" Ngkai ree, rapopalai-imi ngkai tomi posampayaa.
Yesus mpo'epe karapopalai-na ngkai tomi posampayaa. Jadi' hilou-imi mpohirua' -ki, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Ha mepangala' -ko hi Ana' Manusia' -e?"
Na'uli' tauna toei: "Uli' -ka-kuwo kahema-nai, bona kupangala' -i."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Nuhilo-imile! Hi'a-mile to mpololitai-koe."
Na'uli' tauna toei: "Kupangala', Pue'!" pai' mowilingkudu-imi mponyompa-i.
Na'uli' Yesus: "Katumai-ku hi dunia' toi, tumai mpobotuhi kara-kara manusia', bona tauna to wero ma'ala pehilo, pai' tauna to mpo'uli' pehilo moto-ra, wero lau-ra."
Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi to hi ree mpo'epe lolita-na Yesus. Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ha nu'uli' -kona wero wo'o-kai kai' -e?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane rapa' -na hewa towero mpu'u-koi apa' uma ni'incai napa to makono, ke uma-koi masala'. Tapi', apa' ni'uli' -koina pehilo moto-koie, bate masala' -koi-hawo."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: ane ria tauna to mesua' hi rala gimpu ngkahe' wala, pai' uma-i ntara hi wobo', topanako pai' toperampaki-i-hana.
Ane topo'ewu, mesua' ntara hi wobo' moto-i.
Topodongo wobo' mpobea-ki wobo', pai' bima-na mpetonoi libu' -na ane nakio' hanga' -ra butu-butu ma'a-na, pai' nakeni-ra hilou hi mali-na.
Kanakeni-ra hilou hi mali-na omea, mako' meri'ulu-i ngkai bima-na, pai' bima-na mpotuku' -i, apa' ra'inca mpetonoi libu' -na.
Uma-ra mpotuku' tau ntani' -na. Ane ria tauna to bela topo'ewu-ra to mpokio' -ra, rapetiboi' -i, apa' uma ra'incai mpetonoi libu' -na."
Yesus mpo'uli' walatu toe hi to Parisi, aga uma ra'incai patuju-na.
Toe pai' na'uli' wo'o-mi: "Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi: Aku' toi-mi wobo' to natara bima mesua' hi rala gimpu.
Hawe'ea tauna to rata meri'ulu ngkai Aku', topanako pai' toperampaki-ra-hana. Aga bima-ku uma mposaile' pekio' -ra.
Aku' toi-mi wobo'. Hema to mesua' ntara hi Aku', mporata-ra kalompea'. Hira' hewa bima to mesua' hi rala gimpu pai' mehupa' hilou hi mali-na mporata kowo' to morudu'.
Patuju-na topanako-le, tumai doko' manako, mepatehi pai' megerohi. Tapi' Aku' tumai bona manusia' mporata katuwua' to uma mowo kalompe' -na.
"Aku' toi-mi topo'ewu to lompe'. Kupewai' tuwu' -ku bona bima-ku tuwu'.

Ane tauna to baha ragaji', uma lompe' pompo'ewu-na, apa' bela hi'a pue' bima. Ane mpohilo-i serigala tumai, metibo' -i mpalahii bima ewua-na. Jadi' bima toe nadapa' pai' nahungongo' serigala, alaa-na pagaa' -gaa' -ramo.
Tauna to ragaji' toei metibo', apa' mobago baha ragaji' -wadi. Uma-i mposaile' ewua-na.
"Aku' toi-mi topo'ewu to lompe'. Hewa Tuama-ku mpo'inca-a, pai' Aku' mpo'inca Tuama-ku, wae wo'o Aku' mpo'inca bima-ku, pai' bima-ku mpo'inca-a. Kupewai' tuwu' -ku bona bima-ku tuwu'.

"Ria wo'o-pidi bima-ku to ntani' -na, to uma hi rala gimpu toi. Hira' wo'o mpai' kana kukeni tumai. Rapetonoi mpai' libu' -ku, bona hawe'ea bima-ku jadi' mopahantuda lau, pai' hadua-ku-wadi to mpo'ewu-ra omea.
"Tuama-ku mpoka'ahi' -a, apa' kupewai' tuwu' -ku bona kurua' nculii' tuwu' -ku.

Uma ria haduaa to mpatehi-a ane uma konoa-ku. Ku'agi mate hante karoli' -roli' nono-ku. Ria kuasa-ku mpewai' tuwu' -ku bona rapatehi, pai' ria wo'o kuasa-ku tuwu' nculii'. Toe-mi hawa' to kutarima ngkai Tuama-ku."
Kara'epe-na to Yahudi pololita-na Yesus toe, momehono' wo'o-ramo.
Wori' -ra to mpo'uli': "Kahawia' -ile! Wuli-i! Napa-pi kalaua-na tape'epei lolita-na."
Aga ria wo'o to mpo'uli': "Uma-di! Tauna to napesuai' seta-le uma-hawo mololita hewa toei. Ha bisa wo'o-hawo seta mpaka'uri' tauna to wero-e?"
Hi Yerusalem nto'u toe, tauna mpobabehi karamea mpokiwoi eo bohe pompowatia' Tomi Alata'ala owi. Nto'u toe, tempo lengi'.
Yesus momako' hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala, hi pengkawinaraa to rahanga' Pengkawinaraa Salomo.
Topoparenta to Yahudi mpotipuhi Yesus pai' ra'uli' -ki: "Napa pai' nupelele' oa' -kai ingu', uma oa' nupakalonto' kahema-nue? Ane bongko Magau' Topetolo' mpu'u-kole, uli' pakalonto' lau-mi."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Oti-mi ku'uli' -kokoie, aga uma-koi dota mpangala'. Anu mekoncehi to kubabehi hante kuasa Tuama-ku, toe-mi to mpakanoto kahema-ku.
Tapi' uma oa' nipangala', apa' bela-koi bima-ku.
Bima-ku mpetonoi libu' -ku. Ku'inca moto-ra, pai' -ra mpotuku' -a.
Kuwai' -ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na, pai' monoa' -mi ka'uma-ra mpai' rahuku' hi naraka. Uma ria haduaa to ma'ala mpo'agoi-a bima-ku.
Tuama-ku meliu kabaraka' -na ngkai hawe'ea, pai' Hi'a-mi to mpowai' -a bima-ku. Uma ria haduaa to ma'ala mpo'ago-ra ngkai Tuama-ku.
Aku' pai' Tuama-ku, hadua lau-wada-kai."
Ngkai ree, to Yahudi mpotima' watu doko' rapana' -ki Yesus bona mate-i.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Nihilo moto-a mpobabehi bago to lompe' ntuku' hawa' Tuama-ku. Ngkai bago-ku tohe'e, to'uma to masipato' nipatehi-ka?"
Ra'uli' to Yahudi: "Bela ngkai pobago-nu to lompe', pai' doko' kipatehi-ko. Pai' doko' kipatehi-kole apa' mpokedi' Alata'ala-ko-kona! Api' manusia' biasa-wadi-ko, nu'uli' -kona Alata'ala-ko!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Hi rala Buku Atura-ni ria te'uki' Lolita Alata'ala hi pangkeni to Yahudi owi, hewa toi moni-na: 'Koi', raponcawa Alata'ala-koi.'
Napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' tetu, uma ria balia' -na. Jadi', ane Buku Tomoroli' mpo'uli' 'Alata'ala-koi' hi tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala owi, peliu-liu-nami Aku'.
Apa' Aku' toi-e, to nawati' Tuama-ku, napowiwi napowiti' tumai hi dunia'. Jadi', napa pai' ni'uli' -ka mpokedi' -a Alata'ala apa' ku'uli' ka'Aku' -na Ana' -na?
"Ane rapa' -na uma kubabehi bago to ngkai Tuama-ku, neo' -a nipangala'.

Tapi' ane kubabehi moto-mi bago to ngkai Tuama-kue, kana nipangala' -a sabana pobago-ku toe. Nau' Aku' moto uma nipangalai', kana nipangala' kangkai Alata'ala-na pobago-ku. Ane mepangala' -koi hi pobago-ku toe, ni'inca mpai' pai' monoto mpu'u hi nono-ni kahintuwu' -ku hante Tuama-ku, pai' Tuama-ku hintuwu' hante Aku'."
Mpo'epe toe-di, to Yahudi doko' wo'o-ramo mpohoko' -i, aga tepetibo' moto-i.
Ngkai ree, malai wo'o-imi Yesus hilou hi dipo ue Yordan, hi peniua' -na Yohanes ri'ulu, pai' -i mo'oha' hi ria.
Wori' tauna hilou mpohirua' -ki, ra'uli': "Yohanes uma mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi. Aga hawe'ea to na'uli' mpotompo'wiwi Yesus, makono omea."
Toe pai' wori' tauna hi ree mepangala' hi Yesus.

Hadua tomane to rahanga' Lazarus mo'oha' hi ngata Betania hante ompi' bine-na Maria pai' Marta. (Maria toe-mi mpai' to mpolanai witi' Yesus hante lana honga pai' naporihi hante wuluwoo' -na.) Hangkani, peda' -i Lazarus.
Ompi' bine-na to rodua toera mposuro tauna hilou hi Yesus, mpo'uli' -ki: "Pue', bale-nu to nupe'ahi', peda' -i."
Kana'epe-na Yesus kareba toe, na'uli': "Haki' -na tetu-e ria, uma napomate-ki. Toe jadi' bona Alata'ala rapomobohe, pai' bona Aku' wo'o, Ana' -na, rapomobohe."
Yesus mpoka'ahi' Marta, Maria, pai' Lazarus.
Aga kana'epe-na kapeda' -na Lazarus, uma-i ulu hilou, bate hi po'ohaa' -na moto-i ro'eo-pi kahae-na.
Timpaliu ro'eo toe-di, pai' lako' na'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Kita-mi hilou nculii' hi tana' Yudea."
Ra'uli' ana'guru-na: "Guru, ko'ia mahae to Yahudi hi ria doko' mpopatehi-ko. Napa wo'o-mi pai' doko' hilou hi ria-koe?"
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ha uma hampulu' rojaa to mobaja rala-na ha'eo? Tauna to momako' hi eo-na, uma-ra tewinci', apa' mpohilo-ra pehini eo to mpobajahi dunia' toi.
Aga tauna to momako' hi bengi-na, bate tewinci' -ra, apa' uma ria to mpobajahi-ra."
Hewa toe-mi lolita Yesus, pai' oti toe na'uli' tena: "Bale-ta Lazarus, leta' -i. Hilou-a mpolike-i."

Kakoo-kono-na, lolita-na Yesus toe mpowalatu kamate-na Lazarus. Tapi' ana'guru-na uma mpopaha walatu toe, ra'uli' leta' mpu'u-i Lazarus. Toe pai' ra'uli' -ki Yesus: "Pue', ane leta' -i, mo'uri' moto-i mpai'."
Jadi', nalohu lau-miraka batua walatu-na, na'uli': "Mate-imi Lazarus.
Pai' goe' -a apa' uma kukaralai nto'u toe. Apa' napa to jadi' toe mpai' ria, mpokeni kalompea' hi koi', bona mepangala' -koi hi Aku'. Hilou-tamo hi Lazarus."
Tomas, to ra'atu Ntomoropa', mpo'uli' -raka hingka ana'guru-na: "Kita-mi hilou mpotuku' -i, bona mate-ta hangkaa-ngkania hante Hi'a." Jadi' hilou mpu'u-ramo hi tana' Yudea.
Karata-ra hi ngata Betania, mpolia' opo' mengi-imi Lazarus ratana.
Betania tohe'e mohu' Yerusalem, kira-kira tolu kilo kalaa-na.
Jadi', wori' -ra to Yahudi to tumai mpotanta'u Marta pai' Maria hi kamate ompi' -ra toe.
Marta mpo'epe kaneo' -na rata-mi Yesus, kahilou-nami mpotomu-i. Tapi' Maria, hi tomi moto-i-hana.
Na'uli' Marta hi Yesus: "Pue', ane ke hi rehe'i-ko wengi, ke uma-i mate ompi' -ku.
Aga nau' wae, ku'inca moto: napa-napa to nuperapi' hi Alata'ala tempo toi, bate nawai' -ko."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Memata moto-ile mpai' ompi' -nue."
Na'uli' Marta: "Io', to ku'inca-le, memata moto mpu'u-i mpai' hi Eo Kiama, nto'u hawe'ea tomate rapopemata."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku' toi-mi to mpopemata tomate, pai' to mpowai' katuwua'. Tauna to mepangala' hi Aku', nau' mate-ra, tuwu' moto-ra mpai'.
Pai' hawe'ea tauna to tuwu' pai' mepangala' hi Aku', bate uma-ra mate, duu' kahae-hae-na. Ha nupangala' to ku'uli' toe-e?"
Na'uli' Marta: "Io' Pue', kupangala' ka'Iko-na Ana' Alata'ala, Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala owi to tumai hi dunia'."
Ka'oti-na Marta mpo'uli' toe, hilou-imi hi tomi mpokio' Maria, pai' mpowara' -i na'uli' -ki: "Oe-imi ria Guru, doko' napohirua' -koko!"
Mpo'epe tohe'e, napesahui Maria hilou mpohirua' -ki Yesus.
Nto'u toe, Yesus ko'ia mesua' hi rala ngata, hi mali ngata-i-pidi, hi kahiruaa' -na hante Marta we'i.
To Yahudi to mpodoo eo mpohilo kasosa-na Maria malai ngkai tomi. Ra'uli': "Hilou hi daeo' -i tu, hilou motantangi' hi ria!" Jadi', hilou wo'o-ra-rawo mpotuku' -i.
Karata Maria hi pento'oa-na Yesus we'i, pai' kampohilo-na Yesus, powingkotu' -nami hi nyanyoa-na, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Pue', ane ke hi rehe'i-ko, ke uma-i mate ompi' -ku."
Kanahilo-na Yesus Maria motantangi' hante tauna to dohe-na, susa' pai' tuna-mi nono-na.
Napekune' -ra: "Ratana hiapa-i?" Ra'uli': "Mai-moko Pue', kipo'ema' -ko hilou bona nuhilo."
Mo'ili-mi ue mata-na Yesus.
Ra'uli' to Yahudi: "Hilo! Uma mpu'u mowo kama'ahi' -na hi Lazarus!"
Aga ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli': "Tauna towero napaka'uri'. Ha uma-i bisa mpaka'uri' Lazarus bona ke uma-i-hawo mate-e?"
Ngkai ree, peda' wo'o-mi nono-na Yesus, pai' -i hilou hi daeo'. Daeo' toe, wulou' to ratowi hi panapa bulu', pai' ra'unca hante watu to bohe.
Na'uli' Yesus: "Deru' watu tetu!" Na'uli' Marta, ompi' -na tomate: "Neo' -pi rabea, Pue'. Mohoa-imi, apa' opo' mengi-imi ratana."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki Marta: "Ha uma ku'uli' -mikoko we'i, ane mepangala' -ko, nuhilo moto mpai' kabohe baraka' -na Alata'ala."
Oti toe, raderu' mpu'u-mi watu po'unca daeo'. Yesus ngkongoa' hi langi', na'uli': "Tuama-ku, mpo'uli' -a tarima kasi, apa' nu'epe pomperapia' -ku tohe'i.
Ku'inca, bate nu'epe oa' lolita-ku. Aga tohe'i kupesukui mpo'uli', bona ra'epe tauna to wori' to hi rehe'i lau, bona rapangala' ka'Iko-na mpu'u to mposuro-a."
Oti toe, napesukui mekio': "Lazarus! Tumai-moko!"

Mehupa' -imi tauna to mate toei ngkai rala daeo' -na. Pale-na pai' witi' -na teputu' -pidi hante hompu' -na, pai' woo' -na tehoo' hante lenco. Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Bongka pomputu' -na bona lompe' pomako' -na."
Wori' to Yahudi to mpokinomo Maria nto'u toe, pai' rahilo napa to nababehi Yesus. Pai' wori' -ramo to mepangala' hi Hi'a.
Aga ria wo'o-ra hantongo' hilou hi to Parisi mpoparata napa to nababehi Yesus toe.
Toe pai' to Parisi hante imam pangkeni mpobabehi porumpua bohe hante topohura agama to ntani' -na. Ra'uli': "Napa-koiwo to kana tababehi? Apa' wori' mpu'u tanda mekoncehi to nababehi-e.
Ane tapelele' oa' -i, hawe'ea tauna mpai' mepangala' hi Hi'a omea-ramo. Ka'omea-na mpai', tantara to Roma tumai mpogero ngata-ta hante Tomi Alata'ala."
Ngkai ree, hadua ngkai laintongo' -ra to rahanga' Kayafas, Imam Bohe hi mpae toe, mpo'uli': "Uma ni'incai napa-napa!
Uma ni'incai kalompea' ntodea. Agina lau-pi tau hadua mate mposampei ntodea, bona neo' mpai' ragero ngata-ta omea."

Patuju-na Kayafas mpo'uli' hewa toe: Yesus kana rapatehi. Tapi' ria wo'o batua to kahanyala-na, to uma-hawo natungkai'. Apa' lawi' hi'a-mi Imam Bohe hi mpae toe-e, lolita-na mpolowa kamate-na mpai' Yesus mpotolo' to Yahudi.
