Karata-ra hi ree, rapope'onga wo'o-ramo-rawo to tungkai' mosabi' boa'. Ra'uli' sabi' boa' toera: "Tau tohe'ii ntora mporuge' Tomi Alata'ala pai' mporuge' Atura Musa!
Ki'epe-i mololita mpo'uli': Yesus to Nazaret toe mpogero mpai' Tomi Alata'ala pai' mpobalii' hawe'ea ada to tapososora ngkai nabi Musa."
Mpo'epe toe, hawe'ea topohura mponaa Stefanus. Rahilo-rawo, lio-na hewa lio mala'eka.
Mepekune' Imam Bohe hi Stefanus, na'uli': "Makono mpu'u hewa to ra'uli' bali' -nu toera-e?"

Na'uli' Stefanus: "Ompi' -ompi', tuama-tuama! Pe'epei-ka-kuwo ulu lolita-ku! Owi, nto'u ntu'a-ta Abraham hi tana' Mesopotamia-pidi, kako'ia-na mentoli tumai hi ngata Haran, Alata'ala to bohe kabaraka' -na mehupa' hi ntu'a-ta toei,
na'uli' -ki: `Palahii ngata-nu pai' ompi' -nu. Hilou-ko hi ngata to kutudo' -koko mpai'.'

Toe pai' napalahii mpu'u-mi tana' -ra to Kasdim tumai hi ngata Haran. Hi ngata Haran toe, tuama-na Abraham mate-mi. Pai' oti toe, Alata'ala mpopentoli wo'o-imi Abraham tumai hi tana' tohe'i, to tapo'ohai' -mi tempo toi-e.

Nto'u toe, Alata'ala uma mpowai' tana' toi hi Abraham, nau' hampotomia. Sampale-di, Alata'ala mojanci hi Abraham, na'uli': `Tana' tohe'i mpai' kuwai' -koko, duu' rata hi muli-muli-nu.' Hiaa' nto'u toe, ko'ia-hawo ria ana' -na.
Aga Alata'ala mpo'uli' -ki Abraham hewa toi: `Muli-nu mpai' mesowo' hi ngata doo. Pue' ngata toera mpai' mpobatua-ra pai' mpobalinai' -ra hante makanca rala-na opo' atu mpae.
Tapi' oti toe, Aku' moto mpohuku' pue' ngata to mpobatua muli-nu toera, pai' lako' malai-rada ngkai tana' tetu, tumai mpopue' -a hi tana' tohe'i.' Wae-mi lolita-na Alata'ala hi Abraham.

Oti toe, Alata'ala mpobabehi pojanci posidaia' -na hante Abraham, pai' nahubui bona Abraham pai' hawe'ea muli-na ratini'. Ada petini' toe jadi' tanda pojanci-na Alata'ala hante muli Abraham. Jadi', putu mpu'u-mi ana' Abraham to rahanga' Ishak, natini' -imi hi eo kawalu-na. Oti toe wo'o-hawo, Ishak mpotini' Yakub ana' -na. Pai' Yakub mpotini' ana' -na to hampulu' rodua. Pai' hira' toe-mi to jadi' ntu'a-ta kita' to Yahudi.
"Ntu'a-ta toera mohingi' hi Yusuf ompi' -ra, alaa-na rapobalu' -i pai' -i rapobatua hi tana' Mesir. Aga Alata'ala mpodohei-i,

pai' ka'omea-na nabahaka-imi ngkai hawe'ea kaparia-na. Nawai' -i kapantea to mpokagoe' nono Firaun, magau' hi tana' Mesir, alaa-na Firaun mpo'ongko' -i jadi' gubernur tana' Mesir pai' jadi' topohawa' hi rala tomi-na.
Ngkai ree, rata-mi oro' bohe hobo' hi tana' Mesir pai' tana' Kanaan. Rata-mi oro' bohe toe, wori' tauna to ntodohaka, pai' ntu'a-ta wo'o uma-pi ria pongkoni' -ra.
Ngkai ree, na'epe Yakub, ria-hana pae rapobalu' hi Mesir. Toe pai' nahubui-ramo ana' -ana' -na, ntu'a-ta toera-e, hilou hi Mesir. Tohe'e pomako' -ra to lomo' -na hilou hi Mesir.
Kahilou-ra karongkani-na, nalohu-miraka Yusuf kahi'a-nami ompi' -ra. Nto'u toe lako' na'inca-di Firaun kahema-ra ompi' -na Yusuf.
Oti toe, Yusuf mpakatu kareba hilou hi Yakub tuama-na, mpo'uli' -ki bona hira' hantinaa mentoli hilou hi tana' Mesir. Kawori' tauna to mentoli hilou hi Mesir toe, pitu mpulu' lima.
Jadi', mentoli mpu'u-imi Yakub hi tana' Mesir, pai' tida hi ria duu' -na mate. Wae wo'o hawe'ea ana' -na.
Aga wuku-ra rakeni nculii' moto tumai hi ngata Sikhem pai' ratana hi rala daeo' to na'oli Abraham ngkai muli Hemor hante doi pera'.
"Mahaa-hae ngkai ree, neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala mpopadupa' pojanci-na hi Abraham. Momuli-muli-ramo ntu'a-ta hi tana' Mesir, duu' -na wori' lia-ramo.
Ka'omea-na, ria magau' to moparenta hi Mesir, to uma mpokiwoi kahema-na Yusuf.
Magau' toei mposapai ntu'a-ta owi pai' nabalinai' -ra. Nahubui-ra mpotadi ana'lei-ra bona mate.
Nto'u toe, putu-imi-hawo Musa. Musa toei, hadua ana' to subo' lia. Tolu mula-i-wadi rapodoo rala tomi totu'a-na, pai' -i ratadi.
Hi karatadi-na toe, ana' toronaa Firaun mpotima' -i, pai' napodoo naponcawa ana' -na moto-mi.
Jadi', Musa rapoposikola hi hawe'ea kapantea to Mesir, pai' alaa-na mokuasa mpu'u-i hi pololita-na pai' hi pongkale-na.
"Kahono' -na opo' mpulu' mpae-mi umuru-na Musa, ria patuju-na doko' mpencuai' hingka ompi' -na muli Israel.
Karata-na hi ria, mpohilo-i hadua to Israel naweba' hadua to Mesir. Kahilou-nami mpehawa-ki ompi' -na, mpopatehi to Mesir toei.
Na'ulia' -hana Musa, ra'inca moto ompi' -na kahi'a-nami to napopale Alata'ala mpobahaka-ra ngkai karapobatuaa-ra. Ntaa' uma-di ra'incai.
"Kamepulo-na, nahilo wo'o rodua to motuda', paka' to Israel. Jadi', apa' doko' napopohintuwu' -ra, toe pai' na'uli' -miraka: `Napa pai' motuda' moto-mokoi, koi' ntali ompi'?'
Tapi' to hadua to mpoweba' -mi doo-na mpotulaka Musa pai' na'uli' -ki: `Hema to mpo'ongko' -ko jadi' pangkeni to mpobotuhi kara-kara-kai?
Ba doko' mpopatehi aku' wo'o-moko, hewa kampopatehi-nu to Mesir wengi-e?'
Kana'epe-na Musa telohu-mi kehi-na toe, metibo' -imi ngkai tana' Mesir hilou tida hi tana' Midian. Hi ria-i motobinei, pai' -i mo'anai' rodua.
"Opo' mpulu' mpae ngkai ree, mehupa' hadua mala'eka mpohirua' -ki Musa hi tana' to wao' mohu' Bulu' Sinai. Mala'eka toe mehupa' hi rala julumpu to jela'.
Konce-i Musa mpohilo toe, toe pai' hilou namohui' doko' na'inca ba napa-i-hawo. Nto'u toe, na'epe lolita Pue' to mpo'uli':
`Aku' -mi Alata'ala to rapue' ntu'a-nu. Aku' -mi Alata'ala to napue' Abraham, Ishak pai' Yakub.' Mpo'epe toe, moridi' -imi Musa nakeni eka' -na, pai' uma-ipi daho' mponaa julumpu to jela' toe.
Na'uli' wo'o-mi Pue' mpo'uli' -ki: `Roncu sapatu' -nu, apa' tana' to nupokorei tetu-e, tana' to moroli'.

Kuhilo mpu'u-mi kapai' tuwu' -ra ntodea-ku to Israel hi Mesir. Ku'epe-mi pontodohaka-ra. Toe pai' hompo-ama tumai doko' mpobahaka-ra. Jadi', tumai-ko, kuhubui-ko hilou hi tana' Mesir, bona mpobahaka-ra to Israel.' Toe-mi lolita-na Pue' Alata'ala hi Musa.

"Jadi', Musa to rasapuaka to Israel wengi, hi'a lau-mi to nahubui Alata'ala hilou mpobahaka-ra. Lomo' -na rasapuaka-i, ra'uli': `Hema to mpo'ongko' -ko jadi' pangkeni to mpobotuhi kara-kara-kai?' Hiaa' hi'a mpu'u-mi to nakio' Alata'ala hante wiwi mala'eka to mpololitai-i ngkai rala julumpu. Hi'a mpu'u-mi to na'ongko' Alata'ala jadi' pangkeni to mpobahaka-ra.
Musa toe-mile to mpakeni-ra malai ngkai tana' Mesir. Hi'a-mi to mpobabehi anu mobaraka' pai' tanda mekoncehi hi Mesir, hi Tahi' Molei pai' hi tana' to wao' rala-na opo' mpulu' mpae.
Musa toe wo'o-mi to mpo'uli' -raka to Israel owi hewa toi: `Alata'ala mpai' mpo'ongko' hadua ngkai ompi' -ni jadi' nabi hewa aku' toi.'

Musa toe-mile to mpodoo-ra ntodea to Israel hi tana' to wao' -e. Hi'a-mi to mpo'epe lolita mala'eka to mpololitai-i hi lolo Bulu' Sinai, pai' -i jadi' tauntongo' to mpoparata lolita toe hi ntu'a-ta owi. Hi'a to mpotarima ngkai Pue' Ala lolita to tuwu' to raparata-taka duu' tempo toi-e.
"Aga ntu'a-ta owi, uma-ra-rana dota mengkoru hi Musa. Rasapuaka-i jadi' pangkeni-ra. Doko' nculii' lau-ramo hilou hi tana' Mesir.
Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Harun: `Babehi-taka pinotau to ma'ala tapue', bona pinotau tetu-damo to mpokeni-ta. Apa' uma-pi ki'incai napa to jadi' hi Musa tetui to mpakeni-ta malai ngkai Mesir.'
Ngkai ree, rababehi mpu'u-mi lence ana' japi ngkai bulawa. Rapue' -mi lence to rababehi tetu, rasumale' -ki porewua, pai' mosusa' -ramo mpo'une' babehia pale-ra moto.

Toe pai' Alata'ala mpalahii-ra, napelele' -ra mpopue' betue' hi langi'. Apa' ria Lolita Pue' Ala to te'uki' hi rala sura nabi-nabi, hewa toi moni-na: `Ee to Israel! Bula-ni hi tana' to wao' rala-na opo' mpulu' mpae, mposumale' -koi porewua jadi' pepue' -ni. Aga bela hi Aku' pepue' -ni tetu.

Mepue' -koi hi pue' to rahanga' Molokh, pai' tomi-na nikeni-keni oa' dohe-ni. Mepue' wo'o-koi hi pinotau to molence betue' Refan. Lence-lence toe-mi to nibabehi bona nipue'. Toe pai' kupelele' moto-koi mpai' ratawani, pai' rakeni hilou duu' rata hi mali ria ngata Babel.'

"Bula-ra ntu'a-ta owi hi tana' to wao', Pue' Ala mpohubui Musa mpobabehi kemah jadi' tomi pepuea' -ra. Kemah toe jadi' tanda karia-na Alata'ala hi laintongo' to Yahudi, pai' rababehi ntuku' lence to napopohiloi Pue' Ala hi Musa. Jadi', kemah pepuea' toe rakeni oa' ntu'a-ta owi bula-ra hi tana' to wao'.

Mahaa-hae ngkai ree, mate-ramo ntu'a-ta hi tana' to wao' toe. Pai' ana' -ra mpokeni kemah pepuea' -ra toe mesua' hi tana' Kanaan toi. Nto'u toe, Alata'ala mpopalai pue' ngata Kanaan, pai' Yosua mpakeni-ra to Israel mpema'ala tana' to tapo'ohai' -mi toi-e. Jadi' kemah pepuea' toe, ria-pidi hi laintongo' to Israel owi, duu' rata hi tempo-na Magau' Daud.
Daud tohe'e mpakagoe' nono Pue' Ala. Mekakae-i hi Pue' Ala, na'uli': `O Alata'ala to napue' Yakub owi, kuperapi' bona nupiliu-a mpowangu tomi po'ohaa' -nu.'
Aga uma napiliu-i. Ana' -na-damo mpai' to rahanga' Salomo to mpowangu Tomi Alata'ala.
"Tapi' kakoo-kono-na, Alata'ala uma-i-hana mo'oha' hi tomi to nababehi manusia'. Apa' meliu kabaraka' -na ngkai hawe'ea to rapue'. Ria hadua nabi owi to mpo'uli' hewa toi:
Na'uli' Pue' Ala: `Langi' pohuraa-ku, pai' dunia' pentodua-ku. Ha tomi napa-i mpai' to doko' niwangu-kae? Hiapa mpai' to natao jadi' tomi katidaa-kue?
Hiaa' bo Aku' -di to mpajadi' hawe'ea-nae!' Wae-mi Lolita Pue'."

Na'uli' wo'o-mi Stefanus mpo'uli' -raka totu'a to Yahudi: "Uma mowo katu'a maga-ni ompi'! Uma mowo kamengkabatu-ni! Uma mowo kamengkawongo-ni mpe'epei Lolita Pue' Ala! Bate hibalia hante ntu'a-ta owi-koi, mposapuaka oa' Inoha' Tomoroli'.

Uma ria haduaa nabi to uma rabalinai' ntu'a-ni owi. Rapatehi-ra suro-suro Alata'ala owi to mpo'uli' karia-na mpai' Batua Alata'ala to monoa', Hi'a-mi Yesus. Hiaa' hewa toe lau, koi' -mi to mpobalu' Batua Alata'ala toei hi bali' -na. Koi' to mpopatehi-i!
Koi' to mpotarima Atura Pue' Ala to raparata mala'eka hi ntu'a-ta, aga uma nituku'."
Kara'epe-na topohura toera lolita Stefanus, gigi-mi nono-ra, pai' ngkuku' maga-ramo.
Ngkai ree, Stefanus nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli', pai' -i mengoa' hi langi'. Nahilo-mi baraka' -na Alata'ala, pai' nahilo wo'o Yesus mokore hi mali ngka'ana Alata'ala.
Na'uli' Stefanus: "Hilo-dile! Kuhilo langi' mobea pai' Ana' Manusia' mokore hi mali ngka'ana Alata'ala!"
Ngkai ree, topohura agama toera mpo'ompo tilinga-ra, pai' -ra mejeu' mpesukui bona neo' -pi ra'epei lolita Stefanus. Karaperapai-nami, rahoko' -i,

pai' -i radii' hilou hi mali ngata bona rapatehi-i rapana' hante watu. Sabi' boa' to mpobalihi Stefanus mporoncu baju-ra bona lompe' pepana' -ra. Baju-ra toe rawai' -ki hadua tomane to rahanga' Saulus bona nadongo-raka.
Bula-na Stefanus rapana', mekakae-imi, na'uli': "Pue' Yesus, doa-mi kao' -ku!"
Oti toe, mowingkotu' -i pai' na'uli' napesukui: "Pue', neo' -ra nuhuku' ngkai jeko' -ra toi." Ka'oti-na mololita hewa toe, mate-imi.
Saulus wo'o-hawo mpokagoe' karapatehi-na Stefanus toe.
Tauna to mengkoru hi Alata'ala mpo'ala' woto-na Stefanus, rapotantangii' hante nono mpu'u, pai' -i ratana.

Hiaa' Saulus-hana, ngasa' mpu'u-i mpobalinai' tauna to mepangala' hi Pue' Yesus. Butu-butu ntomi-na napesua', pai' hema-hema to mepangala' hi Yesus, lompe' tomane lompe' tobine, nahoko' nadii' hilou hi mali-na pai' natonu hi topoparenta bona ratarungku'.
Jadi', topetuku' Yesus to metibo' ngkai Yerusalem toera, hiapa kahiloua-ra raparata oa' Lolita Pue'.
Wae wo'o-hawo Filipus hilou hi ngata hi tana' Samaria, mpoparata-raka Kareba Lompe' Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo'.
Nababehi wo'o tanda mekoncehi hi ria. Wae kara'epe-na to Samaria lolita Filipus toe, pai' karahilo-na tanda mekoncehi to nababehi, ratarima-mi kareba to nakeni hante nono-ra mpu'u.
Apa' napopalai seta ngkai wori' tauna to rapesuai', alaa-na me'au-au-ramo tauna toera pai' malai mpu'u-mi seta to mpesuai' -ra. Pai' napaka'uri' wo'o wori' tauna topungku pai' tokejo.
Toe pai' goe' lia-ramo to Samaria toera mpotarima Filipus.
Hi rala ngata toe, ria hadua tomane to rahanga' Simon. Simon toei hadua topobali'mata. Mahae-imi mpopehuwu pake' -na to rapokakonce to Samaria. Mpo'uli' -i, hi'a tauna to bohe baraka' -na.
Hi hi'a-damo nono hawe'ea ihi' ngata, lompe' maradika lompe' ntodea, ra'uli': "Simon toei, ria-ki-hana baraka' -na ngkai Alata'ala to rahanga' Kabaraka' Bohe."
Mahae-imi mpakakonce-ra hante pake' -na, duu' -na hawe'ea pue' ngata toe mpotuku' -i pai' mpe'epei hawa' -na.

Aga karata-na Filipus hi ngata-ra, natudui' -ra Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo', pai' natudui' -ra mepangala' hi Yesus bona jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na. Jadi', wori' -ramo pue' ngata mepangala' hi Yesus pai' mpopeniu' jadi' topetuku' Yesus, lompe' tomane lompe' tobine.
Ngkai ree, Simon wo'o-hawo mepangala', pai' -i raniu'. Oti-i raniu', metuku' oa' -imi hi Filipus, apa' konce-i mpohilo tanda to mekoncehi pai' tanda baraka' to jadi'.

Suro Pue' Yesus to hi Yerusalem mpo'epe napa to jadi' hi Samaria, apa' ria to mpo'uli' -raka: "To Samaria toera ria, mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala wo'o-ramo-rawo." Toe pai' mohawa' -ra mpahawa' Petrus pai' Yohanes hilou hi ria.
Karata-ra Petrus pai' Yohanes hi ria, mosampaya-ramo mpekakae-raka to Samaria to mepangala' -mi hi Pue' Yesus, bona Pue' mpowai' -ra Inoha' Tomoroli'.
Apa' ko'ia-ra nakahompoi Inoha' Tomoroli'. Muntu' raniu' -ra mpokahangai' hanga' Pue' Yesus.
Yohanes pai' Petrus mosampaya pai' -ra mpojama to Samaria toera. Jadi', mporata mpu'u-ramo Inoha' Tomoroli'.
Nahilo-hawo Simon, hema-hema to rajama suro Pue' Yesus toera, mporata mpu'u-ramo Inoha' Tomoroli'. Toe pai' Simon mpokeni doi-na hilou hi Petrus pai' Yohanes,
pai' na'uli' -raka: "Wai' -a-kuwo kuasa-ni tetu, bona hema-hema wo'o-kuwo to kujama, mporata-ra Inoha' Tomoroli'."
Na'uli' Petrus mpo'uli' -ki: "Harala ratadi-dako hi rala naraka, ntali doi-nu wo'o! Ha nu'uli' -kona, pewai' Alata'ala ma'ala ra'oli hante doi?
Uma ria huraa-nu mobago dohe-kai, apa' uma monoa' nono-nu hi poncilo Alata'ala.
Medea-moko ngkai jeko' -nu tetu-e, pai' merapi' hi Pue' bona na'ampungi patuju nono-nu to dada'a.
Apa' ku'inca mohingi' lia-ko, pai' napobatua jeko' -moko."
Na'uli' Simon mpo'uli' -raka Petrus pai' Yohanes: "Perapi' -ka-kuwo hi Pue' bona neo' -a mpai' narumpa' silaka to ni'uli' tetu-e we'i!"

Jadi', kahudu-rami Petrus pai' Yohanes mpoparata Lolita Pue' pai' mporohoi nono-ra to Samaria, nculii' -ramo hilou hi Yerusalem. Hi pomakoa' -ra toe, raparata wo'o Lolita Pue' hi rala wori' ngata hi tana' Samaria.
Rala-na hangkani, hadua mala'eka Pue' mpololitai Filipus, na'uli': "Hilou-moko tono' hi selatan, hi ohea to ngkai Yerusalem rata hi Gaza." (Ohea tohe'e uma-pi jau ratara.)

Hilou mpu'u-imi Filipus. Nto'u toe, ria wo'o-hawo hadua to Etiopia to ntara ohea toe nculii' hilou hi ngata-na. To Etiopia toei, tauna to mopangka' bohe, to mpokakamu hawe'ea ihi' tomi raja bine tana' Etiopia to rahanga' Kandake. Ka'oti-na mepue' hi Alata'ala hi Yerusalem, nculii' -imi hi ngata-na mpohawi' kereta to nadii' jara'. Bula-na mohura hi rala kereta-na, mpobasa-i sura nabi Yesaya.
Inoha' Pue' Ala mpololitai Filipus, na'uli': "Hilou-ko mpomohui' kereta toe mai."
Pokeno-nami Filipus hilou mpomohui' kereta toe. Na'epe-hawo, tauna toei mpobasa sura nabi Yesaya. Filipus mpekune' -i, na'uli': "Nu'inca wa batua-na to nubasa tetu-e?"
Na'uli' tau toei: "Beiwa-kona kaku'inca-na, apa' uma ria tauna to mponotohi-ka." Ngkai ree, nabawai Filipus ngkahe' hi rala kereta-na pai' mohura hi ncori-na.
Lolita to nabasa hi rala sura nabi Yesaya, hewa toi moni-na: Hi'a hewa hama'a bima to radii' hilou rasumale'. Hewa ana' bima to uma mobee' ane ragunci wulu-na, wae wo'o uma-i mololita nau' hamelaa.
Raruge' -i pai' rahuku', hiaa' uma ria sala' -na. Uma ria haduaa tauna to mpotutura karia muli-na apa' rapatehi-i-hana."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' -mi to Etiopia toei hi Filipus: "Uli' -ka ba hema-i to natoa' nabi toei, ba woto-na moto-di ba tau ntani' -nadi."
Jadi', ntepu'u ngkai pobasa-na toe we'i, Filipus mpakanoto-ki Kareba Lompe' Yesus.
Bula-ra mokereta toe, mpohilo-ra ue hi wiwi' ohea. Na'uli' to Etiopia toei mpo'uli' -ki Filipus: "Hilo, ohe'e mai ue. Niu' -ama-kuwo jadi' topetuku' Yesus." ((
Na'uli' Filipus: "Ane nupangala' mpu'u-imi, ma'ala moto-ko kuniu'." Na'uli' to Etiopia toei: "Kupangala' Yesus Kristus, Hi'a-mi Ana' Alata'ala."))
Ngkai ree, napopento'o-mi kereta-na, pai' -ra mehompo hilou hi rala ue, pai' Filipus mponiu' -i.
Pencore-ra ngkai rala ue, muu-mule' Inoha' Pue' Ala mpo'ala' Filipus ngkai ree, alaa-na to Etiopia toei uma-pi mpohiloi-i ba hiapa-imi. Napokaliliu pomako' -na hante nono to goe'.
Ane Filipus-hawo, muu-mule' mehupa' -imi hi ngata Asdod. Me'ongko' -imi hilou hi ngata Kaisarea, pai' halengko ohea mpoparata-i Kareba Lompe' hi butu-butu ngata to natara.
Nto'u toe wo'o, ngasa' oa' -imi Saulus mpongasai' pai' mpopatehi topetuku' Pue' Yesus. Hilou-i hi Imam Bohe,

pai' -i mperapi' sura kuasa nakeni hilou hi pangkeni tomi posampayaa hi ngata Damsyik, bona ane ria-ra narata to mpotuku' Tudui' Yesus, nahoko' pai' nakeni-ra nculii' hi Yerusalem, ba tomane ba tobine.
Jadi', pomako' -na hilou hi Damsyik tohe'e, mohu' -imi hi ngata, muu-mule' mehini ncorobaa baja ngkai langi' mpotipuhi-i.
Kamodungka-nami pai' na'epe-hawo topololita to mpo'uli' -ki: "Saulus! Saulus! Napa pai' nubalinai' -a?"
Na'uli' Saulus: "Ha hema-ko Pue'?" Na'uli' topololita toei: "Aku' -mile Yesus, to nubalinai' -e!
Wae-pi, memata-moko, mesua' hi rala ngata. Hi ria-damo mpai' ra'uli' -koko napa to kana nubabehi."
Ane doo-doo Saulus toera, uma-rapa tepololita, kuyu-ramo nakeni eka' -ra. Apa' ra'epe moto wo'o-rawo topololita toe, aga uma rahiloi hema-i to mololita.
Ngkai ree, mokore-imi Saulus mpobini' mata-na, aga uma-ipi pehilo. Jadi', ratete' -i-damo hilou hi rala ngata Damsyik.
Tolu eo kahae-na bate uma-i pehilo, pai' uma wo'o-i ngkoni' ba nginu.
Hi ngata Damsyik toe, ria hadua topetuku' Yesus, Ananias hanga' -na. Nto'u toe, mopangila-i. Hi rala pangila-na toe, Pue' Yesus mpokio' -i, na'uli': "Ananias!" Na'uli' Ananias: "Oi-a Pue'."
Na'uli' Pue': "Me'ongko' -moko hilou hi ohea to rahanga' Ohea Monoa', hi tomi-na Yudas. Pekune' hi pue' tomi ba ria to Tarsus to rahanga' Saulus. Saulus toei bula-na mosampaya,
pai' hi rala pangila-na nahilo-ko, Ananias. Nahilo-ko hilou mpohirua' -ki pai' mpojama-i bona pehilo nculii' -imi."
Na'uli' Ananias: "Pue', wori' tauna to mpotompo'wiwi Saulus tetui. Wori' pebalinai' -na hi topetuku' -nu to hi Yerusalem.
Hiaa' tumai wo'o-imi hi rehe'i, hante kuasa ngkai imam pangkeni, bona mpohoko' hawe'ea tauna to mekakae hi Iko Pue'."

Na'uli' Pue' mpo'uli' -ki Ananias: "Bate hilou-ko! Apa' Saulus toei ria, tungkai' kupelihi jadi' topobago-ku. Hi'a mpai' to mpoparata hanga' -ku hi to Yahudi pai' hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi, duu' hi magau' wo'o.
Ku'uli' moto-ki mpai' kaparia to kana natodohaka sabana petuku' -na hi Aku'."

Jadi', hilou mpu'u-imi Ananias hi tomi to na'uli' Pue' we'i. Karata-na hi ria, najama-i Saulus, na'uli' -ki: "Ompi' -ku Saulus! Pue' Yesus to nuhilo hi lengko ohea katumai-nu toi-e, Hi'a-mi to mpohubui-a tumai mpokinomo-ko. Nahubui-a tumai bona pehilo nculii' -moko, pai' -ko nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli'."
Nto'u toe, ria to hewa ruke uru molepa' ngkai mata Saulus, pai' pehilo mpu'u-imi. Pokore-nami Saulus, pai' -i raniu' jadi' topetuku' Pue' Yesus.
Oti toe, ngkoni' -imi pai' moroho nculii' -imi.
Bula-na hi Damsyik toe, hilou oa' -i hi tomi-tomi posampayaa to Yahudi hi Damsyik, pai' na'uli' -raka: "Yesus, Hi'a-mi Ana' Alata'ala."

Konce omea-ra to mpo'epe lolita-na, ra'uli': "Ha beiwa-mi-koiwo tohe'i-e? Apa' hi'a toe-mi wengi to mpopatehi tauna to mepue' hi Yesus hi Yerusalem. Pai' patuju-na tumai tetu-e, bona mpohoko' wo'o-ra to hi rehe'i pai' mpokeni-ra hi imam pangkeni hi Yerusalem bona rahuku'."
Aga kaboo-bohea baraka' -na Saulus metudui', napakanoto Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo'. Jadi', to Yahudi hi Damsyik, uma-pi rakulei' mpobaro-i.
Ba hangkuja kahae-na ngkai ree, mohawa' -ramo to Yahudi mpopatehi Saulus.
Pohawa' -ra toe, mpodongo hawe'ea wobo' wala ngata, lompe' hi eo-na lompe' hi bengi-na, bona ane liu-ipi mpai', rapatehi-imi. Ntaa' na'inca-di Saulus patuju-ra tohe'e-e.

Jadi', apa' hawe'ea wobo' radongo, Saulus kana mpali' akala-na bona ma'ala-i metibo' ngkai ngata. Toe pai' rala-na hamengi, ba hangkuja dua ana'guru-na Saulus mpokeni-i hilou hi wala tana' to mpotololiki ngata Damsyik, rapopohura-i hi rala karanci, pai' -i ra'ulu hi rala karanci toe ngkai lolo wala tana' hilou hi mali ngata, pai' kaliliu metibo' -imi.
Nculii' -imi Saulus hilou hi Yerusalem. Karata-na hi ria, doko' napobale-miraka topetuku' Yesus, aga rapoka'eka' -i, apa' ko'ia rapangalai' kametuku' -na mpu'u-mi hi Yesus.

Aga Barnabas-hana, hilou-i mpobale-ki Saulus, pai' napo'ema' -imi hilou hi suro Pue' Yesus. Natutura-raka beiwa Saulus mpohilo Pue' Yesus hi lengko ohea kahilou-na hi Damsyik, pai' beiwa Pue' mpololitai-i. Nalolita wo'o-raka kabia' -na Saulus mpokarebai kareba Pue' Yesus hi Damsyik.
Ngkai ree, hampodooa-ramo Saulus hante topetuku' Yesus hi Yerusalem, pai' modao' -i hobo' ngata mpoparata kareba Pue' Yesus hante uma ria kakoroa' -na.
Biasa wo'o-i momewai' ngkalolita pai' momehono' hante to Yahudi to mobasa Yunani. Toe pai' to Yahudi toera doko' mpopatehi-i.
Jadi', kara'inca-na ompi' -ompi' hampepangalaa' -na karia-ra to doko' mpopatehi-i, rabawa-imi hilou hi ngata Kaisarea. Ngkai Kaisarea toe, rapope'ongko' -imi hilou hi ngata Tarsus.

Jadi', nto'u toe uma-pi ria kakoroa' -ra hawe'ea topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus to hi tana' Yudea, Galilea pai' Samaria. Kawoo-woria' tauna to mepangala' hi Yesus pai' kamoroo-rohoa pepangala' -ra. Apa' mengkoru mpu'u-ra hi Pue' Ala, pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' moto to mporohoi nono-ra.
Petrus modao' mpencuai' topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus hiapa-apa. Rala-na ha'eo, rata-i hi ngata Lida.
Hi ngata Lida toe, mpohirua' -ki hadua tomane, hanga' -na Eneas. Eneas toei walu mpae-imi pungku, uma-i tepemata ngkai poturua-na.
Na'uli' Petrus mpo'uli' -ki: "Eneas, Yesus Kristus mpaka'uri' -ko! Mokore-moko, pai' lulu-mi ali' -nu." Hinto'u toe mpu'u, mokore-imi Eneas.
Hawe'ea tauna hi ngata Lida pai' hi Saron mpohilo kamo'uri' -nami, pai' mepangala' -ramo hi Pue' Yesus.

Uma molaa ngkai Lida toe, ria wo'o ngata to rahanga' Yope. Hi Yope toe, ria hadua tobine to mepangala' hi Yesus, Tabita hanga' -na. Hi rala basa Yunani hanga' -na Dorkas (batua-na: ruha). Lompe' po'ingku-na, pai' wori' petulungia-na hi tauna to mpe'ahii'.
Nto'u Petrus hi Lida, peda' danca Dorkas toei, kaliliu mate. Ka'oti-na raniu', ratu'u-i hi kamar to hi lolo-na.
Topetuku' Yesus hi Yope mpo'epe karia-na Petrus hi Lida, apa' ngata Yope toe mohu' -wadi hi Lida. Toe pai' rahubui rodua tauna hilou hi Petrus, merapi' bona napesahui tumai hi Yope.

Metuku' mpu'u-imi Petrus hilou dohe-ra. Karata-ra hi Yope, kaliliu rapo'ema' -i hilou hi powataa tomate. Hawe'ea tobine tobalu mpotipuhi Petrus. Geo' -ra pai' rapopohiloi-i baju pai' pohea to nadau-raka Dorkas bula-na tuwu' -pidi.

Ngkai ree, Petrus mpohubui-ra omea mpalahii kamar toe, pai' powilingkudu-nami mosampaya. Ka'oti-na mosampaya, pai' -i mponyanyohi tomate, na'uli' -ki: "Tabita, memata-moko!" Hangaa mobini' mpu'u-mi mata-na mponaa Petrus, pai' kaliliu mohura-imi.

Petrus mpokakamu pale-na pai' mpo'ore' -i duu' -na mokore. Oti toe, nakio' nculii' -ramo topetuku' Yesus pai' tobalu to nahubui malai-e we'i, pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ohe'i-imi bale-ni, tuwu' nculii' -imi."
Kajadia' toe rajarita hobo' hi ngata Yope, alaa-na wori' tauna mepangala' hi Pue' Yesus.
Oti toe, Petrus tida hi Yope ba hangkuja mengi-pidi kahae-na, mo'oha' hi tomi hadua topobago rewa kuliba to rahanga' Simon.
Hi ngata Kaisarea, ria hadua tomane, hanga' -na Kornelius. Kornelius tohe'ei, pangka' -na kapitee to mpohawai' ha'atu tantara to Roma hi rala hampo'emaa' to rahanga' "Tantara Italia."
Bela-i to Yahudi, aga mengkoru mpu'u-i hi Pue' Ala, pai' hira' hantinaa-ra mepue' hi Alata'ala. Wori' doi nawai' -raka to Yahudi to kabu, pai' tida-i mosampaya hi Alata'ala.
Rala-na ha'eo, ba jaa tolu libe eo wae, mopangila-i Kornelius. Hi rala pangila-na toe, monoto lia nahilo hadua mala'eka Pue' mehupa' pai' mpokio' -i, na'uli': "Kornelius!"
Me'eka' -i Kornelius mponaa mala'eka toei. Metompoi' -i: "Napa-die Pue'?" Na'uli' mala'eka toei: "Goe' -i Alata'ala mpo'epe posampaya-nu, pai' na'inca kamanara-nu mpotulungi tokabu.
Wae-pi, hubui tauna hilou hi Yope mpali' hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon Petrus, pai' kio' -i tumai.
Po'ohaa' -na mohu' hi wiwi' tahi', hi tomi hadua topobago rewa kuliba, Simon wo'o hanga' -na."
Kamalai-na mala'eka to mpololitai-i toe, Kornelius mpokio' rodua pahawaa' -na pai' hadua tantara sarumakaa-na. Tantara sarumakaa-na toe, to mengkoru wo'o-i-hawo hi Pue' Ala.
Kornelius mpo'uli' -raka napa to lako' nahilo we'i hi rala pangila-na, pai' nahubui-ra hilou hi Yope mpopali' Petrus.
Kamepulo-na, bula-ra hi lengko ohea-pidi to rahubui toera, kamohu' -ra hi Yope, Petrus wo'o-hawo ngkahe' hilou hi pengkawinaraa to hi lolo tomi to molempe ata' -na, hilou mosampaya.
Neo' tebua' -mi eo-na, mo'oro' -imi doko' ngkoni'. Jadi', bula-na mpeka'au kataha' koni', muu-mule' ria pangila-na.
Hi rala pangila-na toe, mpohilo-i langi' tebea pai' ria to hewa kumu' to mowela' ratoe hi opo' huno-na pai' ra'ulu tumai hi tana'.
Hi rala kumu' to ra'ulu toe, mparanyalaa binata, ria omea: to opo' witi' -na, to menyolo, hante danci wo'o.
Oti toe, na'epe Petrus ria to mpololitai-i, na'uli' -ki: "Ee Petrus! Mai-moko, sumale' -ramo binata toera lau, pai' nukoni'."
Na'uli' Petrus: "Uma-e' Pue'! Ko'ia ria kukoni' to rapalii' ba to ra'uli' babo' ntuku' ada agama-kai."
Na'uli' tena topololita toei mpo'uli' -ki Petrus: "Napa to na'uli' Alata'ala lompe', neo' nu'uli' iko babo'."
Pangila toe tolu ngkani nahilo, pai' oti toe, te'ore' nculii' -mi kumu' toe hilou hi langi'.

Ngkai ree, ingu' -imi Petrus mpopekiri ba napa batua-na pangila to lako' nahilo toe. Bula-na mopekiri-pidi, rata-ramo suro Kornelius hi ngata Yope. Mepekune' -ra hi pue' ngata kahiapa-na tomi Simon. Ratudo' -raka tomi to rapali' pai' hilou-ramo mokore hi wobo' wala,
pai' -ra mepekune', ra'uli': "Ba ria hi rehe'i hadua torata to rahanga' Simon Petrus?"
Bula-na mopekiri-pidi Petrus, Inoha' Tomoroli' mpo'uli' -ki hewa toi: "Epe pe'! Ria tolu tauna tumai mpali' -ko.
Pesahui mana'u. Neo' morara' nono-nu mpotuku' -ra, apa' Aku' -hana to mpohubui-ra."
Jadi', pana'u-nami Petrus ngkai tomi pai' na'uli' -raka to lako' rata toera: "Aku' -mile to nipali' -e. Napa-di to nipali' -kae?"

Ratompoi': "Kai' tohe'i, napowiwi Kapitee Kornelius. Hi'a toe, tauna to monoa' ingku-na. Mengkoru-i hi Alata'ala, pai' -i rabila' hawe'ea to Yahudi. Hadua mala'eka Pue' mpohubui-i mpokio' -ko hilou hi tomi-na, bona na'epe ba napa to nu'uli' -ki."

Petrus mpo'uli' -raka suro Kornelius toera: "Turu rei-tamo ulu hamengi." Turu mpu'u-ramo hamengi hi ree. Kamepulo-na, me'ongko' mpu'u-imi Petrus mpotuku' -ra hilou hi ngata Kaisarea. Pai' ria wo'o ba hangkuja dua ompi' hampepangalaa' ngkai Yope hilou dohe-ra.

Hamengi-ra hi lengko ohea pai' lako' rata-rada hi Kaisarea. Karata-ra hi ria, mpolia' morumpu-ramo Kornelius hante posantina-na mpopea Petrus. Ria wo'o tongki-na pai' bale-na to nakio' morumpu hi tomi-na.
Jadi', karata-na Petrus hi tomi Kornelius, mehompo-imi Kornelius ngkai tomi hilou mpotomu-i. Motingkua' -i hi nyanyoa Petrus mponyompa-i.
Aga Petrus mpotagi-i, na'ore' -i nculii' pai' na'uli' -ki: "Neo' -hawo wae! Mokore-moko. Aku' manusia' wo'o-a-wadi-kuwo, hewa iko."
Bula-na Petrus mpololitai-i, mesua' -ramo hi rala tomi. Nahilo-hawo Petrus, wori' -mi tauna himuhu.

Na'uli' Petrus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ni'inca moto-le, ntuku' atura agama-kai, kai' to Yahudi uma ma'ala mposigalo-kokoi tauna to bela-koi to Yahudi ba mesua' hi rala tomi-ni. Aga Alata'ala mpakanoto-ka hi rala pangila-ku wengi, ka'uma-na ria manusia' to babo' ntuku' ada agama ba to rapalii' mposigalo-raka.
Toe pai' kanikio' -ku tumai, uma-a leba' motance. Jadi', hewa toe lau, doko' ku'inca ba napa pai' nikio' -a tumai."
Na'uli' Kornelius: "Tolu mengi to liu, ba hewa jaa toe-mi lau, bula-ku mosampaya hi tomi-ku jaa tolu libe eo, ria ncorobaa hadua tomane mokore hi nyanyoa-ku. Pohea-na meringkila' -damo.
Na'uli' tauna toei mpo'uli' -ka: `Kornelius, Alata'ala mpo'epe posampaya-nu pai' na'inca kamanara-nu.
Wae-pi, hubui tauna hilou hi ngata Yope mpokio' tauna to rahanga' Simon Petrus. Po'ohaa' -na mohu' hi wiwi' tahi', hi tomi Simon topobago rewa kuliba.'

Toe pai' kupesahui mpotuma tauna tilou mpokio' -ko. Hiaa' lompe' mpu'u nono-nu, baa' he'i-madakoe. Jadi' hewa toe lau, morumpu-makai hi rehe'i natiroi Alata'ala, doko' mpo'epe hawe'ea to nahubui-koko Alata'ala mpo'uli' -kakai."
Na'uli' Petrus: "Wae lau monoto mpu'u-mi ku'inca, Alata'ala uma mpelence tauna.
Hema-hema to mengkoru hi Hi'a pai' to monoa' kehi-ra, bate natarima-ra, pai' uma napoposisala ba to'apa-ra.

Toi-mi kareba to naparata Alata'ala hi kai' to Yahudi, kareba to mpakanoto ohea-na bona posidaia' Alata'ala hante manusia' ma'ala jadi' lompe' nculii' hante petolo' -na Yesus Kristus. Yesus toei, Pue' hawe'ea manusia'.
Tantu ni'inca moto-mi kajadia' to jadi' hobo' hi tana' to Yahudi. Pontepu'ua-na hi Galilea ka'oti-na Yohanes mponiu' tauna to medea ngkai jeko' -ra.

Ni'inca wo'o tutura Yesus to Nazaret. Alata'ala mpopelihi-i pai' mpowai' -i Inoha' Tomoroli' pai' baraka'. Hiapa pomakoa' -na hi tana' to Yahudi, nababehi to lompe', pai' napaka'uri' hawe'ea tauna to nakuasai Magau' Anudaa', apa' Alata'ala mpodohei-i.
Kai' tohe'i-mi to mpohilo hawe'ea to nababehi hi tana' to Yahudi duu' rata hi ngata Yerusalem. Ka'omea-na, rapatehi-i, rapaku' hi kaju parika'.
Aga hi eo katolu-na, Alata'ala mpotuwu' -i nculii' pai' mpopohiloi-i hi manusia'.
Aga uma hi hawe'ea tauna, muntu' hi kai' to napelihi ami' -mi Alata'ala jadi' sabi' -na. Ka'oti-na Yesus tuwu' nculii', nginu pai' ngkoni' moto-kai dohe-na.
Nahubui-kai mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi hawe'ea tauna, pai' mposabii' Kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi to napelihi Alata'ala jadi' Topobotuhi hi hawe'ea manusia', lompe' to tuwu' -pidi lompe' to mate-mi.
Hawe'ea nabi owi mpotompo'wiwi-i, ra'uli': hema-hema to mepangala' hi Yesus, jeko' -ra ra'ampungi sabana petolo' -na."
Bula-na mololita-pidi Petrus, hompo-mi Inoha' Tomoroli' mpokahompoi hawe'ea tauna to mpo'epe lolita-na.
Konce omea-ramo to Yahudi topepangala' hi Yesus to mpodohei Petrus ngkai Yope, apa' tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi mporata Inoha' Tomoroli' wo'o-ramo-rawo.
Monoto-mi kamporata-ra Inoha' Tomoroli', apa' mololita-ra hante basa to nawai' -raka Inoha' Tomoroli', mpo'une' -une' Alata'ala. Ngkai ree, na'uli' -mi Petrus:
"Hilo pe'. Tauna toera lau, mporata-ramo Inoha' Tomoroli' hibalia hewa to jadi' hi kita'. Jadi', hema-koi to daho' mpotagi-ra? Bate kana raniu' wo'o-ramo-rawo jadi' topetuku' Yesus!"
Toe pai' Petrus mpohubui-ra hira' Kornelius bona raniu' mpokahangai' hanga' Yesus Kristus. Oti toe, Kornelius pai' doo-na merapi' hi Petrus bona mo'oha' -i ulu dohe-ra ba hangkuja mengi.
Ngkai ree, suro Pue' Yesus hante ompi' -ompi' hampepangalaa' to hi tana' Yudea mpo'epe karia-ra to bela-ra to Yahudi mpotarima wo'o-ramo-rawo Lolita Alata'ala.
Toe pai' karata-na Petrus hi Yerusalem, ba hangkuja dua to Yahudi topepangala' hi Yesus mposalai' -i,
ra'uli' -ki: "Napa pai' mesua' -ko-kona hi tomi tauna to babo' ntuku' ada agama-ta, pai' ngkoni' wo'o-ko-kona dohe-rae?"
Ngkai ree, Petrus mpotutura-raka hawe'ea to jadi' ngkai lomo' -na, na'uli':
"Bula-ku mosampaya hi ngata Yope, muu-mule' molinga' -a pai' ria pangila-ku. Hi rala pangila-ku toe, kuhilo kumu' to mowela', ratoe hi opo' huno-na pai' ra'ulu tumai ngkai langi' hompo hi ncori-ku.
Kukamata ihi' -na, kuhilo-kuwo wori' nyala binata to opo' witi' -na, binata to me'ila, binata to menyolo, pai' nte danci wo'o.
Ngkai ree, ku'epe to mpololitai-a, na'uli' -ka: `Petrus, mokore-moko, sumale' -ramo pai' nukoni'.'
"Kutompoi': `Uma-e' Pue'! Ko'ia ria hangkania kukoni' binata to rapalii' ba to babo' ntuku' ada agama-kai.'
"Ku'epe tena lolita tohe'e mpo'uli' -ka: `Napa to na'uli' Alata'ala lompe', neo' nu'uli' iko babo'.'
Tohe'e kuhilo tolu ngkani, pai' te'ore' nculii' -mi hilou hi langi'.
"Nto'u toe wo'o-hawo, rata-mi tolu tauna hi tomi po'ohaa' -ku. To tolu toera, tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi to rahubui ngkai ngata Kaisarea hilou hi Yope mpopali' -a.

Inoha' Tomoroli' mpo'uli' -ka: `Petrus, neo' morara' nono-nu mpotuku' tauna toera.' Jadi', hilou mpu'u-ama dohe-ra. Pai' ria moto sabi' -ku hi rehe'i, apa' ompi' -ta to ono toera mai mpodohei-a hilou hi Kaisarea. Karata-kai hi tomi Kornelius, mesua' -makai hi rala-na.
Kornelius mpotutura-kakai kampohilo-na hadua mala'eka mehupa' hi tomi-na to mpo'uli' -ki: `Hubui tauna hilou hi Yope mpopali' hadua tomane to rahanga' Simon Petrus bona tumai-i.
Hi'a mpai' to mpoparata-koko kareba to mpokeni kalompea' hi iko, duu' -na hi hawe'ea tauna ihi' tomi-nu.'
"Jadi', bula-ku mpololitai-ra-pidi, hompo-mi Inoha' Tomoroli' mpokuasai-ra, hibalia hewa to jadi' hi kita' to Yahudi lomo' -na.
Ngkai ree, kukiwoi-mi lolita Pue' to mpo'uli': `Yohanes meniu' hante ue, aga koi' mpai' raniu' hante Inoha' Tomoroli'.'

Jadi', ompi' -ompi', monoto-mi Alata'ala mpowai' Inoha' Tomoroli' hi hira' to bela-ra to Yahudi, hibalia hewa to nawai' -taka kita', sabana pepangala' -ta hi Pue' Yesus Kristus. Jadi', hema rahi-a aku' toi-e, pai' daho' -a mpolawa' patuju Alata'ala?"

Kara'epe-na toporumpu toera lolita Petrus, rabahakai-mi mposalai' -i. Mpo'une' Alata'ala lau-ramo, ra'uli': "Ane wae-tano, natarima moto-ra-rawo Alata'ala tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi, napalogai-ra medea ngkai jeko' -ra duu' -na mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na."

Jadi', ntepu'u ngkai karapatehi-na Stefanus, topetuku' Yesus hi Yerusalem rabalinai', pai' wori' -ramo to metibo' hilou hi ngata doo, alaa-na pahawu' -hawu' -ramo. Ria-ra to rata hi tana' Fenisia, ria wo'o-ra to loha hi tana' Siprus pai' hi ngata Antiokhia. Hiapa kahilouaa-ra, mpoparata-ra Lolita Pue' Ala, aga muntu' hi to Yahudi-wadi.

Jadi' ngkai ree, ria wo'o-ra-rawo to mepangala' hi Yesus to ngkai tana' Siprus pai' Kirene. Ngkai hira' toe, ria to hilou hi ngata Antiokhia mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi, mpo'uli' -raka Kayesus-na Pue'.
Baraka' Pue' ria dohe-ra, pai' alaa-na wori' -ramo to Antiokhia mepangala' pai' mpotonu katuwu' -ra hi Pue'.
Jadi', topetuku' Yesus to hi Yerusalem, mpo'epe wo'o-ra napa to jadi' hi Antiokhia toe. Toe pai' Barnabas rahubui hilou hi Antiokhia.

Karata-na Barnabas hi ria, goe' lia-mi nono-na, apa' nahilo kabohe pegane' Alata'ala mpogane' tauna to mepangala' hi Yesus toera. Jadi', Barnabas mporohoi nono-ra pai' na'uli' -raka bona tida-ra mpotuku' Pue' Yesus hante nono mpu'u.
Barnabas toei, tauna to lompe' nono-na. Nakuasai-i Inoha' Tomoroli' pai' moroho pepangala' -na. Toe pai' wori' tena to Antiokhia mepangala' hi Pue'.
Oti toe, hilou-imi Barnabas hi ngata Tarsus mpopali' Saulus.

Wae kanarua' -na, napo'ema' -imi hilou hi Antiokhia. Barnabas pai' Saulus, tida-ra hi Antiokhia hampae kahae-na, morumpu ncuu-ra hante topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus to hi ria, pai' -ra mpotudui' wori' tauna. Hi Antiokhia toe-mi lomo' -na topetuku' Yesus rahanga' to Kristen.
Nto'u toe wo'o, ba hangkuja dua to Kristen ngkai Yerusalem rata hi Antiokhia. To Kristen toera, paka' nabi apa' ria pakulea' -ra mpohowa' lolita Alata'ala.

Hadua ngkai tauna toera, hanga' -na Agabus. Mokore-i pai' hante petete' Inoha' Tomoroli' nalowa ami' -mi karia-na mpai' oro' bohe hi humalili' Kamagaua' Roma. (Oro' toe madupa' mpu'u-mi nto'u poparenta-na Magau' Klaudius hi Roma.)
Mpo'epe toe, mohawa' -ramo topetuku' Yesus hi Antiokhia doko' mpotulungi ompi' hampepangalaa' -ra to hi tana' Yudea. Jadi', butu-butu dua-ra mpowai' doi ntuku' pakulea' -ra,
pai' doi tohe'e rarumpu. Oti toe, Barnabas pai' Saulus rasarumaka mpokeni doi toe hilou hi pangkeni topetuku' Yesus hi Yerusalem.
Nto'u toe wo'o, Magau' Herodes Agripa ntepu'u mpobalinai' ba hangkuja dua topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus.
Ngkai hawa' -na toe, Yakobus ompi' -na Yohanes rasumale'.
Kanahilo-na Herodes to Yahudi mpokono babehia-na toe, natampai tena: nahubui tauna mpohoko' Petrus. Tohe'e jadi' nto'u eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga' Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii.

Rahoko' mpu'u-imi Petrus, pai' -i ratarungku'. Opo' ntuda tantara rapahawa' mpodongo-i, butu ntuda, opo' -ra hampo'emaa'. Patuju-na Herodes, bona ane timpaliu-damo posusa' Paskah, rapohurai kara-kara-na Petrus hi mata ntodea pai' -i rahuku' mate.
Jadi', Petrus rapotuhu hi rala tarungku', aga topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus tida mosampaya hi Alata'ala, mposampayai-i.

Rala-na hamengi, turu-imi Petrus hi olo' rodua tantara, pai' rahoo' ntimalia pale-na hante rante. Ria wo'o tantara to mpodongo wobo' tarungku'. Patuju-na Herodes, bona mepulo mpai' rapohurai kara-kara-na hi mata ntodea.

Ntaa' we'i, hi bengi toe muu-mule' mehupa' -mi mala'eka Pue' hi rala tarungku', mokore hi ncori Petrus, pai' ria to mehini hi rala tarungku' toe. Mala'eka toei mpolengo-lengo Petrus mpolike-i, na'uli' -ki: "Ee, pesahui memata!" Nto'u toe, hangaa mobongka moto-mi rante pohoo' pale-na Petrus.
Na'uli' wo'o-mi mala'eka toei mpo'uli' -ki: "Ala' -mi pohea-nu, pai' unco' -mi sapatu' -nu!" Natuku' mpu'u-mi Petrus hawa' -na. Oti toe, na'uli' wo'o-mi mala'eka: "Mobajui-moko, pai' tuku' -ama."
Metuku' mpu'u-imi Petrus. Aga ko'ia monoto mpu'u hi rala nono-na napa to nababehi mala'eka toei. Na'uli' mpohilo pangila-i-wadi.

Jadi', mako' -ramo hilou mpoliu tantara to mpodongo wobo' to lomo' -na pai' tantara to mpodongo wobo' karomeha' -na, pai' rata-ramo hi wobo' ahe' ohea hilou hi ngata. Wobo' ahe' toe mobea moto-imi-hawo. Kaliliu-ramo mpotara wobo' toe hilou hi rala ngata. Ko'ia-ra mahae momako', moronto ncorobaa-imi mala'eka mpalahii Petrus.
Lako' toe-di monoto-mi hi Petrus, pai' na'uli': "Makono mpu'u-mi-tano! Pue' mpohubui mala'eka-na tumai mpobahaka-a ngkai pale Herodes pai' ngkai hawe'ea to doko' rababehi to Yahudi hi aku' -e."
Ka'oti-na mokanono hewa toe, hilou-imi hi tomi Maria, tina-na Yohanes Markus. Hi tomi toe, wori' tauna morumpu mosampaya.
Jadi', Petrus mpokado' wobo' hi mali tomi toe. Hadua tobine topobago hi tomi toe, hanga' -na Rode, tumai ke mpobea wobo'.

Na'epe-hawo libu' Petrus-di to hi mali wobo' -e. Nakeni kagoe' -na, uma-idi kaliliu mpobea wobo', lala' lau-idi nculii' hilou hi rala tomi mpo'uli' -raka doo-na: "Petrus-hanale to hi wobo' toe-e ria!"
Ra'uli' -ki: "Wuli-ko!" Aga najojo lau-mi mpo'uli' kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi. Toe pai' ra'uli' -ki: "Bela-le Petrus tetu-e. Mala'eka-na tetu-e."
Jadi', lingku' -na Rode hilou hi rala tomi, Petrus ntora mpokado' wobo'. Rabea mpu'u-mi wobo', rahilo mpu'u-rawo, etu-imi Petrus. Konce lia-ra.

Ngkai ree, Petrus mpohuka' -raka bona mengkalino-ra, pai' nalolita-raka beiwa Pue' mpokeni-i malai ngkai rala tarungku'. Pai' na'uli' wo'o-raka: "Napa to jadi' tohe'i, uli' -ki Yakobus pai' hi ompi' -ompi' ntani' -na." Oti toe, malai-imi Petrus hilou hi po'ohaa' ntani' -na.
Kamepulo-na mpu'u-mi, sese' -ramo tantara topojaga. Ingu' -ra ba napa to jadi' hi Petrus.

Herodes mpohubui tauna mpopali' Petrus, aga uma-i raruai'. Toe pai' Herodes mpehubui bona tantara to mpodongo Petrus toe-e ngone raparesa' pai' rapatehi. Oti toe Herodes malai ngkai tana' Yudea hilou mo'oha' hi ngata Kaisarea.

Hangkani tempo, moroe lia-i Magau' Herodes mpokaroe pue' ngata Tirus pai' Sidon. Toe pai' mohawa' -ramo to Tirus pai' to Sidon hante hanono lau mposuro tauna hilou hi ngata Kaisarea doko' mpali' kahintuwuaa' hante magau'. Apa' to Tirus pai' to Sidon toera mporata pongkoni' -ra ngkai tana' to naparentai Herodes. Lomo' -na, kako'ia-ra mponyanyo magau', ra'oluhi hadua pahawaa' -na to mpo'urusi tomi magau', hanga' -na Blastus, bona tono' hi hira' -i, pai' lako' hilou-ra mponyanyo magau' mpali' kahintuwuaa'.
Jadi', hi eo to rapakatantu, Herodes mpo'unco' pohea kamagaua' -na pai' mohura hi pohuraa kamagaua' -na, pai' -i mololita hi ntodea.
Mogora-ramo ntodea mpo'une' Herodes, ra'uli': "Tohe'i-e bela-pi lolita manusia'. Hewa pololita tauna to mobaraka' to ngkai langi'!"
Hinto'u toe, mala'eka Pue' mpohuku' ncorobaa Herodes hante haki', apa' molangko rahi nono-na, pai' uma-i dota mpobila' Alata'ala. Bula-na tuwu' -pidi, ulea ami' -imi, alaa-na napomate-ki.
Jadi' kahaa-haea kawoo-woria' tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Pue', pai' kawoo-woria' -mi to mepangala' hi Yesus.
Ane Barnabas pai' Saulus, kahudu-na bago-ra hi Yerusalem, nculii' -ramo hilou hi Antiokhia, pai' mpokeni wo'o-ra Yohanes Markus dohe-ra.

Hi olo' topetuku' Yesus to hi Antiokhia, ria ba hangkuja dua nabi pai' guru to mpokeni Lolita Pue', hanga' -ra: Barnabas; Simeon to ra'atu Nto'eta; Lukius to ngkai ngata Kirene; Menahem to rapokakama dohe Magau' Herodes Antipas; pai' Saulus.

Hangkani, bula-ra mepue' hi Pue' Ala pai' mopuasa', Inoha' Tomoroli' mpololitai-ra hewa tohe'i: "Barnabas pai' Saulus toe, kupelihi-ra jadi' topobago-ku. Jadi', patani' -ramo, bona hilou-ra mpobabehi bago to kupopokoloi-raka."
Jadi', ka'oti-ra mopuasa' pai' mosampaya, rajama-ramo Barnabas pai' Saulus, pai' raposampayai. Oti toe, rapope'ongko' mpu'u-ramo hilou mpokeni Kareba Lompe'.
Jadi', apa' Inoha' Tomoroli' mpahawa' -ra mpopalele Kareba Lompe', mako' -ramo hilou hi ngata Seleukia to hi wiwi' tahi'. Ngkai ree, mpohawi' kapal-ramo hilou hi lewuto' Siprus.
Karata-ra hi ree hi ngata Salamis, raparata-mi Lolita Alata'ala hi tomi posampayaa to Yahudi. Yohanes Markus mpongawa' -ra hi rala bago-ra toe.

Modao' -ra hobo' hi lewuto' toe, duu' -ra rata hi ngata Pafos. Hi ria-ra mpohirua' -ki hadua to Yahudi, hanga' -na Baryesus. Hi rala basa Yunani hanga' -na Elimas. Elimas toei, hadua topobali'mata to wori' inca-na, pai' na'uli' wo'o kahi'a-na nabi Alata'ala. Hi'a toei bale-na gubernur to hi lewuto' toe, Sergius Paulus hanga' -na. Gubernur toei, tauna to pante. Nakio' -ra Barnabas pai' Saulus tumai mpohirua' -ki, apa' doko' na'epe-hawo Lolita Alata'ala. Aga Elimas topobali'mata toei, mpobaro lolita-ra, apa' doko' nalawa' bona neo' mpai' gubernur mepangala' hi Yesus.
Tapi' Saulus-- to rahanga' wo'o Paulus-- nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' -i. Mpomonaa-i Elimas, na'uli' -ki:
"Ee topebagiu ngkaraka'! Iko bali' hawe'ea to monoa'! Hewa Magau' Anudaa' -hana kehi-nu tetu-e! Napa pai' uma nubahakai oa' mpohala'weo tudui' Pue' to monoa'?

Wae lau, hilo pe'! Pue' mpohuku' -ko! Ngkai wae lau wero-ko, uma-poko pehilo ba hangkuja eo kahae-na!" Hinto'u toe, Elimas mporasai ria to mo'eta hewa rangahu mpoleru mata-na, alaa-na mogao' -gao' -i-damo mpopali' tauna mpotete' -i.
Kanahilo-na Gubernur napa to jadi' tohe'e, mepangala' -imi hi Pue' Yesus, apa' konce-i mpo'epe tudui' Pue'.
Ngkai Pafos, Paulus pai' doo-na mpohawi' kapal hilou hi ngata Perga hi tana' Pamfilia. Hi ngata toe, Yohanes Markus mpalahii-ra pai' nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem.
Ngkai Perga, rapokaliliu pomako' -ra rata hi ngata Antiokhia hi tana' Pisidia. Hi Eo Sabat (eo pepuea' -ra to Yahudi), hilou-ramo mohura hi tomi posampayaa to Yahudi.

Hi porumpua toe, ria to mpobasa Atura Musa pai' sura nabi-nabi. Oti toe, pangkeni tomi posampayaa toe mpohubui tauna hilou mepekune' hi Paulus pai' Barnabas, ra'uli' -raka: "Ompi', ane ria lolita-ni doko' mpotudui' -kai, hewa toe lau kipalogai-koi mololita."
Kamokore-nami Paulus, mohuka' bona molino-ra, pai' na'uli': "Ompi' -ompi' -ku to Israel, pai' koi' wo'o to bela-koi to Israel aga to mepue' -mokoi hi Alata'ala: Epe-ka-kuwo lolita-ku.

Alata'ala to tapue' kita' to Israel mpopelihi-mi ntu'a-ta owi, pai' napopomuli-ra alaa-na wori' lia-ramo bula-ra mesowo' hi tana' Mesir. Ngkai ree, napopohiloi-ra kuasa-na to bohe nto'u kanatete' -ra malai ngkai Mesir.
Oti toe, opo' mpulu' mpae kahae-na, napengkatarii mpohilo pesapuaka-ra bula-ra hi tana' to wao'.
Pitu magau' hante ntodea-ra hi tana' Kanaan nadagi bona tana' -ra nabagi-bagi-raka to Israel bona hira' -mi pue' -na.
Kajadia' hawe'ea tohe'i we'i, kira-kira opo' atu lima mpulu' mpae kahae-na. "Oti toe, Pue' Ala mpowai' -ra tadulako-tadulako to jadi' pangkeni-ra, duu' rata hi nabi Samuel.

Nto'u toe, merapi' -ra bona Pue' Ala mpowai' -ra magau'. Jadi', Alata'ala mpowai' -ra magau', Saul hanga' -na, ana' -na Kis muli Benyamin. Saul toe-mi to jadi' magau' to Israel opo' mpulu' mpae kahae-na.

Aga ka'omea-na Pue' Ala mpopohu-i ngkai huraa-na, pai' -i mpo'ongko' Daud jadi' magau' to Israel. Toi-mi to na'uli' Alata'ala mpotompo'wiwi Daud: `Daud ana' Isai toei, tauna to mpokagoe' nono-ku pai' to mpobabehi konoa-ku.'
"Ompi' -ompi', ngkai muli Daud toe-mi, Alata'ala mpo'ongko' -taka kita' to Israel hadua Magau' Tompohore-ta ngkai huku' jeko' -ta, ntuku' pojanci-na owi. Magau' toei, Yesus hanga' -na.
Kako'ia-na Yesus mpotepu'u bago-na, Yohanes Topeniu' mpo'uli' -raka hawe'ea to Israel bona medea-ra ngkai jeko' -ra pai' -ra raniu'.

Neo' hudu-mi pobago-na Yohanes, na'uli' -raka ntodea: `Ntuku' pomporataa-ni, hema-a aku' toi-e? Bela-kuwo aku' Magau' to nipopea. Rata moto-i mpai' ane oti-pi bago-ku. Bangku' jadi' pahawaa' -na to mpobongka koloro sapatu' -na, uma-a-kuwo natao.'
"Ompi' -ompi' -ku muli Abraham, pai' koi' wo'o to bela-koi to Yahudi aga to mepue' -mi hi Alata'ala: Hi kita' toi-mi raparata kareba toe, to mpo'uli' ohea bona tebahaka-ta ngkai huku' jeko' -ta.

Ompi' -ta to mo'oha' hi Yerusalem hante pangkeni-ra, uma ra'incai Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo' toei. Uma ra'incai batua-na lolita nabi to rabasa butu Eo Sabat. Toe pai' rahuku' mate-i-hana Yesus. Ntaa' hante babehia-ra tohe'e, te'ihii' lau-mi to ralowa nabi owi.
Nau' uma raratai to toto-na rahuku' mate-ki, aga raperapi' oa' hi Pilatus bona rapatehi-i.
Hudu-mi rababehi hawe'ea to te'uki' owi to mpolowa-i, rapopana'u woto-na ngkai kaju parika' -na pai' -i ratana.
Aga Alata'ala mpotuwu' -i nculii'.
Oti toe, wori' mengi-i-pidi mpopehuwu woto-na hi tauna to mpotuku' -i ngkai Galilea hilou hi Yerusalem. Hira' toe-mi to jadi' sabi' -na hi kita' to Yahudi, Kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo'.

"Jadi' ompi' -ompi', hewa toe lau, kai' -mi to mparata-kokoi Kareba Lompe' tohe'i. Napa to najanci Alata'ala owi hi ntu'a-ta, napadupa' hi kita' muli-ra tempo toi-e hi kanapotuwu' -na nculii' Yesus ngkai kamatea. Hewa to te'uki' hi rala Rona' Daud karomeha' -na: `Iko-mi Ana' -ku. Eo toe lau kupo'Ana' -moko.'

Yesus tohe'e, napotuwu' mpu'u-imi Alata'ala, pai' bate uma-ipi mate nculii' ba jadi' pope hi rala daeo'. Toe-mile batua lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' hewa toi-e: `Napa to kujanci-ki Magau' Daud owi, bate moroli' pai' monoa' kadupa' -na. Napa to kujanci toe, bate kupadupa' hi koi'.'
"Toe wo'o-mi batua lolita Daud hi rala posampaya-na, na'uli' hewa toi: `Woto-ku uma nupelele' hi rala daeo' duu' -na pope, apa' Aku' batua-nu to nupelihi.'

Ompi' -ompi', bela woto-na Daud moto to natoa' lolita toe we'i. Apa' Daud mpobabehi hawe'ea to nahubui-ki Alata'ala, pai' kahudu tuwu' -na hi dunia' toi, mate-imi. Woto-na ratana hi ncori daeo' ntu'a-na pai' bate jadi' pope-mi.
Aga Yesus, to napotuwu' nculii' Alata'ala-e, uma-i-hana jadi' pope hi rala daeo'.
Jadi', ompi' -ompi', toe pai' kuparata-kokoi kareba toi: hante napa to jadi' hi Yesus toe, jeko' -ni ma'ala ra'ampungi.

Uma-ta bisa tebahaka ngkai huku' jeko' -ta hi kampotuku' -ta Atura Musa. Aga hema-hema to mepangala' hi Yesus, tebahaka mpu'u-ra ngkai hawe'ea jeko' -ra, duu' -na jadi' monoa' mpu'u-ramo hi poncilo Alata'ala.
"Aga kana tapelompehi, bona neo' mpai' jadi' hi kita' hewa to na'uli' Alata'ala hante wiwi nabi owi. Na'uli':

`Pelompehi-e', koi' to meruge'. Konce-koi mpai' mpohilo babehia-ku, ka'omea-na rahuku' mate-koi. Apa' tempo toi kubabehi anu to mobaraka' lia. Hiaa' oja' -ko-koina mpopangala', nau' ria to mponotohi-kokoi.'"
Kamalai-ra Paulus pai' Barnabas ngkai tomi posampayaa toe, tauna to morumpu hi ree mpo'uli' -raka: "Kiperapi' bona Eo Sabat to rata, tumai wo'o-koi mpai' mpakanoto tena-kakai tudui' toe-e we'i."

Oti toe, pagaa' -gaa' -ramo ngkai tomi posampayaa toe. Wori' to Yahudi mpotuku' Paulus pai' Barnabas. Pai' wori' wo'o tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi aga to mesua' -mi hi agama Yahudi, metuku' wo'o-ra-rawo mpotuku' Paulus pai' Barnabas. Suro Pue' Yesus toera mpo'apui nono-ra bona tida-ra mepangala' hi Alata'ala to mpowai' -ta kalompea' ngkai kabula rala-na.
Jadi', mingku boko' hi Eo Sabat wo'o-mi, neo' hawe'ea pue' ngata morumpu doko' mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala.
Tapi' karahilo-na to Yahudi kawori' tauna to morumpu, mohingi' -ramo. Toe pai' raruge' -i Paulus pai' rabaro hawe'ea to na'uli'.

Tapi' hangkedi' kabia' -ra Paulus pai' Barnabas mololita. Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -raka to Yahudi: "Taoa-na, Lolita Alata'ala kana raparata mperi'ulu hi koi' to Yahudi. Tapi', bo uma-ko-koina dota ntarima, koi' moto-mi-koiwo to mpakanoa' ka'uma-nakoi natao mporata katuwua' to duu' kahae-hae-na. Wae-pi, kipalahii-mokoi, hilou mpokeni Lolita Alata'ala hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi!
Apa' toi-mi hawa' Pue' Ala hi kai'. Na'uli': `Kupelihi-moko jadi' baja to mpobajahi nono tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi, bona Iko mpoparata kalompea' hi tauna humalili' dunia'.'"

Kara'epe-na-rawo tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi lolita toe, goe' -ramo, pai' -ra mpo'une' Lolita Pue'. Pai' hema-hema to napelihi ami' -mi Alata'ala bona mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na, mepangala' -ramo hi Pue' Yesus.
Jadi', Lolita Pue' molele hobo' hi tana' toe.
Tapi' to Yahudi mpo'ukei' totu'a-totu'a ngata pai' tobine-tobine to mo'ua' to mengkoru hi Alata'ala, alaa-na Paulus pai' Barnabas rabalinai' pai' rapopalai ngkai ngata Antiokhia.
Toe pai' Paulus hante Barnabas mpotonta awu to hi witi' -ra, tanda kabela-napi-rawo hira' to mpotangku ane Alata'ala mpohuku' pue' ngata toe. Oti toe hilou-ramo hi ngata Ikonium.
Topetuku' Pue' Yesus hi Antiokhia, nakuasai-ramo Inoha' Tomoroli' pai' goe' lia nono-ra.

Napa to jadi' hi ngata Antiokhia wengi, toe wo'o to jadi' hi Ikonium. Paulus pai' Barnabas hilou hi tomi posampayaa to Yahudi, pai' -ra mpoparata Kareba Lompe' hi tauna to morumpu hi ria, alaa-na wori' to Yahudi pai' to bela-ra to Yahudi mepangala' hi Yesus.
Tapi' to Yahudi to uma dota mepangala' mpo'ukei' ntodea to bela-ra to Yahudi, bona mpokahuku' -ra topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus.

Paulus pai' Barnabas, mahae-ra mobago hi ngata toe. Mpoparata-ra Kareba Pue' hante uma ria eka' -ra. Pai' Pue' moto-mi mpotulungi-ra, apa' nawai' -ra baraka' mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi, bona monoto-mi hi hawe'ea tauna kamakono-na lolita to rakeni. Lolita toe mpo'uli' kabula rala Alata'ala mpowai' kalompea' hi manusia'.
Tapi' ihi' ngata toera uma-ra hintuwu'. Ria-ra to tono' hi to Yahudi, ria wo'o-ra to tono' hi suro Pue' Yesus.
Ka'omea-na tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi pai' tauna to Yahudi hante pangkeni-ra wo'o, mohawa' -ramo doko' mpobalinai' pai' mpowatuhi-ra Paulus pai' Barnabas.
Ntaa' ra'inca-di Paulus pai' Barnabas patuju-rae. Toe pai' metibo' -ramo hilou hi tana' Likaonia, pai' -ra mo'oha' hi ree, mohu' hi ngata Listra pai' Derbe.
Hi ree wo'o-ra mpoparata Kareba Lompe'.
Hi ngata Listra, ria hadua tomane to pungku ngkai lomo' kaputu-na. Ntora mohura-i-wadi, apa' uma moroho witi' -na pai' uma mpu'u nakulei' momako'.
Topungku toei mohura mpo'epe Paulus mololita. Paulus mpenoto' -i pai' nahilo karia pepangala' -na bona rapaka'uri' -i.
Toe pai' na'uli' napesukui: "Mokore monoa' -moko!" Hangkore-idile, pai' -i momako' hilou tumai.
Karahilo-na ntodea napa to nababehi Paulus toe, mololita-ramo hi rala basa-ra moto, to rahanga' basa Likaonia, ra'uli': "Hompo-mi anitu bola' tumai hi wongko dunia' molence mpo-manusia'!"
Barnabas rahanga' Zeus, pai' Paulus rahanga' Hermes, apa' Paulus poko topololita.

Ngkai ree, apa' ria-hawo tomi pepuea' hi Zeus hi mali ngata, pangkeni agama-ra ngkeni ba hangkuja ma'a pamawa japi pai' wunga hilou hi wobo' ngata, hangkaa-ngkania hante tauna to wori'. Patuju-ra, doko' mposumale' japi toe rapopepue' hi Barnabas pai' Paulus.
Ntaa' we'i, kara'epe-na Barnabas pai' Paulus napa patuju-ra, raheu' -heu' -mi pohea-ra, tanda kasusa' nono-ra, pai' -ra mokeno hilou hi laintongo' tauna to wori', rapesukui mololita, ra'uli':

"Napa-di to nibabehi tohe'i-ee? Kai' toi-e, manusia' biasa moto wo'o-ka-kaiwo hewa koi'. Tumai-kai tohe'i-e, mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi koi', bona nibahakai mepue' hi pue' to uma ria kalaua-na tetu, pai' bona mepue' -koi hi Alata'ala to Tuwu', Alata'ala to mpajadi' langi', dunia', tahi' hante hawe'ea ihi' -na.
Owi Pue' Ala mpelele' tauna humalili' dunia' mpotuku' konoa-ra moto.

Aga nau' wae, uma nalipo' mpowai' -ta tanda-tanda to mpakanoto-taka karia-na Alata'ala. Nawai' -ta wori' nyala pewai' to lompe': nawai' -ta uda ngkai langi', napopowua' hinu'a-ta hi tempo-na. Nawai' -ta pongkoni', nawai' -ta kagoea' nono."
Nau' wae-mi lolita-ra Paulus pai' Barnabas hi ntodea, aga mokoro lia-pidi mpotagi-ra bona neo' -ra mpokeni pepue' -ra hi hira'.

Uma mahae ngkai ree, ba hangkuja dua to Yahudi to ngkai ngata Antiokhia pai' Ikonium rata hi Listra, doko' mpo'ewa Paulus. Mpo'ukei' -ra ntodea hi Listra bona hira' wo'o doko' mpo'ewa-i. Oti toe, hilou-ramo mpowatuhi-i pai' -i radii' hilou hi mali ngata pai' rapalahii-mi hi retu, ra'uli' -rawo mate-imi.
Ntaa' we'i, bula-ra topetuku' Yesus mokore ntololikia-na, muu-mule' memata-imi, pai' -i kaliliu mesua' hi rala ngata. Kamepulo-na, hilou-imi dohe Barnabas hi ngata Derbe.

Hi Derbe, Paulus pai' Barnabas mpoparata wo'o Kareba Lompe', alaa-na wori' tauna jadi' topetuku' Yesus. Ngkai ree, nculii' -ramo hilou hi ngata Listra, pai' ngkai ree hilou hi Ikonium, kaliliu wo'o hi ngata Antiokhia tana' Pisidia.

Hi butu ngata to rakahiloui toe, rarohoi nono-ra topetuku' Yesus, ra'uli' -raka: "Neo' tabahakai mepangala' hi Pue' Yesus, apa' kita' to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala kana mporata kaparia ncala', aga hi eo mpeno mo'oha' -ta dohe-na hi rala Kamagaua' -na."

Hi butu ngata to rakahiloui toe, Paulus pai' Barnabas mpo'ongko' tauna to jadi' pangkeni to mpototu'ai topetuku' Yesus hi ria. Mopuasa' pai' mosampaya-ra, merapi' bona Pue' mpewili' -ra, apa' Hi'a-wadi poncarumakaa-ra.
Oti toe, Paulus pai' Barnabas mpokaliliu pomako' -ra ntara hi tana' Pisidia rata hi tana' Pamfilia.
Ngkai ree-ra mpokeni Lolita Alata'ala hi ngata Perga, pai' lako' mana'u-ra hilou hi wiwi' tahi' rata hi ngata Atalia.

Hudu-mi pobago-ra mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi ngata-ngata toe. Toe pai' mehawi' kapal-ramo nculii' hilou hi ngata Antiokhia hi tana' Siria. Apa' ngkai ngata Antiokhia toe-mi pontepu'ua pomako' -rae wengi, pai' topetuku' Yesus to hi Antiokhia toe-ramo wengi to mposampayai-ra pai' merapi' bona Alata'ala mpewili' -ra hante kabula rala-na bula-ra mpobago bago to lako' hudu rapobago toe.

Karata-ra hi Antiokhia toe, rarumpu-ramo hawe'ea topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus, pai' ratutura-raka hawe'ea to nababehi Alata'ala hi pomakoa' -ra. Ralolita wo'o beiwa Alata'ala mpobea-raka ohea bona tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi mepangala' wo'o-ra-rawo hi Yesus.
Jadi', Paulus pai' Barnabas, mahae hala' -ra tida hi ngata toe dohe topetuku' Yesus.

Ria ba hangkuja dua to Yahudi ngkai Yudea to mepangala' -mi hi Pue' Yesus, hilou hi ngata Antiokhia. To Yahudi toera mpotudui' topetuku' Yesus hi Antiokhia, ra'uli' -raka: "Ane uma-koi ratini' ntuku' ada to hi rala Atura Musa, bate uma-koi mpai' tebahaka ngkai huku' jeko' -ni!"

Uma mowo pe'ewa-ra Paulus pai' Barnabas mpobaro tudui' -ra toe. Ka'omea-na, to Kristen to hi Antiokhia mpo'uli': "Agina tasuro ba hangkuja dua doo-ta hilou hi Yerusalem, mpobua' kara-kara toe hi suro Pue' Yesus pai' totu'a ntani' -na." To rasuro hilou toe, hira' Paulus, Barnabas, pai' ba hangkuja dua to ntani' -na.

Jadi', to Kristen to hi Antiokhia mpobawa-ra rata hi mali ngata. Ngkai ree, mako' -ramo hilou mpotoa' Yerusalem. Hi pomakoa' -ra tohe'e, mpotara tana' Fenisia pai' Samaria, pai' halengko ohea ratutura beiwa tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi medea ngkai jeko' -ra pai' mepangala' hi Pue' Yesus. Kareba tohe'e mpakagoe' nono-ra hawe'ea ompi' hampepangalaa'.

Rata mpu'u-ramo hi Yerusalem, to Kristen hi ria hante suro Pue' Yesus pai' totu'a ntani' -na mpotarima lompe' -ra. Ngkai ree, Paulus pai' Barnabas mpotutura-raka hawe'ea to nababehi Alata'ala hi pomakoa' -ra wengi mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi.

Aga ria wo'o ba hangkuja dua to Parisi to mepangala' -mi hi Pue' Yesus. Pokore-rami to Parisi toera, ra'uli': "Tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi tetura, uma hono' ane mepangala' -ra hi Yesus-wadi. Kana ratini' wo'o-ra pai' rahubui mpotuku' Atura Musa."
Toe pai' morumpu-ramo suro Pue' Yesus pai' totu'a ntani' -na, mpohurai kara-kara toe.

Mahae lia-ra momewai' ngkalolita. Ngkai ree, Petrus mokore pai' na'uli': "Ompi' -ompi', ni'inca moto ba hangkuja mpae to liu, aku' napelihi Alata'ala ngkai laintongo' -ta, nahubui-a mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi tauna to bela kita' to Yahudi. Ra'epe mpu'u-mi Kareba Lompe', pai' mepangala' -ramo hi Yesus.
Pai' Alata'ala to mpotiroi nono manusia', mpotarima tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi toera. Ta'inca kanatarima-ra, apa' nawai' -ra Inoha' Tomoroli', hibalia hewa to nawai' -taka kita' toi-e.
Kita' to Yahudi pai' hira' to bela-ra to Yahudi, uma napoposisala. Napakaroli' nono-ra apa' mepangala' -ramo hi Yesus.

Jadi' ompi' -ompi', napa-di pai' doko' ta'ewa patuju-na Alata'ala-e? Napa pai' doko' tapopokoloi-raka tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi parenta pai' palia to motomo lia? Bangku' ntu'a-ta-hawoe, duu' rata hi kita' toi-e lau, uma takulei' mpotuku' hawe'ea parenta pai' palia tetu-e!
Uma-ta tebahaka ngkai huku' jeko' -ta hi kampotuku' -ta parenta pai' palia hewa tetu. Taparasaya kamporata-ta kalompea' muntu' ngkai kabula rala-na Pue' Yesus-wadi. Wae wo'o-rawo hira'."

Kahudu-na Petrus mololita, hawe'ea tauna to morumpu toera, mengkalino-ra-wadi mokanono. Oti toe, rape'epei wo'o-pi lolita-ra Barnabas pai' Paulus, mpololita tanda mekoncehi pai' anu mobaraka' to rababehi hante kuasa Alata'ala bula-ra mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi.
Hudu lolita-ra Barnabas pai' Paulus, na'uli' -mi Yakobus: "Ompi' -ompi', pe'epei-ka-kuwo lolita-ku.
Ta'epe-mi we'i lolita-na Simon, mpo'uli' -taka beiwa lomo' -na Alata'ala mpopohiloi ahi' -na hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi, napelihi ngkai laintongo' -ra tauna to napajadi' ntodea-na.
Toe hibalia hante lolita-ra nabi owi, apa' ria nabi owi to mpolowa kanakio' -ra Alata'ala tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi jadi' ntodea-na. Moni-na hewa toi:

Na'uli' Pue' Ala: `Oti mpai' toe, nculii' moto-a tumai mpokinomo-ra muli to Yahudi to naparentai Daud owi. Kupoka'ahi' -ra pai' kuwangu nculii' kamagaua' -na Daud. Ngkai ree mpai', tau ntani' -na wo'o mpopali' -a. Hawe'ea tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi, to kukio' jadi' ntodea-ku, bate tumai-ra hi Aku'.'
Wae-mi ponguli' Pue' to mpakanoto patuju-na ngkai owi."
Napokaliliu Yakobus lolita-na, na'uli': "Jadi' ompi' -ompi', toi-mi lolita-ku. Neo' -ta-hawo mpakasusa' -ra to bela-ra to Yahudi to mengkoru-mi hi Alata'ala. Neo' tapewuku-ra mpotuku' Atura Musa.

Sampale-wadi, agina ta'uki' sura, taperapi' bona neo' -ra mpokoni' pongkoni' to rapopepue' hi pinotau, neo' ngkoni' raa' pai' neo' ngkoni' bau' to uma ralali ncala' raa' -na. Pai' ta'uli' wo'o-raka bona neo' -ra mogau' sala' hante toronaa ba hante tobine doo.

Taperapi' bona ratuku' hawa' -hawa' toe, bona hintuwu' -ra hante to Yahudi. Apa' ngkai owi, to Yahudi hiapa-apa mpobasa Buku Atura Musa butu Eo Sabat hi tomi posampayaa. Pai' hawa' -hawa' toe raparata-raka hi butu ngata po'ohaa' -ra."

Kahudu-na pololita Yakobus toe, suro-suro Pue' Yesus pai' totu'a ntani' -na hante hawe'ea topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus to morumpu toera mpokahibaliai kabotu' -ra, ra'uli': "Agina tapelihi ba hangkuja dua doo-ta, tasuro-ra hilou hi Antiokhia dohe Paulus pai' Barnabas, mpokeni kabotu' lolita-ta." Jadi', rapelihi mpu'u-mi rodua tauna. Hanga' -na to hadua, Silas. Pai' hanga' -na to hadua, Yudas, to rahanga' wo'o Barsabas. To rodua toera, tauna to rabila' hawe'ea ompi' hampepangalaa'.

Oti toe, suro Pue' Yesus mpo'uki' kabotu' lolita-ra hi rala sura, pai' ratonu hi Silas pai' Yudas bona rakeni hilou hi Antiokhia. Moni-na hewa toi: "Kai' suro Pue' Yesus pai' totu'a to Kristen to hi rehe'i to nipo'ompi' hi rala Pue' Yesus, mpopakatu sura toi hi ompi' -ompi' to bela-koi to Yahudi to hi ngata Antiokhia, hi tana' Siria pai' Kilikia. Wori' tabe!
"Ria ki'epe ba hangkuja dua-ra ngkai kai' hi rehe'i tilou mpaka'ingu' -koi pai' mpolengo pepangala' -ni hante tudui' -ra. Jadi', bona ni'inca: bela-kaiwo kai' to mposuro-ra.

Toe pai' mohawa' -makai hi rehe'i hante hanono lau, mpopelihi rodua doo-kai to kihubui tilou. To kihubui tilou, ompi' -ta Yudas pai' Silas. Hira' to rodua toera-damo mpai' to mpo'uli' -kokoi hante wiwi-ra moto napa to ki'uki' hi rala sura toi. Yudas pai' Silas toe, kihubui tilou hidohea hante Barnabas pai' Paulus to kipoka'ahi'. Barnabas pai' Paulus tohe'ira, tauna to mpotonu-mi katuwu' -ra hi Pue' -ta, Yesus Kristus, bona mpopalele hanga' -na.

"Ompi' -ompi', toi-mi kabotu' to kirata ntuku' konoa Inoha' Tomoroli', pai' to kipokono wo'o-kaiwo, kai' pangkeni-ni, bona neo' -koi rapakasusa' hante wori' nyala parenta. Uma-koi rapewuku mpotuku' Atura Musa. Toi-wadi to paraluu ki'uli' -kokoi:

Kiperapi' bona neo' -koi mpokoni' pongkoni' to rapopepue' hi pinotau. Neo' ngkoni' raa', pai' neo' ngkoni' bau' to uma ralali ncala' raa' -na. Pai' neo' mogau' sala' hante toronaa ba hante tobine doo. Ane nipokalaa-damo katuwu' -ni ngkai hawe'ea toe, hono' -mi. Hudu rei-mi ulu lolita-kai."

Ka'oti-ra mositabe, me'ongko' mpu'u-ramo to rasuro toera hante Paulus pai' Barnabas hilou hi ngata Antiokhia. Karata-ra hi Antiokhia toe, rarumpu-ramo hawe'ea topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus pai' ratonu-miraka sura to rakeni ngkai Yerusalem.
Karabasa-na hi ntodea sura toe, goe' -ramo omea, apa' ihi' -na mpotanta'u nono-ra.
Oti toe, Yudas pai' Silas mololita moloe wo'o-ra-rawo, mporohoi nono ompi' hampepangalaa' -ra pai' mparesai' -ra bona tida-ra mepangala' hi Pue', apa' hira' roduaa nabi to mpoparata Lolita Pue' Ala.

Ba hangkuja mengi-ramo tida hi Antiokhia, pai' oti toe rapope'ongko' -ramo nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem. Ra'uli' to Antiokhia toera, mpo'uli' -raka Silas pai' Yudas: "Pelompehi hi ohea. Parata-kaka-kaiwo tabe-kai hi suro Pue' Yesus to mpohubui-koi tumai." ((
Aga Silas-hana, na'uli': "Ko'ia-a ulu nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem. Hi rehe'i-a ulu hi Antiokhia."))
Ane Paulus pai' Barnabas, mahae hala' -ra-rana hi Antiokhia, mpotudui' tauna pai' mpoparata Lolita Pue', hante wori' tau ntani' -na.

Ngkai ree, na'uli' Paulus hi Barnabas: "Nculii' -tamo hilou mpencuai' ompi' -ompi' hampepangalaa' -ta hi butu-butu ngata to tatara-mi wengi mpokeni Lolita Pue', bona tahilo kababeiwa-na pepangala' -ra."
Barnabas doko' ngkeni Yohanes Markus hi pomakoa' -ra toe,
tapi' Paulus mpo'uli': "Neo', apa' napalahii-ta wengi hi tana' Pamfilia, ko'ia hudu bago-ta."
Ngkai ree, momehono' -ramo Paulus pai' Barnabas, alaa-na mogaa' -ramo. Barnabas mpo'ala' Markus napodohe, pai' -ra mpohawi' kapal hilou hi tana' Siprus.

Paulus mpelihi Silas napo'ema', pai' -ra me'ongko' -rawo. Pai' ompi' -ompi' hampepangalaa' -ra hi ngata Antiokhia mpope'ongko' -ra hante mosampaya, bona Alata'ala mpewili' -ra hante kabula rala-na hi pomakoa' -ra.
Paulus pai' Silas mpodaoi' tana' Siria pai' Kilikia, mporohoi nono-ra topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus to hi ria.

Paulus mpokaliliu pomako' -na hilou hi ngata Derbe pai' Listra. Hi ngata toe, ria hadua topepangala' hi Yesus, hanga' -na Timotius. Tina-na, to Yahudi to mepangala' wo'o-mi-hawo hi Yesus. Aga tuama-na to Yunani.
Timotius toei, tauna to rabila' hawe'ea ompi' hampepangalaa' -na hi ngata Listra pai' Ikonium.

Konoa Paulus bona Timotius hilou dohe-na hi pomakoa' -na mpokeni Kareba Lompe'. Toe pai' natini' -i ulu ntuku' Atura Musa. Patuju-na mpotini' -i toe, bona to Yahudi mpotarima-i, apa' hawe'ea to Yahudi hi tana' toe mpo'inca Katoyunani-na tuama-na.

Ngkai ree, me'ongko' wo'o-ramo Paulus pai' doo-na, pai' hi butu ngata to ratara, raparata oa' hi topetuku' Yesus kabotu' lolita suro Pue' Yesus pai' totu'a hi Yerusalem wengi. Pai' ratudui' -ra bona mpotuku' hawa' -hawa' to rapakatantu-mi toe.
Ngkai ree, karoo-rohoa pepangala' -ra topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus hi ngata toe, pai' butu eo-na kawoo-woria' tauna to mepangala'.
Inoha' Tomoroli' uma mpiliu-ra Paulus pai' doo-na mpoparata Lolita Pue' Ala hi propinsi Asia. Toe pai' rabalii' -mi patuju-ra, pai' hilou-ramo mpodaoi' tana' Frigia pai' Galatia.
Karata-ra hi sipa' tana' Misia, ke kaliliu-ra hilou hi propinsi Bitinia, aga Inoha' Yesus mpotagi-ra, neo' hilou hi ria.
Toe pai' raliu tana' Misia, pai' -ra mana'u hilou hi ngata Troas to hi wiwi' tahi'.

Hi bengi poturu-ra hi Troas, mopangila-i Paulus. Rala pangila-na tohe'e, mpohilo-i hadua tomane to ngkai propinsi Makedonia mokore hi mai, mpopetulungi, na'uli': "Mai-mokoi hi Makedonia mpotulungi-ka-kaiwo!"
Hi kampohilo-na pangila-na toe, ngkarewa mpu'u-makai hilou hi tana' Makedonia toe, apa' monoto-mi hi kai' kanahubui-kai Pue' Ala mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi ria.
Me'ongko' -makai ngkai Troas, mpohawi' kapal hilou hi lewuto' Samotrake, pai' kamepulo-na hilou hi ngata Neapolis.

Ngkai ree, mehompo-makai ngkai kapal, pai' -kai mako' hilou hi ngata Filipi. Filipi toe, ngata hi bagia Makedonia to lomo' -na. Wori' to Roma mo'oha' hi ngata toe. Hi ree-makai ba hangkuja mengi kahae-na.
Hi Eo Sabat, hilou-kai hi po'ole halu' hi mali ngata, apa' ki'inca karia-na posampayaa-ra to Yahudi hi ria. Jadi', mohura-kai hante ba hangkuja dua tobine pai' kipololitai-ra.

Ria hadua tobine to rahanga' Lidia ngkai ngata Tiatira. Lidia toei, tauna to mepue' hi Alata'ala. Pobago-na, mpobalu' kain to molei jore' to masuli' oli-na. Pue' Ala mponotohi nono-na, alaa-na natarima mpu'u-mi napa to natudui' -ki Paulus.

Oti toe, Lidia hante tauna ihi' tomi-na, raniu' omea-ramo jadi' topetuku' Pue' Yesus. Oti-ramo raniu', nabawai-kai hilou mo'oha' hi tomi-na, na'uli' -kakai: "Ane nihilo makono pepangala' -ku hi Pue' Yesus, mai-tamo hilou hi tomi-ku." Pai' napewuku-kai kana ntuku' pomperapia' -na.

Hangkani wo'o, kahilou-kai hi posampayaa to Yahudi toe, hirua' -kai hante hadua tobine to tuwu' batua. Tobine toei, ria anitu-na. Ngkai baraka' anitu toe, ma'ala-i mpolowa napa mpai' to jadi' kako'ia-na jadi'. Maradika-na mporata wori' doi ngkai pobago-na toe.

Tobine toei ntora mpotuku' -kai kai' Paulus, pai' ntora mejeu' -i, na'uli': "Tauna tohe'ira batua Alata'ala to meliu baraka' -na ngkai hawe'ea to rapue'! Tumai-ra toi-e mpo'uli' -kokoi ohea bona tehore-koi ngkai huku' jeko' -ni."

Rala-na ba hangkuja eo, bate toe oa' -mi lolita-na, alaa-na oha-imi Paulus mpo'epe-i. Ngkai ree, pe'ili' -nami Paulus pai' na'uli' hi anitu to mpesuai' tobine toei: "Hante hanga' Yesus Kristus, palai-ko ngkai tobine tetui!" Palai-na mpu'u-mi-hawo anitu toei.
Ngkai ree, rahilo-rawo pue' -na tobine toei, ka'uma-napi ria pomporataa-ra doi. Toe pai' rahoko' -ramo hira' Paulus pai' Silas, pai' -ra radii' hilou hi topohura ngata to hi laintongo' ngata.
Karata-ra hi topoparenta to Roma, ra'uli': "Tauna tohe'ira to Yahudi, tumai-ra mpobalinai' ngata-ta.
Mpotudui' -ra tauna mpotuku' ada to mosisala hante ada-ta. Kita' to Roma, uma-ta ma'ala mpotarima ba mpotuku' ada to hewa toe."
Ntodea wo'o-hawo medulu mepakilu. Jadi', topoparenta toera mpehubui bona pohea-ra Paulus pai' Silas raroncu ngkai woto-ra pai' -ra raweba'.
Wori' mela-ramo raweba', pai' oti toe ratarungku' -ramo. Ra'uli' mpo'uli' -ki kapala' tarungku': "Nujaga mpu'u-rae' to rodua toera!"
Toe pai' napopesua' -ramo hi bagia tarungku' to poko hi rala-na, pai' witi' -ra ntimalia rahoo' hi kaju to motomo.
Jadi' ngkai ree, ba ntongo' bengi-mi, Paulus pai' Silas mosampaya pai' morona' mpo'une' Alata'ala. Tauna to ratarungku' ntani' -na mpo'epe rona' -ra.
Nto'u toe, muu-mule' ria ncorobaa linu bohe, alaa-na parawatu tarungku' toe molengo. Kaliliu mobea hawe'ea wobo', pai' mobongka moto-mi rante to rahoo' -raka hawe'ea to ratarungku'.
Molike-imi kapala' tarungku', nahilo-hawo hawe'ea wobo' tebea-mi. Kanawute' -nami piho' -na doko' mekahunca', apa' na'uli' -hawo metibo' -ramo hawe'ea to ratarungku'.
Kanahilo-na Paulus toe, mekio' -imi ngkai rala tarungku', na'uli': "Neo' mekahunca', he'i moto-kai omea!"
Ngkai ree, kapala' tarungku' mperapi' hulu', pai' -i mokeno mesua' hi rala tarungku'. Moridi' -imi mowilingkudu mponyanyo Paulus pai' Silas.
Nakeni-ramo hilou hi mali-na pai' na'uli' -raka: "Napa-kuwo to kana kubabehi bona neo' -a mpai' rahuku'?"
Ra'uli' Paulus pai' Silas: "Mepangala' -moko hi Pue' Yesus, tebahaka moto-ko mpai' ngkai huku' jeko' -nu, iko pai' tauna to hi rala tomi-nu."
Ngkai ree, Paulus pai' Silas mpoparata Lolita Pue' hi kapala' tarungku' toei, pai' hi hawe'ea tauna to hi rala tomi-na.
Jadi', nto'u toe kapala' tarungku' mpokeni-ra hilou hi mali-na, pai' nabohoi' webaa' -ra. Pai' hi bengi toe wo'o, hi'a hante hawe'ea tauna to hi rala tomi-na raniu' jadi' topetuku' Yesus.
Oti toe, nakeni-ramo hilou hi tomi-na pai' -ra napokoni'. Goe' lia-ramo hantomia, apa' mepangala' -ramo hi Alata'ala.
Kamepulo-na topoparenta to Roma mpohubui polisi hilou hi tarungku' pai' mpo'uli' -ki kapala' tarungku': "Bahaka-ramo to rodua to rahoko' wengi."
Mpo'epe toe, na'uli' -mi kapala' tarungku' toei hi Paulus pai' Silas hewa tohe'i: "Rata hawa' ngkai topoparenta, mpo'uli' -ka bona rabahaka-mokoi. Jadi', hilou-mokoi, pai' pelompehi-hawo momako'."

Aga na'uli' Paulus hi polisi toera: "Kai' tohe'i to Roma-kai. Ko'ia-di rapohurai kara-kara-kai ntuku' atura poparenta Roma, ncaliu raweba' -maka-kaina hi mata ntodea pai' ratarungku'. Hiaa' wae-e lau doko' rapopalai bongo wo'o-makai. Uma-kai dota! Uli' -raka retu, bate hira' moto-rawo to tumai mpobahaka-kai."
Nculii' -ramo-rawo polisi toera mpowoli' lolita Paulus hi topoparenta. Kara'epe-na topoparenta Katoroma-ra Paulus pai' Silas, me'eka' -ramo.
Hilou-ramo merapi' ampu hi Paulus pai' Silas, pai' rabawa-ra hilou hi mali-na, pai' ra'uli' -raka: "Agina malai-mokoi ngkai ngata-kai."

Jadi', malai-ramo Paulus pai' Silas ngkai tarungku', pai' -ra hilou hi tomi-na Lidia. Hi ria-ra mpohirua' -raka ompi' -ompi' hampepangalaa' -ra, pai' mporohoi nono-ra. Oti toe, me'ongko' mpu'u-ramo mpalahii ngata Filipi.
Paulus pai' Silas mpokaliliu pomako' -ra ntara hi ngata Amfipolis pai' Apolonia, rata hi ngata Tesalonika. Hi Tesalonika toe, ria tomi posampayaa to Yahudi.
Jadi', kahilou-na wo'o-mi Paulus hi tomi posampayaa toe hewa kabiasaa-na, pai' momewai' ngkalolita hante tauna to morumpu hi retu. Tolu mingku mometuku', hewa toe oa' pobago Paulus hi Eo Sabat.

Mobasa-i Buku Tomoroli', napakanoto pai' nabajahi-raka batua-na, na'uli': "Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Pue' Ala owi, bate kana mporata kaparia duu' -na mate, aga tuwu' nculii' moto-i. Yesus to kulolita-kokoi toi, Hi'a-mi Magau' Topetolo' to ralowa owi-e."

Ria-ra to Yahudi to mpangala' lolita toe, pai' -ra mpotuku' Paulus pai' Silas. Wori' wo'o-ra to Yunani to mengkoru hi Pue' Ala pai' wori' wo'o tobine to bohe hanga' -ra, mepangala' wo'o-ramo-rawo hi lolita to nakeni Paulus toe.

Aga to Yahudi to uma mepangala', mohingi' -ramo mpokahingii' -ra hira' Paulus pai' Silas. Toe pai' me'ukei' -ra mpo'ukei' tauna to dada'a to mengkalose-lose hi rala ngata. Wori' -mi to morumpu, mako' -ramo hilou mpobabehi pewongoia hi rala ngata. Pomako' -ra toe, rata hi tomi Yason, apa' hi ria po'ohaa' -ra Paulus pai' Silas. Mesua' -ramo hi rala tomi toe ke doko' mpohoko' pai' mpokeni-ra hilou hi ntodea.

Jadi', apa' uma-ra raruai', Yason moto-mi to rakahurui. Rahoko' -i hante ba hangkuja dua topepangala' hi Yesus ntani' -na, pai' radii' -ra hilou hi topohura ngata. Rata ria, mejeu' -ra, ra'uli': "Paulus pai' doo-doo-na toi-e mpaka'ingu' tauna humalili' dunia'. Hiaa' rata wo'o-ramo hi ngata-ta toi-e.
Pai' Yason tohe'ii, natarima-ra-hana hi rala tomi-na! Hira' toe-mi to mpo'ewa hawa' Kaisar, magau' -ta hi Roma, ra'uli' karia-na magau' ntani' -na to rahanga' Yesus."
Mpo'epe lolita-ra toe, morani' mpu'u-mi nono ntodea hante nono-ra wo'o topohura.
Ka'omea-na, Yason pai' topepangala' hi Yesus ntani' -na rapopowaya', pai' lako' rabahaka.

Hi bengi toe, ompi' -ompi' hampepangalaa' -ra to hi Tesalonika mpo'uli' -raka Paulus pai' Silas: "Agina malai-mokoi ngkai rei." Jadi', malai mpu'u-ramo hilou hi ngata Berea. Karata-ra hi Berea, hilou-ra hi tomi posampayaa to Yahudi.
To Yahudi to hi Berea toera, lompe' nono-ra, uma-ra hewa to hi Tesalonika. Goe' -ra mpo'epe Kareba Yesus, pai' butu eo-na rapewulihi' Buku Tomoroli' bona ra'inca ba makono lolita Paulus ba uma.
Ka'omea-na, wori' to Yahudi toera to mepangala' -mi hi Yesus, pai' wori' to Yunani to bohe hanga' -ra, mepangala' wo'o-ramo hi Yesus, lompe' tomane lompe' tobine.

Uma mahae ngkai ree, to Yahudi to hi ngata Tesalonika mpo'epe karata-na wo'o-mi Paulus hi Berea mpokeni Lolita Alata'ala. Toe pai' kahilou-ra wo'o-mi hi Berea. Karata-ra hi ria, ra'ukei' pai' raranii' nono ntodea.
Jadi' ngkai ree, ompi' -ompi' hampepangalaa' -na Paulus mpesahui mpobawa-i hilou hi wiwi' tahi'. Aga Silas pai' Timotius, tida moto-ra hi Berea.
Tauna to mpobawa Paulus toera mpobawa-i rata hi ngata Atena. Oti toe na'uli' Paulus mpo'uli' -raka: "Nculii' -mokoi hilou hi Berea, pai' uli' -raka Silas pai' Timotius bona sohi' -ra tumai hi aku'."
Bula-na Paulus mpopea-ra Silas pai' Timotius hi Atena, susa' -mi nono-na mpohilo kawori' -na pinotau to rapue' to Atena.
Toe pai' hi tomi posampayaa, momewai' ngkalolita-i hante to Yahudi pai' tau ntani' -na to mesua' -mi agama Yahudi. Pai' butu eo-na, momewai' ngkalolita wo'o-i hante hema-hema to narua' hi rala ngata.

Hi ngata Atena toe, ria wo'o-ra tauna to pante to mpotuku' tudui' Epikuros pai' tudui' to Stoa. Tauna to pante toera mpomehono' -ki Paulus. Ria-ra to mpotuntui' -i, ra'uli': "Mpo'uli' napa-idie tauna toei-e mai? Pe'inca-na hangkedi', tapi' lolita-na wori'." Ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli': "Ba lue' doko' natudui' -ta hanga' pue' to ko'ia ta'incai," apa' hi rala tudui' -na, Paulus mpokahangai' Yesus pai' katuwu' -ra nculii' manusia' ngkai kamatea.
Toe pai' rabawa-imi hilou hi poromua bohe to rahanga' Bulu' Areopagus, ra'uli' -ki: "Doko' ki'epe-kaina tudui' -nu to bo'u tetu-e.
Ko'ia ria ki'epei tudui' to motani' rahi hewa tetu, pai' doko' ki'inca batua-na."
(Apa' to Atena pai' tau ntani' -na to mo'oha' hi Atena, kagoea' -ra doko' ntora mpo'epe pai' mpojarita lolita-lolita to bo'u.)
Ngkai ree, pokore-nami Paulus hi laintongo' -ra to morumpu hi Bulu' Areopagus toe, pai' na'uli': "Pue' ngata Atena! Kuhilo hi rala butu nyala pogau' -ni, mo'agama mpu'u-koi.

Apa' bula-ku modao' hi rala ngata-ni mpohilo pepuea' -ni, kuhilo-kuwo hameha' watu pepuea' to ria ukia' -na hewa tohe'i: `Pepuea' hi Pue' to Uma Ra'incai Hanga' -na.' Jadi', pue' to uma ni'incai hanga' -na tetu-e, Hi'a-mi to kuparata-kokoi tohe'i-e.
Alata'ala to mpajadi' dunia' hante ihi' -na omea, Hi'a-mi Pue' langi' pai' dunia'. Uma-i-hawo mo'oha' hi tomi pepuea' to nababehi manusia'.
Uma wo'o-i merapi' tulungi hi manusia', apa' Hi'a-hana to mpowai' -ta katuwua' pai' inoha' pai' hawe'ea to taparaluu.
Ngkai hadua tauna, napopomuli hawe'ea manusia', pai' nahubui-ta mpo'ohai' humalili' dunia'. Napakatantu ami' -mi ngkai lomo' -na sipa' tana' po'ohaa' butu negara pai' tempo poparenta-na.
Nababehi hewa toe bona doko' ta'inca kahema-na, bona ane tapali' -i, tapohirua' mpu'u-ki. Apa' kakoo-kono-na, uma-i molaa ngkai kita' butu dua-ta.

Hewa to ra'uli' totu'a: `Ngkai Hi'a-wadi pai' alaa-na tuwu' -ta pai' mongkale-ta pai' ria-ta hi rala dunia'.' Hibalia wo'o to na'uki' ntu'a-ni owi to pante mpobabehi rona', na'uli': `Hawe'ea-tale, ana' Alata'ala moto-ta.'
"Jadi' ompi' -ompi', apa' lawi' kita' ana' -na, uma lompe' ane Pue' Ala taponcawa lence to rababehi ngkai bulawa ba ngkai salaka' ba ngkai watu, ntuku' kapantea manusia'.

Owi, ane mepue' -ta hi pue' to uma makono hewa tetu, uma-ta nahuku' Alata'ala. Napiri moto mata-na hi kawojoa-ta tetu. Tapi' hewa toe lau, nahubui hawe'ea manusia' hi humalili' dunia' medea ngkai jeko' -ra.

Apa' napakatantu-mi hangkani tempo mpai', mpobotuhi-i kara-kara tauna humalili' dunia' hante kanoo-noaa' -na. Bago pompobotuhi toe mpai', natonu hi hadua tauna to napelihi ami' -mi. Tauna toei, napotuwu' nculii' ngkai kamatea, bona monoto hi hawe'ea tauna Kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi to napelihi jadi' Topobotuhi hi hawe'ea manusia'."

Kara'epe-na lolita Paulus toe, hantongo' -ra mpotawai-i, apa' uma rapangalai' karia tauna to tuwu' nculii' ngkai kamatea. Aga ria moto wo'o-ra hantongo' to mpo'uli': "Doko' tena-pidi-kai mpo'epe lolita-nu tetu."
Oti toe, malai-imi Paulus ngkai porumpua-ra.

Aga ria-ramo to mpotuku' -i pai' mepangala' -ramo hi Yesus. Hadua to mepangala' hi Yesus toe, hanga' -na Dionisius, pangkeni porumpua to hi Bulu' Areopagus. Ria wo'o hadua tobine to rahanga' Damaris, pai' ba hangkuja wo'o-pi to ntani' -na.
Oti toe, me'ongko' -imi Paulus ngkai Atena, hilou hi ngata Korintus.

Hi Korintus toe, Paulus hirua' hante hadua to Yahudi to rahanga' Akwila. Ngata kaputua-na hi tana' Pontus. Akwila toei hante Priskila tobine-na, lako' rata wo'o-ra-rawo hi Korintus toe, apa' lako' mentoli-ra ngkai tana' Italia. Pentoli-ra ngkai tana' Italia toe, apa' ria hawa' Magau' Klaudius mpopalai hawe'ea to Yahudi ngkai ngata Roma to hi tana' Italia. Jadi', karata-na Paulus hi Korintus, hilou-i mpencuai' -ra hira' Akwila pai' Priskila,
pai' -i mo'oha' dohe-ra. Mobago-ra hangkaa-ngkania, apa' pobago Paulus hibalia hante pobago-ra hira', mpobabehi kemah.
Butu Eo Sabat, Paulus momewai' ngkalolita hante tauna to morumpu hi tomi posampayaa, lompe' to Yahudi lompe' to Yunani. Patuju-na doko' mponotohi nono-ra bona mepangala' -ra hi Pue' Yesus.

Jadi', karata-ra Silas pai' Timotius ngkai propinsi Makedonia, Paulus uma-pi mobago mpobabehi kemah. Napake' hawe'ea tempo-na mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi to Yahudi, na'uli' -raka Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala.

Tapi' to Yahudi to hi Korintus ntora mporuge' -i. Toe pai' natonta-mi awu to mentaka' hi pohea-na, tanda kanapalahii-ra. Pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ane nahuku' Alata'ala-koi, bela aku' to mpotangku! Koi' moto-koiwo! Ngkai wae lau, kupalahii-mokoi, hilou-ama mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi!"
Oti toe, malai mpu'u-imi hilou hi tomi to hi ncori tomi posampayaa toe. Pue' tomi toe, bela-i to Yahudi, aga to mepue' hi Pue' Ala. Hanga' -na Titius Yustus.

Aga hadua pangkeni tomi posampayaa toe to rahanga' Krispus, mepangala' wo'o-i hi Pue' Yesus hante hawe'ea posantina-na. Pai' wori' wo'o to Korintus ntani' -na mpo'epe kareba to nakeni Paulus toe, duu' -na mepangala' wo'o-ramo-rawo hi Pue' Yesus, pai' -ra raniu' jadi' topetuku' -na.
Rala-na hamengi, mopangila-i Paulus. Hi rala pangila-na toe, Pue' mpo'uli' -ki: "Neo' -ko me'eka', pai' neo' nupento'oi mpoparata Lolita-ku.
Apa' wori' mpai' tauna hi ngata toi to jadi' ntodea-ku. Aku' moto to mpodohei-ko. Uma mpai' hema to dungku pale-ra hi iko."
Jadi' ka'omea-na, Paulus mo'oha' hi Korintus hampae ono mula, mpotudui' tauna Lolita Alata'ala.
Nto'u Galio jadi' gubernur hi propinsi Akhaya toe, to Yahudi hintuwu' mpo'ewa Paulus. Rakeni-i hilou hi tomi pobotuhia.
Rapakilu-i, ra'uli': "Hi'a tohe'i mpotudui' tauna mpopue' Alata'ala hante tudui' to mosisala hante Atura Musa!"
Ko'ia napoka'alai Paulus mololita, na'uli' -mi Galio: "Ee to Yahudi! Ane to nipakilu-ki tetu mpokahangai' petiboki-na hi atura ngata ba gau' to dada'a mpu'u, mosabara moto-a mpe'epei pangadua' -ni.
Tapi' tohe'i-e, pomehonoa' -ni mpokahangai' lolita pai' hanga' hi atura agama-ni moto-koiwo. Wae-pi, koi' moto-koiwo to mpo'urusi tetu-e lau. Aku', oja' -a-kuna!"
Oti toe, pai' napopalai-ramo ngkai tomi pobotuhia.
Hi mali tomi pobotuhia toe, ntodea mpohoko' Sostenes, hadua pangkeni tomi posampayaa, pai' -i raweba'. Aga Galio uma mposaile' babehia-ra toe.

Ngkai ree, mahae-i-pidi Paulus tida hi Korintus, pai' lako' mpalakana-i hi ompi' -ompi' hampepangalaa' -na. Patuju-na doko' nculii' hilou hi tana' Siria. Jadi', hilou-imi hi wiwi' tahi' hi ngata Kengkrea. Hi ria-i mpopesongki' wuluwoo' -na, apa' ria janci-na hi Alata'ala pai' wae-mi-hawo ada to Yahudi, ane hudu-damo tempo pojanci-ra kana rasongki' wuluwoo' -ra. Oti toe, mohawi' kapal-imi hilou hi Siria, hidohea hante Priskila pai' Akwila.

Hi pomakoa' -ra toe, mehani-ra hi ngata Efesus, pai' Paulus hilou hi tomi posampayaa pai' momewai' ngkalolita hante to Yahudi to morumpu hi ria. Raperapi' -i bona mahae hala' -i dohe-ra, tapi' uma-i dota. Sampale-di hinto'u pe'ongko' -na, na'uli' -raka: "Ane napokono Alata'ala, nculii' moto-a mpai' tumai hi rehe'i." Priskila pai' Akwila, tida-ramo-rana hi Efesus, tapi' Paulus mpokaliliu pomako' -na, mpohawi' kapal hilou hi tana' Siria.
Rata mpu'u-imi hi ngata Kaisarea hi tana' Siria, hilou ncala' -i hi Yerusalem mpotabe topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus to hi ria, pai' lako' hilou-idi hi ngata Antiokhia.
